choices: Go eat breakfast with the family
Head to the bathroom to freshen up
11.content:
Your mother’s scream for you to get up pulled you from your slumber. You groan and roll over on the sock that you call your bed, thinking that maybe its time to ask mom to buy the softer brand of tube sock. You wipe the sleep from your eyes and stretch out, working the kinks out of your sore body. Yesterday you had accidentally fallen into your sister’s shoe and for the millionth time, she forgot the one rule to always check where she is stepping and you ended up being carried out of the house in her shoe. It had been an unpleasant day for you, sure, it was aright for a little bit, but around the time your sister got to the nightclub and started dancing, things went sour. Being pushed against her sweaty toes for hours had been a pain, but when you slipped under her sole and was stepped on, you decided that you liked being with her sweaty toes more. That night you’re sister danced till the early hours of the morning, you didn’t know what time she stopped because they were yet to make watches for the three millimeter wide wrist. After the night was finished, your sister headed home, taking off her shoes when she arrived; she never even noticed the small sweat crusted body crawling out of her shoe.

You had stumbled to your bed on the lowest shelf in the living room and got about an hour of sleep before your mother started screaming for you. Stuffing your head under your sock/bed, you try to ignore the screams to wake up and get a few more moments of sweet sleep. For a second you do doze off, but are awoken again when you sense a shadow looms over you like the angel of death.

“Come on honey, it’s time to get up.” The sweet voice and the shadow belong to your mom, but you don’t care if they were the president. You need your sleep or your going to be like the living dead for the rest of the day. You wrap your sock/bed tightly yourself and try to block out your mother. Maybe if you ignore her, she’ll give up and go away.
“Honey, it’s a beautiful day out. The birds are singing, the cars are revving by and I think it might rain.” You groan at your mother’s mismatched words. You sometimes wonder how she ever graduated high school or kept down a job. Then you see her DD-cup breasts and you know the reason.

“Five more minutes,” you grumble, wishing that your sister had come home an hour earlier last night. All you need is a few more minutes of sleep and you’ll be ready to face the big bad world.

“Wake up or I’ll let your little sister look after you when me and your older sister are out.” This gets you up right away. Being trapped in your older sisters shoe all night was bad, being trapped with your younger sister for more then a minute, a hell of a lot worse. Sitting up, you glance upwards at your mom. Her huge bust blocks her face, but you know she has the sickening sweet smile on her face. The same smile she has when she’s rewarding or punishing you. Her hand lowers towards you, offering you a ride, but you wave her off. Your fourteen now and don’t need you’re mothers help doing everything. You’ve some how survived the last fourteen years at this size, with minor physical and major physiological damage. Your mother walks away and your alone, just the way you like it. Time to start another day as the three-inch boy.

choices: You scream up at someone to feed you
You walk onto someone's plate to get some food
111.content:
Crawling out of your bed/sock naked, you scratch yourself and yawn. You find that the doll clothes that make up your wardrobe are too scratchy to sleep in so you always sleep naked. You walk towards a pile of freshly bought dolls clothes that your older sister bought and get dressed. Using a rubber band as a belt, you put your pants on and slide on your shirt. There’s no good underwear out their for someone of your size, so you always go commando. You climb down the ladder connecting your sleeping area to the floor and stroll towards the kitchen. The smell of bacon and eggs wafts towards you, making your stomach rumble. Even if you have the taste of feet in your mouth from last nigh, you still have a huge appetite to satisfy. Your walk to the kitchen takes five minutes, considering that the living room is connected to the kitchen and your size, you’re making great time. The carpeted floor ends and you find the cold tile floor against your feet. The dinning room table stands high above you, with three chairs surrounding it and two filled by your family. You turn to the middle chair where your mom sits and avoid making eye contact with the other chair.

Stopping at your mom’s chair, you take a deep breath and yell out, “Down here mom!” Hearing her middle child’s tiny voice, she looks down towards you and smiles brightly. Like a thousand mornings before, her hand drops to the ground and you step onto her palm. The sensation of air passing by you occurs as your carried up and placed on the edge of the table. Throwing you mom a nod of gratitude, you leisurely walk over to a small squire between where your mother and sister sit. There a small thimble sits where you drink from and a shiny dime that you use as a plate. You tried to eat breakfast on a normal plate once and your mother accidentally forgot you were on it and dumped it in the sink. You were floating around in soapy water all day before someone found you. Since then, you don’t mind using tiny objects to eat off of.

You take your seat at the table and give a brief glance at your youngest sister, tulip. She flashes you a cruel smile and you look away. She’s probably trying to think of a new way to make your life miserable. Your other sister steps into the kitchen with a two pans of freshly made eggs and bacon. Tulip and your mom eye the plates hungrily, it seems you’re not the only one with a monstrous hunger. Everyone is severed but you, Usually ether your mom or older sister give you small crumbs from their meal to eat because most of the food that is served is bigger then you. Your older sister joins you at the table and everyone digs in. While you wait for someone to serve you breakfast, you look around the table at all of your family.

You’re mom is a beautiful, blond bombshell, that has every hot blooded guy in town drooling over. Long legs, shapely butt, and easily DD-cup breasts, even you from time to time lust after her. Although she’s got an A+ body, her mind falls more into the C- category. She’s not stupid per se, just a little ditzy and oblivious. Most of the time, she acts more like a close, flirtatious friend then a mother. Her playful outlook has left you confused and frustrated. Not many mothers ask their sons to help clean their teeth or help them shave their bikini area. You know she’s your mother and all, but sometimes you want to just gawk at her hooters and give a wolf whistle. If you ever did that she would probably thank you for the compliment.

While your mom is all play, your older sister, Tracy, is more into work. With your mother being so reckless, Tracy has had to handle a lot of things around the house. Washing, cleaning, laundry, cooking and even driving is all handled by your sister. She’s a stickler for perfection and wants everyone to do there part around the house. Frequently, you offer to help clean all those hard to reach places that the vacuum can’t reach. We must have the cleanest floors in the whole town. Tracy tries to take care of you and help you whenever you need it, sometimes her constant nit picking gets on her nerves, but you always remind yourself that at least she’s not Tulip.

Tulip, the eight-year-old menace, the midget she-devil, the plague on your tiny existence, you’re little sister. To her, you are the family toy, to be used in any perverted way imaginable. What, you have an itch on your butt? Use Steve to scratch it. What, your throat hurts? Get Steve to poke his head down your throat to check. You say that your bored? Well then, Steve will be the perfect toy for you to play with. That was Tulips attitude. No matter how many times she’s told you aren’t a toy by your mother or sister, still sticks your head up her butt and giggles as you struggle. You’ve seen more of her body then you ever wanted to. You don’t know why she gets such a kick out of seeing you suffer, maybe it has something to do with getting payback for all the attention you get from mom and Tracy, or maybe she’s just evil. Whatever the reason is, the only thing keeping tulip from turning you into her perverted doll is the rest of the family. They protect you from Tulips sick games, but when they aren’t around, look out.

Still, you have no food on in front of you. Glancing up at mom, she is scarfing down her third slice of bacon and has yet to even notice you. The same can be said about Tracy, who is still drowsy from last nights dancing and looks pretty out of it. You look Tulip and then turn away; she’ll only give you food if it can used as bait. The last thing she gave to you anything to eat, it was attached to a string and when you grabbed it, she pulled you towards her. It looks like no one is going to feed you, so you do something about it.
111.title: Meet the Mcminors

choices: She is sticking you in her food.
She is sticking you down her pants.
She is slipping you into her sock.
1111.content:
"Uhm... Excuse me..." you say. "Anyone going to... ugh..." you're getting no reaction from anybody. Your mother is still chewing away on bacon and Tracy is chugging down water, Tulip is the only one who seems to be paying attention to you is Tulip. She is staring at you, well more of glaring really, while chewing her eggs silently. You look away, trying not to lock into some interaction with her.

Everyone is ignoring you, and it feels like it's on purpose. You start to get frustrated and shout, "Hellooo!~". Still no response, and now you are starting to freak out. How does your family even expect you to stay alive, if feeding you never crosses your mind. You stamp your foot down and and scream at the top of your lungs, "WILL SOMEBODY PLEASE FEED ME!" Your eyes are squinted closed, and the table is silent. You squint an eye open and look around, crap... everyone is staring at you now.

"Steve, if you want to eat, all you have to do is ask for some food... POLITELY! I think maybe you need to learn some manners, why don't you just sit there and watch us eat", your mother has a terrible grimace and if eyes could kill... she'd be basically melting your face off right now. You try to argue the fact that you already asked, but she shushes you. You sigh and sit down, stomach growling and spirits defeated.

You notice that Tulip is still staring at you. You have nothing else to lose so you stare back at her. A smile streaks across her face, it looks pretty genuine for once. The hand not holding her fork waves you over. Nice try, girl you think and stay exactly where you are. There's no way you are falling for her tricks today.

Some minutes pass and your family is still eating without you. Your stomach growls audibly and makes you cringe. You look back over at Tulip, she's still smiling. She nods as if to beckon you towards her, and raises her fork to show you her eggs. ugh...I can't believe I'm falling for this, you think, hopefully she'll feed me at least.

You walk up to her plate, unsurprisingly she grabs you. You don't even care really, as you're still staring at her plate... There's still a couple lumps of eggs, some pieces of bacon, and... oh god there's three whole pancak...

Your train of thought is interrupted as Tulip quickly jerks her hand. What is she doing to you?
1111.title: No Soup For You!

choices: “Mom, can I keep my pancakes in the fridge till lunch?”
“Mom,  you want some more pancakes? I’m completely full”
11111.content:
Next thing you know you are pushed on one of the three pancakes and she holds you down. You are pushed down on your belly, and you can only look forward. You see you older sister and mother, but they don’t notice you struggling on Tulip’s pancake. You try to squirm to get their attention, but suddenly you notice a second pancake placed on your back. Tulip withdraws her finger and places her palm on the second one very casually.

She then proceeds to lift up the second pancake, but doing it in a way that she blocks the view of your mother and sister and only Tulip can see you. She looks down on you, but she can’t say anything because she will draw unnecessary attention. You off course, know what she has in store for you, and are not prepared to be in her mouth, or even worse, in her intestines during the weekend. However, looking for help is a problem, because your mother probably would allow it, because you were impolite.

She winks at you and slowly licks her lips. For you it is a terrifying sight, knowing that the same tongue will soon be your whole world. You try to get up, but the same finger comes back at you and presses you down. Her other hand slowly waves no and she smiles a big toothy grin.

Suddenly her hand vanishes and comes back with a bottle of honey. She holds it above you and squishes the bottle. Gooey sticky substance quickly spreads over your body, and she withdraws her finger. She knows by her experience that you are to weak to resist her now. She licks her finger and savours it while she keeps her eyes on you.
Her finger comes back and does something you didn’t expect, she moves you to the edge of the pancake. Then she puts the second pancake back down, and you notice what she has done. You are completely immobile, but you can see outside of the pancake. Then, without warning you feel the pancake being lifted and slowly turned toward your sister. On the last moment she turns the pancakes upside down so you are facing the ceiling.

Because you are turned so quickly, you lost your orientation and are extremely horrified of what you see next. Instead of seeing her tongue and throat, you only see her upper row of teeth and the roof of her mouth. Suddenly you feel hot and humid air and a giggling sound. You expect to feel her bite down, but instead she just holds you there for a few seconds. Then suddenly she extracts you from her mouth a bit and you feel her lips on your head. She starts to suck on your head, savouring all the honey dripping from it. You don’t know what to expect anymore, and you know that is what she is trying to accomplish.

Because suddenly you feel her tongue pressing on your head, sticking you a little bit further in the pancakes. You still can see outside the pancakes, but you think it will be hard to notice you. You are being placed back on her plate and oddly are left alone for a couple of minutes. You ponder on the fact that one minute ago you were a free man, and now you are trapped like a topping in some pancakes for your little sister.

The bacon that is in front of you is lifted a couple of times, so you know Tulip is still eating her breakfast. Suddenly you are again lifted, but instead of being greeted by her mouth you feel her taking a bit from the opposite side of you and you are being placed down.

Suddenly you hear her ask to her mother:
11111.title: She is sticking you in her food.

choices: Your mother secretly knows about your predicament..
111111.content:
“Mom, can I keep my pancakes in the fridge till lunch?” Your eyes widen, there is no way you just heard that correctly. You lay still in anticipation of the outcome of the conversation. You look forward and can see that your mother is sitting right across the table from you and your sister. You can see that she is reading the morning paper, but because of the pancake on top of you, there is no way to see her head.

“Why honey? Are you so full you cannot finish your breakfast?” your mother asks. “Pff, I don’t think there is any room left mom”. You find that hard to believe, she just want you in the fridge. But your mother is a bit reluctant, maybe there is some hope left! Maybe she has been watching Tulip and will save you the last moment!
“I don’t know honey, there almost isn’t enough room left in the fridge to put the pancakes” Your mother replies, and with that remark your last hope is also gone. “Give your plate to me, then I will finish them”.

But Tulip isn’t planning to share and quickly gets up and walks to the fridge and opens the door. She looks into the fridge and notices that the fridge is indeed almost full. There are a lot of Tupperware in the fridge, but she notices that there is room for one container more. Tulip smiles and opens a cabinet next to the fridge containing the Tupperware and gets one out. She also takes a marker and a etiquette and sits back at the table.

Your mother is watching Tulip amused but says nothing. Your sister is looking at your mom and says “I’m sorry mom, but I really like the taste of the pancakes and have prepared them already, so if you don’t mind I’ll eat them during lunch.” You already know that your mother will give in to your sister, so you start to squirm. “Also, I found a nice spot for one more container, and it is only for a few hours”. Then I will get it out and rinse it, ok mommy?” Suddenly your view is blocked by a container and you know that will be your extra prison. You double your struggles to get out and get seen, but you don’t make any progress.

Your mother smiles sweetly at Tulip and says that it is ok, and with that she start reading her paper again. Your sister eyes your mother and when she is sure that she isn’t looking she quickly lifts up the pancakes and peers through the crack. She sees her brother fighting to get out, but unable to. You see your sisters face through the crack and Tulip waves a goodbye! You are furious with your sister, but all the sounds are muffled.

Then without warning you feel the pancakes drop and she gently places the pancakes in the container. You are on the edge and have a distorted view of the outside. You notice a shadow above and suddenly the air pressure is a bit different. Tulip placed the lid on the container. You are so frustrated with the whole situation. Instead of a lazy weekend you are imprisoned in pancakes, which are imprisoned in a container and will soon be imprisoned in the fridge.

The container is turned with Tulip’s hand and you notice she is writing a etiquette with her other hand. Although distorted you see her picking it up and sticks it to the side of the container in your view. You almost laugh if it wasn’t so sad. The writing simply said “Tulip’s food”, and she wasn’t wrong.

Tulip is admiring her handywork and enjoys the fact that her brother was in that very container sharing the fate of the pancakes in it. She gets her glass of milk and leans back on her chair while drinking. She gently starts to tap on the container and savouring the moment. Suddenly her mother startled her . “Well, put it in the fridge then”. Not wanting to risk getting caught, she quickly gets the container and walks to the fridge. She opens the door and gently places the container in the right spot, making sure her brother was looking outside. She taps it one more time, and slowly started to close the door.

You are frustrated beyond believe, but there is not a single thing you can do. You just have to endure the view of the closing fridge and face the fact that for the next couple of hours you are nothing but Tulips food, waiting to be consumed.

“Good girl” is the last thing you hear from your mother before the lights went out.
111111.title: “Mom, can I keep my pancakes in the fridg...

choices: One of Tulip's friends sitting at the table.
1111111.content:
Bright white light floods the fridge, someone has opened the door. As your eyes adjust you see a hand reaching in and grabbing your container. You are pulled out of the fridge and placed on the counter. The hand pries open the container and you get a full view of Tulip’s vicious smile. “How was your morning, bug?” she asks, making sure to emphasize the bug part. You get a good look at her for a moment before responding with “… cold.”

The past few hours had been excruciating. All you could do was wait and stare outward at the fuzzy darkness through the container walls. The cold of the fridge had solidified the honey, freezing you into place. The way your body froze made you feel a bit like Han Solo, trapped in carbonite. Luckily, thanks to Tulip sucking the honey off of your head earlier, you could at least move that around. The only good part of the whole experience was that you were able to eat some of the pancake above you, though you’d never tell Tulip that.

“Well then, let’s warm you up!” Tulip cheers, and turns on the stove top. She grabs a pan from the cupboard and starts buttering it up. ’Oh god!’, you think to yourself. ’She’s going to use the stove to heat me up!’ This might not be so terrifying if you didn’t know about the rest of Tulip’s cooking career. Any time she would cook, you’d be force to try to eat her… concoctions. She seemed to have a knack for turning food into charcoal.

She places the pancakes (and you) down into the pan. You can’t see her from the angle you are at, but you shout in protest anyways. “Please don’t! Just let me out! You can eat me right now if you want!” you plead. You hear a giggle from behind you, followed by Tulip saying “Ew! Then you’d be all cold and icky.” You mentally facepalm and think ’this girl’s logic…’

She swivels the pancakes around for a bit, but you quickly lose her attention and she walks away. You can’t hear what she’s doing due to the butter crackling nearby. The pancake below you begins to heat up and, thankfully, so does the honey. You can finally wiggle your limbs slightly. It’s not very much but it still feels like stretching after being stuck in place for so long.

The pancake below you starts to get too hot and you scream out, “Hey!!!! You’re going to burn me!” Tulip rushes over with a spatula and flips the pancakes over. “Oops, sorry about that.” she says. Before the next pancake overheats, you proactively shout “Okay! I’m done!” It’s only after you say it do you realize that you actually just admitted to being food.

Tulip laughs at this and scoops the pancakes out of the pan, dropping them onto a plate. “We make a pretty team, you know. I’m going to have to use you every time I cook something!” You cock an eyebrow at her and say “Yeah, too bad I’ll only last a few meals… you know… before I burn to death.” She laughs and picks up the plate.

Tulip moves over to the table and sets down the plate. Looking out of your pancake prison you see…
1111111.title: Warming Up

11111111.content:
Looking out between the pancakes, you can see your sister's face, lowered to meet your gaze. Her mouth is wide open, she lunges forward at you and snaps her teeth shut just short of you. Smiling, she says "guess where you're headed, bug!" Her mouth opens again and you get a clear view of the inside. Her tongue is hanging so far out of her mouth that the tip reaches the tabletop. She pulls it back into her mouth and drags it across her top row of teeth, paying particular attention to her incisors.

"Please don't do this, Tulip" you plead. You think that your plea fell on deaf ears, but then you see her hands pry apart the two pancakes that hold you in place. "Thank you" you say, but Tulip doesn't respond. She looks at your body, stuck in a spread eagle position, and pinches your arms to your side and your legs together. "This will be a lot easier for both of us if you don't move" she says and drops the pancake back on top of you. 'Looks like she hasn't changed her mind', you think to yourself as you grimace. She uses her palm to squish the two pancakes together, locking you firmly in place. "Now where were we..." Tulip asks rhetorically and pours syrup onto the pancakes. Syrup slowly flows down over the openings between the pancakes, leaving you blind to the outside world.

Tulip sends the fork slamming down into the pancake, taking care not to stab you. By looking at the pancake, she can tell where you are by a long lump. She hears your faint shouting from inside the pancake, and this makes her smile. She carefully cuts off strips around you, until you are left inside of a somewhat manageable mouthful of a pancake sandwich. She then leisurely eats the other pieces, making moaning sounds to build up the tension for you. After she finishes the last piece, she picks up your piece with two hands and raises it to her face. She presses her lips the edge and uses her tongue to wipe up all of the syrup covering the entrance, allowing you to see what's coming.

Being blinded by the syrup, all you could do was hope that someone would come by and save you. No such luck, you figured out as you stared into your sister's huge face again. "Why are you always so cruel to me?!" you ask on the verge of tears. "You are my plaything, you were born for that reason alone as far as I'm concerned", she replies. "...but... I was born before you. How do you explain that?" you rebuke. "That doesn't matter! If you weren't meant to be my plaything, you wouldn't have been born so small and tough." She pauses, thinks for a second and smiles. " I own you, and I decide what happens to you. Right now, for instance, you are my food. So let's send you where all good food goes. Her mouth opens, sticking her saliva coated tongue out, and pulls you closer.
11111111.title: Tulip's Food

111111111.content:
Tulip stares at you as she slowly pulls you closer, thinking to herself about how much of a mouthful you are going to be, and opens her mouth. She widens her jaw a little further to make sure there is enough room to receive her delicious morsel. From where you are her mouth looks enormous, the sight of it alone makes you seize up in fear. Her tongue curls underneath the bottom of the pancake and you come to a halt. You have a clear view of the base of her tongue, and the sight of each and every one of her taste buds makes your heart is beating out of your chest.

Tulip's eyes look down at you from above, and even though her mouth is open quite far she is still managing to curl the corners of her lips into a smile. She begins to pull the sandwich into her mouth, guiding it in with her tongue. You panic and begin to shout "Wait!", but Tulip crams the sandwich into her mouth before you finish. She pushes it as far as she can manage without choking, but only about half of it makes it in.

You plunge into your sister's mouth, and immediately feel thick humidity. You can Tulip's hot breath whistling past you, along with the wet sound of the pancake sliding along her tongue. Tulip's uvula hangs in front of you but vanishes into darkness as she closes her lips around the pancake. You feel Tulip's movement beneath you through the pancake as she snakes her tongue back into her mouth.

You feel a pinching at your torso and realize Tulip is biting at your waist. She clamps down on you and you scream in shock. She doesn't bite down hard enough to do any real damage, but it still scares the hell out of you. She moves her incisors back and forth along your torso, ripping the pancake apart and scraping against your skin. The pancake slides out from under you and your body makes a slap against Tulip's tongue. You feel Tulip's fingers pinch your ankles from outside and next thing you know you are sliding backwards. She slurps on your body as you slide out, getting your chest and face slick with saliva. You slide over her teeth and squeeze out through her lips. She puckers her lips together and makes a "....mmmmuah!" sound as you exit. The honey which held you in place for so long leaves strands connecting from Tulip's lips to your upper body. She slurps at the strands and uses her tongue to coil them until they snap.

"Mmm..." Tulip moans. You stand upright watching as she chews the pancake while staring at you. This continues until the pancake is, you presume, nothing but mash. With an audible gulp you watch a lump, which could have easily been you, travel down her throat. You are distracted by this until you feel Tulip's finger pat the top of your head. "I'm not done with you yet, little bug. Let's get back you tucked back in there", she says. You look down and notice that there is still half of the pancake left. You turn your head to look back at her right as she pushes your head down. Her finger is impossibly strong but you grab her finger and try to wrestle it off of you. Despite your best efforts, your knees to buckle you plunge downward. She continues to force you down into the remaining pancake, neatly packing in your limbs with her fingers, until you disappear completely inside the two folds of pancake.

You try to thrash around in the darkness, but you are frozen in place and unable to see anything except your kneecaps. There is nothing you can do to get out. You know this, yet you still try to break out. You had hoped there would be a way out of this by now, or at least hoped someone would have saved you from things getting this far out of hand. Tulip smirks as she watches the outline of your cute little body wriggling in the pancake piece. She lifts it up and quickly deposits it into her mouth, licking her fingers on the way out.

You can't tell what has happened to you from the jolting motion but you have a pretty good idea. Your suspicions are confirmed when Tulip starts chewing and the pancake bursts apart around you. The surprise impact of her molars almost knocks the wind out of you, you'd think she'd be more careful with you (then again... maybe not...). Now free to move around, you try to swim through the thick saliva and honey mixture away from the teeth. You find her tongue, which is more than happy to greet you as it slams you into her cheek.

The tongue pins your back against her cheek, and prods your body all over. You squint against the pressure try to shout out but the tongue drags over your face and the tip of her tongue along with what seems like a gallon of saliva cram into your mouth. Tulip realizes she's found your mouth and curiously tries to wiggle her tongue in further, forcing your jaw open. The tip makes it to the back of your throat but no further. You gag as she chokes you, but luckily she loses interest and goes back to licking your midsection. You cough out what you can, but you are pretty sure you just swallowed a bucket of your sister's spit.

Tulip's tongue plays with you a little longer, then pushes you up into her gums. She packs your body between her cheek and gums and holds you in place while she chews the other half of the pancake. Your body is wedged against her warm flesh. With a moment to yourself, you think of your options. You could grab her teeth, but only at the risk of getting them bitten off. You could dislodge yourself, but she would probably put you right back before you could make it to the lips... There really isn't much you can do, you decide, and sit tight.

After a decent number of chews, Tulip's tongue pushes you out of her gums and drags you back into the center of her mouth where a mushy glob of pancake awaits. You try to squirm away but her tongue is too fast and it shoves you into the glob. She then uses her tongue cradles you firmly into the glob and rolls it against her palette until it is a ball. She pushes the ball into her cheek and sits for a moment, deciding whether or not to go through with it.

Well... Does she spit or swallow?
111111111.title: Breakfast For Lunch

choices: She gulps them down without noticing you.
She finds you in the food.
111112.content:
“Mom, you want some more pancakes? I’m completely full”, Tulip asks. Your mother with a look of concern on her face as she looks at Tulip. "You barely touched them. Are you okay, sweetie?", she asks. "Just not that hungry this morning, is all", Tulip says. Without further ado, she gets up and heads out of the room (but not before screeching the chair back against the table).

"She's such a strange one..." Your mother says, looking at Tracy. There is an awkward silence in the air as Tracy just shrugs and drinks her orange juice. "Well. You and I can finish it off, I suppose", your mother says. Tracy takes a moment to finish off her drink, before responding with "sorry, mom, but I've got work today. Got to go before I'm late."
Tracy grabs her plate, dumps it into the sink quickly, and quickly rushes out. "You've still got some ti...", your mother starts to say, but Tracy leaves the room before she can finish her sentence.

Your mother sighs, staring at you. Well, the pancakes, which you are currently a part of. She grabs the plate and slides you over to her. You see how all of this is going to play out in your head. She'll try to eat the pancake and find Tulip's surprise after a few bites in. You could save yourself a few minutes of this ridiculousness if the syrup hadn't sealed your mouth shut.

You try to look up at your mother's face, but her breasts obscure your view. She then picks up a nearby fork and knife and the pancake around you rumbles. There is the telltale clanking of silverware against plate, and the knife comes down nearby as she starts cutting up the pancake. She cuts two... three... four times and luckily miss you every time (though you had to move your arm for the second cut to avoid you).

Slowly you see the fork dragging away the strips of pancake off the plate. The only sound you can hear is the squishy smacks of your mother's lips and tongue on the pancakes and the gulp as she sends them down her throat.

She gulps down another strip and you feel the push down as you are now lifted off the plate. 'Here we go' you think as you look outward. You can finally see your mother's face come into view, her face is nonchalant as she brings you closer. Her mouth opens widely and you get a full view inside. You can see the saliva coating on every surface inside, and dread the part coming up. Her uvula bobs slightly and her tongue slides out of her mouth as she slides you and the pancake inside.

What happens next?
111112.title: Pancakes, mother?

1111121.content:
The inside of your mom’s mouth glistens wetly as her tongue rolls lazily out to greet you. The inky blackness of her throat beckons to you past the shiny pink walls and the row of pearly white teeth. Gooey strands of her saliva crisscross the inside of her mouth as her lips part wider and wider. The image is unreal; like the side of a building suddenly opening wide to reveal the mouth to hell. Her pouty lips are speckled with fat drops of sticky syrup from the last bite and as she pulls you closer you can start to make out stray crumbs of masticated pancake across her tongue.

Everything seems to move in slow motion as each moment drags on. A warm gust of breath blowing across your sticky face as your mom exhales. Her tongue seems to wriggle slightly as if eager to savor every inch of your tiny trapped body before sentencing you to a long slow night at best… and maybe worse than that.

Your ‘unique’ relationship with your sister Tulip has given you a number of insights into your tiny condition. You know, for instance, that Tulip’s stomach cannot digest you because you have gotten the full tour of her digestive track a number of times now. And that one time with the neighbor’s dog, but that was also her fault so you usually just add that to her ever growing list of offenses. You know that you are ‘probably’ immune to stomach acid.

Yet, as that massive, soft, pink cave of doom inches closer and closer, you cannot help but reflect that ‘fear of consumption’ should not really be on anybody’s list of daily inconveniences! Further, just because you have been lucky enough to make it through Tulip’s intestines a dozen plus times now, doesn’t mean that this time will be exactly the same.

Your mother is older and, as your eyes drop for half an instant into the vast cleavage sliding by beneath you, she is certainly more developed than Tulip will ever be. What if her stomach is stronger too? What if you’re trapped inside it for a longer time? What if she eats or drinks something later that makes her bubbling digestive juices more potent? Getting eaten alive should NEVER be a humdrum experience because it never is! Hell, getting eaten at all just should NOT be an experience you can speak about with firsthand knowledge. All of that, assuming that she manages to not chew you to pieces first!

Shadow falls across your face as the oversized bite of pancake passes the edge of her lips. The world falls away; replaced with the hot, humid inside of your mother’s mouth. She lets out a soft moan of enjoyment as you struggle to claw at the sticky sap covering your own mouth. Chewing with her mouth open, you can see each time that her powerful jaws come down. They barely miss you once. Twice. Three times.

As slow as the world was moving a moment ago, it seems to speed up now as adrenaline surges through your body. You thrash wildly. A bite this big should take several chews before she can swallow you and you are determined to let her know you are there long before that ever happens.

She swallows.

“NOOO—“

You manage to get out a muffled scream of horror and surprise just as her throat opens wide to accept the half-chewed bite. Her tongue surges upwards beneath you, pushing you and your giant wad of pancake towards the dark opening of her neck. Powerful muscles clamp down, squeezing from all sides and your ears pop from the pressure change as she swallows. The trip takes forever as the vice-like tube of her throat works you lower and lower. Somewhere, you know that Tulip is watching the massive lump move down Mom’s neck before disappearing behind Mom's massive chest.

Just as your body reaches its limit and you start to pass out, the pressure vanishes. For one brief moment, you experience the joy of weightlessness before you plunge headfirst into a frothy, mushy stew of everything your mother has eaten today. You come up sputtering and spitting; so many trips into Tulip’s gut and you STILL have not learned to close your mouth before you take the plunge into the pool of bile and acid. Everything around you bubbles slowly and you can barely make out the glistening, wrinkled walls of her stomach.

Hurling curses at your sister that she will never hear past the gurgling, groaning walls of the cavern you are in; you start to climb onto the biggest pile of half-digested material. Sometimes this helps to keep you out of the bubbling lake, but this is NOT one of those times. Every step you take sinks deep into the gooey slurry until you are completely encrusted in your mom’s stomach contents.

Defeated, you sink down into the chunky slop. You cannot escape. You cannot call for help. You cannot even get mildly comfortable. All you can do it soak in Mom’s bubbling stomach and wait until you get to experience her asshole from both sides. Tulip definitely won this round, the next 24 hours will be completely miserable.

A sticky drop of saliva spatters across the top of your head just as you hear the loud but distant sound of another powerful swallow.

“Oh come ON!”

The tight ring at the bottom of her throat opens wide as a dump truck worth of food emerges and plummets towards you. You have overheard a few of Mom’s weekend boyfriends muttering about how she should swallow more. As you make a desperate attempt to leap clear of the falling ball of chewed food; you are not sure swallowing MORE is even a possibility! They should be demand she chew her food a little better!

Standing in the thick soup of stomach acids and food, you cannot possibly get clear in time and a moment later, the massive pile completely envelopes you as it lands. Slimy chewed food is everywhere; in your mouth, in your ears, you cannot even breathe as you claw your way out. Finally you manage to push your face free and inhale a deep breath of the thick, putrid air. Another enormous mouthful of food drops, landing on the first and further cementing you into place. You tug back and forth, trying to work an arm or a leg free but the every growing mountain of food keeps piling up above you until you finally give up. This seems to be your spot as the walls of her stomach start pressing in to digest you.

Hours pass as you enter a sort of stupor. The greasy, slimy world of Mom’s stomach and then her intestines floats past you as you are pushed deeper and deeper into her body.

Has she noticed I’m gone yet?

Tulip is undoubtedly working on an alibi so you have no idea what you will tell Mom when she sees you floating in the toilet. Will not matter, really; you will come up with something and then you will do everything you can to never be in this situation ever again.

Finally light cuts through the darkness and for the first time in what seems like forever, a blast of cool air rushes across your face. With a distant grunt from your mom to announce your return to the world, you are forced through the tight sphincter of her asshole. You get the briefest look at the most disgusting toilet that you have ever laid eyes on before the bowl of dingy brown seems to rush up to greet you.

“N-no! Mo—“

Your voice is weak after your long trip through your mom’s intestines and your desperate cry is cut off as you land in the toilet bowl with a loud ‘sploosh’. Like back in her stomach, you are deeply embedded in the log that she’s just squeezed out of her ass. You struggle and flail as the log turns over to keep your face below the surface, just barely managing to work an arm free. Immediately you use it to get your head back above the water.

“GAAASP! M-Mom!” Another grunt and another loud splash drops a second log neatly beside the first. This entire experience is disgusting and you so wish this were the first time; but it is not. This is the part where Tulip would make you beg before fishing you out.

But Tulip is not here this time. Mom is, except she has no idea that you are struggling just to tread water beneath you. Light filters into the bowl as she tugs at a piece of toilet paper and wipes herself, the sheet of soiled paper actually falling over you. Cursing your standard luck, you manage to free a second arm from your warm, clay-like prison before fighting your way though the now soaking wet paper.

You realize you have got to hurry. It looks like Mom’s in some disgusting public restroom and you cannot just let her walk off and abandon you here of all places! The bowl is streaked with every bodily fluid you can imagine and a few that you would never imagine finding here. As you finally pull apart the paper above your head, you get the briefest glimpse of your full dressed mom as she steps out of the stall.

“N… no, Mom! MOM!!”

The whole situation is just getting worse and worse! All you wanted was some breakfast! Now you’ve got to find a way out of the bowl before…

Already another woman is stepping into the stall. Younger than your mother, she is wearing expensive clothes and has a long mane of platinum blond hair. Everything about her screams ‘spoiled daddy’s girl’, but it does not matter now. She is your saving angel as soon as you get her attention and you are in luck this time because her nose wrinkles in disgusts as she looks directly at you.

Except… No hint of recognition crosses her face. Instead she presses a hand to her lips as if fighting down her gag reflex as she looks at the two steamers your mom left her.

“Like… Eww… Some people can be SO gross.”

You barely have time to register her movement before it’s too late. With a flick of her slender wrist, she flushes the toilet and you start to swirl around the bowl. You get one last glimpse of her perfect ass eclipsing all light before you are swallowed down the drain forever.

The ultimate moral of the story: pancakes are deadly.
1111121.title: She gulps them down without noticing you.

1111122.content:
Hot, moist air greets your body as you feel the pancake coming to a rest in your mothers mouth. You know full well how terrifying a mouth is when your captor isn't aware of your presense. Just like countless times before, the lips behind you close and your body along with the pancakes is immediately moved to the side where you'll be greeted by her molars. Sure enough, the teeth immediately clamp down on the pancakes, ripping it apart. You grunt when your body is twisted between her hard molars, trying to grind your body in a more manageable bite to swallow. You know your body can stand this kind of pressure, but it's extremely uncomfortable.

Her jaw stops moving for a second. Your mother probably felt something odd between her teeth. Just when you think you’re save, she tries a second time. This time it is even more uncomfortable because the pancake that acted like a cushion before is now partly gone. The pressure is even more intense, but screaming is impossible because there is still syrup covering your mouth. All you can do is bear your mothers chewing a little longer.

Finally, light floods back into her mouth. You're greeted by a terrifying view op partially mashed pancake stuck on the molars above. Looming in the distance is her throat, glistering with saliva. All you can do is wait, until the tip of your mothers index finger comes into view. It presses on your legs and scrapes your body of her lower molars. You expect to land on her tongue, but your body falls on her thumb. The fingers press your legs, and to your great relieve, retracts you from inside her mouth. You are blinded by the light, but feel your body dangling all of a sudden, caused by your mother lifting you up by your legs.

When you feel accustomed to the light, you open your eyes again and are greeted by your mothers wide blue eyes, looking all over your body. You still cannot talk, but you are very happy that your mother found you. Your relieve is short-lived however, when the silence is broken by your mom almost choking on the pancakes from her sudden laughter.

After some humiliating seconds of your mom's laughter, she gives you a playful push, letting you dangle a bit more from her fingers while saying "I see you finally found some food". You're unable to respond, so you just look with pleading eyes into your mothers. She looks closer, and when she sees your mouth is shut caused by some syrup she chuckles again. "Tulip did a real good number on you this time" she says.

Your mother often is very casual about all kinds of situation, and apparently this is no exception. You hear the clank from her fork hitting the plate. It seems that she's going to eat another bite while you're dangling in front of her. "But really Allen, you should try to avoid these kind of situations" she says and puts another bite in her mouth. She chews slowly and says with a mouth full "because it almost look like you do it on purpose". She leans back in her kitchen chair and holds you above her head. "Still, I have to give Tulip a scolding". You quickly nod your head to tell her that you agree.

You blood runs cold when you hear her say "But maybe my boy deserves a little lesson as well". Your squirm but to no avail when you see her tilt her head back and open her mouth. Her mouth is filled with mashed pancakes, sticking to her teeth and tongue. Hot air greets you from her throat caused by her chuckling, causing some pieces of food near her throat flying. Your squirming intensify when you feel your mom lowering you towards her mouth.
1111122.title: She finds you in the food.

choices: You and your mother plan some revenge.
11111221.content:
Your mother lowers you down toward her waiting mouth. The hot air makes your eyes squint, but you still get a pretty good view of the pancake pieces sitting inside. You dangle just over her lips as she closes them into a smile, “After all...” She swallows and opens her mouth up again. This time her mouth is empty and clean of pancake. She wags her tongue left and right to show you that it's all gone. “...That could have been you.” The sight of it all makes you sweat. At least, you think that's sweat you feel... It’s probably sweat.

Your mother was right, though. You were the one foolish enough to trust your little sister, making you partially to blame for your circumstances. She lets you hang there for a moment, probably to let her point sink in, before lowering you down onto the table. She releases you and starting grabbing her plates. Finally free to move on your own, you get to work dislodging the syrup from your mouth. It takes far longer than it should to get it all out, but eventually you are free to speak again. It’s a wonder that people don’t use this stuff as glue.

You were so intent on clearing the syrup that you forgot about your mother. Turning around, you see that she is currently washing off her plates in the sink. You want to ask her what she plans to do with Tulip, but the noise of her cleaning is too loud for you to get her attention. You open your mouth to shout, but then remember where that got you last time so you close it back up.

Sitting down on the tabletop, you decide to wait until she’s done.

What happens next?
11111221.title: She's just playing.

111112211.content:
The tabletop feels cold under you as you watch your mother finish up the dishes. She whistles a soothing tune as she rinses and scrubs the plates. Unknowingly, you start to bob your head to the rhythm and, eventually, catch yourself humming the tune with her. *Thump* A noise catches your attention and you look behind you to see... Tulip! You are just about to scream for help as she swats her hands at you. Before you can get a word out, her hands close around you. Tightly enclosed inside of Tulip’s hands, you can barely move around. The slight bounce you feel tells you that she’s taking you somewhere. A couple seconds later, she spreads open her palms and light blooms around you.


Seeing that are in the living room now, You turn around to face Tulip. “Hello” she says enthusiastically and picks you up with her free hand. “Eww!” She exclaims and let’s go of you. You land in her lap, in the soft valley between her legs. “Where have you been?.. Oh yeah, I forgot!” She laughs as you get up. Not amused, you decide not to dignify her with a response. She lifts you up again, “so... how was your breakfast?” You roll your eyes, “oh, it was great, I love almost getting eaten.” She holds back a giggle, “don’t tempt me.” She pauses for a moment. “Well, I’m glad I could help,” she winks. “I’m surprised mom even found you, given the way she was stuffing food down.”


You give her a cold look, she really shouldn’t talk about your mother like that. Tulip’s eyes are looking off in the distance, so your stare is wasted. She looks back at you, “so what are we going to do today, hmm?” “I don’t know what you mean by ‘we’ but I am--“ You are interrupted by your mother’s voice, “going to come with me to pick out some dresses, and that goes for you too young lady.” “Aww, come on!” you and Tulip both complain in unison. “No complaints!” your mother replies. She plucks you out of Tulip’s hand and carries you into the hallway.


“Let’s get you all washed up and ready. She carries you into the bathroom and strips off your clothing. She holds you under the faucet in the sink and washes your body gently, then she dries you off with a hand-towel. She drops you off at your bed in the living room, and are told to get dressed. After she walks out of the room, Tulip approaches. You shoo her away, “Get out of here! I’m dressing!” “Please.” She says, pinching you between her fingers and holding you up to her face. “Like I’ve never seen you naked.” “Stop playing around, you’re going to make mom mad” Tulip smiles deviously at you, and adjusts her hold on you so that most of you is covered by her hand. “Why? You look ready to me.”


“I’m going to tell mom!” you shout. “You’re going to tell me what?” Your mother asks, walking in the room. “Steve says he doesn’t want to go to the mall with us!” Tulip spurts out. “Steve, you’re going and that’s final. Let’s go.” She turns around and walks towards the door. “...But mom,-“ you protest. She stops and turns to glare at you, “I don’t want to hear it!” She looks angry, but you can’t go to the mall like this. You try again, “But mom, I’m-“ Tulip moves her other hand and covers your mouth. “Thank you, Tulip,” Your mother says. “Come on, mom, let’s go.”


You all get into your mother’s car, a gray sedan. Tulip takes the backseat and volunteers to hold you for the ride. Without disagreeing, your mother backs out of the driveway and heads for the mall. During the ride over, Tulip ignores you for most part. She does make a point to keep her pointer finger positioned over your mouth and keeps rubbing the top of your head with her thumb, messing up your hair over and over.


Once you all get into the mall entrance, your mother asks Tulip to hide you in her pocket and walks ahead. Your family sometimes likes to hide you in public, since you tend to draw a crowd. Tulip stops, letting your mother walk ahead for a second. She loosens her grip on you slightly, so that your arms are free to move around, and looks down at you. She holds up one finger in front of you then points it at her mouth, then she holds up two fingers and points them at her ass. You facepalm yourself, realizing that she is giving you options. If you don’t choose, she’s going to choose for you.


What do you choose?
111112211.title: Tulip sneaks up on you.

1111122111.content:
Tulip nods her head at you as if agreeing to something, then opens her mouth. Your body is thrust inside, face first, until you're more than halfway in. You brace yourself, putting your hands out in front of you on the way in. It doesn't slow your progress at all. Your elbows buckle and pin your hands to your chest, forcing you to get a good feel of her moist tongue as you squeeze in. Her lips close around your waist firmly, and with one strong slurp she sucks you in the rest of the way.

Tulip leaves you to lay there on the wet muscle as it moves idly under you. You sigh as you listen to the steady breath and wonder exactly what made her think you chose her mouth. Maybe it was your facepalm? You don't really know. It probably didn't matter anyways. She had probably already set out what to do with you in the first place. That little brat always gets what she wants.

You feel Tulip skip ahead as her tongue starts to work you over. For the next few minutes, she plays with you like a piece of candy. After a few minutes, though, she gets bored and just leaves you to lay on top of her tongue. You are wet from head to toe in her saliva. Wiping some of it off your face, you see that you are facing her front teeth. There's not much you can do other than lay here and wait until she lets you out.

"What do you think about this one?" you hear your mother ask. As Tulip's mouth opens to reply, you quickly scream out for help. As you shout, you see your mother holding holding a blue dress and staring right at you. Her expression turns from curiousity to anger. Tulip clamps her teeth shut, silencing the rest of your scream.

"Tulip McMinor, get your brother out of your mouth this instant!" she orders. Light opens up in front of you and you are spit out of your sister's mouth into her hands. "Sorry mom..." Tulip says back to her mother, her voice full of guilt. She then wipes you off roughly using her shirt. After you are somewhat dry, she clenches your body and hides you behind her back.

Tulip shoots an innocent smiles at your mother, who then...
1111122111.title: Reasons not to face-palm at Tulip

choices: She puts you in time out.
11111221111.content:
You can't see anything while behind Tulip's back, but after a moment of silence you hear your mother say, "Tulip, please be more gentle with your brother." "We were just playing," Tulip argues. "I wasn't hurting him, honest. I'm just so bored." Yeah right, you think. You start to yell out your side of the story, "'playing' my butt! She was-", your shouts are cut short by a quick squeeze from Tulip.

~~~~~

Your mother, Nikki, turns back around, placing the blue dress back among the others. She has a party to go off to later tonight, and she needs to find something fun to wear. She already found a couple that were pretty nice, but she just wants to check a few more sections... "This shouldn't take much longer, just be patient," she says. After a slight pause she turns to her daughter, "I'll tell you what - if you're both good, I'll take you both out for ice cream after I'm done." Tulip sneers, but agrees anyways. "Okay...", she grumbles. Nikki smiles, proud of her little angel for being so patient. "Steve...?" she asks, hinting at Tulip. Tulip quickly pulls her little brother out and presents him to Nikki. Nikki bends down to make sure her son has her full attention, and asks "Steve, are you going to behave?". She gives her son a stern face when she asks, she loves him and all his tiny-ness but he does seem to have a knack for getting into trouble. She is just thankful that Tulip is around to look after him the way she does.

~~~~~

Your mother's face looms right next to you. You want to say something about Tulip's handling but you can tell by her face that she isn't in the mood for complaints. "Yes, ma'am", you respond reluctantly. "Good boy", she praises and pats you on the head with her finger. Satisfied, she goes back to shopping, leaving you with Tulip again.

You turn around to see Tulip's face, clearly not happy with your little outburst.

What happens next?
11111221111.title: She goes back to shopping

choices: Your mother (eventually) asks where you are
111112211111.content:
Tulip squeezes you firmly, and walks behind a few racks of clothing. She stops and kneels down, keeping you both out of sight of your mother. "You trying to get me in trouble, bug?" she asks rhetorically. You decide to respond anyways, "You know I hate it in there!" "I know that's the point, dumb-dumb." She narrows her eyes at you, looking a bit frustrated. "I suppose I'll have to teach you a lesson now, won't I?" "Just put me in your pocket, I'll stay quiet", you nod your head convincingly as you talk. Tulip gives you a glance of pity, "I wish I could, little brother, but I just can't trust you to stay quiet anymore." She taps her finger against her lip as she looks away, devising your punishment. She then turns back, "no, I think I'm going to have to put you in time out. somewhere you can make all the noise you want~." She smiles at you while dragging her tongue across her lips.

Ugh, back in her mouth again? "No, come on! Not the mouth again, that's the third time today!" you protest. Tulip chuckles silently, trying not to make too much noise. "Don't worry, you won't be there for long," she smiles and lifts up her shirt to reveal her taught belly. "All that talk of ice-cream made me hungry, I need something to hold me over for a while." You want to fight her, but her iron-grip on you is impossible to fight. She lifts you up to her face and opens wide.

~~~~~

Tulip watches her little brother as she opens her mouth. Seeing the fear in his little eyes drives her crazy, she can hardly help herself as eases him into her mouth. He keeps frantically trying to push himself out before she can close her lips on him. She loves the way he fights her the whole way in. She uses her tongue to drag his midsection farther inside while using her finger to push his limbs back in when they manage to get passed her lips. "Mmm", she moans quietly as she tongues his body up and down. She never could put her finger on exactly what he tasted like. Something like chicken, but with just a tinge of salt. She smiled as she felt him try to wrap his little arms around her tongue. She quickly broke his grip and slid her tongue around him some more. It wasn't a taste she had liked at first, but she kept eating him because she loved the way he wriggled around as he tried to escape. As time went on, she kind of 'acquired' a taste for him. Now, when she did it, it was like having candy.

She pushes her little brother into her cheek as she thinks of how fitting this is. When she tricked him onto her plate this morning, she was going to swallow him herself. It had been a couple weeks since she last time she had gotten to, so she was really looking forward to it. When she saw her mother shoveling down her food, though, she got another idea. While she was disappointed, not being able to feel his tantrum inside her, the joke was too good to pass up. Tulip continues to lick her brother, pushing him into the wall of her cheek repeatedly. Things didn't work out the way she'd hoped they would, though. Her mother had found her surprise before gulping him down, spoiling all the fun.

'Now', thought Tulip, 'here we are. Everything back to the way it should be.' She walks back to her mother while dragging Stevey out of her cheek and slipping him underneath her tongue. She pushes her tongue down on him, submerging him in spit, and smiles as she feels his little arms and legs beating against her tongue as she holds him down. Almost time.

~~~~~

You squint as Tulip's tongue holds you down underneath it. You are already worn out from fighting it for the few minutes that you have. All you want is a moment to recoup, but her tongue is relentless. She always has to make sure to extract every bit of taste out of you, until you feel like an oversized gummy bear. You still try, though. Pushing and kicking the giant muscle, which doesn't even budge. You stop struggling for a moment, not wanting to use up all your energy without being able to catch your breath. As if sensing your admission of defeat, Tulip's tongue lifts off of you. You push yourself up and out of the spit while wiping your face off, catching your first breath in a long time. As you do this, the tongue scoops you up from below and pins you to the roof again. It slides forward under you and drops down again, leaving you right at the edge of her throat.

You can feel her hot breath against your face as you look down at her epiglottis and the dark entrance of her throat. Seeing it writhe in front of you causes you to reel backwards. You try to grab on to something, anything, to keep you from going down. Her tongue is too thick around down here to wrap your arms around, and there is far too much spit for you to get a grip on it or her teeth. With a quick thrust, her tongue pushes you headfirst into the wet chasm. Your body slides down and stops for a moment as her throat muscles catch you. Flesh surrounds you on all sides, and you can feel a firm squeeze on your legs as her throat pushes you downward.

What next?
111112211111.title: Back in the mouth for you!

choices: The door opens and Mom comes back to get Steve out.
The door opens and Tracy comes in.
1111122111111.content:
Steve was getting far too used to being "candy" for his younger sister. He grumbled privately as he was pushed down into her stomach, mostly at how he'd be needing new clothes, AGAIN, when he got out of there. Knowing that she enjoyed it when he struggled inside her, he decided to deny her that by staying as still as possible. As if she knew his game, she thumped her belly a few times to try and encourage his movement. Steve did his best to ignore it as he waited for the natural digestion process to start moving him towards the intestines.

~~~~~

Tulip was getting rather mad. That bug of a brother wasn't stimulating her like he normally did! Unfortunately, she had to hide the fact that she had swallowed him from their mother, so she couldn't act up in public to try and get him to work. It wasn't long after she had finally gulped her "candy" down that her mom had decided she was done shopping for now. So, not immediately suspecting anything, she'd declare that it was time to go get ice cream. Tulip would cheer like a normal kid as they made their way back to the car. However, once inside, their mom would turn to Tulip and say, "Alright Tulip, time to give me Steve for the drive."

The young girl tensed, having not expected to be asked that. A few silent seconds passed before Mrs. McMinor would ask more firmly.

"Tulip, hand your brother over right now."

She started fidgeting, having avoided this side of her mom for long enough to not be used to hearing it aimed at her.

"Tulip McMinor, where is your brother?!"

"I...I...I swallowed him." Tulip blurted out with her mother's glare fueling her tongue. That glare only got more angry as her mother reached full disciplinary mode.

"You lied to me, Tulip. You lied about being on good behavior with your brother." She had gotten good at hiding her misdeeds at home, but Tulip had nowhere to run now.

"You are grounded, missy. For two weeks! And if I ever, catch you doing things like this with your brother again, being grounded will be the least of your worries!"

~~~~~

Once they were all back home, Mrs. McMinor had forced Tulip to vomit Steve out before being sent to her room for the rest of the night. The mom apologized to her son and set him up with a hot sink bath to deal with being in his sister's stomach. With a sigh, she'd ask herself what she was going to do with Tulip and her behavior today while leaving Steve alone to soak. Several minutes later...
1111122111111.title: Busted Tulip

choices: Not much longer. She leaves you at the mall.

You can still see through the thick liquid to the outside, where three gleeful faces watch you suffer gleefully. Their eyes filled with malice for your very life, wanting to only see you suffer. You aren’t sure why they hate you so much, two of them you’ve never met before. Whatever their reason is for hating you, it can’t justify this living hell that you can’t escape. Slowly things are starting to dim, which is frightening because you are physically unable to close your eyes. Maybe your eyeballs are starting to melt next. Things go dark, but you swear that you can hear little girls laughing cruelly.

..............

Everything becomes bright again, you can see and hear and the pain is gone. Maybe you died and this is heaven, where you aren’t tiny anymore or being horrible abused by bored thirteen year olds. Those dreams of a happy heaven are shattered when you hear the high-pitched voice of your evil sister. “Holly crap, that acid stuff is strong. Look what you did to the bug!” The happiness in your sister’s voice worries you, what did that acid do? You’re still alive, so she isn’t celebrating your death. That only leaves you being horribly disfigured by the acid. Tears would come pouring from your eyes if you had the ability. Right now, it seems your body is numb, which is still much better then pain. “I told you didn’t I,” Theresa replies. The Asian girl looks down at you proudly, like the acid was something she created. “Melts through pretty much anything, didn’t I say that?” Your sister snickers darkly. “You sure did. But I never expected this to happen.”

Now you’re really scared. What happened? Where are you? What did the acid do to you? The first good look you give your surroundings offers the identity of your location instantly. Your still in the bottle, floating around like nothing happened. Whatever happened to you seems to have left you impervious by the acids affects. That would be good if you knew what had happened to you. You look around you, focusing on the shiny wall of the bottle. Everything freezes for you when you see what had happened.
111212112112.title: The Burning

choices: The phial hit the floor and shatters. Your free! But now what?
The phial lands in the toilet.
1112121121121.content:
It’s impossible, you tell yourself as you stare at a reflection of nothing. In front of you is the reflective side of the phial, but as you look into it you see nothing back but the sloshing liquid. You see bubbles in the spot where your body should be and everything that’s happened becomes too much. You open your mouth to scream, but no sound comes out, you have no mouth! It’s completely insane and irrational, but some how you’ve become liquefied. You have no body, but somehow you can see and hear. How this is possible is a mystery to you, but you use one of your only remaining senses to listen to your sister talk with her two friends.

“Honestly, I’m a little sad,” the pudgy redhead named Olga sighs as she looks into phial. Tulip grimaces at her friend. She doesn’t miss you at all, but somehow Olga, who knew you for only a few minutes was sad you were gone. Your curious as well, and look up at the chubby redhead with a little bit of delight. At least one of these terrible brats feels bad about what they’ve done. “What you talking about Olga?” Your sister butts in making your nonexistent eyes move to her. “You’re the one that thought it would be cool if we killed my late bug bro?” Olga lowers her head, looking upset and you’re almost moved. But then Olga lifts her head back up and she’s grinning merrily like nothing had happened.

“I did want to kill the little bug boy, but not until I had a turn with him. You might have gotten bored of eating him and shitting him out, but me and Ran never got to try it once. Now we’ll never find out how he feels in our ass’s now that he’s dead.” Olga resumes pouting and the Asian girl, apparently named Ran, joins her. You sister looks at her friends, feeling bad that you were gone, now her friends would never get a chance to feel the pleasure of having you squirming in their rectum. You, who are alive in some sense, would of started swearing if you still had a mouth, but with your lack of lips, mouth or lungs, all you can do is look at the evil girls with pure hate. How can they be so cruel and malicious?

You’ve never even met Tulip’s friends but some how they want to torture and main you for no other reason then it’s fun. You blame Tulip, she probably turned them to her sick way of thinking and now they were just as evil as she was. Wishing this would end somehow, Tulip seems to have the same thought and has gotten up.

“Hey Ran, if I spill the acid in the phial into water, will it still melt through anything?” The Asian girl shakes her head. Once added to water, the acid loses all it’s corrosive properties. Tulip smiles slightly and lifts the phial up to her eye. She looks right through you, grinning at the once clear liquid inside. Since you melted, the acid had turned pink, looking almost skin tone in color. Tulip thought the pink water was just your blood remains mixed with the acid, when in fact it was actually your new liquid form.

“I’m going to give the watery remains of my dear buggy brother a proper send off. He’ll be joining the other turds in the sewers after I flush him down the toilet.” The girls giggle, finding the thought of your bloody remains being flushed down the toilet hilarious. You try to scream to your sister to stop, but end up only making a few bubbles rise to the top of the acid in the phial. You aren’t sure what would happen if you’re put in the toilet, you’re not sure what’s going on now. One thing your sure of is that going into the toilet can only make this worse.

Tulip head’s to the bathroom, humming happily to herself as she walks. She idly thinks about what to tell her mother when she gets home and how to convince her to move on and try and have another son. There was a good chance any other son your mom had would be tiny like you. Getting a younger new tiny bug sounded very nice to Tulip. Pushing the bathroom door open, she looks at the toilet with a big happy grin. She pops the cork open and peers in at the murky fluid.

“I’d say I was going to miss you bug, but that would be a lie. I’ll say one thing though, I’ll miss having you around to eat me shi…” Tulip was cut off when she tripped over the bath rug and started to fall forwards. You slip from her hand and go flying in the air. Your body sloshes around in the phial as you go flying and before you start falling, you spot your sister clenching her knee in pain. Seeing your sister scrap her knees is perhaps the greatest thing you have ever seen and it makes you happy for the first time today.
1112121121121.title: Nothing Left but Liquid

11121211211211.content:
Gravity takes hold of the phial and you feel yourself start to fall; but that doesn't matter. You're dissolved in this acid and can't imagine that life will get any better when you are diluted in the water of the toilet bowl. But the thought you'll hold most dear is of your younger sisters face scrunched up in pain. Or, at least, that's what was going through your mind a moment before your world explodes.

In an instant the phial hits the floor beside the toilet and shatters spraying bits of glass, as well as the pinkish liquid you seem to inhabit, across the floor.

It's an incredibly strange sensation to be able to feel as the liquid spreads out across the bathroom floor. You're surprised that the floor feels cool, despite the fact that you have no way of feeling it.

"Oh shit," you hear Tulip say and your non-existent eyes are instantly drawn to her. She's still kneeling where she hurt her knee, but she's looking at you with an expression of extreme annoyance. "He's even a nuisance to me when he's dead!"

You watch as she reaches past you and pulls a towel to herself and begins to reach it towards you. You brace for the inevitable 'joy' of having your sister literally wipe the floor with you, but it doesn't come. Your sister has stopped right above your liquid remains and is frowning.

"Hmm..." Tulip says, apparently addressing the liquid you seem to be a part of, "after watching what happened to the bug when he touched you; I don't really think I want to clean you with my bare hands."

With that she stands and you again find yourself marveling at the sheer size and power such a young girl possesses compared to yourself.

"Hey Ran!" she says as she turns and leaves the bathroom, "do you have any rubber gloves?"

Joy. Saved from a trip down the toilet to instead be sopped up by some dirty rag and thrown away. Maybe it would have been better to have let Mom eat you this morning.

You groan at this thought and place you hand to your forehead.

"What?!" you scream as you suddenly realize that you've got a forehead and a hand to put to it. You look at your body. It seems to be soaking up the liquid that you had dissolved in. No, that not right. It almost looks like the liquid is reforming your body.

You stand amid the broken shards of glass and watch as the last of the liquid runs to your feet. 'Strange,' does not even begin to cover this. Maybe you've become a superhero! With growing excitement you grab a shard of glass and quickly bring it's point to the palm of your other hand. Pain shoots behind your eyes as blood wells up around the cut you've just given yourself. Nope, not a superhero.

"Well that was stupid!" you mutter to yourself as you toss the shard away and begin nursing your poor hand. It takes a few moments for you to notice the change; the cut is already closing. You watch in awe as the pain recedes with the healing wound and in a few moments more, both are gone.

Alright, that's different. Never the less, you can't help but smile; you're alive and seem to be alright. You can't wait to tell... oh yeah...

Suddenly reality hits you. You're absolutely naked in the bathroom of some friend of Tulips. They've tried to kill you once and will definitely finish the job since the alternative is you escaping and getting them into trouble.

You can hide, but that only helps in the short term; eventually you'll have to find some way home. You think you hear footsteps coming back to the bathroom! Better think fast!
11121211211211.title: I'm alive... I think!

choices: Tulip shows her friends that you're still alive
111212112112112.content:
You have no time to hide or run or even take one step because your sister is in the doorway, holding a pair of rubber gloves and a washcloth. You look up at her with your mouth gaping and she looks down at you with the same expression. Neither one of you moves or says anything. In front of your would be executioner your brain shuts down and it stays that way for a few more seconds. Your brain reboots quickly and you take a huge gulp then start backing away from your sister. All you can think about is running away from her and finding somewhere safe to hide. Anywhere is fine as long as you’re far away from your psychotic sister.

“Well, I’ll be fucked,” your sister swears. Seems she’s gotten over her shock at seeing you alive and that’s your cue to start running. Sadly, like always, your too small and too slow to get away from your sister and she’s on you in a second. Avoiding the shards of glass, you steps over you and bends down. Her meaty paw grabs you and carries you up to her face. Tulip’s eyes are wide with excitement and wonder as she looks at your tiny naked body like she’s never seen you before. Grinning broadly, she starts giggling before breaking into full hysterical laughter. It dies down after a minute, but she’s still grinning like a fool at you.

“I’m not even going to try and guess how you’re alive. I saw you melt away like a stick of butter in the microwave inside the phial, but somehow you’re here. I don’t know whether I should be angry or sad or happy. I thought I was rid of you, but here you are, not a scratch on you.”

Tulip starts giggling again, finding your resurrection the funniest thing in the world. You tremble under her glassy eyes and manic grin. Your sister has never been well balanced, but it seems seeing you alive has pushed her over the edge. It seems things have gotten worse because now your not trapped with a homicidal little girl, but a mental disturbed, homicidal girl. There’s a big different between the two, mostly the higher level of cruelty in the latter.

“Not a scratch,” your sister laughs and brings one tree-sized finger to your chest. You wince as she pressed her sharp fingernail into your soft flesh and slashes down above your ribs. Tulip abruptly stops laughing at the sight of the cut on your chest. Your skins tough and it takes a lot of pressure to cut you, but her fingernail sliced into your chest like a hot knife through butter. You’re shocked too by how easily you bleed, what has happened to your resilient skin? The sudden fragility of your body shocked your sister, but when the cut sealed itself up a few seconds later, she was absolutely flabbergasted. Her shock didn’t last though because that insane grin of hers came back with newfound ferocity.

“Looks like big buggy brother is no longer as sturdy as he once was. You can bleed, you can be cut and I wonder what else I can do.” Tulip looks at you fondly, rubbing her finger up and down your back. She coos softly to you, but underneath her warm words, you feel malice and madness that makes you more afraid then you’ve ever been before in your life.

“You want to know something? I always hated the fact that you could never be really hurt by something. You’re stepped on, you get back up. You’re sat on, you walk it off. You’re suffocated, you still move. It always pissed me off seeing such a resilient, annoying bug. But now you’re not invincible. You can be cut and I can only wonder what else can be done to you. This is a whole new ball game; our games are going to be so much more fun now that I can really hurt you. We’re going to have a such a good time testing how much pain that tiny body of yours can take.”

Tulip has never been this intense before. Torturing you has always been just a pass time for her, but now it seems like an obsession. You feared for your life before, but now your worried more about your mind and body. The cut hurt a lot and your sister was just messing around before. How much pain could this demonic little girl dish out when she puts her mind to it. Maybe it would have been better melting away and staying melted because Tulip seemed hell bent on making your pain her pleasure.
