111212112112112.title: A more deadly sister

1112121121121122.content:
"Who are you talking too?" comes a voice from behind Tulip and a moment later the head of the red haired girl, Olga, appears over Tulip's shoulder. Her jaw drops as she does a small double take upon setting eyes upon you. "Hey! But-- I thought-- where did he come from?!"

"He survived," your sister replies, maintaining a frighteningly big smile, "so you'll get your chance to eat him after all. Come on." She turns, moves past Olga and walks down the hall to Ran's room; never taking her eyes from you for a second. You feel, literally, like a deer in the headlights. You brain is screaming at you to jump from her hand and run; but you can't seem to tear your eyes from hers.

As Tulip enters the room, with Olga at her heels; Ran turns from her desk where she's typing something into her computer.

"What's tha-- where did he come from?!" she says with rising excitement. Jeez! Where did your sister meet these people?!

"It gets better!" Tulip replies with excitement as you are placed on the edge of Ran's dresser. You think for a moment that she's about to completely release you, but Tulip actually maintains a hold on your chest using the fingers of one hand while she brings a fingernail from the other hand to your arm. You realize what she's about to do a split second before she does but that's far too late to stop her.

With one quick movement she swipes the nail down the skin of your arm, splitting it from your should to your wrist. Your whole body spasms as white hot pain shoots through your mangled arm. Tulip's restraining hand is the only thing keeping you from collapsing completely.

Finally, after what seems like an eternity, the pain begins to fade and you finally manage to stop screaming and actually examine your arm. There's still a long cut down it's length; but even as you watch it finishes healing up. A few moments after that; it's as if it never happened.

You take stock of your surroundings. You're drenched in sweat and panting for breath after that vicious attack. You look up and realize that all three are of your captors have their faces right up beside the edge of the dresser watching you in fascination. Tulip, her face flushed, is still smiling that fucking smile though she's clearly breathing heavily as well; if she were older you'd swear she was getting off on this. Olga's face reveals only shock with fair share of disbelief. Ran, Tulip's Asian friend, is watching with the calmest expression of the three; like she's watching a magic trick that she's almost figured out.

This time, it's Ran who reaches a fingernail over towards you. You start to shake your head to stop her from doing what you know is coming.

"Whoa-- whoa-- wait-- WAIT! AAAAAAAAAHHHHHHH!!!" you are again reduced to a screaming mass as the world around you falls away from your senses. Just you and the searing, searing pain as Ran parts the flesh of your arm to the bone. As much as it hurt before, it somehow feels even worse this time.

Your world seems to spin around you as the pain finally begins to recede again. As soon as the wound closes completely you fall to your knees as Tulip finally releases you.

"So, how much to you think he can take?" you hear Olga ask the room in general.

"Well..." you hear Ran's somewhat muffled voice and manage to lift your shaking head to see her digging in her closet, "my parents got me something for Christmas that I think will help us figure that out."

Finally, she pulls out a black, plastic case and holds it up for the others to see. "A dissection kit," she says simply.

'Shit!' you think as your eyes shoot wide and fix on the approaching black, plastic container of unimaginable pain. 'I've got to get out of here!'

"Now, now," you Sister says as her hands suddenly encircle you and gather you up again, "I don't think we need to jump strait to that."

Given what you've just been through, you almost feel touched that Tulip has suddenly decided to spare you further pain. However, that feeling quickly turns to confusion as you realize that she's setting you down on the floor between the three of them.

"After all," she continues, "I can think of a much quicker way!" With that, you watch as her sneaker clad foot suddenly shoots from the ground and momentarily seems to hover above you. You don't even have time to fall backwards onto your ass before the foot rockets downward with all of her weight behind it.

Despite the speed with which Tulip moves her leg; the entire event seems to happen in slow motion to you. Pain shoots through your body as the impact instantly shatters your legs and you're forced onto your back under the still descending sneaker. Your entire body becomes nothing but a single mass of pain as she crushes the rest of you a split-second later.

You're one desperate hope was that you would either die or at least black out as the pain became too much; neither of these happen. Instead, you 'feel' everything as the liquid mush that is now what's left of your body is ground into the carpet. You can somehow actually feel as parts of 'you' find their way into the tread of your sister's sneaker as she begins to twist her foot back and forth to make sure she got you all. The pain is unlike anything you could possibly have imagined and the only thing keeping you from screaming till your lungs give out is that they've already been ground to paste.

Light hits you as your sister finally lifts her foot to admire her handiwork. Most of you seems to be stuck to the bottom of her sneaker; but you see long strands of gooey flesh run from it to the floor where the rest of you remains.

Through the haze of pain, you can actually hear them discussing what's left of you.

"Eeewww!" Olga says as her face scrunches up, "what a mess!"

"Neat," Ran replies as she crouches down beside your sister's raised foot and begins to poke at your remains with one of the instruments from her kit. "It looks like his body is actually trying to fix itself!"

Your sister, for her part, is panting just like she just ran a marathon. "That... was... awesome..." she finally manages to get out before she starts to giggle at what she's done to you.

"Put your sneaker near the rest of him," Ran tells your sister, "he'll fix faster if he's closer together."

A moment later your view from the underside of her sneaker shakes as she removes it and places it, and you, on the floor beside the sticky remains of your body.

Several long moments pass as you continue to wallow in your own personal hell of unending pain. Finally you hear somebody start screaming; only to register with slight surprise that it's you as your lungs reform.

It is several more long moments, and with a quite a bit of relief, that you realize that you can close your eyes again. It does nothing to dull the pain, but at least it's one thing you have control over shutting out.

Finally, mercifully, the pain begins to fade and then disappear completely. You're whole again. Curled into a fetal position and sobbing your eyes out from the pain of the last few minutes, but whole.

You become aware of fast talking taking place above you as your captors discuss what to do with you next. All of their eyes have momentarily left you as they talk and you realize that this may be your only chance. As they're standing all around you, your only option is to make a run for it between the legs of one of them and hope that you can hide. At least if you're caught, you'll have some say into who has you next.

The only real unknown is Olga. So far she's the only one of the three who's been all 'talk' as far as torturing you is concerned. But does that mean she's also 'unwilling' to harm you? Or is this a case where the Devil you know is better than the Devil you don't; and you should choose between Ran or your Sister.

With a groan, you pull yourself up and start running in the direction of...
1112121121121122.title: And happy fun fun time begins...

choices: Someone spots the strange stain on Olga's naked ass
Olga puts on her pants, thus trapping you in darkness and out of sight
11121211211211221.content:
You run towards Olga as fast as you can, which isn’t very fast at all. Your legs feel rubber and are hard to move, must be because less then a minute ago your legs were nothing but paste under your sister’s sneaker. No matter how weak you feel, you refuse to slow down and head towards your only salvation. Every time you think of Olga, you remember her disappointed words at the sight of you dead. However, what is most clear is how those words were of disappointment that she wasn’t going to eat you. You hoped she no longer was thinking about swallowing you, but if she was, being digested by a prepubescent had to be better then being torn apart over and over again, by Tulip or her other crazy friend.

You get to Olga’s foot and start jumping up and down, trying to get her to see you and pick you up. The chubby girl does notice you, looking down dumbly as you wave your hands. “I think the bug wants me to pick him up?”

“Then pick him up. You were complaining earlier that you were disappointed you wouldn’t get to play with him and there he is. What are you waiting for,” Tulip tells Olga who only nods and starts reaching down. As her chubby fingers near, it hits you how stupid your idea was. The only reason Olga hadn’t made any threats towards you was because she simply had nothing to say, not due to having any kind of conscience she had. The girl was a follower and did whatever Ran or your sister said. This hits you as her fingers wrap around you and you’re lifted up into the air. You start squirming, willing to fall and break every bone in your body to escape Olga’s meaty paw.

“He’s wiggling in my fist. It feels funny,” the big girl chuckles and tightens her grip to make you wiggle harder. She grins as she squeezes you, delighting in your tiny movements against her palm. Ran and tulip move closer, staring joyfully at you as you squirm desperately in Olga’s hand.

“Wait until you feel him wiggling in your belly,” Ran tells Olga to your horror. The girl blinks and looks at you, licking her chops as she lifts you to her mouth. You go still as her mouth opens and you see the wet, pink inside of her mouth. Whatever she had for breakfast must have been spicy because her breath has a terrible zesty smell that makes you gag.

Your moving closer to her mouth until you’re only a few scant inches away from her gleaming white teeth. You wonder of the girl will swallow you whole or chew you up with her sharp teeth. You get sick at the thought of tiny, chewed up bits of you going down her throat to her hungry belly. It would be quick, but incredibly painful. You’re nearly in her mouth when Tulip grabs Olga’s arm and saves you from becoming the girls mid-morning snack. Why your sisters saving you is a mystery, but you’re grateful no matter what the reasons for her stopping the hungry girl were.

“Why not feel him wiggle under you first. Give the bug the full Olga treatment.” Tulip’s words send a chill down your spine even though you have no clue what the full Olga treatment meant. Olga looks between you and your sister flustered. Self-confidence builds inside her and a very big, menacing smile forms on her face.

“Okay Tulip, if you say so.”

The next thing you know, Olga’s throwing you down onto a chair. You land with a thud, breaking several bones, a few seconds pass and they reset. You healed faster that time, before it took three times as long to heal. That was good, except you still felt the pain of having your bones shatter. No matter how fast you heal; nothing can take away from the pain coursing through your frail body. You hear giggles and what sounds like clothes rustling. You stare up at where Olga is standing and let out a whimper. You see two very big, very pale moons jiggling above you. Olga had pulled her pants down and exposed her big, fat ass. The behind hovers over you as Olga prepares to sit. Each cheek is the size of a double-decker bus and probably weights twice that.

“Please,” you whimper before Olga sits down, dropping ten ton’s of fatty flesh on top of your tiny body. The soft booty feels like steel when it crashes down on top of you, breaking dozens of bones the second of impact. More bones break as Olga continues sitting down until her whole butt is on top of you. The huge behind smothered you with it’s weight, pressing down on you and breaking everything inside you. You couldn’t scream or cry because your jaw eye sockets had been flattened. The pain was unimaginable as Olga’s ass crushed every part of you. Olga slid her butt across the chair, compressing you further. You wish for the bliss of unconsciousness, but it never comes leaving you under Olga’s titanic ass to suffer.

Muffled as it was, you heard Olga speak. “He stopped moving.” The next instant, you feel Olga’s ass lifting up. You rejoice, but not for long because your being carried up with it. Somehow, you’re stuck to Olga’s butt and being lifted up with it.

“Hey, where they’d the bug go?” Tulip asks when she sees you no longer on the chair. Her eyes turn directly on you, but quickly look away. Why can’t she see you? You look around desperately, trying to find some reflective surface to see how bad the damage is.

Olga turns, spinning you around and that when you catch sight of a mirror. Once more, you lack a mouth and can’t scream out in horror. Olga’s ass had complete crushed you, reducing you into nothing more but a smear on her left butt cheek. Your body had conformed to the cheek, blending in perfectly with the fleshy globe. You were nothing but a blotch on Olga’s ass, kept flat by the heat and density of her flesh. You weren’t going to peal off until someone pried you off, but who the hell was going to check Olga’s ass for a human smear? If no one finds you, you might be trapped as nothing but a blotch on Olga’s ass forever. That horrid thought makes you try to vibrate your shapeless body in hopes that one of your tormentors might see you.
11121211211211221.title: Olga Butt Crush!

choices: Have 'fun' with you on her own.
111212112112112211.content:
"He's got to be here somewhere," declares Tulip as she begins to search for you around the chair you were just squashed in. "Did you feel him get away?"

"No!" Olga exclaims in a slightly indignant tone. "One second was was just wiggling away under my butt and the next he wasn't."

"Well, find him!" Tulip orders from the floor where she's already on her hands and knees looking for you.

"Yes, Tuli--" her voice trails off; but you're the only one who notices. Of course, the fact that Olga is looking over her shoulder and staring at you in the mirror may have helped there.

'Yes!' you dare to think as your new life as part of Olga's ass again flashes behind your eyes. Scary doesn't begin to cover it.

This thought is almost thankfully interrupted as your plunged into darkness. Moving faster than you would ever have been willing to give her credit; Olga has reached down and yanked her pants back up into place.

Like many girls, Olga wears jeans that are just a size or so too small for her butt. This become readily apparent as you now find yourself mashed between Olga's ass cheek and the denim of her jeans. This is exactly the sort of fate you wanted to avoid.

"Uhhh..." you hear Olga begin awkwardly, "I have to use the bathroom."

And with that your world is in motion again as Olga takes off down the hallway without waiting for a reply from your sister or her other friend.

A new burning pain quickly starts and spreads as you're repeatedly rubbed against the inside of Olga's jeans by her ass. By the times she's made it down the hall to the bathroom you feel like your whole body (where ever the hell it is) is on fire. As such, the sudden blast of cool air as her pants drop again and you are exposed to the light, comes as a welcome reprieve.

Olga quickly kicks her pants off completely and then turns her backside to the mirror to get a better look at you.

This is the best chance you've had to see yourself since this whole mess started and now that you do, you're even more surprised that Olga saw you at all. You are a barely noticeable splotch on her left ass cheek. Try as you might, you can't even determine your entire outline. There are places where you can't tell where her ass ends and you begin.

"It is you, isn't it," Olga breathes in amazement, "I thought so."
Suddenly her hand covers you as she begins trying to peel you off of her ass. Unfortunately, after a few attempts it becomes obvious that you're not going to be removes easily.

Of course, that doesn't stop Olga. Pain pierces your body at multiple points as she tries to pinch your body off her ass. Unfortunately, that also fails. The pain is difficult to describe as her next attempt is to actually scratch you off. He fingernails, each roughly the size of your head are repeatedly dragged across your body. To make matters worse, being pressed flat against her skin seems to allow her to reach what would have been your front and back at the same time. The pain is excruciating and seemingly relentless. FINALLY, she stops.

Though your thoughts are now hazy from the pain endured during the last few minutes; you do manage to hear her give a frustrated sigh as she gives you a look that clearly indicates that she thinks YOU'RE being difficult on purpose.

"Damn it," she groans, "I wish your body would just remake itself."

A moment later her eyes shoot wide as your body begins to reform right on her ass cheeks. As if rising from a pool of water, your head emerges first and takes shape, followed by the rest of your body until your entire body is whole again at which point you promptly fall from her ass.

Sure, you did fall into the hard, hard sink, but you gladly welcome the accompanying pain this time as it at least means your free from her ass and don't have to endure any further attempts to remove you.

A moment later the light to the sink is blocked out by her head as she peers down at you.

"How'd you do that?"

"Yes," you manage back after a moment, "I'm fine thanks for asking."

"How," she begins again, her tone definitely taking a harder edge this time, "did you do that?"

"I don't know!" you yell back at you slowly climb to your feet, "I was stuck there and then you said you wanted me back in my body and here I am!" Some part of you realizes the folly of yelling at somebody who can and, in fact, has squashed you like a bug; but the stress of the last few minutes seems to have caught up with you and you just don't care anymore. "Now take me home!"

Your resolve weakens immediately as you realize that she's not focused on you but is already deep in thought. The resolve absolutely evaporates when she does finally focus on you again as a smile begins to creep over her face.

A moment later you are again encased in her meaty hand as she whisks you up onto her shoulder. She's actually pulled her shirt aside near the base of her neck so that you are sitting on bare skin.

"I have an idea," she says more to herself than to you. "I think you'd make a great... tattoo!" She says the last word as if she where a magician finishing a trick and watches you with obvious excitement on her face.

For your part, you are simply confused by this latest display but find you can't complain too much because whatever she thinks she'd doing isn't actually hurting you any.

That is, until you begin to melt.

"What?!" you scream as your feet seem do disappear. It's like she's mashing you back into her skin but she isn't even touching you!

"How are you doing tha--" you words are cut off as the rest of your face and head quickly join the rest of your body on her shoulder.

You find yourself again a part of Olga's skin; though you do have a better view this time. You watch as she leans over the sink to get a better view in the mirror.

Olga lets out a triumphant giggle as she pulls back her shirt to reveal a new tattoo on her collarbone. It's a tiny image of your face, you mouth open in a tiny silent scream, your hands up beside your face as if trapped behind glass.

Somewhere through the shock of this latest development you hear your sister's fat friend let out what can only be described as a happy purr.

"So long as you're touching my skin, I can make you take any shape I want," she says as her smile widens. "Hmm... I've wanted to get either a piercing or a tattoo for the longest time but mom wouldn't let me. Now I can try both and see which I like more!"

Her smile drops slightly as her verbal thought continues, "of course, Tulip will want to know about this."

Olga decides she's going to...
111212112112112211.title: Imperfections In the Skin

choices: Olga stops automatically, something off about her all of a sudden.
Olga laughs and tosses you into her mouth. You're mince meat.
1112121121121122112.content:
Olga stares down at your flat, unmoving face on her collarbone and slowly a devious smile forms on her chubby face.

“Maybe it would be better if Tulip never found out about this. She’s been trying to get rid of her insect sibling for years, why spoil things by telling her he’s alive. Besides, she got to toy with the worm for her whole life, it’s time someone else got to enjoy the pleasure of crushing the bug,” Olga says as she nods in approval over her decision. The girl had made up her mind, you were going to be all hers and Tulip would never know about your whereabouts. Olga thought that maybe she could tell Ran. The little Asian was good at keeping secrets and it would be fun to share in punishing you. Olga wondered if it was possible to contort your body to the shape of a Chinese word, which would make a great tattoo for her lower back.

As Olga decides the various ways to make you suffer, you remain frozen, trapped in a nightmare that you can’t escape from. Against Olga’s flesh, you can’t even close your eyes or breath. It’s like you’ve literally become a piece of the fat girl’s skin. You’re left stuck there, alone with your thoughts on how unfair this is and how you wish you could scream. What makes your doom sink in is how when Olga started to talk about what she was going to do, she had been talking to herself, not you. Was that going to be your fate, alone and trapped on the fat girl’s body forever, treated like a blot of ink on her body? For once in your life, you wanted to be back with Tulip. She might have been a masochist, but she never treated you like an object and ignored you like this.

A shadow loomed over you and out of the corner of your eyes, you saw Olga’s chubby fingers going towards you. Pain shot through your one-dimensional body as she scrapped her fingernails against your side. She was trying to peel you off again and this time it was easier because she knew precisely where you were. Taking the pain silently, your body started to roll off Olga’s body. She got her thick fingers nails underneath and pulled you off with one tug. You hung suspended from her fingers as your body filled up and resumed to normal. Gasping for air, you looked wearily up at Olga. You doubted she had come down with a change of heart and feared what the possessive, cruel girl would do to you next.

“How you doing? Having fun being pressed against my sexxa body?” You snorted at the question, Olga knew damn well how much pain you had gone through and she dared to ask if you were having fun. You wanted to escape, but Olga was holding you tightly between her fingers and even if you did get away, she would be able to get you back without any trouble. After spending your whole life a few inches tall, you knew it was impossible to get away from a person unless they were distracted and Olga had her full attention on you.

“Not talking? That’s okay, I know you loved being smushed against me,” Olga let out what could have been a purr, but could of just as much been her clearing her throat. “I peeled you off because I was afraid that Tulip was going to see you when I left the bathroom. I need to hind you somewhere that Tulip will never see you, but where?”
You gulp nervously at the potential places the very creative girl could put you. Every hole on her body was a potential hiding place for you and none of them where good. You hoped she did something like put you in her shoe, smelling her bg sweaty feet was a lot better then being placed anywhere else on her gargantuan body.

Olga tapped her chin as she thought, her tiny mind trying to come up with a solution. “I could put you in my panties, Tulip would never think to look at my ass. How does that sound little guy, want to be on the other side of my butt?” You wretched in disgust at the possibility Olga cramming you up her ass. The huge hunk of flesh had smelled horrible on the outside, no telling how bad it is inside.

Olga seems to consider it for a second before shaking her head. “Naw, we’ll save that one for later.” Sighing in relief, you know that you’ve only dodged one bullet, there were still many more horrible places Olga cold put you. You didn’t even think about being in her ass later, one horror at a time for you. “I need a place where you can’t be seen and I know you can’t get away,” Olga mumbled as she tried to think, which was not easy for her. Finally, an idea came to her simple mind.

“I’ll eat you!” Olga squealed and licked her thick lips. You bite your lip to keep yourself from screaming at Olga in anger. Being in her stomach was going to be hell. You can only imagine what smells and half digested food are floating in Olga’s big gut. You had been swallowed before and it was never fun, but inside Olga’s gut you knew that things were going to be pure hell. You would be shaken and stirred inside her caldron like stomach, crushed under mushy food and swept around by the tide of digestive enzymes and that’s not taking into condition your new body makeup. You could actually melt in there.

“Please,” you beg, but are completely ignored. Olga doesn’t look at you once as she lifted you up to her mouth. Her lips part and she opens her mouth. Warm, putrid air blows out against your face and you gag. You prepare yourself to be tossed in like a piece of candy and swallowed down to Olga’s waiting belly. But as your arm dangles above her teeth, Olga closes her mouth on your arm with a snap. You scream your lungs out as Olga pulls you away from her mouth. She had bitten your arm off at the elbow and was chewing on your arm loudly. You could hear crunches as her teeth grinded flesh and bone to paste. With a gulp, your destroyed arm goes to her stomach and Olga opens her mouth with a sigh.

“Yummy,” she comments as you lay limply between her fingers. Semi-consciously, you look at your arm, watching with dulled fascination as your arm starts reforming. The sight of bones growing and flesh forming out of thin air should have been amazing, but all you could think of was, great, now she can rip my arm off again.

“Please stop,” you weakly plead. What you’ve gone through in the last half and hour had been hellish. Melted by acid, Crushed under a food, flattened by an ass, turned into a tattoo and then ripped limb from limb. Whatever little sanity you had left was cracking as the nightmare continued on without an end in sight.
1112121121121122112.title: Never Ending Nightmare

choices: Olga tries to obey the command.
Ran's coming in to find Olga, ready of not!
11121211211211221121.content:
Through your fuzzy senses you become aware of a distant thumping. You struggle to focus as your brain tries harder and harder to disconnect. You've had a hard fucking day and the only sign of it ending so far would be with the possible sweet embrace of death down in Olga's bubbling, frothing stomach.

The thumping comes again and you realize that it's Ran, Tulip's other friend, knocking on the door as she yells in, "Hey Olga, quit punishing my toilet and get out here and help us look. If he tells Tulip's mom we'll all be in trouble!"

"I'm almost finished," Olga calls back as she licks her lips at you. For just a moment her eyes actually focus past you instead of on you. With the slightest shake of her head she comes back from wherever she was and takes hold of your foot.

In an instant your world is turned upside down as Olga hoists you up above her head and opens her mouth as wide as it can go directly below you. Long strands of thick saliva criss cross her mouth and you notice bits of food stuck in her teeth from whatever she may have eaten earlier. As much as you don't want to; you find you can't take your eyes off of her throat. Perhaps accidently, perhaps intentionally, you watch Olga's throat open and close below you, offering you an excellent view of the deep dark hole that your arm has already disappeared down.

"You're going to be..." she starts as her hot, foul breath washes over you again, "so... going to be... so... tasty."

You don't know what her problem is, but she seems to be hesitating and you recognize the sudden appearance of hope when you see it.

"Don't Olga," you beg with as much earnestness in your voice as you can muster, "You don't really want to do this!"

"I... I... I do..." Olga starts again, sounding almost confused now. You aren't sure what her problem is but you have to take advantage of it.

Still focused on Olga's glistening open mouth you try to talk rationally to her, "Olga, you don't have to do this. Just let me go."

To your horror Olga actually gives you what you want as her fingers instantly release you and her mouth rockets up at you. With a wet plop you land on the middle of her tongue where you begin to slide backwards. With a small flip you find yourself on your back staring up past Tulips teeth and lips to the outside world; her fingers remain where they were when they released you. You clench your eyes shut in anticipation of the accompanying gulp that will follow. And you wait. And wait.

Finally, experimentally, you open one eye and take a look around. Your on your back, practically spread eagle in the back of Olga's mouth. With a sudden surge of panic you realize that the only reason your still in her mouth is that her throat was closed when you landed and she hasn't opened it to swallow you yet. That could, of course, change at any moment. Yet it doesn't. Looking around more, you realize that she hasn't moved her hand away from above her mouth yet. You aren't sure what kind of game Olga is playing but if you've got a chance to not endure the pain of being melted down in her stomach, then you're all for it. You also realize that you're covered in her thick saliva and that it actually seems to be running back and pooling around you.

Wiping the thick, viscous fluid away from your mouth, you slowly begin to sit up further. When this garners no further reaction from Olga you actually dare to stand; trying your best to step along the edges of the opening to her throat instead of directly over it. The sensation of wading through an ankle deep pool of spit is strange at best.

With dawning apprehension you realize that eventually, the amount of saliva will increase to a point that Olga's throat will simply open automatically and you don't really want to be here when that happens. Unfortunately, the only way out seems to be up Olga's tongue. A sudden wave of hopelessness threatens to overwhelm you as you realize that even if you managed to scale her tongue and reach her lips, Olga would just flip you right back in to play some more.

'No!' you think angrily at yourself, "one problem at a time. And first things first." Determined, you place your feet directly on the opening to her throat and give a push to hoist yourself up onto her tongue. You throw your arms out as wide as you can and do your best to cling to the giant slippery muscle. A sudden blast of hot air from below you signals the opening of Olga's throat as the push with your feet provides the final stimulus needed. In an instant all the pooled saliva disappears down the dark, slick tube to oblivion. But it doesn't stop. Her throat remains open. Waiting for you. You tare your eyes away from her throat and lock them instead on her fingers, still poised high above you.

With a heave you throw one of your arms out above you and try desperately to cling to the tongue enough to pull yourself up; and you do, barely. And so it goes. Arm over arm, you begin to slowly make your way up her tongue. You can hear your heart pounding in your ears at the thought that, with one mistake, you will begin your trip down Olga's gullet. Fortunately, that moment doesn't seen to come as you inch higher and higher.

With a supreme sense of satisfaction and accomplishment you finally reach a point towards the tip of Olga's tongue where you can lock your hands together behind her tongue. Physically and mentally drained you hang limply from your momentary perch, clinging to her tongue. You have to admit though, as terrifying as it is, the sensation of dragging your naked crotch against Olga's hot moist tongue isn't completely unpleasant. Hell, given the right situations, you could probably even enjoy it. A quick glance down to the glistening hole below quickly reminds you why these thoughts should be put away for later. Much later.

As weary as you are, your goal is practically in sight. Carefully, you climb the rest of the way until you can wrap you legs around the tip of her tongue and thus free up your arms. Losing your balance would be a big mistake now so you take the utmost care as you reach up and grab onto one of her teeth. With a massive effort you manage to heave yourself up onto the far side of her tooth where you straddle her lower lip. For a minute, you simply lay upon her lip as you slowly begin to catch your breath.

Finally you look up towards Olga's eyes which are focused on her fingers; still poised above her mouth.

"Olga," you call questioningly.

No reply.

"Olga," you call a little louder. You don't want to be at her mercy but something strange is definitely going on.

"Say something," you yell up at her.

"Something," Olga says, the sudden motion of her mouth throwing you off her lip. In terror you slide down her chin and achieve momentary free fall before you hit her shirt. For the first time you're thrilled that Olga is so chubby as the slope of the shirt to cover her stomach not only slows your fall but actually serves to fling you forward instead. With a thud you land painfully on the bathroom counter. Pain shoots through your newly reformed arm as you become all too sure that you've broken it in your fall.

Thankfully, the shooting pain begins to fade as a cracking sound seems to signify the resetting of your bone as your arm begins to heal itself. Painfully you struggle to your feet and look up at your tormentor, who remains strangely immobile above you. Her arm is still waiting above her open mouth as if it had just dropped you inside. Anger wells up inside of you. You don't know what the hell she's doing but you've had enough of whatever little game she's playing.

"Put your arm down you fat fuck," you scream up at her. Your eyes shoot wide in surprise and you actually jump backwards as Olga instantly lowers her arm to her side. You could almost laugh, with her arm down but her mouth wide open and held to the sky, she looks strangely like a baby bird waiting for her meal. What the hell is she doing?!

"Close your mouth," you yell up. Again, Olga instantly complies. Against your own will, a smile begins to pull at the edges of your mouth.

"Turn on the water and make it nice and warm," you call up to her, your voice taking a commanding tone this time. Olga instantly complies and a moment later, steamy hot water is running running from the sink faucet. With a smile you step below it and begin to wash Olga's drying saliva off of your naked body. The sensation of the water cascading down your body helps to clear your head some and you realize that this change came over her after she'd eaten your arm. You inspect your new arm again as your smile spreads still further. Finally you step out of the water and look up at Olga again.

Suddenly, disgusting fat Olga seems so much better when she's obeying your commands instead of abusing you. But you need a test. Something to see just how far you can push her. You look around for a moment for something to command her to do. Finally it dawns on you.

With your smile now reaching from ear to ear you begin to contemplate the concept of owning your very own giantess. Turning your back on Olga you bend over slightly. "Olga," you command, "lick my ass." No hesitation crosses her face as she immediately sticks out her tongue and brings to down to you. With one quick swipe Olga gives your tiny butt a wet lick before she stands again.

"Well fuck me!" you say somewhat awestruck as you turn around to look up at 'your' giantess again. Suddenly your blood runs cold...
11121211211211221121.title: Olga becomes much easier to live with.

111212112112112211212.content:
You stare up at the pudgy, red-headed friend of your increasingly sadistic sister Tulip as the pounding comes again.

“I mean it, Olga, I’m gonna count to three then I’m coming in to get you!” Ran calls from just beyond the door. Alright, Olga’s brain seems to have gone bye-bye for the moment. What does that mean for you though? You could command Olga to get you out of this madhouse; but just past the wooden door are two girls of equal size and strength who don’t need someone telling them what to do like a real life Jimminy Cricket. Think Steve, think!

“One!” calls the cool, slightly accented voice again.

Fight or flight. Fighting still seems out of the question. Flight comes next. You can use Olga to hide! Quickly your eyes scan over Olga’s gargantuan body. You’ve been close enough already to realize that personal hygiene is not exactly Olga’s strong suit and finding yourself wedged into any of the various cracks or crevasses on her body fills you with an emotion best described as ‘wanting to hurl.’ But what choice do you really have?!

“Two!” calls the voice again as the doorknob gives a rattle.

No choice. Death at Tulip’s hand or an unpleasant ride in Olga’s pocket; a surprisingly difficult choice, but you ultimately choose life after the intense pain you’ve already experienced today. Turning back to Olga you start to call up to her only to feel your hopes sink. Her eyes have changed. Vacant and staring mere moments ago; her eyes seem to be slowly blinking back into wakefulness. Bad. Definitely bad. No choice though. “Olga!” you call up to her with as commanding a voice as you can muster. The sound of her name definitely has an effect; just not the effect you had hoped for.

“You!” she says thickly as her eyes focus on you again. Faster than you thought her pudgy arms capable, they propel her open meaty palms towards you. Before you can even squeak in surprise, her fat fingers close around your middle and hoist you up off the counter.

“Three!” comes the voice again at almost the exact same instant that the door swings open. Framed in the doorway is the dark haired Ran with a smile of accomplishment that she had picked the lock. Her smile falters slightly as she takes in the situation. Olga, still looking slightly dazed; and you, held so securely between Olga’s interlocked fists that you can barely breath. “You found him,” she squeals much more quietly than you would have expected, “where was he?”

“He, uh…” says Olga, demonstrating why she isn’t the brains of the trio, “was here, uh… under my ass and I was just about to give him to Tulip.” It’s hard to see from your position in Olga’s fists but you can tell that Ran is judging the story for truthfulness. A moment later you hear a door quietly close.

“You were, huh?” says a clearly not convinced Ran as she steps closer. Her voice has dropped. Olga had told you that she would keep you for herself. The fact that Ran isn’t getting Tulip at this very moment leaves little doubt in your mind that she has similar plans. “You weren’t planning on… keeping him? Just for a little while?”

You watch the expression on Olga’s face as massive gears slowly begin to tumble into place behind her eyes. “Just… for a little while,” she echoes, “well, maybe just a very little while.” You watch a smile start to form on her lips.

“We’ll give him back to Tulip,” Ran agrees from just behind you. Her warm breath blows past you. She must be inspecting you very closely now. “We’ll just give him back… in a little bit,” she concludes as if a deal had been struck. “Now give him to me.”

You had been so close! Olga had been under your power and nobody else had known. Now you’re right back in the position of hoping you get left with the LESS awful girl. And you’re not even sure which girl that is!

“Huh?” Olga responds quickly with a hint of suspicion in her voice, “why should I give him to you?”

“Because,” Ran replies coolly, “you’ve already had some fun with him. I’m quicker at coming up with excuses than you are. And…” she finishes with a hint of triumph in her voice, “if you don’t, I’ll tell Tulip everything right now.”

You can actually see Olga’s hopes wilt as her grip on you tightens even more. For just a moment you consider the fact that she’s decided to crush you rather than hand you over but then she suddenly holds you out to Ran; opening her palm so that you lay panting in the middle.

The sight of another set of fingers reaching out to abuse you is a little more than you’re willing to take lying down. “Let ME GO!” you scream as loud as you can between pants. Immediately Olga yanks her hand back as if burned sending a very surprised Steve McMinor tumbling toward the floor.

“Olga!” she hisses as she manages to nab you out of thin air just before you splatter on the floor; which may actually be what happens given your new bodies ‘disability.’ “What’s the matter with you?”

“I, I don’t know,” Olga says in a clearly confused tone. “My hand just moved on its own.”

“Whatever stupid,” your new holder says with a roll of her eyes. Your own eyes are locked on Olga however. It’s still working! She had followed your order! Quick Steve, before something else happens!

You take a massive breath and yell at the confused chubby girl, “Olga—“

Immediately another hand closes over the palm you’re sitting in. “Shhh,” Ran says simply as you are jostled between her hands. She’s clearly doing something. A moment later you find out what when the covering hand is removed. Kneeling now, Ran peers down at you. You spy a sneaker only a few inches from her palm. ‘No points for guessing what she has in mind,’ you think miserably even as the palm starts to tilt.

You spin around on your ass, intending to grab the edge of her hand to slow your drop into her smelly sneaker. You are not now, nor have you ever really been a ‘foot guy’; and the thought of being trapped in a smelly, warm sneaker while its owner hangs out with your younger sister is not a pleasant one.

“No escaping this time,” Ran coos gently as you react too late. You hands scrape uselessly against her skin as you slide off the side and land heavily inside the garment.

“What are you doing?” a concerned sounding Olga asks suddenly from somewhere beyond your sight as Ran leans closer till her face obscures everything else beyond the mouth of the shoe.

“Consider it my first test,” she says as she smiles big down at you, “he’ll survive.” Her confidence in you isn’t exactly touching. You have barely climbed to your feet when your new prison shakes violently with motion and you find yourself on your hands and knees again. Like a solar eclipse, you watch slowly as the light is blotted about above you. Looking up in panic you realize that it’s Ran’s foot. She’s putting the sneaker back on.

Frantically you shove your hands out against the advancing foot; but at your size you might as well try stopping an 18 wheeler from rolling downhill. It just isn’t going to happen. The foot easily pushes into the shoe, forcing you onto your back as you stare in terror up at the wrinkled surface. Before you can come up with a plan B, the ball of Ran’s foot presses down onto your body… and keeps pressing. Intense pressure builds as you feel your body being crushed. Somewhere distantly you hear the sound of bones snapping and you realize they’re your own. Unlike the last few times your body has been likewise punished; you don’t bleed this time. Instead, while intense pain shoots though every synapse of your brain, your body merely conforms to the wrinkles and contours of the underside of Ran’s foot. The pain that you’re in makes real coherent thought a bit of a luxary at this point; but the mental image of Gumby being squished does briefly flutter through your thoughts.

Muffled by the sneaker and the massive foot your find yourself beneath; you can still hear Ran give a soft hum of approval.

“It feels good, like one of those liquid gel insoles,” she says happily.

“I want him next,” says an unconvinced Olga.

“In time,” Ran replies, punctuated by the sound of the bathroom door opening. “Now let’s go help Tulip look.

Inside the sneaker, you’d love to believe that the worse sensation you could feel was the vertigo as the foot lefts suddenly when Ran starts walking. It’s not, the pain blocks out everything. And no matter how much you want; there’s no escaping it…
111212112112112211212.title: Ran Spoils Everything

choices: Ran's body reacts the same way Olga's did.
Ran has a very different reaction.
1112121121121122112122.content:
The pain. You’ve spent the last few hours with your body smooshed flat beneath the sweaty, bare foot of one of Tulip’s friend’s. For a guy who’s only three inches tall; being crushed beneath someone’s heel is one of the less pleasant day to day worries. The one consolation is that, were such a horrific action to happen; you would last mere moments before death. You wouldn’t have to endure having your body crushed on the mere whim of another human being. You wouldn’t have to hear your own bones breaking in such quick succession that it sounds more like a crackle than a crunch. Blissful death would embrace you far before any of this happened; or it should have…

The pain had been so intense that nearly a minute passed before you realize that it is subsiding. Slowly, achingly your body has begun reforming itself as it had a number of times today. Ran’s foot is gone and you hadn’t even felt it withdraw from the shoe.

Slowly you try to organize your scattered thoughts as you body finishes its regeneration. You remain huddled in the fetal position in the bottom of the sneaker. Tulip hadn’t been happy when you’d disappeared. The three of them had searched the house from top to bottom. You vaguely recall Tulip’s annoyed tone as she asked Ran to quit stomping everywhere. You more vividly recall the giggle that had followed. Finally, the movement had lessened and there had been the sound of impatient ‘good-byes.’

Cautiously you turn your head, scanning what you can beyond the mouth of the shoe. The scent of Ran’s sweaty foot still lingers heavily; but it’s still the freshest air you’ve had in hours and it’s glorious as far as you’re concerned. You recognize the pale pink walls as belonging to Ran’s bedroom and you can see the edge of something that may be the underside of a table.

You push yourself shakily into a sitting position. Thankfully, nothing hurts now but you can’t seem to stop your body from shaking. Finally, you manage to grab the edge of the sneaker and pull yourself up. It takes no time at all to find Ran who is currently kneeling on the floor with her ass towards you, spreading out a thick blanket on the floor. As tired and weak as you feel at the moment; you still recognize an opportunity for escape when you see one. Grunting from the effort you manage to pull yourself over the lip of the shoe. God demonstrates exactly how much her hates you a split second after your feet hit the floor when giant, soft fingers encircle your body and lift you effortless into the air.

Bracing yourself for whatever grueling, demeaning torture comes next you are lifted before the attractive Asian features of your newest captor. “Hi,” she says as cheerfully as if she were greeting her best friend.

“Oh, go fuck youse…” you scream back defiantly only to trail off as your brain tries to focus, “uh… did you say ‘hi’?”

Ran gives a girly giggle before she replies again, “duh. What, you want something more formal?” Her smile drops immediately as she adopts what must be her ‘serious face.’ “Hello young master McMinor.”

Something has gone terribly wrong. You aren’t sure what but something in your brain clearly isn’t processing right. Desperately you cling to your sanity as questions run through you head. “Did… didn’t I just spend an afternoon plastered to the sole of your foot?”

“Yeah,” Ran answers simply.

Several long seconds pass as you wait for her to elaborate but she simply smiles benignly at you as if you should be satisfied. “Yeah?!” you scream finally, “and, and, and, and, and you were the one who pulled out a dissection kit! A dissection kit?!”

“Oh that,” she says sheepishly before giving another giggle, “but I didn’t use it.”

“Because she crushed me with her shoe!”

“Look,” she says and her face drops to truly serious, “you belong to Olga and I now. But that doesn’t mean we have to hate each other. If you’re good, I’ll be nice. But if you misbehave, I’ll have to punish you.” With that she smiles delightedly at you. “Kay?”

So that’s it. Slavery with a happy face. “Great,” you grumble between her fingers as you are informed that your new place in life isn’t very different from Tulip’s previous place for you. “So what about being in your sneaker? Was that you being nice, or punishing me?” You can barely keep the contempt from your tone. You realize rationally that there’s nothing to keep her from putting you back but somehow you don’t care at the moment. “Huh?! Which does that count as?”

Far from being put off by your tone, Ran giggles again before she answers, “that was YOU behaving like a good boy. I had to hide you from Tulip and it had to be somewhere you couldn’t escape. So it was either that…” The hand that is holding you drops suddenly till you find yourself held directly before Ran’s slender tummy. “Or this,” she finishes; punctuating the sentence by rubbing her stomach softly with her other hand.

“Great, you’re my new best friend,” you grumble up at her as you already begin plotting your first chance to ‘not behave.’

“Well Mr. Grumpy,” Ran replies easily, “if that’s really how you feel about it then...” instead of finishing her sentence she lifts you from in front of her stomach back up to her face, and then up above. Looking down at her in confusion you realize she’s intending to lower you into her mouth. Her pink tongue rolls out to guide your body between her lips as you start to slide in.

Living with Tulip, you’ve certainly seen your share of the human digestive track; but all of that was before your newest transformation. You don’t have a clue what acid will do to your new, malleable body and you don’t particularly want to find out. “Whoa, whoa, whoa, wait a sec. I was just kidding. You can be as nice as you want too!”

This gets you part of what you want as Ran does close her mouth; she just doesn’t remove you first. Your panic rises as you feel her soft yet firm lips clamp solidly around your middle. “Let’s not do anything hasty,” you squeak as you feel solid objects press tightly against your flesh on the other side of her lips. Her teeth! “Don’t you fucking dare!”

Ran actually smiles as her teeth clamp shut, severing you clear in half. Horrific pain floods your tiny half of a body as a soundless scream escapes your lips. Carefully, Ran pulls you away from her mouth and changes the orientation of her hand till you find yourself lying in her palm screaming down at where your legs used to be. Unable to focus on anything else, you squeeze your eyes shut in a desperate bid to block out some small portion of the stimulus assaulting your brain.

Minutes pass as the pain slowly begins to subside. Finally you dare to look down again. A small sense of relieve hits you as you realize that you already have legs again. You grit your teeth but continue to watch as feet soon form at the bottom of your new legs and a minute later the pain disappears again completely. Anger soon flows in to replace the vanished pain as you turn to glare at Ran.

Your mouth drops open at what you see before you. Ran has apparently been watching you the entire time and a smirk is visible. Her mouth is hanging open and is clearly filling with drool. None of this is particularly surprising at this point. What is, is the fact that she hasn’t swallowed your lower half yet. Laying in the middle of her wet tongue, covered in saliva, lays your legs. More surprisingly, just as you’ve grown new legs; your legs seem to be growing a new top. You watch as the golden liquid that now seems to constitute your body finishes forming a head and face on your twin. You jump in surprise as you watch the other you take a first, shuddering breath and open its eyes.

“This is…” you begin.

“…fucked up,” the other you finishes. At which point, Ran flicks her tongue up, sending him sliding back toward her dark, gaping throat.

“No!” you scream, crawling quickly to the edge of Ran’s hand with your own hand outstretched. Your horror only increases as Ran’s lips close, sealing the other you inside. A moment later she audibly swallows; the smirk never leaving her face. When she opens her mouth however you dare to let out the breath you’re holding as you realize that he’s still in Ran’s mouth. Clinging to the back of her tongue with his legs dangling into her throat; but still there, none the less. “Come on!” you call to your other self, trying to offer whatever support you can, “you can do it!”

Locking eyes with your twin you see his resolve strengthen. Slowly, he begins to claw his way up her tongue and out of her throat. Ran makes no move to stop him; choosing to keep her mouth slack though her eyes are fixed intently on you. You ignore her. “Come on, please!” you call again, your arm outstretched as far as you can reach. If he jumps from her mouth you might just be able to catch him. The thrill of victory flutters in your chest as your other self finally climbs completely back onto her tongue. He takes hardly a moment to steady himself on the slick, constantly moving surface before he charges her lips; obviously thinking the same thing you are. A moment before he makes his leap Ran’s mouth slams slut again. You don’t even have a chance to cry out before she swallows loudly again. You watch in horror as a squirming lump is carried down her slender neck until it disappears below her shirt.

“Noooo!” you scream as your voice finally finds you!

“And that,” says Ran with an air of smugness, “is what COULD have happened to you. So be a good boy, okay?” Below you, her other hand is softly rubbing her tummy again.

‘He’ll be okay,’ you tell yourself. ‘He’ll be okay. He’ll be okay.’ Again and again you repeat this as you stare down at her belly from her hand. But something tells you this is far from the truth. A loud belch, rumbles past Ran’s lips to punctuate the point for you.

“Oops, excuse me,” says Ran happily as she stands and carries you to her bookcase. She sets you down on the eye level shelf far more gently than her previous behavior would dictate. “Don’t worry, you’ll learn to be good,” she says comfortingly as she turns to leave the room. She squeaks in surprise as she reaches the doorway and raises her hands up to hold her stomach. “Huh, you’re more of a fighter than I thought.” And smiling, she leaves the room as you stare daggers after her.
1112121121121122112122.title: Ever Watched Yourself Get Eaten?

choices: Tulip notices Ran putting something in her mouth.
Tulip remains blissfully ignorant for now.
11121211211211221121221.content:
You make no attempt to escape while Ran is out of the room. You don’t even plot one. Instead you lay slumped on your side on the bookshelf Ran left you on. Try as you might, you can’t seem to shake the image of your temporary twin; the look of hope on a face so familiar to you as he ran towards you and potential safety. But he hadn’t. And even now he was in the young Asian girl’s belly being broken down into basic nutritional components. And as awful as that thought is to you; even worse is the guilt you feel as you realize that you’re relieved that it was him and not you that made the trip. All of this after being dissolved; crushed; and eviscerated by someone who SHOULD love you and a couple of her apparently like-minded friends.

Distantly, you notice Ran wander back into the room. She’s moving more hesitantly than before as if she’s occupied with something but you ignore her. You just want to go to sleep and forget this entire day happened for just a little while. It’s been a long day and you’re done playing whatever sick game fate has chosen for you.

“Hey,” begins Ran as she staggers closer to you. Her uneven steps manage to attract your attention enough to actually focus on her. Her own eyes are obviously focused on you but something is wrong; they’re glassy and distant. You’ve seen that look somewhere fairly recently. Your exhaustion shows through when to takes a few moments for the final thought to fall into place. Olga! Olga had looked like that when she’d started following your commands. Hope; extinguished since the moment you’d watched a struggling lump travel down Ran’s neck, begins to burn again.

Ran is almost to the bookcase by this point but she seems to be slowing down more and more by the second. Slowly she stretches out a hand toward you. “I… need to hide… to hide…” Finally she trails off as she comes to a complete stop with her fingertips just barely touching the edge of the shelf you’re on.

“Ran,” you try cautiously. Your eyes scour her body; searching for any sign that she’s heard you. Nothing. Her eyes are open and staring in your direction, but they make no attempt to follow you when you move. Olga had been in this state for several minutes before her brain had seemed to start again. Ran had quite a bit more of you and the effect seems to be quicker this time as a result. Several long moments pass but gradually, Ran begins to wake up again.

“Wha, huh? What was I saying?” she says slowly as she finally focuses on you again. Her hand, frozen in mid-reach, finally moves forward to scoop you up. You don’t fight as she gently places you in her cupped hand and are rewarded with a pleased smile. “Well, looks like you’re a fast learner, aren’t you?”

“Sure am,” you smile smugly back up at her, “now put me down on your bed.” Her eyebrows jut upward at your demand.

“No, I don’t think I’ll do that,” she says simply but then proceeds to do just that; stepping over to the bed and lowering her hand down till she dumps you gently in the middle of her mattress. This is all worth it for the look of surprise and confusion on her face. You watch as she pushes these emotions aside. Determined, she reaches down towards you again.

“Don’t touch me,” you order quickly as her fingers comedown on either side of your body. You smile broadly up at you ‘captor’ as her own body refuses to bring her fingers together to snatch you up. You can see the tendons twitching in her arm as she tries to grab you; but the fingers remains a few inches away as if you were protected by a force field. “Good girl,” you coo mockingly.

“What’s going on,” she demands, the sweet tone from earlier is completely gone. Fury dominates her face now. “What did you do!?”

“Oh no you don’t,” you shoot back immediately at the girl towering above you, “you’re the one who decided she needed a quick snack. Time to reap the whirlwind, bitch.”

Being three inches tall, you’ve had to grow used to the idea that if you don’t like what somebody is doing to, for, or around you, well, too fucking bad. Because you’re in no position to stop them. Now, staring up at somebody who can and HAS crushed you beneath her foot; you almost feel a twinge of sympathy for Tulip and the power she must feel at having you so helpless before her. Not enough sympathy to release Ran, of course.

“Strip,” you command coolly.

“You fucking pervert,” Ran hisses, all pretense of a smile long gone, “you’re going to rape me?!”

“What?! God, no!” you groan in disgust. Ran, like your sister is 6 years younger than you. At 14 years of age you have long since started noticing how attractive females are; how they can have the most hypnotic curves in just the right places. Ran, unfortunately for you, just isn’t developed enough to be fun to admire. Nope, this is about humiliation, pure and simple; and you tell Ran as much. Ran, her face already clouded with anger; manages to look even more surely as you inform her that should she try to cause you harm, you’ll have her go for a little walk down the street in just her birthday suit.

You watch the Asian girl angrily shuck off her jeans and shirt, panties following soon after. Defiantly she stands in front of the bed with her hands clenched at her side; refusing to show any embarrassment with her predicament. ‘Hmm… well, mostly not developed enough,’ you think as you find yourself admiring her form more than you anticipated. A part of you has to admire her refusal to yield; you’ve certainly attempted to pull of that same look. Of course that was usually before you spent an evening in Tulips stomach, on wedged into the toe of the shoe of one of your classmates from school or dehumanized in a plethora of other methods. Looking at the same determination on someone else’s face; you have to admit to yourself that it does just feed the urge to push them harder. Until they are broken. “Now, bow.”

You watch Ran’s jaw clench with the effort to keep from obeying even as she drops to one knee, bowing her head towards you. “Lower…” you urge with a smile. Ran, barely restraining a sob of pure frustration drops down to her hands and knees; bowing as low as if you were the great King of Siam.

“I swear I will crush you beneath my ass,” she spits at you with her face still pressed low to the floor.

“Ha,” you can’t stop the snort of laughter from escaping. “I’d like to see you try,” you add mockingly.

The motion comes so quickly that for a moment you aren’t sure what’s happening. One moment Ran is naked and bowing low before you; the next she’s on her feet and closing the gap between her and the bed in one angry stride. “Huh,” you sputter in surprise as she reaches the bed and spins around as if to moon you. With a wave of panic you watch the small, pall ass begin to descend rapidly toward you. ‘Stop!’ your brain screams for your mouth to say. “Shit!” your mouth actually sputters, clearly not listening to your brain as the ass closes in. Realizing that if you’re flattened you’ll be as good as dead; Ran will never give you the opportunity to command her again. Frantically you leap, not even paying any attention to where as the girls shadow completely envelops you.

WHUMP!

Intense pain surges though your legs, not for the first time today, as you fail to jump completely clear in time. Pinned on your stomach you look back to see that your legs have disappeared beneith a wall of pail, warm flesh. Two walls to be more precise as you realize you jumped right to the top of the crack of her ass. Normally this would be a relatively safe position for you; but that was before you received your new body chemistry. Now, you can feel every pore of her skin where it’s crushed your legs flat. You see movement far up above as her head swivels to look at you through one eye. Like a flash the wall of flesh lifts off and moves further back, totally eclipsing you again as Ran proceeds to finish the job.

“Stop!” you scream a split second before hundreds of pounds of ass flesh land on your fragile body. In an instant the rest of your body is pressed just as flat as your legs; forcing all thought from your mind as the pain that dominated your lower body spreads up to devour all of you. Somewhere, distantly, you notice the unusual sensation of your body actually conforming to Ran’s ass crack.

And then it’s gone. The pressure disappears almost as quickly as it comes and the pain begins to recede soon after. Slowly your body bends itself back into shape until you have enough control to look around. Your first thought is that you’re hovering above the ground. ‘I can fly too?’ A moment later you are disappointed to realize that you’re actually still wedged between Ran’s butt cheeks.

“Alright,” you sigh wearily, “let’s try this again.” Ran blows out an exasperated breath upon hearing your voice; clearly hoping that she’d managed to wedge you deep enough that you’d be unable to speak. You want to be angry, or upset; but, you just don’t have it in you at this point. It’s been too long of a day.

“Look,” you begin as you have her set you back onto her pillow. You do your best to sound reasonable, “I’m exhausted. I just want to get some sleep. I can order you to sleep in your closet or outside or something; but I won’t if you agree to a truce.” You watch her eyes narrow as she seems to ponder this.

“Terms,” she says simply.

“I want Tulip,” you reply with a weary smile. “I want Tulip under the same power I have you under. You help me and you’ll never see me again. Deal?” You can almost see Ran working though the idea in her head. Betray her friend for her own freedom?

“Deal,” she says finally.

“Good,” you reply with relief, “but first some ground rules: Ran, I order you not to harm me or allow harm to come to me.” The only change your latest demand brings is a tightening of Ran’s jaw; but it’s over so quick that you may have imagined the whole thing. Doesn’t matter either way though, “now get some pajama’s on and go to bed.” You’re so exhausted that everything is starting to ache even without it being crushed or bitten off. Satisfied as you watch Ran go to her closet you plop down onto your back and quickly start to fall asleep. A few minutes later the light clicks off and Ran’s head joins you on the pillow.

“I still don’t like you very much,” she whispers.

“Fair enough,” you whisper back sleepily before finally nodding off.

3.5 MINUTES LATER

“Wake up you lazy bitch!” comes a voice only too familiar as the lights suddenly click on again. Tulip! You jump frantically to your feet as she clambers into the room, lugging a large bag with her. Fortunately, Ran had sat up just as quickly as you had; her own body blocking yours from sight. Peeking quickly around Ran you can see Olga just behind Tulip; both are dressed in pajamas.

A sleepover! Tulip must not have given up on finding you. That’s what Ran had been laying out when you’d first climbed from the shoe, a sleeping bag! Shit. A similar thought must have run though Ran’s head as her face spins around to stare down at you.

“Hide me,” you squeak in panic. Obeying instantly, Ran’s fingers close carefully around you. You can see Ran’s face as she looks frantically around for a quick hiding place before she greets her guests; when no other spot jumps out at her she focuses her large brown eyes on you again. Before you can make another sound her hand lifts you quickly up and shoves you past her lips and into her mouth. Her lips clamp shut almost immediately as she turns back towards Tulip and Olga.
11121211211211221121221.title: Nothing Ever Goes According To Plan

111212112112112211212211.content:
It seems like you’ve spent your whole life around or inside mouths, which is ironic considering how sensitive your ears are to people’s voices. But you’re never been brought to a mouth to listen, only to be swallowed, which has taken on a much darker twist now that you’re body is malleable and regenerating. Right now, you’re inside another mouth, this one belonging to your mind slave Ran, who has graciously hidden you between her gleaming teeth to protect you from your sadistic sister. You’re used to sitting on peoples tongues by now. All mouths are pretty much the same except for the size and smell. Ran’s mouth is tight, so you have to sit down or your head would bump into the roof of her mouth and her breath is slightly spicy, but not terrible. Other then that, everything is the same as every other mouth you’ve ever been in. It’s balmy, wet and dark, with warm air blowing up from the esophagus onto you. After years and years of sitting on different peoples tongues, the wonderment of being inside someone’s jaws has diminished greatly. You yawn, wondering when Ran will get a chance to spit you out.

“Hello Ran, any luck finding our tiny toy?”

And suddenly you aren’t bored. Tulip’s voice sends shivers of dread down your spine. You’ll never understand how someone related to you, much less your little sister, could hate you so much to want to see you suffer a slow, agonizing death. You must have done some real evil shit in a previous life to get a sister that would creep out the Anti-Christ.

You’re jostled around inside Ran’s mouth as she shakes her head. Saliva sloshes around your waist, but you ignore it. If saliva is the worst thing you get drenched in tonight, you can consider yourself lucky. You listen for your sister, growing more nervous as Tulip remains silent. Tulip is always talking, either to make threats or promise retribution, her sudden silence leaves you fearing the worse. Just as you start wondering if you should try communicating to Ran somehow to get her to leave, you are jolted violently forward, past Ran’s teeth and right into Tulip’s open hand.

“Gottcha!” Tulip snarls, her fingers closing around you like a cage. Sitting up in terror, you look out and see Ran holding the back of her head in pain. Tulip had whacked her friend in the back of the head to get her to spit you out. She had no idea you were controlling her, only that you were hiding in her mouth. Tulip could have asked Ran to spit you out voluntarily, but the crazy bitch found smacking the Asian girl much in the head much more fun. Tulip smiled darkly down at you, then looks up and sneered at a still wincing Ran.

“You tried to steal my toy!” Tulip childishly bemoaned, bringing her fingers down around you and crushing you into a tiny ball. The pain comes quickly as your limbs snap, but you retain your sight and hearing and watch as your only hope vanishes. “Olga, take this Jap traitor into the other room! I’ll deal with her after I’ve finished the bug off for good.”

You watch Ran be led off by your other mind control puppet. You try to call out to tell both of them to attack Tulip and save you, but your chest is still crushed and you can only moan softly. You watch the tubby Olga push Ran away, but the girl turns to look at Tulip one last time. It seems like she’s going to say something and you fear she’s going to reveal your mind control ability, instead she screams at Tulip. “I’m Korean you stupid…”

The last part is cut off as Olga pushes her out of the room and looks back blankly. Seems the fat cow is still having trouble getting her wits about her. You try to call out for help, but Olga quickly leaves after your sister gives her a dirty look. Your body retains its shape a moment later, but it’s too late. Your mind slaves can’t hear you and you’re alone with the psychotic junior high school girl from hell. Mustering up all your courage, you stare defiantly at your sister’s evil face and try not to tremble at what you saw. Whenever you’ve been around Tulip she seemed happy and smiling, never showing any signs of anger. When she squished you, she smiled. When she smothered you, she giggled. When she swallowed you, she moaned. She was evil, but not angry evil. Right now, she was looking at you with an ugly sneer and rage burning in her eyes.

“I wasted my afternoon looking for you,” she simply states like wasting her time was a capital offense. You got nothing to say to that. If you tell her that you tried to escape because she was torturing you, it would only make it worse. Tulip didn’t care if you were in pain, she only cared that she was the one giving you pain. You couldn’t beg either. Begging had never gotten any results except more torture. Bargaining was impossible as well because what could you offer her? She already pretty much owned you. Tulip was like an act of God, you couldn’t reason with her. All you could do was get out of her way.

No choice left, you stared at Tulip, wondering what horrible thing she’d taunt you with or threaten. Instead of Tulip saying anything, she acted. You were her toy bug, not worth talking to, not worth explaining what she was going to do. She had grown bored of your terrified expression, bored with speaking to you like you were a person and tired of you existing. Tulip had decided that this was the end of you, but wasn’t planning to let you know until it happened. So, with no regret, no second thoughts, not even a fond memory, she tossed you into her mouth.

Being tossed into her mouth caught you by surprise, not because it was out of character for Tulip to put you there, but you expected her to put you somewhere more dangerous like under her foot or butt. You thought this was going to be your chance to find out if you can survive digestion. You thought that Tulip was going to swallow you down like all the times before. You thought wrong.

Tulip’s tongue surges up from under you, tossing you off her slippery tongue with easy. You land chest first on her teeth and before you realize what’s going down, Tulip snap her upper teeth down on your unprotected back. Her gleaming molars snap your spin and keep going, nearly cutting you in half. As the pain shoots through you, Tulip opens her mouth and her tongue again pushes you around until you are lying down on a row of pointy, hard teeth. Whimpering, you now know what’s doing to happen, but aren’t prepared with inflexible, jagged teeth crash down on you. More of you is mashed as Tulip gnaws on your soft body, moaning softly as her teeth grind every inch of you. Her teeth pull back, only to come down again, crushing you over and over again between her molars like a piece of gum. As the pain continues and you feel every inch of you get pulverized and mashed, you start wondering if Tulip really will treat you like gum. Maybe she’ll blow a brother bubble?

You’d laugh at the crazy thought if your whole head wasn’t a chewed up piece of flesh. Tulip keeps chewing on you, never pausing for a second to let you regain any shape. The pain is incredible, but worst of all you can no longer tell what she’s grinding down with her teeth. You’re an unidentifiable pink blob with teeth marks all over you. You really do look like a piece of gum. If Tulip spit you out right now, no one would know that you were once a person. Saliva drips off every inch of your shapeless form. You twitch as Tulip gnaws on you hard and some of you gets caught in her teeth. That’s the weirdest part, you can still see. You have no face, much less eyes yet you can see every detail of Tulips mouth as her teeth chomp down on you. Whatever cruel fate made you this way must have wanted to suffer more and be able to witness the carnage first hand.

Tulip keeps chewing on you, even though you’re nothing more then a blob, she doesn’t quit. It’s hard for you to know how much time she’s spent gnawing you, it feels like hours, but it might be only minutes. You know torture distorts your perception of time. The only chance you get from her blunt teeth is when Tulip starts tossing you around her mouth and pushes you into the top of her mouth. Her tongue pushes you flat against the roof of her jaw and you become stuck there. Like peanut butter you’re glued to the roof of her mouth with no where to go. This was no reprieve though; Tulip instantly started trying to lick you off. Her fat, soft tongue pounded against your flat form, moving up you very slowly. You wish you could cry. Tulip had reduced you to nothing more then a piece of food stuck to the top of her mouth. The humiliation was almost as bad as the pain.

She got you off the roof of her mouth. She had to peel you off with her fingernail. When you saw her finger come towards you, your first thought was that she was going to pull you out. Instead, she peeled you off the top of her mouth and let you fall with a splat on her tongue. Her tongue went to work then, rolling your malleable form into a tiny ball. Being compress into a perfect sphere wasn’t fun, but with every inch of you already as soft as clay, the pain was manageable. Lying in the middle of your sister’s tongue, a tiny ball of flesh, the only thing you wished was for this to end. You got your wish a second later when Tulip tilted her tongue back and you rolled strait towards her throat.

Your compressed ball form was no bigger then a pill and with all her experience she had from gulping down your old three-inch form, Tulip swallowed you without any problem. You dropped, muscles in the throat pulling you towards an uncertain fate. Being swallowed was another thing you were used to. It had happened a hundred times before, only this time you weren’t sure it was a return trip. You spend your last moments actually enjoying the trip down Tulip’s throat. Being massaged down someone’s neck has always been the only part of being swallowed you ever enjoyed. It was safe and relaxed, giving you a chance to close your eyes and listen to the sweet sound of a heart beating. You can’t close your eyes now because you have none, but that doesn’t change the fact that you are enjoying the final journey. If Tulip had ever known that you enjoyed this part even slightly, you’re sure she’d punch her own throat just to make it miserable for you.

The journey ends with you fall from the end of the esophagus towards the bottom of the stomach. You see the thick digestive enzymes bubbling beneath you as you plunged into the thick juices. You cause a tiny splash, falling towards the bottom of the stomach. There you lie, on the bottom of your little sister’s stomach, a pill sized ball of unmoving flesh. Then you start being digested.

If you had a mouth, you’d be saying, ‘Tulip you are such a….’





“Urp.”

A tiny little burp escaped Tulip. She covered her mouth as best she could, but her hand couldn’t hide her smile. Grinning unabashedly, Tulip skipped towards the bathroom to brush her teeth. She didn’t even want your taste remaining in her mouth. She gave no heed to Ran or Olga as she skipped past them, she’d deal with the Asian after she brushed her teeth. To imagine, that bitch thought she could keep her brother as a pet? Tulip had always known that Ran wanted to own her brother. She was always going on about wanting a pet, but couldn’t keep one because her father was allergic to animal hair. She had thought you would be the perfect pet. What an idiot.

Bugs should be stomped out, not domesticated.

Tulip turned on the bathroom light and smiled at her reflection in the mirror. She could honestly say she was in a great mood after finally getting rid of the waste of space. Humming softly, she grabbed her toothbrush and liberally applied as much toothpaste as possible. She didn’t want her breath stinking of brother. She was about to brush when she suddenly remembered she had to floss. Grabbing a thread of floss, Tulip quickly ran it between her teeth, getting the bits of food hidden between her pearly whites. Soft bits of mashed up food came out and Tulip spit them out quickly into the sink. Throwing away the floss, Tulip started brushing her teeth, giving no mind to what she’d spit out.

For the next few minutes, Tulip brushed her teeth hard enough to make her gums bleed. She wanted your taste done forever.
