Tomorrow, she looked forward to the bowel movement that would rid the last of you from her life forever. Maybe she’d even say some final words, like good riddance or it’s been fun. It seemed so perfect that you’re digested remains would rest with crap even bigger then you. Tulip nearly chocked on her toothbrush as she burst into cruel laugher.

“…Bitch!”

Her toothbrush dropped from Tulips hand as she looked down to the sink. Standing there, in all your three-inch glory was the one person Tulip was sure she’d never see again. It was only a small crumb sized piece of you lodged in Tulip’s teeth, but it was enough. You were alive again and there was only one thing on your mind, REVENGE!
111212112112112211212211.title: Really Eaten

choices: You realize your new power over Tulip.
1112121121121122112122111.content:
You stare daggers up at your sister Tulip as she stares back down at you with her mouth hanging open as if her brain simply refuses to process what she’s seeing. On one level you can understand this. This is, after all, the second time that you’ve cheated death where she’s been involved today. First she’d watched your body dissolve in a container of acid only to have you turn up alive and… apparently chewy. And now she’d just finished actually eating you. She’d felt you travel down her throat for what should have been the final time. Hell, YOU’D felt you travel down her throat. Despite all of this, here you stand in the bottom of the sink with your feet apart and your chest thrust out defiantly at your perpetual tormentor. The tormentor who’s left eye is starting to twitch slightly as she stares down at you. Again, on one level you can understand all of this; on another, much more primal level, you don’t give a flying fuck if she’s confused or not.

She’d chewed you up and swallowed you. By all rights that should have been the end of you. It was Tulip’s best shot and you don’t intend to give her a second chan—

WHUMP!!

A massive fist slams down where you’re standing as Tulip’s mind finally restarts. In an instant you are reduced to a smear in the bottom of the sink with a fist print where your face used to be.

“How the hell did you get out?” she snarls down at your slowly reforming body. Her eyes dart down to her stomach as she pulls her shirt up; searching for some hidden hole or escape hatch to her tummy. When the answer fails to present itself she turns her crazed eyes back toward you. “Answer me you pathetic bug!”

You take a deep breath as your body finally finishes reforming itself. Alright, round 1 and 2 go to Tulip but this time she’s going down. “I command you tooooo…” Before you can finish you sentence her fist closes around your body like a vise, and yanks you into the air in front of her face.

“Shut UP!” she practically screams. She’s holding you so tight that you can’t even scream, let alone squeak out a command. You can almost feel your body starting to conform to the contours of the inside of her fist. “I am so sick of your little lucky streak,” she hisses through gritted teeth. She’s practically spraying you with spit as she continues, “I eat you, you survive; I sit on you, you’re just fine; I step on you, no problem for you there. Well no more.”

The world behind her spins as Tulip turns in the bathroom. If you could just get some air into your lungs you could end this whole unfortunate episode!

“You’ve been a pest for as long as I’ve owned you,” she continues, “but pests exist to be gotten rid of.” Finally her fist loosens and for a second you think she’s decided to drop you. The girls talk more, and the intestine keeps pushing and squeezing you along. Hours and hours go by; you doze off from time to time and are always awakened by the feeling of falling or the bounce of jumping and laughing. Eventually you hear them exchange goodbyes and Tulip goes home. You know she’s reached the house when the door slams. A minute goes by and you hear your mother’s voice. “ Oh, hey Tulip! Wait… Where’s your brother?”. “Steve wanted to go sleep over at a friend’s so I dropped him off.” You hear this and are instantly angry. You start to shout as loud as you can so your mom can find out what happened to you.

Tulip stands in the kitchen; her mom sitting at the table, drunk with a beer. She starts to hear your tiny noises coming from her belly. She looks at her mom who starts to perk up a bit from the noise, trying to figure out what it is and where it’s coming from. Tulip suddenly starts humming to herself loudly, and heads out of the kitchen and into her room. She lets out a sigh of relief and then starts swinging her hips around. “nah nah nah nah nah, nah” she taunts. “Trying to get me in trouble eh? Too bad so sad.” She laughs. As she is laughing she happens to glance at a clock, which reads almost eleven. “Man, it’s late! Looks like you’ll be sleeping with me tonight, bug!” She slips out of her clothing and into her pajamas. After a leap on the bed, she turns off her lamplight and falls fast asleep cuddling her pillow with her face, and her belly with her hand.
On the inside, you curse your failed attempts to be noticed. Tulip has fallen fast asleep, but you still have such a long way to go. You figure it wouldn’t be such a bad idea to catch some shuteye here, and doze off.

You awaken to the feeling of your head pushing against a wall. Looking around you see that you have finally reached the Tulip’s sphincter. You have no idea what time it is but Tulip still seems fast asleep. You decide to make your way out and take a well god-damned deserved shower, and head off to sleep.
Do you make it out quietly?
1112121122211.title: Riding Tulip's Intestines

11121211222111.content:
Pushing yourself through, a cool blast of fresh air hits you. You get out up to your torso when Tulip begins to stir. You freeze, hoping that you haven't woken her up. She rolls over from her side to being on her stomach.

You sigh in relief and push yourself out the rest of the way. You crawl off of Tulip and try to sneakily slide down. On your way down you lose your grip and fall fast to the bed, bouncing on the surface.

Your eyes bug open as you lay still, hoping Tulip doesn't wake up.

Moving your eyes back and forth, you scan Tulip's body for motion. There isn't any, lucky again. After a second sigh of relief, you get up and head off the bed. Once you reach the floor, you finally start to feel safe.

It must be pretty late, the only light in the room is shining in from the moon out the window. After getting to the hallway, you notice that the lights are on in the living room.

Do you keep heading to the bathroom or do you investigate?
11121211222111.title: You slip out silently.

choices: You wait a little longer to make sure it's safe
1112121122212.content:
Using your hands, you wedge yourself against the walls of Tulip's intestine. You push with all your might against the current, and manage to shimmy your way back up into the stomach. Tulip pats her stomach and yawns, "I think it's time for a nap." She must not know you are still in her stomach, since she is completely ignoring you at this point. She walks into her bedroom and snuggles up against her pillow.

If you can avoid waking her up, you could crawl through her esophagus and get out of a whole day of punishment. Now is your chance.

Do you try to escape or do you wait it out.
1112121122212.title: You manage to break free of the current!

choices: Tulip can't here you, she's asleep!
111212112222.content:
With all of your strength, you swim away from the unfathomable vortex. Just before you're sucked in, the vortex stops, as the last of the digested food is sucked down into Tulip's intestines.

Dripping with the food, you stand up and examine your surroundings. You're still inside of your sisters stomach, although the gurgling has stopped and the food has vanished. Now that the horrible experience is over, and another even worse one has been successfully avoided, you can focus on the situation at hand. "HEY! TULIP!" you scream and pound on the stomach walls.
111212112222.title: At Least You Avoided That...

choices: You make it into her mouth.
1112121122221.content:
Again and again your fists splash against the soft walls of your sister's stomach, but nothing happens. You stand there confused, figuring Tulip to at least dignify you with a response. You wonder why for a moment before noticing how unusually calm everything is. The walls expand and collapse in a smooth motion in sync with the bass-y sound of Tulip's breathing. It's pretty clear that she's sleeping, and from past experience you know how much of a heavy sleeper she can be.

You recall the last time she fell asleep with you, you were stuck in her sock. Your head was wedged between her toes, with your chest pinned against the sole of her foot. It felt like every time you were almost asleep, she’d wake you by reorienting you against her foot. You finally passed out after she rolled you into her toes and rubbed your head with her big toe.

A thought comes to you as you lay in the remaining pool of chime on the stomach floor. You could probably escape before your sister wakes up. You look around, listening carefully. She still seems deep asleep. There are only two ways out of here, you think to yourself. You could try to crawl back up Tulip’s throat, or you could take the… back… door. “Ugh”, you think as you imagine it. Going through the intestines has always been a pretty crappy experience. It's nothing but blind turns in a dark, wet, tube; possibly taking hours to get through. You also know that Tulip is probably planning to keep you in there until she passes you, and you wouldn’t want to give her the satisfaction.

‘That settles that’, you think. You might stand a chance as long as long as she doesn’t wake up before you escape.

You make your way to the entrance of her throat and try to wedge yourself in. For once luck seems to be on your side, the slick liquid coating your body allows you to slide in. Tulip’s throat is extremely tight, but just relaxed enough to allow you to wedge yourself along.

You continue to crawl until…
1112121122221.title: Tulip can't hear you, she's asleep!

choices: Time to go see her friends
She still has a couple more hours to kill
11121211222212.content:
After a couple minutes of crawling you think you're near her throat, but suddenly you hear an extremely loud noise that almost resembled an explosion. It comes from all around you, and before you know it you are shaken by another, louder sound, this time Tulip's body seems to jerk, and you feel her esophagus start pulling you back down.

Tulip coughs a couple times in her sleep and instinctively swallows. She doesn't wake up from the coughing, but it lightens her sleep. She rolls over and feels an odd tingle in her belly, and her eyes begin to open.

You land back in her stomach, and before you even have time to move she shifts and you're sent tumbling across the ground. You stood up in the small amount of goop that was pooling around you and are about to pound the wall, but she moves again causing you to slide down to the stomach floor. A rubbing sound comes from somewhere in front of you, followed by a voice.

Now awake, Tulip sits up and scratches her stomach. "Still in there? My lunch wasn't very big so I figure it would have passed through by now."

"Yeah, well, it did," you shout back in reply.

"Part of it, at least. You must really like being inside me if you made the effort not to get pulled deeper into my gut. Maybe I'll just leave you in there."

You reply back with snark of your own. "Sure, I mean, as long as I'm in your stomach you can't torment me like you usually do." Of course, you want out of the stomach, and you hope this will trick her into getting you out now. You'll still be in her clutches, but at least you'll be out of her body.

Tulip thinks to herself "yeah, we'll see about that." She takes a breath and prepares to regurgitate you, but pauses.

The stomach squeezes itself together around you, the fleshy walls rippling around your body. You recognize this movement as regurgitation. But it only lasts a moment before the stomach returns to it's normal, undulating state.

"I guess you're right," she says and sighs. You can't see it but she's smiling slyly and rolling her eyes. She hops out of bed and continues, "you win this time."

"What?!" you yell after recovering from being tossed about by her sudden movement.

"Yep, I just can't get to you as long as you're inside me. So you're safe until you come out."

"And when is that supposed to be??"

"How can I say? You're the one who chose to stay in my belly. Maybe you will stay in me forever?"

Despite her surrender, as long as she's awake she's in full control. You can't climb her stomach wall enough to reach the esophagus, and even if she lays down she could easily just swallow you back down if she feels you. And her pylorus will just push you back out if you try to force your way into her intestine, you have to wait for her to eat and digest a meal to get pulled through.

Tulip knows this as well. So she intends to make sure she doesn't eat anything for as long as possible to keep you trapped in there. "Now, what time is it?" she asks herself and looks at the clock.
11121211222212.title: Trapped in Tulip

111212112222121.content:
Tulip checks the clock. Two o'clock already, about time she heads over to her Ran's house. She grabs her coat from the rack and leaves through the back door. She hops over the fence, taking the shortcut through the woods.

She gets aggravated as she thinks about the comment you made about her not having any friends. She wasn't about to let that little bug get the upper hand; she was a god compared to that toy of a brother. The truth of the matter was, though.... he was right. For whatever reason, she could never hold on to any of her friendships. Ran was currently the only person who would hang out with her right now.

Your body flops around Tulip's body as she hops the fence. You She hasn't said anything, but she's probably heading over to her friend's house now. Wherever she is going, she's taking the hard route. Her steps are too unpredictable to get your footing, you will just have to ride this out until she settles down again.

About twenty minutes later, Tulip walks up to Ran's window and knocks on the glass. She could see Ran playing around on the internet, then jumping out of her chair as she heard the knocks. Tulip laughs as she sees Ran freaking out. With a grimace, Ran walks over to the window and opens it. "Jeez Tulip, you scared the crap out of me!" "Hahaha, you should have seen the way you jumped out of that chair." She keeps laughing as Ran slams the window shut out of frustration, and walks out of sight.

Tulip walks around to the front door and waits for her friend to open the door.

Does she?
111212112222121.title: Time to go see her friends

choices: Tulip decides to let you out of her stomach.
Tulip eats something else, to torment you.
1112121122222.content: You scream and pound on the squishy walls of Tulip's inner stomach. "TULIP!" you scream. "Let me out! I know you can hear me!" You are answered by Tulip's annoying little laugh that you've learned to hate so much. "I can't believe you're still in there!" she says. "You've had your fun, now let me out! you reply. Suddenly...
1112121122222.title: Is it over?

11121211222221.content:
The stomach walls shrink around you and the floor pushes you up into Tulip's throat. Your body quickly shoots through the tight confines of her esophagus and into bright light. Next thing you know you plunge into water. Tulip threw you up into the sink. Before you get a chance to come up for air, you are grabbed by Tulip's hands and held in front of her face. "You look clean enough. I got so caught up in playing with you that I forgot all about going over to my friend's house. We need to go now." She heads to her bedroom and throws you on the bed as she grabs a coat. "It's going to be chilly today" she says. You don't get but a few seconds rest before she grabs you again, stuffs you into her pocket, and heads out the door.

When she said chilly, she wasn't exaggerating. She didn't so much as dry you off before heading out the door, so you shiver as cold breezes flow through the pocket. "Tulip! I'm f-f-freezing down here!" you shout. The pocket shifts around you and Tulip's hand enter the pocket. "At least she is nice enough to keep me from freezing to death", you think. Unfortunately, she wasn't just putting her hand in her pocket to block the wind. She pulls you out of her pocket and looks down at you. "Aw, you're cold, huh?" she says with a sympathetic voice. "Why don't we go ahead and warm you up then." She lifts you up above her face and sticks out her tongue. She then eases you, legs first, onto her tongue. You grab her upper lip and scream "No! Not again!". She quickly moves her tongue out from beneath you until the tip of the tongue rises up behind you and slides you into her mouth, breaking your grip on her lip and forcing you into the warm wet cave.

The tongue undulates under you as she moves you about her mouth. You slide around, thinking "Damn, I just got out of here!... well at least it's warmer than outside." You know there isn't much you can do to stop her and just lay on her mouth as her tongue works you around her mouth.

Tulip builds up saliva in her mouth and swishes you around from cheek to cheek. The tip of her tongue is constantly pushing you around, slithering up and down your body to get a grip on you. Your whole body was already wet, but now you feel soaked. She continues to work you around her mouth for what seems like forever. You do what you can to breath but her saliva seems to always find a way into your mouth. Just as you think you are going to drown, she buries you in her cheek and swallows the spit.

"Hey everybody!" She shouts. As her mouth opens, you can see the faces of three girls. You've seen them before, they come over from time to time to visit Tulip. They are perfect for each other, in the sense that they are all cute but can't seem to leave you alone. Playing with you like a doll or, even worse, playing catch with you on the trampoline outside. Tulip is greeted with hugs and they are all talking so fast that you can't seem to make out what a single one of them is saying from the confines of your sister's mouth. "Quit worrying, of course I brought him!" Tulip says.

Her tongue suddenly yanks you out of the cheek and onto her tongue, which she slides out of her mouth with a "oowuah..." sound. You and a thick coat of saliva slide off of her tongue and drip onto her hands. "Hahaha, you are so mean to him Tulip!" Says one of the girls. Tulip and the girls head into the living room. "So, are we going to do that thing we talked about?" Asks Tulip. "Of course! Let me go get it," Says the girl, whom you know as Mercedez.

Mercedez leaves the room in a hurry. Tulip let's down onto the glass coffee table. She and the two other girls just sit there on a nearby couch and watch you shiver, partly from the cold and partly from the fear of what's to come.

Mercedez returns, holding a...
11121211222221.title: Out of The Frying Pan, Into The Oven.

111212112222211.content:
Mercedez walks in holding some string and a glass of soda, and sets them on the table next to you. As you are staring at the string Tulip pushes you down and puts her index finger against your back, pinning you against the table. "Hey!", you shout and try to push free from the table without any success. "Hurry up and tie him", she says. The other girls giggle as Theresa, one of Tulip’s friends, ties a string around your waist and double knots it. She tugs at it to make sure it's tight. Satisfied, she smiles and says "He's all ready to go."

Tulip takes her finger off of your back, allowing you to get up. You tug at the string around your waist, it's too tight to slip out of and the knot is too tight to undo. You look up at the girls and ask, "Okay... So why the string? Are you going to walk me or something?" This makes them laugh, it wasn't really a joke but whatever... "Oh, it's much more fun than that." sneers Tulip. "Ready girls?" They all nod their heads up and down and look between each other.

Their arms all extend toward you and you put your hands up in a defensive posture. The hands move over and past you, and you turn around to see them reach into a bowl at the center of the table and each pull out a blueberry. Pulling their arms back, they bump the berries together as if to say 'cheers', and eat them.

The girl you know as Olga grabs the end of the string and lifts it... and you... up to her face to get a good look at you. As you lift upward you struggle to get in a better position but the string around your waist forces you to dangle there. "We are going to play a little game, here are the rules," she says. Her words bathe you in hot air from her mouth, which would be soothing if it didn’t make you so uncomfortable. She continues, "we each swallowed a blueberry, and your job is to get each one back out."

You take in the full meaning of what she is saying and your eyes widen. "You wouldn't!", you shout in protest. She clears her throat which silences you, and continues, "once you are down there and get the blueberry, tug on the string and we'll bring you back up. If you manage to get all the berries, you'll get a prize. If you don't... you'll stay in there until nature decides you're ready to leave.

"So... who's first?", she asks. The girls bicker among themselves for a moment while you hang there.

They finally decide on…
111212112222211.title: A Twisted Game of Fetch… In a Stomach…

choices: Yes, you find it just in time.
1112121122222111.content:
Olga's argument with the girls moves her hand around and you end up swinging back and forth. After a few minutes they finally decide that Olga should go first, seeing as how she is already holding you in place. "Awesome", agrees Olga and she turns her head to face you then opens wide. Her tongue slides down her chin quite far, farther than a normal girl's tongue would. She must be moving her hand back and forth because you are swinging farther and farther to each side (this might also be due to all of your struggling to escape). The swings eventually get rough enough that you bump into Olga's slimy tongue. A string of saliva stretches from it to your face as you pull away.

Her hand moves you closer to her face and you bounce off her tongue a few more times until you are stuck to it. She pulls the tip of her tongue upwards and drags you into her moist, wet cave. She doesn't waste much time as she tilts her head back, and you slide towards her gullet. Once your shoulders bump against the back of her throat, she squeezes her throat tightly from reaction and swallows you down. The force of her throat squeezing you is immense, you can hardly breathe. Luckily it her a few seconds to send you down to the dark pit of her stomach.

Your entry is gentle as the stomach acid softens your fall. You wipe off your face and get to work, if these girls aren't lying to you only have to catch four blueberries... in each of their stomachs... God damn them, you think as you kneel down and start spreading your hands across the bottom of Olga's stomach to find the blueberry she deposited earlier. After a few failed grasps you finally find purchase onto what must be the blueberry, not that you can tell in this darkness. "HEY! I GOT IT! LET ME OUT ALREADY!", you shout while tugging on the string.

While you were down there, Olga was rubbing her stomach at the feeling of having you inside her. The girls already had a game plan, to make sure to squeeze as much fun out of this game... and you... as possible. Once she feels the string tugging, knowing you have found the blueberry, she grabs the glass of soda off of the table and chugs it down. For a second, all you feel is the slight vibration of her chug until you are suddenly drowned out by soda. You are swept into a little torrent of liquid as the soda fills up her stomach.

You can't tell which way is up so you just swim as hard as you can into one direction. Your head bumps into a a fleshy wall, and you swim along it until you find air. Once you find the air pocket, you burp out the soda you accidentally drank from the flood and take deep breathes. You've dropped the blueberry in all the commotion, and start to feel the string tighten. Olga must be pulling you back up! You swim down into the soda to find the blueberry before you are dragged back up her throat.

Do you find it?
1112121122222111.title: Olga.

choices: They throw you in the air and compete to catch you
11121211222221112.content:
’I have to find that blueberry!’ you think to yourself. The girls never specified what they would do to you if you didn’t get the blueberries, but there were many options for punishment and you didn’t want to experience any of them.

You swim down to the stomach floor and drag your hands across the ripples, searching desperately for the berry. The string goes taught and you start being pulled upwards. There any floor left to search and you still haven’t found it. Fighting against the upward tug proves useless, though you still try. Just before you breach the surface of the soda, you bump your head against something. ’ The Blueberry!’, you think and snatch it.

You hold on to your prize like your life depended on it (it very well may). Your ass bumps against the valve to Olga’s throat but can’t make it in. Your body is too thick to go up her throat with you bent over like you are. The stomach shakes violently around you with the sound of a cough. “Ouch! What the hell are you doing down there?” she shouts. The sound reverberates all around you.

“I got stuck! Hold on, give me some more line!” you shout to her. The string goes slack again. ‘Crap’, you think. She can’t pull you out midsection first; you’d better do something before she gives up on the idea of letting you out. You maneuver your body so that your head slides into her throat. You start to shove the rest of yourself into the esophagus, then yank the string again.

On the outside, Olga is sitting on the couch with her head tilted all the way back to face the ceiling. She slowly raises the hand holding the string, this time she doesn’t cough. You slide slowly up the walls of her throat, the slick and bumpy surfaces rub against you all over on the way up and it feels pretty nice (imagine that!). You emerge from Olga’s mouth and rise upwards. You are slick with saliva and bile, and there are strands that stretch from one limb to another. You feel all webbed up and the breeze makes you feel cold.

The girls’ faces surround you, and they stare at you like you curiously as if you were some kind of experiment. You present the blueberry and say “tadaaa!” with a forced smile. “Good job, bug. The next one won’t be so easy though,” Tulip says. ’The first one wasn’t easy’ you think to yourself. “Okay, how to do decide who’s next?” She asks the group.

How do they decide?
11121211222221112.title: Round One: Victory!

choices: You pry open her throat and force your way in
Theresa and Mercedez start making out
111212112222211122.content:
They sit and ponder for a second, but then Theresa just grabs the string out of Olga’s hand.”Let me go next!” she says authoritatively. “Fair enough,” the other girls agree.
Theresa isn’t skinny, but she also isn’t fat. ‘Thick’ would be a more accurate description. She has dark brown hair with a round face and thick pink lips. You stare as she curls her bottom lip and slides her tongue across it while staring at you.

She grabs your waist with her right hand and pulls you toward her face. She pushes your head and shoulders between her lips, she lays your neck on top of her bottom teeth and closes her jaw to pin you with the top set of her teeth as well. She uses her tongue to bat you in the face and smother you with the front of her tongue. She is using a lot of force on your and it pushes your head back, but you are pinned inside from the teeth clamped around your neck.

You wave around your limbs in despair. You try to shout but it only serves to push the very tip of her tongue fully into your mouth, choking you. It slides back out and slaps the side of your face; meanwhile you try to cough back out the decent amount of saliva you swallowed just now. After a few minutes of this, she slides the rest of your body in and shuts her mouth.

Her tongue pins you to the roof of her mouth, and it drags across you back and forth. She is playing too rough for your own standards, but you can’t fight back the pressure pinning you down. Her tongue then pushes you against her cheek as far as you can go, but a lot of your body is still in between her molars.

“Oh my god, guys! He is delicious!” Theresa says with a mouthful. While talking her molars scrape against you, not hard enough to break the skin but it doesn’t feel good. Theresa felt it too and enjoyed the feeling. She opens her mouth while moving you around her cheek with her tongue. She centers you on her back teeth and begins to chew you with her molars. The teeth come down and rake against you and crush you.

You thank god for being made so tough, your body can withstand a lot of force. The teeth don’t break the skin or break anything, but it does feel terrible. Your screams go out to deaf ears, as she doesn’t change anything at all.

For minutes and minutes she swishes you from cheek to cheek, chewing on you and slopping you with saliva. From time to time, enough saliva accumulates that she pulls it to the back of her throat and swallows it. You are so completely done with being chewed on, and when you see this you realize how you can escape it.

When Theresa goes to swap you to her other cheek, you grab hold of both of her back teeth and push yourself towards the back. Her tongue instantly pushes back against her throat, your only guess for why she’d do that is that she wants to keep savoring you. ‘No! Not today!’ you think and you wedge your legs against her front teeth to get good leverage.

Your upper body pushes against her tongue, and you use your arms to pry open the passage to her throat and get down there.

What happens next?
111212112222211122.title: Theresa's Turn

1112121122222111221.content:
You push as hard as you can, trying to pry the tongue away from the roof of her mouth. The surface is too slimy to get a grip anywhere, but you don’t give up. A minute goes by and you haven’t gotten anywhere.

All of the rubbing of your body and hands against her tongue gets her saliva flowing. It pools up in the bottom of her mouth, and Theresa starts to use the tip of her tongue to slather your legs with it. You lose your foothold against her teeth and slip down into the pool of spit. “Blech” you gasp as your mouth fills up with her saliva. Your body is now covered from head to toe, but you do the only thing you can and get back up and try again.

While trying to pry the tongue down again, your hand accidentally slips in between the tongue and roof. ‘Aha!’ you think to yourself, and slide your other hand in also. If you can’t push the tongue down, at least you can squeeze yourself in between the two. You slowly move your hands further in until your arms make it all the way in. You move your legs so that your feet sit against the teeth further back in her mouth, so you can push yourself the rest of the way. Taking a deep breath, you push your head in. The pressure is immense as your face is pressed into the face of her tongue.

Finally, you slide your chest in. With another kick, you slide far enough back that your face makes it past her tongue and you stare down her gullet. Your legs are still stuck, but suddenly her tongue lifts up your legs and pushes them back. The walls of her throat tighten around you and you hear a loud *GULP* sound. ’Yes!’, you think as you make your way down the throat. You smile, satisfied that you didn’t let Theresa have her way with you.

It only takes a few seconds to make it to the stomach. The hot air and pulsating walls are starting to seem pretty normal to you. You stand up and find the blueberry right away. With a tug, you are lifted back up and out of Theresa’s gut. With you back in her mouth, Theresa opens her mouth. As the lips part, you are pushed outward and see the other girls looking at you. There you are: smiling, lying on your back against her tongue, holding the berry in one hand and waving in the other.

Theresa tilts her head down and you slide off of her tongue and splat against the surface of the coffee table. You drop the berry and wipe the saliva off of your face. You realize that you are starting to enjoy this game, but you keep that to yourself. You are sure that the game would be over as soon as they found that out.

“Looks like you’re up, Mercedez” says Tulip. “Okay, let me go get something really quickly.” She dashes out of the room. Meanwhile you sit on the coffee table: naked, wet, and cold. Well you aren’t sure if it’s actually cold, but it’s certainly much colder than the insides of these girls. Tulip picks you up with her slender fingers, and throws you to Olga. Olga throws you to Theresa, and so on. They play catch with you for a few minutes, until Mercedez comes back into the room. She walks back into the room holding something.

What is she holding?
1112121122222111221.title: Winning Round Two

choices: You can't seem to find it anywhere
11121211222221112211.content:
Mercedez returns carrying a large bowl of green gelatin. And by the looks of it she couldn't wait to dig in, as you see her gulp down a mouthful.

"Okay, my turn, stick him in here Olga."

She hands out the bowl and you're dropped on top of the jiggling food. Mercedez then uses her spoon to push you down into it, burying you in the green goop.

"Hey, is there any more?" Theresa seems to want some too.

"Sure, lots in the fridge!" Theresa and your sister both head into the kitchen, and you watch as Mercedez picks up a spoonful of gelatin and deposits it into her mouth. After a bit of chewing and swishing she swallows it and goes for another spoonful.

You have to get inside her and find that blueberry, so you try to swim through the sticky mess. You miss the next spoonful, it's too hard to move quickly inside the gelatin. A couple scoops later her spoon is close enough you are able to grip the side of it and get lifted up along with it.

"Ooh, a prize inside!" she says noticing you hanging from her spoon. She lifts you to her mouth and slips you and the spoon inside. You brush against her lips and teeth as you enter and let go once you land on her tongue. Her lips close darkening the space around you and the spoon is removed, leaving only the gelatinous mess on her tongue. Immediately she starts swishing it around in her mouth and lightly chewing it. You get caught on the outside of her teeth and are unable to get back on the other side as she collects the food and swallows it.

You start to get concerned this is taking too long, you still have to go inside your sister and no doubt she's going to have a plan to be the most challenging of the four. If you don't get inside her soon the berry will likely digest making finishing the game impossible, and who knows what will happen to you then.

Another spoonful enters and you cross over the teeth while you have the opportunity. Mercedez tongue batters you as she works on the gelatin, but you manage to stay in the middle of her mouth. 11121211222221112211112.content: You take a walk around the living room and kitchen to get the lay of the land. You also use that time to think about your actual options. You know that if you hide in an easy spot, you can ruin their fun and get this all over with. Then again, it could be fun to frustrate the girls by hiding in a tough spot. After making the rounds, you decide to...
11121211222221112211112.title: Stick to the living room and kitchen

choices: Which one of you is going to eat him?
Any of you have any other ideas?
111212112222211122111121.content:
It's about time you starting using your head. Those girls are using you for their own entertainment, you think about the best way to spoil their fun... Aha! If you just revealed yourself right away, their little game would be over with no enjoyment whatsoever.

You think about walking right into their room, but can't. While you are determined to ruin their game, you can't control your anxiety about facing them. It'd be better if you just let them finish their movie while you wait and prepare yourself. You'll need to find somewhere easy to spot. After looking around the living room, you decide to station yourself right on the arm of the couch. Scaling the mountainous leather throne, you see that you have a straight line of sight to the room, perfect. You sit down, facing the door, and wait.

You try to prepare yourself for the encounter, but you can't figure out how they are going to react. In the worst case, they'll just have one of them swallow you and be done with it.

About an hour has passed by when the door finally opens. You stand up as you see the girls crowding their heads for a peak down the hallway. You wave the tissue around to let them know where you are. The girls' faces seem visibly disappointed as they walk down the hallway and right up to you. Tulip is the first to say something. "Why aren't you hiding, is something wrong?", she asks. You shake your head, "Nope, I'm just done playing your games. If you're going to eat me, then get it over with."

Your bluff seems to work, as Tulip looks down at you and says "I guess hide and seek is off." She then looks over at the other girls and asks
111212112222211122111121.title: Spoil their fun, hide somewhere easy.

1112121122222111221112.content:
You feel a rough texture against your arm as you lean. Picking up the object, you start to get excited. You can't say for sure, but you feel pretty confident that this might actually be the blueberry. Its slightly smaller than the rest, and it feels right but is it?... You take a small bite just to be sure and... Yes! It actually is. It must have managed to stay above the grapes this whole time. You can hardly believe that you found it in this condition. You hold it tightly against your chest and wait for Tulip to bring you back up.

In a few minutes time, your body emerges from Tulip's mouth. As you slide out, you don't even try to hide the smug-ass grin on your face. When Tulip pulls you away to get a look, you present your prize. Your smugness only amplifies once you see her triumphant expression turn to shock. The other girls' faces crowd around to see. "Holy shit..." Theresa says. Olga shakes Tulip's shoulder, "hey, he actually found it!" As the girls make their comments, you decide to bask in the glory. "Oh, this?" you say modestly. You then hold the blueberry with one hand and use the free arm to flex at the girls. "Chyea, totally found it as soon as I dropped in there. No big deal."

As you finish your sentence, some of the saliva coating your body slides down the top of your head into your eyes. "Ack!" you exclaim as you frantically wipe it off. Theresa and Mercedez burst into laughter. "Okay then, macho man", Theresa says between laughs. You laugh with them, slightly embarrassed. Looking over at Olga, you see that she wasn't too moved but is at least smiling; Tulip seems to be the only stick in the mud. You could almost swear you could see steam rising off of her irritated face.

After the girls recover from their fit, Tulip holds you between her fingers. "Well, looks like you've won. Congratulations." You see some restraint in her expression. 'What is she hiding?', you wonder. "Oh, yeah. What is the prize anyways?" Mercedez answers first, "you get to watch a movie with us, your pick." Olga interjects, "-BUT while we watch the movie, you have to be our servant. So whenever we ask you to do something, you do it. capeesh?" Your brain translates the message quite clearly. It's still going to suck, but it's better than being trapped in one of their bellies all night. You nod in agreement.

The girls take you back inside the house and into the bedroom you assume is Mercedez'. Mercedez and Tulip leave the room to prepare snacks while you are left with the remote, they decide to leave the string on you for an extra touch of humility. Olga and Theresa are also in the room with you. The two girls work quickly to move a second bed from the other side of the room and push it against the one you are sitting on. Olga then grabs you and the remote, and places you between the two of them.

They then lay back and critique your choices of movies as you see what's available. You go back and forth between a few you might like when an idea hits you. If you pick something the girls will be interested in, they'll be more likely to leave you alone. You keep an ear open as you flip through the selection. Olga goes on about the best romances, while Theresa seems to be more interested in comedies.

You don't know girls too well, but you always hear about them liking sappy love stories. In the end you choose a movie called Titanic. You've never seen it yourself, but you have heard about it before. Olga commends your excellent taste, which boosts your confidence about the decision a bit.

The three of you wait until Mercedez and Tulip return from the kitchen. The girls walk in with a smorgasbord of snacks on plates. Mercedez moves across the room and lays next to Theresa, while Tulip turns off the lights and then sits next to Olga. Once the snacks are arranged to be within arm's reach, the movie is started.
"Titanic, huh... Never seen it." Tulip says at the title. "You'll love it!" Olga says.
...
The movie starts and you figured that the girls would ask you for something right off the bat, but they don't. You accept the reprieve with open arms. It doesn't take you long to realize that the movie sucks, 30 minutes in and not a single explosion or fight scene. Is this the kind of crap people liked back in the 90's? You start looking around the room, seeing all of Mercedez' knick-knacks. Obviously someone else stays in the room too, she must have a sister. Turning your attention to the girls, you see that both Tulip and Olga are totally engrossed in the movie. Theresa and Mercedez look pretty bored, though.

You flinch as Theresa catches your eye. She smiles when you lock eyes, and asks "Steve, can you..."
1112121122222111221112.title: A Titanic Victory

choices: Succeeds. You are thrown back into Tulip's hands.
Fails. You are now stuck inside of Mercedez's stomach.
111212112222212.content:
Mercedez returns to the room with a large bowl of queso and sets it near you in the center of the coffee table. "This is going to be so awesome!!!!", shouts one of the girls. You look back at the girls and notice all the smiles. It's clear to you from the lack of chips what is about to happen. "Please, PLEASE, do not do what I think you are going to do!", you plead. Tulip, without responding whatsoever, grabs you by your chest and submerges you feet first into the queso. You wail your legs around in the queso while punching her fingers, which are forcing your body to swirl around the bowl. She then lifts you out, and you look down at your legs. It seems all the struggling you've done has only helped to collect a good amount of queso.

You hardly have time to turn around to see the open mouth closing around you. You can tell from the minty smell that you are back in Tulip's mouth. Her tongue gets to work as soon as her lips close on you. She pins your back to the roof of her mouth and moves her tongue back and forth over your chest. You are flipped and rolled until she can't taste any more queso, Her tongue then pushes you to the back of her mouth until your face is hanging over her open throat. She then tilts her head back and swallows hard. Her esophagus squeezes you down her throat, and you land in her stomach... again. You take a deep sigh, wipe the saliva and stomach acid off your face and sit up.

"Oh my god!", "are you serious!?", "Why did you do that!?", the girls protest. The stomach walls bounce you around as Tulip laughs, "oops, hahaha, sorry guys I got carried away. Don't worry I'll bring him back up. Here." And once again you are thrown upward out of her stomach, and land on to the coffee table with a splat.

"Be careful, will you. We all want a taste of him", says Mercedez. You are exhausted from the ride, but that doesn't stop Mercedez from snatching you up and dipping you into the queso face first. She pulls you out but your face is covered in queso so you can't see anything. Suddenly a warm object slides across your face, taking the queso with it. You open your eyes to see Mercedez smiling at you. She opens her mouth and sticks out her tongue out so that it forms a U-shape, obviously meant for you.

She slides you in the valley of her tongue, and closes her mouth around your waist. You are stuck inside of the valley of her tongue when she grabs your legs. She then slurps you all over her body with her tongue, rotating you with her fingers and pushing you in and out. She does this well after the queso is cleaned off, and she starts to push you further and further into her mouth. You think that she might be trying to swallow you, so you grab her back teeth and push as hard as you can. Unfortunately, she is much stronger than you keeps pushing you back and forth, each time closer towards the gaping throat. You are finally at the point in her mouth where Tulip would swallow and you prepare your body for the dive (there is a technique involved in this). Strangely, she doesn't swallow. She continues to pushes you into and out of her throat while still holding your feet with her fingers. after a few more minutes of this, she pulls you out of her mouth.

The next hour is just plain horrid, the girls continually dip you and suck the flavor off of you while playing with you inside their mouths. All the while, Tulip keeps swallowing you "accidentally" and throwing you back up. After the umpteenth time of Tulip swallowing you, you are laying in her stomach when you hear Mercedez ask: "do you think you can teach me to bring him back up after swallowing?" "I don't see why we can't try, what's the worst that can happen?", replies Tulip.

You are vomited back to the table and Mercedez grabs your body, "What is the easiest way to swallow him?". Tulip giggles and says "Well he is already pretty lathered up, feet first is always easiest for me." You look up at Mercedez as she contemplates the easiest way to swallow you whole. It's bad enough that Tulip eats you, now Mercedez is going to start doing it as well. She picks up your body and carries you up to her mouth, but all you can think about is how horrible it is that your sister is actually TRAINING people on how to swallow you whole. What's worse is you don't think Mercedez is going to be satisfied by just doing this once, and she is the kind of girl who likes to sneak up on people. You shudder as you think about how she might surprise you at school or home by coming up behind you and landing her mouth around your body and swallowing you before you even know what happened...

You snap to just as you slide fully inside her mouth, legs already down her throat. You panic and start kicking her throat and pushing against her teeth to move backwards. You finally get some good luck, and Mercedez gags due to all of the kicking. You are spit back onto the tabletop. "Ugh, Steve you are such a jerk! I'm sorry, Mercedez. Let me help, open your mouth" Tulip grabs you and pushes you into Mercedez's open mouth face first this time. you are lying on your stomach as you feel Tulip's finger on your ass, pushing you farther and farther back. You are lodged into Mercedez's throat when she starts to gag, but Tulip pushes her hand inside her mouth. She uses her fingers and works you down with her fingers. It takes Mercedez several swallows, but she finally get's you down.

The girls celebrate, which tosses you about like crazy inside of Mercedez's stomach. After a while Tulip attempts to coach her on how to throw you back up, which...
111212112222212.title: You Got The Dip, Now Where's The Chip?

choices: One of the girls wants to try
1112121122222121.content:
Tulip shows Mercedez a few tricks on how to get you out. Mercedez tries sticking her fingers down her throat, but apparently she has no gag reflex. Tulip shows her a few other methods. Just when they start to give up, Mercedez figures it out and you come spewing out of her mouth. Your wet body lands with a splat into Tulip's waiting hands.

"There you go! See, I knew you could do it." Tulip says excitedly. Mercedez looks at her while smacking her tongue against her lips "that was fun, I wish I had a brother like that." Tulip sticks her tongue out teasingly at Mercedez. "Well now that you know how to do it, it shouldn't be too hard to 'convince' Steve to spend more time with you." Tulip then turns to the other girls.

She grips you in her fist and raises you up to them. "So, does anyone else want to try? or should I just put him away for the time being?"
1112121122222121.title: Success! Back into Tulip's Hands

choices: The girls go home, and leave you with Mercedez.
1112121122222122.content:
"Wow!" Mercedez exclaims, as she sits with her two friends around her. "I can feel him wiggling around inside me. Heehee!" she giggles. "Tulip, do you get to do this all the time? You know, swallow him like that?"

"Yup!" Tulip eagerly replies. "That little bug's in my belly every week. Now, I'll show you how to bring him back up, so we can keep playing with him!" Tulip Proceeds to coach Mercedez on bringing your little body up her throat, but has trouble explaining. She tries different methods of showing Mercedez how to gag and bring you back up into her mouth, but none of them work. All the while, Mercedez's stomach turns and squeezes from the efforts, tossing you around in piles of half-digested foods and liquid, and making you quite sick.

Mercedez tries again and again, but can't seem to maneuver her stomach to push you up into her throat quite the way that Tulip. Finally, with a sigh and a small burp, she turns to Tulip and says "I can't do it! I'm not good at this like you". She opens her mouth and sticks her tongue out in a frown at her two friends, who sigh in return. "It's alright, Mercedez, we were out of Queso anyway" replies Tulip, who seems to have given up just as much. "You hear that bro? You're staying in there! So be good!"

Inside Mercedez's churning stomach, you hear your sisters words. Exasperated, you lie down with a wet flop on the stomach floor, right in a pile of Queso covered food. Well, great, you think to yourself, Now instead of being trapped inside Tulip, I'm swallowed by this other girl. Though from the inside, her stomach doesn't look much different from Tulip's. It has the same pulsating pink walls, the same nauseous motion, the same acidic secretions, and the same rancid smell.

The girl's quickly lose interest in you and turn to other things, leaving you to ferment inside of Mercedez with the rest of her food. You wonder how the three girls who were so obsessed with you ten minutes ago could forget about you so quickly. It seems as though they no longer want to play with you, and find it too difficult to keep trying to get you out. Instead, they've left you to rot inside of Mercedez's digestive track like a consumed meal. However, you two turn your attention to more pressing matters. Mercedez's stomach has long since given up trying to get rid of you, and is now instead digesting you with her lunch. Your body is thrown around inside the hot belly, and you feel as though you're becoming one with it's digesting soup. You're too tired to try and stay out of the sloshing flow of stomach bile and instead resign yourself to being tossed around inside like a piece of meat.

Hours into the process of digestion, the though occurs to you. How is Tulip planning on getting you home? Although you try not to think about it, you've had to accept time and time again that nature will run it's course and leave you in a nasty place. But when nature calls, will they be waiting? You hope that an inattentive Mercedez won't end up flushing you down her toilet.
1112121122222122.title: Stranded inside Mercedez

choices: play with you using her feet.
11121211222221221.content:
For hours, you lay inside of her stomach, sloshing and flopping around with all the motions and movements Mercedez makes through the night. You slide against the slimy pink lining of the stomach along with the queso and other fluids, which looks more and more like soup as time goes on. The girls have been having the time of their life. Movies, gossip, and lots of laughter; all of which you feel in pulsing and vibrations.

After a while the noise and movement die down. All you can feel around you is the rhythmic movement of breathing, which means Mercedez must have gone off to sleep. The warm, soft interior of her stomach seems to be lulling you to sleep as well. You try to fight it but there isn’t anything else to do, this is a problem you run in to when Tulip swallows you as well. Your eyes feel heavier and heavier, until eventually you give in.

You are awoken by the sudden feeling of falling. You open your eyes and flail around, your hands try to find purchase on anything solid but reach nothing. “Shit!” you shout as you fall. Everything you see is white except a pool of water heading right towards you. You splash into the water, and swim back up to the surface to gasp for breath. You wipe the water off of your face and look around. Looming just above you is the face of Mercedez.

The sight of her face brings reminds you of everything from yesterday. Your expression turns to a scowl, as you see her hand reach down and grab you up out of the water. “Good morning!” she says too gleefully. You decide not to dignify her with a response, which doesn’t seem to bother Mercedez. “So… what was it like in there?” she asks. “Imagine being trapped in a hot, slimy bag for hours with nothing to do”, you respond. “Oh, come on… I bet it was fun”, she winks and carries you off out of the bathroom.

You are taken to the living room where you see the rest of the girls, still sleeping, on a large blanket next to the table. Well, at least I have a way home, you think to yourself. Mercedez must have woken up early for a nature call.

She sits down on the blanket next to the other girls and decides to…
11121211222221221.title: The Next Morning

111212112222212211.content:
Mercedez lowers you to her right foot and places you between her toes. She must still be tired, because she leans back, squints her eyes, and stretches hard. Her toes squeeze together on you. "Ack!" you exclaim while fight off the pain. While in mid-stretch she hears your outburst and opens an eye to look at you. Settling back down from, she leans forward and moves her hand toward her foot and you.

"You like that, eh?" she asks rhetorically. "What part of that made you think I enjoyed it?" you reply angrily. She lets out a small chuckle and pulls you out from her toes. You feel relieved from the lack of pressure... until she sticks you on the bottom of her foot and pins you there with her palm. She rolls you up and down the sole of her foot. The smell of her feet is everywhere, and you can't tell what is up and what is down. After a minute or two, she let's her hand go and you drop to the floor.

You stagger back onto your feet. The world is a spinning mess of color and the ground seems too unstable for you to stay upright. Mercedez watches you stumble about in front of her feet. Just when things settle down and you get your footing, she puts her foot down on you. Her toes are right beside your head and she wiggles them up and down, giving your back a heavy massage.

She moves her foot back to pin your back with her big toe, and uses the other ones to position your body to be in line with her toes. Then she curls them up and rolls you inside of them. Her other foot moves over and she joins them together to squish you between her toes. She keeps moving her toes around all over you, almost suffocating you with them. You shout for her to stop and, to your surprise, they do. "Thank you... Jesus! What is wrong with you!?"

"We just know how to have fun, that's all" a voice states from behind you. You feel the hairs on the back of your neck stand up as you recognize Tulip's voice. Your struggling must have woken the girls up. "Mind if we join in?" she asks. Mercedez agrees and you watch from the inside of her curled toes as the other girls sit in a circle around one another. They extend their feet and create a little pit whose walls are composed of heels, soles, and toes.

Mercedez releases you from her grip, and you drop to the center of the ring. You stand up and look around, but all you can see are feet. You can't even make out whose any one of the pairs belong to. "Just be gentle..." you request sadly, knowing there is no way out of this. The ring shrinks around you and the feet all get to work.

You can't figure out what is going on, all you can see is a rush of skin and toes flinging everywhere. you are constantly being squished, and grabbed, and slammed. The four girls play footsie with one another while you are trapped between their feet. They rub you between their soles, poke and prod you with their toes, and roll you around. Back and forth, back and forth... you don't even know where the ground is anymore. All you can hear is the intense laughter of the girls. You do your best to cope with the pain, but it's intense. You grit your teeth to deal with the pain, but that only makes things worse. A toe comes by and rubs your face, giving you the taste of the girls foot in your mouth. Spitting it out is worse still because more toes come back around and the spit and foot smell is rubbed back onto your face.

It goes on like this for ten, maybe fifteen more minutes... it's hard to tell. Eventually they get tired of the whole idea and the feet let up. Tulip grabs you and sticks you in her pant pocket.

What happens next?
111212112222212211.title: Footsie In The Morning

choices: Try to get you out on her own.
11121211222221222.content:
As you lay amidst the soup of digested liquid inside of Mercedez, the girls have been spending their time watching TV and giggling about their lives. There isn’t ever much to do, since she wasn’t kind enough swallow any books for you to read while you are down there, so you just lay there thinking about life until you eventually fall asleep.

You are awoken to the sound of your sister’s voice. “Hey bug! You still in there?!”, the voice is quite distinct so Tulip must have her face right against Mercedez’s stomach. “Listen it’s getting late and I gotta go home. Since you won’t come out of there, I’ll just have to pick you up tomorrow. Have fun!” she says too happily. You respond with “Not my fault you suck at teaching!” Tulip smiles cruelly and says, “Oh yeah? Well at least my bed isn’t a stomach tonight.” She then starts to tickle Mercedez, who laughs incessantly.

You’re thrown around the stomach while Mercedez’s laughter emanates around you from being tickled. It’s an all too familiar feeling, Tulip used to have your mother tickle her after she secretly swallowed you. I guess she really liked the feeling of you jumbling about in there.

Tulip quits tickling Mercedez and leaves her with instructions on how to suck him down into her intestines and how long it should take for him to get to the exit after that.

Mercedez listens intently, they say their goodbyes and Tulip leaves. Leaving the two of you alone.

What does she do?
11121211222221222.title: The girls go home, and leave you with Mercedez.

111212112222212221.content:
You sit up in the digesting soup of the stomach floor, leaning back against the fleshy wall and listening to the TV which Mercedez is watching at the moment. You think to yourself, so much for a peaceful weekend. The thought makes you so angry that you slam your fist down into the liquid, sending it splashing around you. Mercedez feels this and starts to giggle with delight. You are so tired… tired of being a plaything, tired of being so easy to control, and most especially tired of sliding down everybody’s throat.

You wonder if this is some kind of record for how many times you’ve been swallowed in a day, but then you remember the time that Tulip first learned how to throw you back up. You shudder, and realize that how lucky you are that Mercedez didn’t learn to do the same. You do however need to find a way out, and there are really only two choices.

Mercedez gets up off the couch and walks into the kitchen. “Ooh, I can’t believe I’m still hungry. I figured you’d be enough to enough to hold me over for the night.” She rubs her tummy, “you clearly aren’t doing your job.” You make sure to use your most sarcastic tone and reply, “Sorry about it.”

Mercedez cooks up some noodles and heads back to the living room. You wonder what you will have the pleasure of eating tonight yourself when the hatch opens above you and noodles with meat and sauce rain down on you. You grab and eat what you can catch, but you soon have your fill. She must have been really hungry, because you start to get surrounded by noodles. It keeps pouring down around you until you are up to your neck in it.

What happens next?
111212112222212221.title: Oodles of Noodles

1112121122222122211.content:
You push as much of the noodles as you can out of your way and float on top of the soup. 'I'm just going to have to wait this out' you think to yourself and wait. All you can do is feel the liquid pulse with the rhythm of Mercedez's body, and hear the muffled sounds of her activities.

On the outside, Mercedez gets ready for bed, changing into pajamas, and brushes her teeth. She crawls into bed, and shuts her eyes.

The contents of her stomach swish around and you slip under the surface of the soup. You thrash around, trying to find which way is up, and the noodles get tangled up around you. This only makes you thrash more, you can survive underwater for a while but you have to breathe at some point and your instincts scream at you to find air.

Mercedez feels all the commotion in her tummy and starts to poke it. "Hey! Keep it down in there! Just calm down and enjoy it, will you?"

You can barely hear what she says, but are unable to respond (though you wish you could talk back) since you are still trapped. After another half minute or so, you calm down and analyze how to get out of the tangle. Slowly but surely you slip out of your noodly bonds and eventually surface back up.

"See, it's nice in there, isn't it?" She says genuinely. "Ugh, you have a twisted view of life" you respond, but it only makes her giggle.

Mercedez makes herself comfortable and closes her eyes. She rubs her tummy and drifts off to a happy sleep.

You have lain back on top of the noodles, and try to get some shut-eye yourself. Sleeping in a stomach is never easy, but you've done it enough times to be able to do it. You just have to either lean against the slimy walls of the stomach lining, or in this case: float on the contents, and listen to the heartbeat while ignoring the occasional gurgling of the stomach. After a few minutes, you yourself fall asleep.

Where do you wake up?
1112121122222122211.title: She goes to sleep

1112121122222122212.content:
“Ah, much better”, said Mercedez. She stood up and stretched, leaning backwards. This made you lose your footing and you fell into the pool of noodles and sauce. As you struggled to get above the surface you flail about, and start to get tangled among the noodles. Your struggle is churning the food inside Mercedez; she holds her stomach, feeling sickly. Meanwhile, you struggle to break free of the noodles but every thrash seems to get your more and more tangled. This can’t be the end, you think, there were so many things you still had to do in life.

Suddenly you feel pressure all around you and you realize that Mercedez is convulsing. Mercedez runs into the bathroom and gets in front of the sink. You shoot upward with some of the noodles into her esophagus. Just as she was about to throw up, Mercedez covers her mouth over her hand just as it floods with her dinner. You shoot out of her throat and into her mouth, but go no further. You can see her tongue and teeth through the bile and noodles, and you start to swim towards them

Relieved that she didn’t puke, Mercedez starts to swallow everything back down. You reach the front of her mouth and start to feel a current pulling you backwards. You grab onto the tongue but you can’t get a grip, and slip back down Mercedez throat. You fight her throat, but the muscles push you back down. This is your only ticket, you think. As you land in her gut, you immediately spin and thrash about in the noodles. Sure enough, the stomach walls start throbbing again and you shoot upwards.

As you make your way up you kick the back of her throat. Mercedez covers her mouth again, but you propel fast enough to slip between her lips and also between her fingers. You can’t see where you are going but you hit it with a splat. As you slide downward you realize that you hit the mirror in the bathroom, and you are falling towards the sink. Your adrenaline must be pumping heavily, because you manage to land on your feet and you take off out of the bathroom and into the hallway. You glance around and see that you can either head towards the living room, or what looks to be a bedroom.

Which room to you run to?
1112121122222122212.title: A Blessing in Disguise

11121211222221222122.content:
A quick look towards the living room sends flashbacks of this afternoon into your head, and you know that it isn't the place to be. You throw your legs, one after another, towards the bedroom. Mercedez shouts something behind you, but you can't hear what she is saying because you are so focused on getting the hell out of there. The thumps of her enormous feet seem to be right behind you but you keep sprinting. You fly through the door opening and make it to and under the bed.

You afford a quick look around, and see the underside of someone's box-spring frame. One side of the bed is against the wall, and scattered on the floor are some random knick knacks along with a layer of dust. Towards the wall you can see a tear in the underside of the box-spring fabric. You see this as the perfect place to hide from Merce... 'Wait a minute' you think to yourself. You realize that it's been quiet since you've reached the underside of the bed. Mercedez had been right behind you, hadn't she? You slowly turn your head to look to the opening of the bed.

What do you see?
11121211222221222122.title: A Successful Escape?

111212112222212221221.content: but whos hand is it?
111212112222212221221.title: A hand reaching for you.

111212112222212221222.content:
There doesn't seem to be any sign of Mercedez in the room. You stand still and wait just in case she might be anywhere near by. You hear something behind you and turn to look. Your heart skips a beat as you see a huge spider climb down from the bed frame. 'Jesus Christ!' you think. This thing is huge! Without another thought, you sprint out from under the bed.
