As it happens, most of Emily's day is scheduled to be in her squad car checking up on at-risk residents. Normally the movement would bother you, but between your conversations with Emily and your worry about Angela (obviously you haven't heard from her, and you have no intention of asking Emily), your physical discomfort is the last thing on your mind.

As you're chatting, the topic inevitably gets to school. You roll your eyes as much as you can. You'd had this conversation more times than you could count, though judging by your grades in math, that wasn't much.

"So what are your plans for college?"

"I haven't decided yet. I've visited a few campuses, but none of them can accommodate me."

"Understandable, I suppose."

"My grades are pretty much average, so Ivy Leagues are obviously out of the question."

"Obviously. Do you know what you want to study?"

You shrug as much as you can.

"No idea. I thought about medicine, but math is pretty important for that, and my math grades suck."

"I could help you, if you want. I was a math tutor in college and I still remember a few things. I'd be happy to help you out."

"Really? That would be awesome."

"Great." You feel the car come to a stop. "All right, I think it's time for you to come out. I'll see if Mr. Gonzales will let me use his restroom."

The door opens and closes, and you feel Emily walking. You hear what you assume is a doorbell, then muffled speech. She continues walking, then starts shifting. It's time.

She grunts as your slide out of her. You blink in what to you is bright light, though it's really dull fluorescent.

"Welcome back," Emily says, smirking, "I trust you enjoyed your trip?"

You groan, stretching. "Hardly."

She laughs. "Here, let's hose you off."

She warms up the sink, then turns around as you peel off your clothes and rinse off, then clean your clothes as much as you can. It's not perfect, but it'll do.

"Could you dry me off?"

Emily grabs a towel and gently pats you dry, then sets you down on the counter.

"Better?"

"Much better."

"So," Emily clears her throat, "Where would you like to ride now that you're out?"
12213331311.title: A Natural Progression

choices: drinking too much and making themself sick.
swallowing all those goldfish last night.
1222.content:
Well, you probably weren't going to be able to wake someone else up from an alcohol fed sleep even if you tried, and as bad as the smell is, you've survived worse before. The sewer for instance, or that week you went riding inside that one girl's butt. She had captured you from your keeper that day, and tried to keep you as a pet, but then, when she started bleeding in the night, her mother had checker her bed and found a tiny human shaped space clean of blood.

Sighing she had asked her daughter if she knew where you were, to which the girl lied, and got a spanking, though you got the worst of the deal, getting shoved very far up her, though it did cause her to tell her mother where you were, and in a few hours you, along with several logs of waste, fell out of her into the toilet, and her mother was apologizing for her for hours to you as she cleaned you up, and finally took you home.

Your parents, being glad just to have you back, didn't press charges for the kidnaping, though the girl's parents were quietly asked by the school to send her to another district. Last you heard the girl had grown up every bit the felon she had been in school, and was serving time in the local juvie hall for selling drugs on the street, and for second degree attempted murder, a tainted batch of marijuana being how she was caught.

Laughing at yourself you wonder how you'd gone from inside someone's stomach into that old memory. After all, that had been almost half your lifetime ago, but then, things stuck with you, even when they happened more than once. Lots of people wanted you, both for pleasure and for profit. Some corporations had offered your parents a lot of money to study you, but the government had given them more in aid to keep you out of their hands.

It had been a point of state pride that you'd made it as long as you had, considering your condition, and they weren't about to let some two bit hack with an idea to clone tiny humans or to miniaturize the population screw that up by slicing into you with a scalpel. Of course, as a matter of personal pride you had been sneaking away from your keepers since the day your turned thirteen. It was just a phase, they all told you, that you would eventually see the necessity of what they were doing to protect you, but you never cared, and you always snuck out again, no matter what blocks they put in your way.

Which had led you into the most fun nights of your lives, partying with friends. Even when you did nearly get stepped on by every dancer, or served in a cup of punch to some idiot girl who thought you were some kind of decoration for the drink. Or that time at Angela's birthday party, the one where her dad grilled burgers, and you tried to get a bite from Angela's for yourself, only to get pushed into it on accident, and endure the party from inside her gut.

Your whole life was full of incidents like that, and you wouldn't have traded it for the world. After all, such things were the spice of life, or so they said. Those misadventures had shown you things about your friends that no other would ever see. From Angela's stomach, to that one boy's....well you had been young, and he wanted to know where pee came from. You had been young then too, and hadn't seen a problem with it, though your mothers both had, when they came in to find his tiny member half squirming, and you already inside him completely part way.

Now of course, you knew better, and incidents like this were few and far in between, though every time you remembered them, you realized how good a doctor you would make. With the right suit you could literally go through another person completely, from any orifice. Then you could heal their ulcers and other hurts with an ease modern science simply could not hope to match, no matter how many tiny robots they had.

Suddenly you were brought back to the present as the stomach tilted, and you realized that the breathing had become more regular over the past few minutes. Whoever you were inside of had chosen to wake up while you were lost in your memories, and you went tumbling down to the bottom of their stomach as everything resettled around you, splashing about in the bile, and then watching as the wall caved in a bit, a hand outside rubbing it. In a nondescript voice, which you couldn't even identify as male or female because of the distortion the roaring lungs created you heard the person complain about.....
1222.title: Musing on the Past and Present

choices: one of the people from the party.
12222.content:
Of course, that is not something you expected to hear, and you look around, wondering where these goldfish were, after all, you would have seen something of them if you were in the stomach with them, but nothing comes to your eye that looks even remotely solid. And then you remember. The party had included a fish tank, bought from the store who's parking lot you'd been in. That had been before the drinking, and just after the food. That meant that they had all been digested before you even got into this belly where you found yourself.

Looking about again, you realize too how much harder that made your job. Someone feeling a pounding in their stomach when there shouldn't be one was one thing, but feeling it when they had eaten something live the night before was a different story. Depending on what was eaten, and who had eaten it, there was a good chance they expected to feel something now, which meant your pounding would only confirm that the fish this person had eaten was alive to them.

Thinking farther, you realize how little choice you really have in this matter. With them up and about, it would only be a few minutes before the alcohol filtered out of their stomach, and once that happened it would wake up itself, to find a nice, moving treat inside. One that would stop moving in a few hours, if it had any say so in the matter. With that thought in mind, you start to rise, only to get swept off your feet as the stomach around you starts to rise to, swinging to one side for a moment as the person gets out of bed, and then starts to do a pendulum motion back and forth with their walk.

Sighing a bit you try to rise as soon as they're stopped, only to be tossed around as the person leans forward, and in the background of the noises inside their body you can hear the sound of running water, and several splashes, likely them getting a face full of ice cold liquids to make themselves wake up after the night before. Seeing a chance you start to strike the stomach wall under you, and suddenly a rush of air pulls at you, and a terrific belch escapes the lips of the person inside of which you find yourself.

The rush of air caused your ears to pop, and you held them against the varying pressures as you went sliding back down into a puddle of bile as everything started to settle down. Before you could regain your footing though whoever was outside started to pat their stomach, and you were tossed about a second time, before you felt them rubbing at your back, the smooth, soft flesh of the stomach wall actually feeling good against your naked skin.

"I didn't think they'd live this long," commented the voice, and this time the breathing is shallow enough that you can make it out, if it is still a little distorted, and you start to rub your head, forcing your still somewhat wool filled head to give up those memories of people's voices, as you knew this one, but you didn't know specifically who it belonged to at the moment, after a time you remembered, and snapped your finger, recognizing it as the voice of.....
12222.title: Starting the Morning

122221.content:
Given your friendship with Angela, you're a little insulted that she would swallow living creatures, but you'll have to take that up with her later. Right now you need to focus on getting out of her stomach. Panicking a little, you pound frantically on her stomach wall, eliciting a chuckle from Angela.

"Hey, little fishies. Want some nice, cool water?"

Realizing what's about to happen, you swear violently, only to be cut off by a stream of liquid from above. Some gets in your mouth, and you spit it out in disgust. Green Gatorade, Angela's favorite. The one flavor you can't stand.

"Really, Angela? You had to go with Gatorade?"

Now forced to tread Gatorade to keep breathing (breathing is good), you start to think of another plan. A few years ago you taught yourself Morse code in case of situations like this. You'd used it a time or two before, but never like this. You swim over to the stomach wall and begin pounding out LET ME OUT over and over.

Angela-
122221.title: Angela.

choices: Attack the stomach walls to get her attention...
Just try to survive digestion and get her attention after...
122222.content:
Christine!

Not really a friend of yours. While you'd always been struck by her dark hair and full lips; the few times you had ever actually managed to speak with her she had come across as quite a bitch. Not mean really, just not friendly.

You'd always kind of suspected that she was a partier but you hadn't expected to have to swim in the proof.

With renewed vigor you leap at the wall where her hand is rubbing; kicking and punching and yelling with all your might. For your efforts you do succeed in hearing a gasp from Christine.

"Oh! Wow! That feels so great!" she breaths as you knocked off your feet again as she leans over. You briefly hear water running again. Just as your attempting to stand up again you are sent back into the frothing contents of her stomach as she stands up again.

A moment later you hear an audible gulp just before you are deluged with gallons and gallons of ice cold water which succeeds not only in dousing you and knocking you back into her bile but also in raising the current level of her the already rising fluids; bringing them to your waist now.

"There," you hear her say, "some fresh water so you can keep making me feel that good; cause mommy had a long night and needs something to take her mind off her aching head."

With that she's walking again and your back to just trying to keep you head above the vile fluids all around you. Finally the entire entire stomach turns on it's side and as you come up sputtering you quickly realize that she's gone back to bed.

Damn it! You go back to hitting the walls of the stomach as you try to yell out to her. Sadly, your rewarding only with a soft but definitely happy moan from your unknowing captor as she seems to really enjoy your struggles..

At the same time Christine's stomach has begun to move on it's own as it prepares to try to break down everything inside. Shit.

Thinking quickly, you remember that digestion stops during times of sexual arousal. You almost have to laugh as you realize that getting Christine off will buy you some valuable time.
122222.title: one of the people from the party.

choices: She notices him swimming in the toilet.
She doesn't notice him and flushes.
1222222.content:
Given her reaction from earlier, you start bounding around her stomach as much as you can to slow down her digestion process. With all this commotion, Christine rubs her stomach and says “Ooh, you’re much happier now that I gave you some water, why don’t you have some more?” This makes you stop bouncing, and as soon as you brace yourself more water comes pouring into the stomach.

Most of the stomach is submerged in water now, you included. You swim up to the very top to a small pocket of air, but just after getting a breath the water swishes about. Christine poked her stomach, “there, isn’t that better? Enjoy it while you can little fishies.”

There is no way you are going to get her attention now; it’s hard enough to catch a breath. You know your only option now to get out of this pool of water is to wade your way through her intestines before you drown in the water. You take a deep breath and swim down to the bottom of the stomach, struggling to the find exit. Upon discovery, you quickly squirm your way through the opening and into her intestines.

The intestines are so tight that the only way to move forward is to shimmy your way through. You spend the next few hours making progress and taking breaks whenever you are out of energy. Meanwhile, you’ve felt Christine moving about and heard some of her phone conversations. “You remember last night? Yeah, I know! Guess what… The goldfish, they’re still alive down there! Pretty cool, right? What? Why would I let them out? Hahah, no way. Those things are <b>mine</b> “

At last, you find your way to her sphincter, pushing against it makes Christine jump. You jumble about from the vibrations as she scrambles to the bathroom. You hear her pants unbuckle and feel yourself pushed forward. The pool of water from the toilet comes into view and you land in the water with a “bloop”. Finally, you think as you stretch your limbs for the first time in hours. As you look up…
1222222.title: Just try to survive digestion and get her atten...

12222221.content:
You see Christine’s shocked face staring down; I guess she wasn’t expecting you. “What the fuck?!” she gasps. All you can really come up with is to wave back and give a hearty “hello~!” The next few minutes are spent by both of you recalling your own versions of the events of last night, what you remember from it that is.

The basic gist was: after drinking an impressive amount of alcohol, you decided to show Angela how manly you were by diving into a nearby goldfish bowl and fighting the monstrous fish. You recall this being an awesome idea. Angela must have wandered off for one reason or another, and you were alone fighting off the aquatic fiends. As you were pursuing your opponents, Christine comes along. She was totally wasted and trying to convince the guys at the party how cool she was.

After finding the goldfish bowl, she apparently had the same idea as you, except her version of fighting was to swallow them whole. After fishing her hands around inside the bowl, she must have scooped you out. She also mentioned how she played with the fish for some time in her mouth before swallowing, though you aren’t sure if she made that up to tease you or not.

“So… you planning on leaving me in here all day or what?” You ask, still floating in the toilet. “Hey little guy, you’re lucky I didn’t flush you down right away like I normally would,” she says as she pulls you out. You are washed off in the sink and picked up by her slender hands.

Where does she take you?
12222221.title: Recalling Last Night

122222211.content:
You are cupped in her hands, as she carries you through her house. You stare up at Christine’s face and say, “So… not that it wasn’t fun or anything, but I need to be getting home.” She pauses for a moment, thinking about her options. She starts walking again and stares back down at you while saying “the way I see it, you came out of me. That makes you my property. Just imagine all the fun I… we… can have together.” You see a sinister grin sneak across her face.

I don’t think so, you think to yourself and start looking around for a soft place to jump to. This isn’t the first time someone has tried to keep you for themselves. They think that just because you small you are their toy, not like you have your own plans or anything. Christine makes her way into what must be her bedroom, and as she passes alongside her bed you make your escape. You leap out of her hands and bounce onto the bed. “Hey!” Christine exclaims, and you dash along the bed towards the door.

Christine turns around and swoops her hand down to grab you. You hurtle over her fingers and her hand just misses you. You reach the edge of the bed, leap downward, and rush through the door. Just behind you Christine is scrambling toward you. You reach a hallway and run towards the front door you saw earlier. Christine see’s where you are headed and makes a leap toward you. She lands hard on the ground and her hand slams down on top of you, pinning you down and knocking the wind out of you.

She closes her fist down around you and sits up. “Listen you little fucker. You’re small, I’m tall. Whatever I say goes, and I say that you are staying so deal with it.” Her expression is frightful as she stares at you saying this while her fingers squeeze you tightly. You strain to answer back with “…okay..”, what else can you do in this situation. She gets up and carries you into a different room, which must be a little girl’s because of scattered dolls strewn about. She kneels down and reaches her free hand into a chest and pulls out a miniature boat. You wonder what she is planning to do as she heads back through the hallway and into the living room.

She heads over to an aquarium which must be about 40 gallons or so, opens the lid and drops the boat onto the water. She sits onto the couch and lays you down, pinning your legs with her fingers. While you’re pinned, she uses her other hand to start working your shirt off. You struggle to keep it on but she is too strong for you. Once it’s off she pushes her palm flat on your chest and face, and works off your pants. Once you are completely naked, she picks you up and drops you into the floating boat on the aquarium, and seals the lid back on top.

“Now, you stay in there. Swim around, drive the boat, I don’t care. I need to head out; I’ll be back in about half an hour with some supplies for us. See you soon, Mr. Fishy!” Before she leaves, she places a couple textbooks across the top of the lid to keep you in.
If only you could find a way out, you look around and the room but can’t see anything that might be useful later. A cat jumps onto the bed and stares at you. Great, you think, a cat.

What happens next?
122222211.title: You're just another fish to her.

1222222111.content:
The black cat sits on the bed; its tail flicking from side to side as it stares at you. “Nice kitty”, you say while trying not to make too much movement. A minute passes in your standstill. The cat sits there watching you with interest, but doesn’t make any attempt to come after you.

Relieved, you start to row through the water with your hands. The boat itself is, even for you, a few sizes too small. It rocks heavily with each paddle until one time you paddle too hard and capsize the boat, flinging you into the freezing water. You gasp as you surface, and see that the cat is now sitting just overhead.

It stares down at you through the mesh. Its tail, flicking back and forth, knocks against the textbooks. Each flick pushes the stack little bit closer to the edge. Flick. Flick. Flick. ‘Shit’, you think as you watch it all happen. Flick. Flick. Lowers its head close to the mesh. Flick. Flick. The cat stretches its claws out and digs them into the wire mesh, kneading it with its paws.

WHAM!

The textbooks flip off the edge and slam down onto the table below. The sound freaks out the cat, and it leaps off the aquarium... except it’s not as much a leap as it is a tumble. Its claws must have been stuck in the mesh of the aquarium cover because as it leapt, it took the whole aquarium with it.

“Woah woahWOAHWOAH!” You scream as the aquarium falls off its stand. It only takes a moment to crash down onto the table, landing on its side, and smashing nearly all the glass on impact. Water spills across the tabletop, you ride the wave all the way off the table. You land on the carpet with a splat and lay there until the waterfall stops crashing down on you.

What a mess. The entire carpet is drenched, and there are pieces of the aquarium all over the room. You see the little boat off to your right and look up the side of the bed to see that damn cat on top staring down at you. It licks its lips.

“Good kitty” you say as you back away towards the door. “Nice kitty...” You pass through the doorway into the hallway. You can do this. You can make it!
The cat hops off the bed onto the carpet. It must not have expected the carpet to be wait because it leaps back up onto the bed and starts licking its paws and fur.

This is the ticket you needed. You dash with full intensity out into the living room. Looking around, you see that the window is open. Just then, you hear a noise coming from Christina’s room. The cat might be on its way.

What do you do?
1222222111.title: The cat attacks

choices: She thinks the cat ate you.
12222221111.content:
You hear something that sounds like a splash coming from down the hallway. The cat must be on its way! You panic and make a run for the couch, and dive in underneath. You lay there for minutes, listening for the approaching predator but hear nothing. After waiting a few more minutes, you do the stupid thing. While staying as quiet as you can, you peek your head out from under the couch and look for the feline. Once again. Nothing, just the empty room. Weird.

You carefully crawl out when the door opens behind you. “Ack!” you shout in surprise and dive back under the couch. You peek your head out again and see Christina coming through the door. You assume from her casual locking of the door that she didn’t see you. Holding a couple full plastic bags, she passes by the couch and heads into her bedroom.

She stops at the entrance and screams out something so loud that it causes you to crouch back under the couch. “WHAT! THE! FUCK!” she screams. You can’t see much, but you certainly notice the cat scrambling out of the bedroom and into the living room with you. “ARE YOU FUCKING SERIOUS!” She starts stomping your way.

What is going on?
12222221111.title: Hide under the couch

12222221112.content:
Your heart is beating out of its chest as you stop and see the open window. It's just the thing you needed to get out of this mess. You rush over and wedge yourself between the table legs and the wall. Using your adrenaline to your advantage, you shimmy yourself up and quickly as you can. On your way up, you feel a slight thump. You look around the table leg but don't see anything. Cautiously you continue upward. When you get to the top, you carefully poke your head over the lip of the table. Directly in front of you is that damn cat!

You quickly duck your head back down. 'Did it see me?' you think to yourself.

You cower just under the lip of the table, waiting for the cat to strike, but nothing happens. You poke your head above the edge again. The cat is still there. You wonder why it isn't attacking until you notice that it isn't actually facing your way. It is sitting on the table, staring at the floor near the couch. Probably looking for you.

You wonder. If you are REALLY careful, could you make it to the window without becoming the cat's plaything? Looking over, the window is so very close. It wouldn't be the stupidest thing you've ever done.

Gently, you ease yourself onto the tabletop and stand up. You manage to sneak around the side of the cat. You have to walk over the cat's tail, but it turns out to be easier than you thought. Once you're clear, you look back at the beast. 'Dumb cat', you chuckle to yourself in your head. Time to get out of here, you think and stroll towards the window.

You don't make it three more steps before something hits you from behind and sweeps you off your feet. As you fall you see that it was the black fluffy tail. *Whump* You land flat on your back and knock your head against the hard wood. You instinctively reach back to feel your head for damage, even though you know its perfectly fine. That's when you see Mr. Kitty. Its head has turned and is now staring right at you. Mr. Kitty then turns around; its tail whipping over you as does so.

You are now face to face with the cat. It's expressionless gaze watches you intently; its eyes adjusting to focus on you. What do you do?
12222221112.title: Go for the window

122222211121.content:
After staring at the cat, your first instinct is the drop your head down and lie still. You've seen plenty of cats in your day, and they always seem to lose interest pretty quick when their prey stops moving. You feel the thump of the cat as it turns around, It's breath is on you. Your body is then nudged around by its nose. It's trying to coax you into moving. You don't give in.

For a minute, nothing happens. You think that it might have finally gone away. That's when you feel its jaws close around you. It's pulling you into its maw! You can feel its sharp teeth scrape over your head and gently grasping you by your shoulders. You can feel the cat's tongue against the back of your head as it starts pulling you inside. You then feel its teeth let go. It suddenly lurches its head forward and uses its tongue to draw more of your body inside. You feel the teeth resting around your waist now. Your arms and hands are resting on something slick; you open your eyes in panic to get a look. You can see your body resting on the fleshy interior of the cats mouth, along with the rows of sharp teeth that are currently sitting on your waist.

Again, the cat lets go of you then lurches forward. You can't see anything anymore, your head is wedged into the entrance of the cat's throat. You can feel it's teeth holding you just below your knees now.

The back of your mind is telling you that playing dead clearly isn't working...

What do you do?
122222211121.title: Playing dead

choices: Christine comes back, but doesn't realize you are in the cat.
Christine realizes you have been eaten, and tries to get you out.
Christine thinks this is freaking hillarious and decides to leave you there.
1222222111211.content:
You try your hardest not to panic. Despite every muscle in your body screaming to struggle and fight your way out you keep still. Trying your best to maintain your composure so that the cat will lose interest like all the ones before. Your iron will is soon rewarded... With a final lurch as your feet slip past the cats lips and you feel the muscular throat start to pull the rest of you in.

By now you realize that playing dead has failed but it is also too late. Your arms held to your side by the cat's constricting esophagus as your feet flail wildly in its mouth. Another quick gulp and that too is no longer possible. It feels like an eternity as your constricted body delves deeper and deeper into your feline predator. Until finally, with a plop, you are deposited into a relatively cramped fleshy sack.

If you somehow hadn't known where you were, the gastric juices and half chewed up cat food made it quite clear.

"Great. Guess I can add cat food to my resume when I get out of here.", You grumbled as you tried to right yourself.

Unlike all the other stomachs you had been in, this one was comparably small. Standing on shaky legs you were even able to touch the 'ceiling' if you stretched. This offered an opportunity you didn't normally have when you were treated as a snack. You could somewhat reach the sphincter to the cat's esophagus.

That ray of hope was quickly dashed however, when the moment you had barely managed to slip your arm in did you find it immediately forced out by a feline gulp.

"Well, so much for that."

Looked like it was the back door again. You dreaded the thought of being deposited in a litter box, but waiting it out in another stomach seemed just a tad bit worse. So you went searching in the dark until you eventually found the OTHER sphincter... only to find you couldn't fit more than a hand through with all you might.

"....No. NO. NONONONONONONNOOOOOOOO!!!", you screamed as you fought viciously against the fleshy ring that was denying you freedom. When that failed you rushed back to the esophageal sphincter only to be repeatedly gulped down.

This had never happened before. You had gotten so used to being swallowed you had never stopped to wonder what would happen if the body's natural course wouldn't free you. In a sick twist of fate, you were trapped like a rat in this cat's gut.

You banged against the walls, screamed, pleaded, tried everything you could think of to be freed from your feline prison. Only to be greeted by the sound of the stupid cat purring. It was ENJOYING the little show its meal was putting on for it. You slipped down on your knees and held your head in your hands, taking deep breaths. You tried to be hopeful. Christine would surely notice you. Sure, she views you as property. But MAYBE she would care enough about her possessions to not let them stew inside her cat.

So, what happens?
1222222111211.title: Keep playing dead!

choices: She saves you from the cat (not necessarily out of kindness)
She decides a cat’s crotch is the perfect storage for a little rascal like you
122222211122.content:
You don’t see any way out of this situation. Whatever you do, the cat will catch you within a blink. However, it still remains a stupid beast. Maybe you can outsmart it.
While you are backing off, the cat is visibly curling up in the expectative to pounce on its prey any moment, watching for the right instant. You know there is no chance to distance it at your size, but you could play the element of surprise by acting counter-intuitively.

At the exact second the cat leaped, you dived forward in a very daring move under the beast. You lived the scene in slow motion: first the chest, then the belly, and finally the crotch. As you were sliding below, you eventually recognized the gender of this cat at his two plump little balls, framing a ridiculously small sheath. You never believed how small cat’s genitals could be: even at your size, you could embrace it without effort. It’s at this instant you got a terrible idea. As clever as your move was, it would not take long for the cat to turn around and chase you immediately. You had to find a way to buy more time; and these little balls were the perfect way to pay for it. You gather your strength and smash on the orbs like if it was an emergency stop button. Well, it’s very shameful to exploit this common male vulnerability, but in the present case, it is a matter of life: honor may wait.

However, you didn’t see through all the consequences of your action. In your plan, you would flee while the cat was paralyzed for a few minutes. In reality, the animal instinctively crouches to protect his precious genitals, smothering you under his butt at the same time. Now, you were crushed by a mammoth feline crotch, his bruised balls flattening your face like in revenge.

You try well to punch back, but it only worsens the pressure from the cat’s body. In a few moments, endorphins will calm the beast’s pain, and he will shred you with no doubt for what you’ve done, if his big fat butt doesn’t crush you before. Your not-so-clever plan was turning against you.
You think fast of all the possibilities to get by this alive. There is no much, except one not very attractive: you have to replace the pain with pleasure, so the cat may hesitate before he tries to kill you. And for that, you are ideally placed, right under his privates, which are both the cause and solution to your predicament. You wriggle below his balls and dive your hands in his sheath to grab his penis. 122222211122.title: Cat's toy

1222222112.content:
Minutes pass by, and you notice the cat hasn’t really moved at all. You laugh to yourself as you realize that the cat probably sees you as a fish too. You haven’t really seen anything that you can use to escape the tank, so you’ve given up on that option for now.

After testing the water, lukewarm and relatively clean, you decide ‘fuck it’ and dive into the water. The tank is well taken care of and the only things swimming around are a few tetras and a suckerfish, nothing you couldn’t take on if you needed to. You check out the castle at the bottom of the tank and notice that it is hollow on the inside. It’s big enough to fit inside with room to spare. You spot a bubble of air sitting against the ceiling, which gives you an idea.

You let out the rest of the air in your lungs in the castle, head back out, and swim back to the surface. You do this repeatedly until enough air accumulates on the inside of the castle to last you a while. The idea is that if you sit tight on the inside of the castle when Christine gets back, she might think you’ve escaped. While it won’t help you escape, but it will distract her attention. That at least will get her to leave you alone long enough for you to figure out your step two.

You feel a deep vibration, which must be Christine coming home. The sudden vibration jolts you and you knock your head against the ceiling. You see the some rocks below you move a bit and suddenly you are submerged under water again. You look up you see the castle floating upward towards the surface. Damn it, you think, must have put too much air in there… cheap plastic castles.

Christine comes over to the tank and sees the castle floating at the top. She raises an eyebrow and cocks her head in confusion. “Well, looks like you have been busy”, she says and moves to the bed, putting a bag down on the bed. You get back in the boat and see what ‘goodies’ she got for you two. The first thing she pulls out is a dark colored sheet of something, you can’t figure out what it is, covered in plastic and sets it on the bed. She also pulls out a bottle of lubricant. This one widens your eyes, there aren’t many things you can do with that, and knowing Christine it’s pretty obvious what she’s planning. You just hope she’s gentle.

She gets up and takes off her clothes. She strips everything off piece by piece, making a little show for you while you sit in the boat. You try not to look, but can’t help it. She smiles as she looks at you, and your embarrassment is fully realized when you look down and see that you have a raging hard-on. She drops the last article of clothing, walks over, and grabs you out of the tank. With you trapped between her fingers, she takes you over to the bed.

What does she use on you?
1222222112.title: Go For A Swim

12222221122.content:
Christine sits down and pins you against the sheets with one of her hands, and pulls out the black sheet. "Do you know what this is?", she asks while working off the wrapping of the sheet with one hand. You shake your head no and she replies with, "it's called nori, the seaweed stuff they wrap sushi in. My parents taught me how to roll sushi when I was little, we used to make our own rolls every Friday... until dad left..." Her smile turns to a frown as she moves you over the top of the sheet of seaweed.

She places you on the edge of the sheet and rolls you into it. The sheet covers your body up to your shoulders, and after you are rolled into about two layers she cuts the extra sheet off. Then she gets a string out of her nightstand and wraps it around your waist, tying it in a knot. She leaves you alone for a moment to check her phone. This is it, you think as you try to wriggle out of the seaweed. After writhing back and forth with great effort, however, you discover that she has wrapped you too tightly and you can't get out.

She puts down the phone and takes a good look at you. "Now, now, don't use up all your energy just yet. We've got some fun ahead of us still", she says and then smirks. She brings the scissors down to your feet and starts to cut. You scream, thinking she's going to catch your feet, but she misses. She cut just below them, and then she cuts another piece of string and ties the seaweed again, around where your ankles are located.

"Alright, now you're officially a fishy", she says with a smile. "Let's go find you some water!". You look directly at her with the most unimpressed look you can muster and reply with "oh, boy... what fun..." She must have ignored your sarcasm, since she just grabs you and takes you into the bathroom.

Where does she put you?
12222221122.title: The Little Merman

122222211221.content:
Christine drops you into the tub. You land hard on your side; the porcelain floor is freezing against your exposed chest. Christine turns on the water and starts slipping off her shirt. The water level starts to rise, you can’t get up being wrapped and tied in the seaweed. You think of the irony as you feel more like an upside down turtle than a fish. The water eventually rises high enough for you to wiggle your way through the water.

You catch a good breath of air just before the water level starts to drown you. Now submerged, you thrust your hips up and down while kicking your legs. Doing your best to imitate a dolphin and, to your surprise, you start moving forward. After a minute or two of practice, you start to move around quite fast.

On the way towards finishing another lap, the water in front of you explodes, and a giant foot explodes to the bottom of the water. As a second foot comes down, you turn around and swim away. You swim up to the surface and see Christine sliding the rest of her body into the water. Her feet slide your way, and she uses one of her feet to rub her toes against you while she says, “hey there, fishy. How’s the water?”

You hadn’t taken notice in all the fear and dread, but Christine has a pretty nice body. Her skin was smooth and pale, with curves in all the right places. You swim up to her and beach yourself on her stomach, which looks like a kind of like a shore from your perspective.

“When you tied me up back there, I was pretty afraid but now I’m kind of liking this.” You say with enthusiasm. “I see you have figured out how to move in that suit, that’s good.” She says, smiling, and grabs you...

What does she do?
122222211221.title: A Bigger Aquarium

choices: Takes you out of the seaweed.
Does something else (you stay in seaweed)
1222222112211.content:
She puts her arm up and holds you in the air. “Here comes the dive!” She shouts and you are thrown violently into to the air. You flip through the air, unable to reorient yourself because of the seaweed suit. Everything is spinning, but you know you’re falling from that sinking feeling in your stomach. You start to scream “FFUUUU~” and you splash down into the water.

You hit the bottom of the tub hard on your back. ‘that’s going to leave a bruise’ you think to yourself and swim back up to the surface. “Ow! Look, I’m all down for games, and swimming like this is pretty fun but you have to be a bit more gentle” you say to her. She frowns and imitates your tone, saying “meh meh meh be more gentle meh meh! FINE, I guess. I want to keep you alive.”

She throws you around the tub, more gently this time. You manage to figure out how to land with your face and break the water as gently as you can. Your swimming gets pretty excellent and the two of you find yourselves playing games together. Christine uses her hands and feet to try to grab you in the water and you always seem to slip away just in time. Then you would use your legs like a whale’s tail and splash her in the face, but she would retaliate with enormous waves that would sink you.

The two of you lose track of time, and after about an hour the water started to get freezing cold. Christine decides to get out of the tub and dries off. You can’t help but watch her nice ass as she flips forward to whip the water out of her hair and dry it. As she is bent forward, she looks back and catches you sneaking a peek. She develops a sinister smile and you quickly look at the wall of the shower. She reaches into the tub and flicks a switch to drain the water. On her way out, her hand picks you out of the water. She sits on the toilet lid in her towel and thinks for a moment.

What does she do?
1222222112211.title: Fun With Christine

12222221122111.content:
Christine turns towards you after a moment, her expression shows serious interest. "So, what do you think? Having fun so far?"

You hadn't really given it much thought until now. She did say that you were going to be keeping you as her... 'property'. Sure you had some fun in the bathtub, but it was only you making the best out a bad situation. You take a look at Christine, her eyes are wide as if she were genuinely curious about your response.

She is clearly delirious. You aren't anyone's property, she has to be crazy to believe that she can just own you. Though, there is the problem of escaping. Christine is bigger, faster, and stronger than you. Even if you did escape, you have no idea where Christine lives. It'd be no use to escape just to arrive lost out in the middle of god knows where. You realize that your best bet is to stick around until Monday when she has to go back to school. Seeing as how it's Saturday that means you'll have to survive two more days, and that means playing nice with this crazy ho.

"It's been kind of fun, actually..." You say, lying through your teeth.

Christine smiles as she hears your answer, she picks you up and sighs. "Phew, I was worried that I'd have to do some convincing. Hold still." She uses her free hand to pinch the seaweed you're wrapped in and rips it off of you with relative ease. She drops it to the side and loosens her grip on your body. You slide through her hand and your feet land on her palm. Her hand which just held you withdraws and you stand there naked.

Christine stares at your naked body and says, "Let's try an experiment, I'll let you stay like this and if you don't try to run away I'll let you stay that way. If you do run... well there will be consequences."

You nod in understanding. "Okay", you say back.

She gets up off of the toilet and the sudden force knocks you on your ass. She moves out of the bathroom and into the kitchen.

What are her plans?
12222221122111.title: Trust, sort of.

12222222.content:
Looking upward, you can see a giant ass blocking the entrance of the toilet. You see other members of your asshole party falling out, and their splashes disturb the water around you. You stroke backwards towards the side of the bowl and just as you reach it a blinding light pervades the toilet. All the time spent inside Christine has your eyes adjusted for darkness, and you can't make up what is going on. You can somewhat make out Christine's backside, and her hand reaching behind her.

Shock splashes across your face as you realize she's reaching for the flusher. "Wait!" you shout desperately, but it's too late. The water starts swirling violently and you are carried in a circle around the bowl. You can't even manage to steady yourself as you are pulled along the current. The liquid drains and you are being taken downward, but just before you are dragged into the black abyss below you catch the sight of Christine above you. She is staring at you in a face that you can't discern from utter surprise or horror. This is the image that sticks with you as you are pulled under, into total darkness.

The next few hours are complete madness.

First you attempt to fight the current, at least what you think is the current. Your body has been tumbling around over and over so much that you have lost your sense of direction. The only times you are able to tell what direction you were heading is when the piping shifts and you are thrown into a new direction. You can't see anything and you feel lucky that your body is so durable. Being able to hold your breath for hours at a time is something of a godsend, and a definite necessity for the type of punishment you are constantly being put through in your life.

The flow of sewage seems to go on and on, pounding you with every twist and turn. Eventually you are spit out into the air, your body separates from the liquid and for the first time in a long time... you feel cold... and wet.

It doesn't last for long, your body splashes into a large body of water. You surface and cough out all the fluids that have breached your mouth throughout the ride. Looking around, you see barely lit brick archways spanning in two directions. The river flows down one direction, carrying you along one direction. To the side, you see very thin ledges protruding above the lip of the water.

Exhausted, you swim towards the ledge and heave yourself up onto it. You catch your breath for a few minutes. When you feel ready, you get up and start to move again.

Where do you head?
12222222.title: Flush!

choices: Next to a mansion in the countryside.
122222222.content:
The air around you is musty and it doesn’t seem like anyone has been down here in a long time. There haven’t been any spider webs like you imagined; in fact the only sign of life is some fungus dangling from the ceiling. The old-fashioned brickwork design makes you feel as if you’d be better equipped holding a torch and cross.

Walking along the barely visible brick ledge, you ponder the best direction to go. Logic tells you that all rivers tend to flow down in elevation and typically empty into larger bodies of water. This means that downstream will be the easiest way out of this mess.

You head down the ledge in the direction of the current until you hit a fork in the river. There really isn’t any way you can figure out which path will be the best choice, this time around. You give up thinking about it and just get in the river, letting it decide for you.

The river takes you to into the left archway. After drifting along for a few hours, you think to yourself that the current seems to be getting faster. The water around the ledge is splashing and that’s how you know that it is indeed increasing in speed. You swim towards the side, until you glance downriver and notice that the river disappears. ’Oh, shit!’{/i] you think to yourself as you realize that it’s a big hole, and start swimming frantically to the side. It’s no use, though, and you plummet into the hole.

As you fall, you see all the specks and ovoid globs of water floating around you. It’s almost unreal how alien it all looks. The moment doesn’t last as you splash down into water. You surface somewhere away from the waterfall and look around.

You are in a large room filled up halfway with water, with a hole in the ceiling spills more into the center. There are ledges all around the edge, and two tunnels at opposite sides of the room. The tunnels are raised up so that water can’t reach it.

Fatigue hits you hard, so you swim off to the side and climb up the closest ledge. You lay down, tired from the day’s events, hungry, and still a bit hung over. Before you know it you are fast asleep.

You wake up the next day and try to find a way out. The only thing you find is a sealed manhole cover in one corridor, and piles of garbage littered throughout the tunnels. Another day goes by, this time you come across a rats’ nest. You kill one using a needle, and cook its meat with an old lighter and some tinder (all items you found strewn about the tunnels).

Weeks go by, and then months. You start to gain a rhythm for surviving down in the sewer. Eventually you give up all hope of escape, and build a shelter some length down into the tunnel.

Your body stays the same during all this time. For whatever reason, you’ve never had facial hair and your nails and hair only grow to a certain length and then stop.

Months later…

You sit down, staring at the wall in front of you. Drawings and miscellaneous notes you’ve scribbled riddle the walls, but that’s not what you are focused on. You’ve tried to keep track of how many days you’d been down here by scratches and scores on the wall. If they are at all accurate, you’ve missed your eighteenth birthday by about four months. You are now a man, you realize. The idea is strange to you, since you don’t feel any different. You always imagined it would feel different.

A clanking sound sends you into alert, and as you peer down the tunnel you can see a light. You grab your needle and race down towards the source. As you arrive, you see a man dressed in yellow walking down the tunnel away from you. More importantly, the manhole cover you discovered early on is open. You take a moment to absorb the clean air blowing down onto you.

The moment passes. You look back at your shelter, saying goodbye to your life here, and start flying up the ladder. You scale the wall, jumping from rung to rung. You climb out and stand in the fresh air, freed of your prison and home.

Where are you?
122222222.title: 18, A New Beginning

choices: A girl in her early tweens(reserved)
1222222221.content:
You sadly don't recognize the city. All the blaring lights and cars, and people. It has been so long since you'd seen people.

Which is why you hardly notice when a foot collides with you and sends you flying! Great job there Steve, first new day and you're already an idiot!

You land on something soft though, before tumbling down an assortment of things. Finally falling to a stop at the bottom of a bag, surrounded by lip gloss and other such girl beauty items. You hear the bag close as the person you are on hope on a bus. You gulp as you are jostled about, so tired...

You feel something prod you and poke you as you slowly awaken before hearing a girlish shriek as someone moves back from you...
1222222221.title: A city at night.

choices: In a bowl full of cereal!
12222222211.content:
You blink and move to cover yourself, feeling that chill wind blowing across your body. "Err hi..." You gulp, staring at the girl.

The girl would blush, blinking a few times, "Hi..." She had some Asian features, probably half Asian. With Chestnut eyes and brown hair tied up into two pigtails. Adjusting her glasses she coughed to clear her throat as she scooted over in her pjs. "So just to be clear that I'm not dreaming... You're real right?"

You sigh and nod, "Yes I'm real... Do you have anything I can cover myself with?"

The girl would blush and nod, rummaging around under her bed before laying out a pair of doll swimming trunks, you rapidly pull them on. "Sorry... Umm, I'm Sora. You?"

She was kinda pretty... And did have... Well not the biggest chest, A cups at least. You shook your head, "Steve... So where am I?"

"My room." She looked at you quizzically.

You sighed, "What city I mean."

"Oh. San Francisco."

You blinked, did this girl just say... Jesus that was miles away from where you lived in your dorm! Shit!

Okay don't panic... Don't panic...

"Okay Sora... So, I'm a college student, I need to get home. Can you... Are your pare--" you stop as your belly grumbles. "Do you hav--"

She giggles and offers her hand for you to hop onto, "Anything to eat? Yeah. As for my mom and dad they left me in charge of the house since I'm old enough now."

You gulp at that, "How old are you?" You ask as you step into the hand, not expecting her to gently stand at a slow pace. "I'm 12."

You gulp. Okay take back the looks there mister, she's underage. Then again flattery might win you some favors. "What about you?"

Shit. "Uhh... 18." You say blushing as she giggles, "Well you look pretty handsome." She says as she walks, blushing a bit, did she just flirt with you?

"Okay lil guy we're here~" she says as she sets you down on...
12222222211.title: Meeting Sora

choices: Tell her the whole story, while the cereal grows soggy around you.
Make something up, it'll probably be faster that way.
Tell her the story, but change or leave some things out. Will she believe you?
122222222113.content:
"Okay lil' guy, we're here~" she says bringing you over to a bowl of cheerio's on the kitchen table. You get ready to jump off her hand as she brings you down when suddenly, instead of setting you down next to it, she tips her palm over and drops you flailing right into the bowl!

You yell out in surprise at the sudden fall and then crash through a couple layers of baked grain loops, allegedly rich in complex carbs and fibers, good for the heart and whatever. You splash through the sea of cold milk underneath and bump into the bottom of the bowl before jumping up, shoving through the layers of cheerio's again to surface and vent your displeasure.

"Hey, what gives!?" You shout, sputtering and wiping milk from your eyes to glare at the laughing tween. The whole thing wouldn't leave you with any bruises or anything, but it hadn't exactly tickled either.

Sora tried to stop laughing as your tiny, milk-soaked figure fumed at her from her bowl of cereal. "Sorry!" She giggles, clearly failing. The cheerios keep bumping up against you, and you shove them away angrily. "You just had the swim trunks, so I couldn't resist!"

You sigh deeply and calm down as she eventually gets control of her amusement, then you wade over to lean back against the rim of the bowl where you grab a cheerio and, with as much dignity and patience as you could manage in the circumstances, pick it up and start taking bites from the soggy end. "Whatever." Actually, it was pretty tame compared to some of the 'fun' you've had in bathtubs growing up... or hunting rats and cockroaches for sustenance, more recently. Yeah, roaches. If you prepared them just right, you could trick yourself into pretending you were fooling yourself into thinking it was lobster...

Having calmed down, Sora sits down and pulls the bowl with you in it closer, right up to the edge of the table, snapping you out of your reminiscence and also getting you smacked by a few more cheerios. You look up to object, but change your mind and let it go, seeing her look down at you with what looks like innocent curiosity rather than mischief this time. She leans over you with her elbows on either side of the bowl, hands together on the table in front of them. Taking up most of your field of view from ahead or above, the giant normal-sized little girl stares down at you with the typical intense gaze of a kid who's trying really hard to act like patiently at the moment, her little pigtails dangling over either side of your little milk-tub.

Of course, a lifetime of being tiny had left you with a very different concept of personal space compared to other people, so this stranger's literally looming over you all of a sudden didn't even faze you. You'd be an absolute nervous wreck by now, if you hadn't long since gotten used to that sort of thing.

"What's up?" You call up at Sora, swallowing down the deliciously rich, flavorful mouthful of bland carbohydrates and 2% milk you were chewing, your first quasi-civilized food in months. Clearly, she was dying to ask you something. Come to think of it, that actually made perfect sense. It's not like she was expecting something like yo- wait a minute.

"Say, how come this cereal was just sitting here?" You ask. "While you were in your room, I mean?" The rest of the house had looked impeccably clean, even her room. She didn't seem like the type to just leave food lying around.

"Oh, I poured it after I got home and before I went to my room to look at you" she says matter-of-factly.

Well, obviously. "Yeah, but why leave it here instead of eating it?" You elaborate.

She frowns a little. "I like to let it soak. I don't like chewing crunchy things, they scrape up your mouth and get jammed in your teeth." She makes a face, then changes subjects. "Anyway, what were you doing out on the sidewalk?"

Well, fair enough you suppose. She looks like she's been wanting an explanation for quite some time. Putting aside your cheerio for the moment, you take a deep breath and-
122222222113.title: Cereal Dunking

choices: Tell her you need to get going now.
Offer to stick around until her parents come home.
You're interrupted before you can finish?
1222222221131.content:
Having more or less eaten your fill of soggy cheerios, you sit back and lounge in the cereal bowl, as if you were a regular person chilling in a swimming pool, while you tell Sora the basics about your life up 'till now. About being born this way, growing up, how it wasn't as bad as you'd think.

Along the way, of course, you have to answer a lot of reasonable and/or childlike questions she bombards you with. Yes, really, you'd been stepped on. Yeah, you were fine. No, she wasn't wearing shoes and it was a soft carpet besides, you didn't know if you'd survive a real stomping.

Yes, you really could hold your breath pretty much all day. You just didn't like to. Yes, you really had been accidentally swallowed before. Yeah, mostly they got you back out later, but one time you ended up going all the way through and getting pooped out after. That's actually how you ended up in this city, by getting flushed down and washing down the sewer system. Got trapped underground for months.

"What was it like?" Sora whispers, her mouth forming a perpetual 'o' of intrigue at all of this adventure.

"What, living in the sewers?" You say, waving it off casually. At first explaining everything had been just a matter of routine, but you couldn't ask for a more attentive audience than this girl and despite yourself, you'd been caught up in the swing of the storytelling. "Well, first thing I did was find the gray-water runoff - that's the mostly clean stuff, like from sinks, for big buildings particularly - and wash off best as I could. Then I fought a rat to the death and killed it, stabbing it with a nee-"

"What was it like being eaten, thought?" Sora blurts out and interrupts you, somewhat annoyingly.

"What, that? Didn't like it. Real cramped and damp and hot inside, seriously, there's way too little room to move around. And that's just in the stomach! Weirdly enough, that's the smelliest part too, since you're not adjusted to the sm-"

"You mean because of all the other food?"

"Hey, just 'cause I got eaten doesn't make me food, alright!?" Sora looks quizzical at this, but before she can ask another question you quickly interrupt: "But yes, because of the food. And bile. Keep in mind, there's not even standing room inside the stomach to begin with, right?

"So I'm curled up in there trying to keep my head above this chewed-up mess of some girl's breakfast, but meantime, every time she takes a step or even moves around at all it's, like, this huge motion and everything gets thrown around, so I have to keep moving to keep my head clear the whole time - (god forbid she chug down some kind of drink on top of that, by the way). You'd think having someone moving around that much in your gut would make you nauseous or something, right? But apparently, some people actually enjoy it somehow, like this last chick who kept on patting her stomach and drinking down water until I finally decided it was give up and move on, or drown. That idiot apparently thought she'd just swallowed a fish the night before, like an actual living goldfish. Seriously."

You stop and take a breath after venting this. Months of hard-fought survival had not yet taken the edge off of how annoying that whole memory was.

Meanwhile, Sora still had questions. After waiting a moment to make sure you were done, she asked: "Didn't you try yelling out that you weren't a fish? Even if she only just kind of heard you shouting in there, you'd think she'd realize that goldfish wouldn't do that. Right?"

You roll your eyes. "Of course I tried that. Waste of time. Apparently she couldn't hear anything at all from me. Meanwhile, I have to hear every little sound she's making. Words, steps, heartbeats, even loud breathing sometimes, you name it. I woke up while she was snoring, and believe me, I could feel that noise - literally! Call that fair? 'Cause I most certainly do not!"

You cross your arms in mock anger, dramatically fuming, which gets a laugh out of the younger girl while she sits back and brushes her pigtails back over her shoulder. You make a face and get another little chuckle out of the moment, then crack a grin and lean back again, spreading your arms out over the rim of the bowl. She smiles back again, then asks another question. Because of course she does. "So what was the worst part, if you had to pick just one? The smell? The big-person noises? Maybe the part at the end, where you had to wait to be pooped out of her butt?" She teases, giggling.

"Yes. All of it was the worst. It was all terrible."

"Aww, c'monnn..." Sora pleads, switching gears in an instant. Dammit.

"Gah, fine! If you must know, then honestly? I think being totally ignored like that was the worst. Everything else wasn't great, but when the person who got you into that whole mess in the first place, and could totally get you out of it anytime, doesn't know or even care about it? Well, that really made me mad."

"And the best?" She prompted, leaning back in and setting her arm down on the table.

"There was no 'best'. It was all the worst."

"Steeeeve!" She pouts.

"Alright, alright already! So if I had to pick the least-bad thing about it, somehow, I guess..." You think for a moment. One odd little standalone event in that whole debacle had been how, when Christine had started rubbing her belly while you leaned against it, the sensation had been surprisingly somewhat pleasant. But you felt weird about saying that. "I need to think about it. I never really thought about it that way before," you conclude.

"But-"

"Nope! No buts. Also, it's my turn to ask some questions. Like: can I use your phone, when you get a second? I need to call my folks and let them know what's up, already. Clear up a missing persons case, get home, and what not."

"Ah- about that..." Sora looks embarrassed, and turns her eyes down while she talks. "See, the thing is, my phone, I might have... dropped it in the gutter, when I saw you, so..."

You give her an incredulous stare, at which she blushes and looks back down again. "For real? Damn, that sucks, sorry. Anyway, if you've got a landline..."

"We don't." You smack your palm to your forehead. "Yeah, fair, fair, I guess I should have expected that much. Then, when you're going to school yo-"

"My parents took me out of school," she blurts out, suddenly looking even sadder. "Last year, because of bullying. I mean, I'd rather go there anyway, and at least see other people, but..." she trails off.

Partly out of sympathy, and partly out of curiosity, you chip in: "Bullying, what for? You're like the coolest kid I ever met, first one that isn't a total brat. What's up with that?"

Sora blushes, and then smiles weakly. "Thanks, but it's not me. Not really. It's just because I have two moms."

"Ah." Damn kids. You both sit in silence for a while.

Finally, Sora raises her head. "Anyway, I could take you to a pay phone later. Would that help?"

"A-uh. Yeah. Yeah, that should be fine. I've never used one before, but y'know. Pretty sure we can figure it out. Your parents probably don't let you use their computer either, huh?"

"Only for the guest account. It has my home-ed software on it, so the web browser's disabled so I can't look up answers. Sorry." She says it easily enough, but looks uncomfortable while she's at it.

You honestly have to feel bad for her. Somehow, it feels like she's lonelier here in this house than you ever were in that sewer. Damn shame. She seemed like a pretty good kid. Even if she was a bit mischievous, and skipped over all your heroic rat-killing/bug-slaying adventure stories to ask a million friggin' questions about people eating you.

"Anyway" you stand up, milk sloughing off you as you stretch out and call up at the girl, who's attentive but still looks at you a little sadly. "Thing is, I've been totally AWOL for a seriously long time now, so..."

Without turning to look, you can plainly hear her outreached hand fidgeting nervously behind you, as she listens with reluctant resignation...
1222222221131.title: Exchanging Stories

choices: She moves the spoon, and catches you...
She starts pouring more milk into the bowl, the cheater!
12222222211312.content:
"I've been totally AWOL for a seriously long time now," you tell her. "So... I guess a few more days couldn't hurt, right? Why don't I just hang out here until your parents are home?"

Sora's face lights up when you say this. "Really!?" She exclaims, sounding hopeful. "You mean it?"

"Sure, why not?" You tell her, aiming for a tone of cheerful gruffness and mostly pulling it off correctly. "Besides, way this was going, you probably didn't have any quarters for the phone booth or whatever. Anyway, go ahead and make yourself some breakfast while I try to come up with something fun to do..."

While you were talking, standing there chest-deep in cereal in front of her, Sora was starting to wear a suspiciously cheerful grin on her face, while subtly adjusting her arms on the table on either side of you. Just when you're about to call her on it, a giant spoon against your back suddenly shoves you face-forward into the middle of the bowl, plunging you under-cereal for the second time today.

You come up sputtering and calling out again, but this time Sora's cheerfully talking over you. "Oh, look!" She chirps happily, faking discovery. "My cheerios are all soft and mushy now, just how I like them!"

"That's not funny!" You grumble, treading your way back towards the rim of the bowl, when the spoon sweeps in front of you and rushes by, held daintily above in just three of her fingers. "Hah, missed!" You cry out, surging forward in a rush of milk and grain in the wake left behind it. The big tablespoon rushes by again, a little further out and faster this time. Again, you surge forward.

"Oh my, is that the Lucky Charms elf?" Sora gasps in mock surprise, dramatically covering her mouth with her other hand as she does so. "I didn't know he was an ingredient in cheerios!" Haha, very funny, you grumbled internally.

"Maybe I should let him out?" She pretends to ponder, while running the spoon by you again. This time, the current doesn't drive you forward - in fact, it's all you can do to not get pulled back! Looking around, you suddenly realize Sora's game: She's missing you on purpose, stirring the bowl to create a whirlpool and drag you towards the center!

A rush of individual cheerio hoops catch you off-guard and knock you off your balance, causing you to fall and be swept back several strides before you're able to right yourself again. Just as you do, her spoon rushes by again, and you struggle to stand your ground against the now even-greater torrent of milk and cereal rushing against you.

"I suppose if he tries to climb out, I'll let him..." Sora goes on overhead, now faking boredom and ambivalence. "Yeah, if grabs the edge and tries to climb over, it would be rude to push him back. If he grabs the edge... that makes sense, right Stevie? Don't worry, I won't push you away from it or anything. In fact, I'm only going to eat straight from the middle, so the rest of the bowl is yours to swim around in however you want!"

Thus gleefully proclaiming, she sweeps her spoon around the bowl even faster, further out this time, upon which it finally forms the whirlpool she's been going for. You have just enough time to shout out "yeah, that's very fu-" before the current hits you and you get dragged under. You fly through the liquid, zooming around and around in an ever-narrowing spiral before you finally reach the center and burst free, resting on solid ground while the shallow mixture pulls in all directions around you.

"Whoah, that was intense!" You exclaim, half-laughing and half-panting while rubbing the grainy milk concoction from your eyes. "I feel like I should be mad, but that was some pretty crazy white-wate- huh?" You suddenly feel yourself rising, and the swirling liquid falls away. You quickly finish pawing at your eyes and open them to find yourself sitting on the girl's spoon, in a puddle of milk, rising steadily above the bowl. "H-hey, cut that-"

"Ahhhh!" Sora leans in and opens her mouth wide, keeping the spoon steady over the bowl, blasting you with a wave of hot, humid air as you stare down her rapidly-approaching throat.

Quickly, you jump off the spoon and fall back into the cereal bowl, controlling your fall this time and landing upright. "Sora, that's not funny!" You reproach, after gaining your bearings and coming up again. "I told you before, I really don't like getting swallowed!"

Disturbingly, Sora seems to ignore you for the most part, while making an elaborate show of pulling the now-empty spoon out of her mouth and swallowing. With the whirlpool having slowed down somewhat, you're able to start making some progress back out of the bowl when, to your dismay, she sighs happily and starts stirring the bowl again.

"Say, Stevie, why go to all the trouble of swimming to the middle and getting onto my spoon, if you don't want me to eat you?" She teases, giggling. You sigh.

Alright, she wants to play a game? You can play a game. Before the whirlpool can overpower you again, you carefully walk back to the middle of the bowl yourself, standing upright in the middle with the cereal swirling all around you. Sora looks surprised for a moment, then swipes extra-hard with the spoon, at which point again you're swept off your feet by the current and spin in place in the center, curled up and holding your breath.

The moment you feel yourself being lifted above the surface, you quickly get your bearings and jump clear, easily escaping the rising spoon. You land, surface, and look up to see that Sora has wasted no time on theatrics this go around, lifting it straight up and into her mouth without any fanfare.

"What, again Stevie?" She calls out after swallowing, this time with a hint of genuine disappointment creeping into her voice. "Don't be so indecisive! I guess I'll just have to be faster, before you change your mind again!"

You go another round, and then another. Sora's not even pretending at table manners anymore, she just picks up the spoon and shoves it into her mouth as quickly as she can - but you're always just one step ahead of her. "C'mon... I promise I won't flush you...~"

You start to get dizzy from spinning around all the time, as well as tired from withstanding the current. Which ordinarily would spell your defeat sooner or later, but for one thing: the water level's getting lower. With every swing and miss, another spoonful of liquid leaves the whirlpool, leaving it just a tad less to deal with on the next swing. Eventually, the whole thing's going to be shallow enough for you to just walk right out of here.

Just as you're thinking this, while swirling in the vortex for the umpteenth time, you feel yourself land in the hollow of the spoon and are swiftly lifted above the surface again. Fumbling slightly, you brace yourself and jump off blindly as usual, only this time...
12222222211312.title: Stick Around, Put a Positive Spin on Things

122222222113121.content:
You jump blindly off... Only to feel the spoon under you! She had moved it to catch you this time, lifting you up while you recovered. Shaking your head and wiping your eyes you'd watch as the lips slid past you, rows of monolithic teeth, and that pink monster of a tongue. Your world tilting as Sora deposited the Cheerios with a satisfied "Mmmnn~"

You could only watch as your eyes got used to the dark, the chunks of cheerio littering her tongue as she pushed them to the left and right, her molars crunching then into mushy bits. Keeping you dead center on her tongue, as if showing you how powerful she was versus your puny body, when you tried to stand she flicked her tongue to the right, pushing you against her cheek before letting you drop down into saliva.

"He-hey what gives?!" You got your answer as you felt her jaw move, her neck and throat open, an audible gulp, hard and meaty hit your ears.

That, had definitely been intentional. You had to guess to show you how easy you'd be to swallow, that or ... "Or she doesn't want to swallow me?" You could only yelp as you were bombarded by her tongue careening into you,the sweet sugary saliva coating you.

"Arggh-- ugh, Sora! Come on this isn't fun-- ack!" You shouted as she plopped you on the center of her tongue face down. "Come on, spit me out you've had you--" you stopped as you felt her suck on your whole body.

"S-Sora stop I'm not a--mnooh..." You whimpered. It'd been so long since you'd felt any sort of pleasure. This sucking motion though... It had you hard. Loathe to admit it, this did feel rather good.

"He-hey ca-Hareful! Ohhh fuck..." You gasped out as she sucked on you again. You had to get out,before...

"So-Sora please sp-spit me... GAH!You gotta... Mnoh goooood!" You came hard on the tongue, sputtering your seed all over the pink monster. Sora's moan reverberating in your ears as you felt her tongue raise...
122222222113121.title: In the mouth of awkwardness

choices: Sora tries to make herself throw up, though not necessarily right away...
Actually, she has a better idea.
122222222113122.content:
Unbeknownst to you, the eager girl had been paying close attention to your escape attempts for a while now. She'd worked out that you'd almost take just enough time to get your hands and feet under you on the spoon, then use your right arm and leg to shove yourself off to the side. Moreover, she'd noticed that you didn't even bother trying to open your eyes before you jumped anymore. As such, she'd secretly switched things around when you weren't looking: She'd switch the spoon over to her left hand just before scooping you up, and then bring it up sideways, held at an angle perpendicular to her face.

The first few times she'd tried this, she'd been unlucky and you'd come up lying on your back, so you'd simply roll away from her and fall back down. without realizing anything had changed. This time, however, you'd finally landed on the spoon face-down, so you were able to get a foot under you and really shove off when you jumped away from it.

And so this time, Sora's plan works like a charm. Instead of free-falling into the increasingly shallow bowl of cold milk and cereal, you feel a rush of hot air go by as you ram head-first into the back of Sora's throat, taking even her by surprise by the sudden impact, bounce back slightly, and land with a splat upon the surface of her tongue. Immediately, her mouth tilts back and-

*GULP*

The sound resonates through your bones as the undulating flesh tightens around and yanks you forward, pulling you by your head and torso and pushing you from behind, sliding you along the slimy surface to bring you face-to-face with her gaping maw. "No Sora, don't!" You scream, staring directly down her throat.

"Nnn! K-K-"

The only response is a series of squelching noises as her throat muscles flex and relax a few times beneath you, then a brief whine as Sora starts to gag. "Cough me up! Quick!" You shout hurriedly. You were just mildly concerned about flying out of her mouth and into something painful, but at this rate it was that or be swallowed, provided she didn't choke on you first. At three inches tall, you weren't exactly easy to swallow, and you dreaded the thought of getting stuck in some girl's windpipe while she suffocated to...

As you're thinking this, Sora shoves the now-empty spoon into her mouth after you. You feel the familiar press of cold metal against your feet, pushing you forward, as she once again tilts her head back and-

*GULP*

The young girl's throat tightens around you and pulls you in, sending you down on the path to join the rest of her breakfast down below. She swallows a couple more times as you go down, for good measure, as it's a tight fit given that you're more or less fully-grown now, and Sora herself is very much on the smaller end of 'people who've swallowed you before'.

Even so, the slippery muscles only manage to drag you down a short way before you get stuck again, coming to a stop about midway down her chest. (You can tell because her heartbeat is REALLY loud, and sounds like it's right in front of your face. At least, you're glad to note, it sounds like she's panicking the way she should be at the moment, given how rapidly it's beating).

Meanwhile, Sora feels you getting stuck halfway down. Somewhat annoyed, yet undeterred, she quickly takes up her spoon and starts eating again. Moments later, she feels the obstruction in her chest disappear, as the wave of milk and mush going through her gullet easily washes you down, sweeping you right along into her belly. Quickly, she jumps up and rushes to the bathroom, grabbing a first-aid kit from the cabinet there and hurriedly pulling out a stethoscope. As she starts putting it on, she suddenly feels some movement in her belly, and gasps. That really did feel kind of cool! Weird, but not in a bad way...

After all the commotion, tossed around the cavity full of chewed-up cereal like a ragdoll in a washing machine, you rearrange yourself to be sitting more or less upright in the stinking mess when you hear a gasp, then a slight rustling and a tapping sound emanate from the wall in front of you as, unbeknownst to you, Sora puts the drum end of the stethoscope against her stomach, beneath her shirt. "Hello, Stevie? Can you hear me?"

You grumble as Sora's voice booms all around you. "Of course I can friggin' hear her I'm inside the friggin' source. Damn it, she'd better have been running to the bathroom to throw me up just now. I can't believe I thought I'd be nice and keep her company, and the first thing she does is friggin' swallow me! I'd just told her how much I hated that..."

"Hey, language!" To your surprise, Sora's booming voice immediately scolds you in response, followed up by a couple of sharp raps against her belly. "And I don't wanna throw up, that's gross! Can't you just, like, climb out or something?"

"Hell no!" You shout. "And you think this isn't gross? If I cou-"

"Hey!" She exclaims, suddenly prodding her stomach hard enough to knock you over into the slop again. "Language!"
122222222113122.title: Hop On In, The Slobber's Fine...

choices: Dance practice; she wants to keep you trapped a while longer...
Homework; you make it out a few hours later...
1222222221131222.content:
