"Language! And you're the one who jumped into my throat like that! I thought I was going to choke!" Sora pouts, while secretly enjoying the squirming in her belly as you get yourself upright again. She'd be on the lookout for more excuses to knock you around again.

Through the stethoscope, she hears your reply: "...y didn't you just cough me up like I was saying to? I kept shouting it!" She huffs at it in response. "I thought you might get seriously hurt if I did that! And you said you survived being eaten before, so it seemed safer than coughing! Besides, I didn't hear you!"

Back upright in her stomach, you sigh, and calm down a little after hearing this. Personally, you'd rather take the risk of flying through the air and crash-landing somewhere than end up getting eaten. But it was good to know she'd been thinking of your safety at least a little, and not just having fun. "Anyway, hang on a minute - I'm going to go finish my breakfast real quick."

With a slight giggle, she starts walking back to the table, sending your surroundings into chaos again in the process.

Suddenly, as your world settles back down into calm as she sits down at the table, you realize something important. "Hey, wait!" You shout, with a start. "That girl who ate me earlier, her diet was all messed up! Her stomach wasn't very acidic!"

Your only answer is a loud gulp, shortly followed by several gallons of warm, slimy, semi-sweet liquid spilling down onto you. You move around to try to wipe the mess from your face and avoid the next load as best as you can, and then the next one, never suspecting that your young captor was secretly enjoying the sensation, and was deliberately taking her time with the rest of the food to drag your struggling out as long as possible.

Almost five full minutes later, Sora's bowl is finally empty. With a sigh of satisfaction, she puts the stethoscope back against her tummy and-

"-ERRRP!"

Half the stale air in the muscular enclosure is squeezed out as the stomach contracts, shoving you around, deafening you, and reminding you of yet another thing you hate about this whole experience. "Whoops, sorry!" Sora giggles cutely. "You okay in there, Stevie?"

"Sora! Quick! You've gotta get me out of here, that girl before..." You rush to tell her about the peculiarities of the Christine case, leaving out all the cum and other such details of course. Towards the end, you brush your hand up against your swim trunks while gesturing, and realize they feel much coarser than normal. "Oh, God! Hurry! It's already dissolving my shorts!"

"Eep!" Sora squeals and jumps up quickly, then stops for a moment. "Wait, you said it's affecting your shorts?"

"Yes! Hurry!"

""But it's not affecting you?"

"No! Not yet, but- wait..." Suddenly catching on, you frown, and start feeling yourself all over. All normal, if messy. Including your hair. "I guess... I guess I'm fine."

You hear a sigh of undisguised relief, and then some tumbling around as Sora starts walking calmly."Jeez, don't scare me like that." After a few more gulping sounds, you're met with another load of water from above, this time bringing a round, white tablet bigger than your chest along with it. "That should help keep the shorts from being ruined." Sora's voice booms again, still sounding relieved. "I don't know if I have another pair around."

You open your mouth to thank her as the pill starts bubbling in front of you, but that turns out to be a mistake as she suddenly starts walking again. Some of her used Cheerio's splash into your mouth as you go through another bellyquake without warning, and then she flops down in the couch on her back, still holding the stethoscope against her. "Hey, Stevie?" You hear her ask, after a moment, sounding a little remorseful.

"What's up?"

"You're not... mad at me, are you?"

You sigh, not that she can hear it.

"...at first I was, but since you were just trying not to hurt me then... I guess I'm just glad we're both okay." Her sigh of relief, on the other hand, you can hear plainly.

"...but!" You go on. "I still want you to throw me up sooner, rather than later already. Even if I'm not going to dissolve, I still don't like it in here!"

"Aww, c'monnn..." she whines. "I shouldn't have to do that, I won fair and square! And besides, didn't you say the worst thing about it before was being ignored the whole time? That's why I put mommy's stethoscope on, so I can hear you while you're there!"

So she had been listening. Clever girl. And you had to admit, that was a neat trick she came up with there. "I also said everything else about it was bad, remember? And you did not win fair and square! That little 'game' of yours was completely unfair!"

"Hey, what do you mean, 'unfair'!? I totally set it up to make it easy for you, you only got caught because you jumped in my mouth yourself!"

"There was milk all over my face, I couldn't see where I was jumping!"

"Well then maybe don't jump so hard! You could have just dropped off the spoon instead, you know!"

"You'd have probably just used the spoon to catch me, then!"

"Nuh-uh!"

"Yeah, well how am I supposed to know? It's not like you explained all your silly rules, and actually asked me if I wanted to play your little game!"

"Well, you kept going straight back to the middle of the bowl, so I thought you did!" Damn it, she has you there.

"...well, you still go through all the rules. Or ask me what I thought about them. Or let me make any of them myself."

There's a moment of silence. Then: "Okay, so what other rules would you have added, to make it fair?" She demands.

Well, shit, you hadn't thought of that. You can't help but feel like you're losing the argument to this twelve-year-old, as you fumble to answer. "Uh, I... first, like, e.g., you can't move the spoon around to find me. You have to use the same motion every time, besides mixing up the bowl. And no dumping the cereal back if you don't catch me. No adding more of it, either! And it has to be a whole spoonful every time, whether I'm in the spoon or not. Also, if I win..." You stop to think a moment.

"Yeah?" She giggles, shaking you around a bit.

You wipe sludge off your face, yet again. "Then you have to do whatever I say for the rest of the day, and call me 'Steve' instead of 'Stevie'. No, actually, make that 'Lord Steven'! And when I tell you to do something, you have to answer like 'Yes, m'lord~' or 'Right away, Lord Steven!~'" You call out, mimicking a high-pitched voice to call out the responses at the end. Sora laughs in response, dunking you in half-digested cereal yet again.

"Okay, fine, but I get to swallow you when I win. And you can't complain when I don't throw you up, either!"

"No way! What do you even want that for? Am I seriously that good-tasting?"

"Maybe~"

You roll your eyes. "Besides, you already did that!"

"So you'll be used to it already!" You roll your eyes.

"Y'know what? Fine. You can eat me if you win, but if I win, you have to do what I say for the rest of the week!"

"What, no way! That's too long! You don't even do what I want for a whole day if I win!"

"What you want is worse than what I want!"

"I don't know that! Okay, how 'bout this then: If you win I'll do what you said for the whole day, and if you win twice in a row then it'll be the whole week? Also, you have to do what I tell you to while you're in there." She adds, smacking her flat belly and rubbing it a couple of times.

"Alright, but this time doesn't count," you counter.

"Okay, but I don't have to throw up either!"

"You weren't going to anyway, were you? Whatever. Deal. Just make sure that you REMEMBER not to flush." You reluctantly concede.

"Deal! Yipee!" Sora quickly agrees, then jumps up in celebration. "Let's shake on it!" She laughs, bouncing up and down to shake you around.

"H-mmph! Stop th-mm!" You try to shout at her to stop so you can find the exit and get going, but you keep getting dunked in the sloshing fluid. Amused by your struggles, but sensing that you're trying to get out, Sora decides it's time for...
1222222221131222.title: She refuses.

choices: A bathing suit, holding a little toy boat: Gulliver's Travels!
A fuzzy dinosaur costume: Godzilla Attack!
12222222211312222.content:
Sora settles down to work on her at-home tutoring. You spend the next few hours in relative peace, apart from all the gurgling and thumping noises in Sora's intestines, and the occasional muttering, as you shimmy your way along through her digestive tract.

Come mid-afternoon, you've finally reached the exit. Sora feels this and giggles slightly, as she briefly considers leaving you trapped in there a little longer just to mess with you. In the end, though, she heads up to the bathroom to let you out instead.

You feel yourself squeezed out of the fleshy tube and into free fall, air rushing by as you crash-land in cold water and swim to the surface. Once your eyes are adjusted to the sudden bright, white light inside the massive ceramic toilet bowl, you look up to find Sora trying not to giggle looking down at you, holding a clean-looking toilet brush that she extends down at you. From the cereal bowl to her gullet to the thankfully-empty toilet bowl (you've beaten the rest of her breakfast here). How symmetrical.

"What's so funny?" You ask wearily, as you swim over to grab on to the plastic brush head, and are lifted out of the bowl. "Poopie" Sora answers and giggles, setting you gently down in the sink which you see she's already had filled with warm, soapy water. "What?"

"You!" Sora points at you and laughs out loud, as you methodically work on scrubbing yourself clean. Whatever. She leans in closer. "You went down my throat and in my tummy and then out the other end, you're my poopie! Heeheehee..." She keeps laughing until she's red in the face, then stops to ask: "So how's it feel to be my poop?"

"Just great."

"Really?"

"No."

"Oh" Sora makes a face at you and sticks her tongue out in defiance, but just as quickly grins again. "Bummer." She laughs at you some more.

The rest of the day goes by more peacefully. After hearing the girl's murmurs while inside her gut, you realized that she was mostly struggling with stuff that you could help her with, so you spend some time going through her homework with her and patiently explaining the material. She turns out to be fairly quick on the uptake, though the electronic coursework often didn't explain things very well at all - so it was no wonder she'd been having some difficulty with it.

Having finished all of her lecture material for the day, you next spent some time watching TV together, with you perched on her shoulder. Her parents had set up pretty strict family controls, though, so that got boring rather quickly.

You next killed some time by helping Sora lacquer all her nails. Not exactly something you liked or had a lot of experience with, but hey, it was something to do. As a 'reward', she then insisted on setting up a tea party for the two of you, with some doll furniture. You thought she was a little old for this kind of thing at first, and it turned out you were right. The whole thing was just a setup to have you sit on Barbie's lap at the table, which she found highly amusing and you, of course, found highly uncomfortable.

Never mind Barbie being twice your size and made of hard plastic; you hadn't seen a grown woman in months, and so feeling her thighs underneath you and her rigid boobs on either side of your head made you feel anxious and uncomfortable about wearing nothing but swim trunks at the moment, regardless how cold and hard they were. Just when you're starting to panic and wonder how you could play off hiding your waist under the table, Sora puts her teacup down and perks up a bit.

"Hey, Stevie. I just thought of a game we could play. Wait here a sec!" She says, then jumps up and skips out of the room.

A few minutes later, she bursts back in wearing...
12222222211312222.title: Full Circle

choices: Explore Sora. No other reason that getting home. Yep. Absolutely.
122222222113122221.content:
She giggled as she looked at you sitting on Barbie. Holding up the toy boat with a grin.
"I think "Gulliver" can have a lil adventure don'cha think?" She giggles, picking you up. You were less interested in the boat and more interested in the attire she was wearing.

The red and white plaid Top covered her small mounds and the skirt covering the bathing suit bottom a fair amount, though from your first view from below her you'd had to shift a bit and quickly adjust your crotch.

"Stop it Steve. She's just a kid! Just a kid... In a bathing suit." You thought to yourself as you were set on the boat.

"So, Gulliver versus the kraken? I mean I can hold my breath a fair bit but... This seems kinda dangerous." You said voicing your concern.

"Nonsense! I'll be really careful." She grinned back as she headed into the bathroom, dropping the boat gently into the tub.

Okay you couldn't be mad at that cute face. Though you also couldn't deal with the whole... View.

Sora grinning as she slid into the tub with ease, your tiny boat above her thighs as she giggled.

"So I was thinking... We could play Stevie fights the kraken..." She said, wiggling her fingers towards you. "And if I win I get to, well, eats you up again!"

You sighed, "You really love that don't you."

Sora grinned a bit, "Well it's fun having you inside me."

You couldn't help but blush, as did she after a while. "N-not like that! Gross!" She huffed.

"Hey you said it not me!" You chuckled. "If I win... You make me a nice bed and take me back to my place. Agreed?"

Sora huffed and pouted. "Maybe. Let's up it. If I win, I can eats ya, and then put you in my socks all of tomorrow." She smirked.

Ugh, eaten AND underfoot? Well... It was fair.

"Deal. So you mentioned one other idea..."

Sora blushed, "We-well... " She looked away, blushing a bit, "Explore the skin colored island?" She shifted a bit and grinned.

Oh. Well... Both could end badly.

"And ho-how do I win that?" You blush a bit, looking her over.

Sora simply grinned.

"You have to plant a 'flag' in my hair." She giggled, pointing at her head.

After thinking it over you decided...
122222222113122221.title: Gulliver's Ocean Adventure

choices: "Alright, let's play then I guess." (You lose.)
"I don't want to get swallowed again already. We can just do the sock thing."
1222222221131222211.content:
I'm an idiot, you think, scrambling desperately to escape Sora's maw while voluminous laughter booms around you. You'd chosen to 'fight the kraken' without even thinking about it, immediately taking a hard pass on 'exploring' a preteen kid. It took like half a second to realize that you'd never come up with a way to 'win'. You'd gotten as far as shouting that krakens didn't have hands, before she'd capsized your little boat by lifting her knee. Then she leaned in and opened wide, and sent you swirling past her lips along with a flood of bathwater. With nothing but the flag in your hand to help you out, you think quickly as the teeth start closing before you, and jam it vertically against the roof of her mouth to try and prop it open so you can climb out.

Unfortunately for you, your devourer is a human girl, not some kind of dumb animal or TV monster. As soon as she feels the flagpole jabbing against her flesh, she simply shifts her tongue beneath you and sweeps it to the side, then bites down with her teeth on either end to hold it in place. Your heart sinks as you feel yourself rising upwards, bathwater spilling out between her teeth and leaving you caged inside as she gets up.

Sora steps out of the tub and admires herself in the bathroom mirror for a moment. Looking through the gap in her teeth, you see your reflection struggling inside her giggling mouth, fighting to pull yourself forward on the flag while the slobbery tongue shoves back against you. "No fair!" You shout at the mirror, desperately hoping she listens. "Do-over!"

Nope. The last thing you see is Sora flashing a proud smile at you before the lips close together, sealing you in darkness.

You'd hoped for a while that she would be more sporting, agree to make it fairer when the game was so quick and easy for her. Instead, there's a loud slurping noise, and your ears pop from sudden depressurization as she sucks you down to her waiting gullet. You cling to the flag with all your might, with a roar of determination, before you find yourself submerged in saliva and end up choking on it. Your hands are torn from the slippery pole with ease, and as you slide back along the young girl's tongue, she once again tilts back her head and-

*GULP*

The tongue rises up and shoves you back, as Sora's throat opens up and swallows your legs up to the waist. She looks down and opens her mouth to let the flagpole fall to the floor. You catch a brief glimpse, in the mirror, of your upper half disappearing down her gullet as she gulps at you again.

*GULP*

One final push on your head sends you down the tight, slippery tube to Sora's guts once again, ending your day basically the same way you started it.

Finally resigning yourself to spending the night in the young girl's insides, you give up and try to streamline yourself as much as possible, resulting in a swift and uneventful return to her now-familiar stomach cavity. Unlike earlier, now Sora's belly is empty apart from a little pool of stomach acid. Even though she's laughing and bouncing up and down on her heels at your instantaneous defeat, you have little trouble fumbling your way over to the pyloric sphincter and trying to push your way through. Since there was no food and water down here to dilute it, the acid would be much stronger than before, and you weren't exactly keen on losing your shorts down here already.

However, due to the relative emptiness of the stomach, the valve is shut tight for now and isn't quite letting you through...

"Hah! That was so easy this time! Easy Stevie!" Sora mocks, feeling you struggle. Despite your best efforts, you're unable to get much more than your arm through to her intestines at the moment. Although Sora doesn't know that.

"Hey, know what? Hang out in my tummy for a bit if y'want some of my dinner, okay? Just keep moving around until then so I know you're still in there, and I'll make sure to sit extra-still so y'can catch some before it hits the ground! I'll try not to chew it too much either, promise!"

With another cute giggle, she then sets about toweling off and changing for bed while you think it over. Obviously, she just thought it'd be funny to make you wait around to eat her chewed-up food for supper, and made a good excuse to keep you moving around in her stomach like she wanted apparently. On the other hand, you hadn't eaten since breakfast and you weren't going anywhere until she ate anyway. You've eaten worse...

Once things settle down enough for you to manage, you quickly strip yourself of your shorts and shove them past the tight valve and into her intestines. Once it opened up a little, you'd go after them, but in the meantime at least they wouldn't dissolve. For the next couple of minutes, you shift yourself around various ways in the tight enclosure, until you hear a brief chewing noise from above and then she calls:

"Here it comes, Stevie! Ahhh!" *GULP*"

A slimy ball of spit and canned tuna, and she had totally been lying about not chewing it too much.

"It's what the kraken eats mostly, when there aren't any little travelers around!"

...arguably still less disgusting than flies and roaches. You try to find less-slimy handfuls of the stuff to eat, without much success, and eat it anyway. To be honest, it still tastes pretty much like what you remember. Canned tuna is canned tuna, apparently. You feel like this doesn't surprise you all that much, thinking back on it.

Once she's done with dinner, Sora grabs the stethoscope and goes up to bed and you're finally able to squeeze your way through the exit, worming your way along her insides. You find your shorts soon enough, and grab on to them, but your fleshy prison is too tight for you to reach down and put them on right now; you'll have to wait until you hit the large intestine, eventually.

In the meantime, Sora puts the stethoscope on and you chat for a while as she lays in bed. You learn a little bit about her mothers, the first of which apparently took her to see you once when you were just a kid. Eventually, she goes to sleep and so do you. No sense reaching the exit super early, just to wait half the night to get let out. Besides, the rhythmic breathing all around you, plus the soft, warm, sleeping-bag-like fleshy environment, was making you really sleepy already in any case.

Hours later, you wake up surprisingly well-rested to feel your head bumping against something firm and unyielding. Stirring to, you find that you're thankfully still holding the swim shorts you'd dozed off gripping, and awkwardly shift around until you've managed to put them on. Your new host, from the sound of it, is still sleeping, so you try to push your way out through the exit to her digestive tract yourself. No dice. Eventually, you give up and just doze off again.

Finally, you wake up to a lot of hectic sound and motion, and then the exit scene from yesterday repeats itself again. A sleepy-eyed Sora yawns a good-morning as she fishes you out of the toilet bowl, then takes you to wash off in the sink again.

"Mm. Morning. So listen, Sora..." you begin, as you finish scrubbing yourself off and find her staring at you expectantly. "That whole sock thing from earlier... we don't need to do that, right? I mean, that game wasn't really fair anyway. Besides, it's kinda weird. Let's just do something else..."

"But I wanna!"

"C'mon! Really?"

Sora pouts, then thinks a moment. "Tell ya what," she says, eyes suddenly gleaming. "If you want we can play the cereal game again, and if you win then I don't have to follow your orders all day, but you don't have to hang out in my sock either. Deal!?"

She seems excited at the prospect of potentially eating you again... already. You just got out the other end, for crying out loud. You start to wonder how many more trips through Sora you'll have to take, before the week is through.

Still, the cereal game had some new rules tacked on it now. It should be somewhat fair, at least. And after spending the night and half of yesterday in Sora's insides, you weren't keen on now spending the entire day in her sock.

After thinking it over a moment, you tell her...
1222222221131222211.title: Failing The High Seas

12222222211312222112.content:
"Bring it!" You shout, seizing the chance to get out of your oddly specific penalty for losing last night's game. Strangely enough, (given how much she seemed to like eating you), Sora looks somewhat surprised and even a little disappointed.

She rallies, and tosses her head. "Fine!" She says, indignantly, and then starts musing to herself. "I wonder if I should still put him in my sock until breakfast..."

"Hey, that wasn't part of the deal!" You shout.

Sora goes on as if you hadn't said anything. "Nah... I don't want him to it taste like feet when I'm eating him later!" She jokes and then sticks her tongue out at you, before putting it back in. As an afterthought, she licks her lips and then grins. "Come on, Stevie," she says tauntingly, holding out her hand for you to climb on. "You can ride in my socks when I poop you out again!"

"I'd say something clever, but, meh." You shoot back, stepping onto her palm. "No need."

"Hmph!" Sora adopts a look of indignant indifference as she brusquely carries you down the steps. Once you've got hold of your balance, you do the same.

When Sora grabs you and dumps you into her bowl of cereal, minutes later, you spring into action and show the kid you weren't bluffing. Now that you know what's coming, you're no longer taken by surprise when you're dumped into the bowl, for starters.

You twist during the fall, and hit the water in such a way as to immediately find the bottom of the bowl with your feet as you crashed through it. Letting yourself sink down under the cereal rather than try to soften the landing, you crouch on the bottom of the bowl and then spring into action, launching yourself up and outward. You break surface without a good view of where you're going, as milk and cereal block out your vision once again, but you reach ahead and pull yourself forward mightily with a double-armed stroke anyway. You know she'll be mixing the bowl soon.

Sure enough, a dim flash immediately cuts across your blurred vision, and you feel the current pull you in and aside after it. Too little and too late, though. You find bottom with your feet, as the current pulls you forward and then abates, and you jump forward again. The second pass of the spoon starts building the whirlpool that had dragged you to the center of the bowl every time before, but again, it's too little and too late for her.

One more leap forward, against the now-building current, and you grasp the rim of the bowl with your hands. One more jump and a good pull with it, and you're out of the bowl entirely. You land hard on the table beneath it, clutching a soggy Cheerio in one hand and raising a fist to the sky with the other. "Yess!" You call out, delighting in flawless victory.

You take a moment to wipe soggy cereal from your eyes (again), and the first thing you really see is that a massive shadow falls over you. "Sora, no, I won!" You shout, as massive lips close around you, Sora slurping you off the table along with the cereal you've spilled. "This is cheating! You shout at her now-familiar gaping throat, as you're sucked in towards it. Your hard-won cereal is ripped out of your grasp, and swallowed down without effort in front of you.

To your relief, though, Sora had only been teasing you there. Lifting her head up, she pulls you out of her mouth by the legs, while sucking the cereal off of your body. "Okay, fine!" She pouts, setting you gently down by the cereal bowl again. "You win... this time." She turns her nose up.

"Better luck next time, kiddo" you tell her airily, waving it off. "Now, lemme' get some of that breakfast."

"Hey, be nice!" She protests. Ignoring her, you carry on the act.

"Boy, it sure makes me hunger being an absolute winner all the time. Yup, what can I say. Winning is hard work, am I right? Say, you there. You, girl. Am I right? Wait, are you a winner too, or is it just me here?" You boast, puffing out your chest.

Sora raises her hands with clenched fists, and you feel a tinge of panic as you're reminded of how small you are, and you suddenly fear that you've just gone too far. Even an angry twelve-year-old is a very serious threat to someone like you, after all, which is something you've somewhat forgotten after being out of society for so long.

Instead of doing anything threatening, though, Sora just raises her fists to cover her eyes and face, and then stoops over and asks you in a sad, trembling voice: "Hey S-Steve, c-can I... can I choose the next game we play?"

What? You wonder. She's been fine with poking fun at you all this time, and this is how she takes a joke? Oh, wait. Crap. She had that whole thing with bullying in her past, you realize. Now you feel kind of bad. Wait. But that doesn't mean you're going to let her eat you again, or anything. It's not like all this is your fault.

"Uhh. Only if it's fair." You manage, unsure how else to deal with this. "If we can agree it's fair. Okay?"

"Great!" Just like that, all of Sora's nostalgia disappears, replaced with an open, gleeful, self-satisfied expression. The little actress! "In that case, when I'm done with homework we should play..."
12222222211312222112.title: You win!

choices: Try to sneak through the living room, and onto the stairs!
122222222113122221121.content:
"...we should play cat and mouse!" Sora urges, clearly excited. "You'll be a mousy that's trying to get all the way across the house, and-"

You hold out your hand to stop her, shaking your head firmly and shutting her down hard. "Yeah, no," you answer flatly. "That sounds about as fair as the kraken game last night. Fool me once..."

"But it won't be!" She insists. "Wait, listen! I'm going to go and get something from my room. Promise you'll wait here, and let me explain it when I get back?" Her tone is anxious, pleading. She seems rather excited to try selling you on it. Well, you're pretty sure you already know what this entails.

Still, couldn't hurt to hear her out, you suppose. "Alright," you shrug. "But I'm not promising I'll agree to anything." "Yippee!" She pumps her fist, and jumps up gleefully; as you're momentarily baffled by seeing someone actually and unironically shouting 'yippee' in real life, she hurries out of the room.

After what seems like an eternity of waiting around later, you're back in the cereal bowl casually munching on some of the remaining cheerios when Sora finally skips back in, now dressed in... a white kitty outfit, and holding a small dessert bowl. "I'm baaack, Stevie!" She proudly proclaims, posing in the doorway with the bowl at her hip.

Sora's mothers may not have let her have a lot of friends, but they obviously were much more willing to acquiesce when it came to toys. The cat pajamas she was wearing had a detachable, button-on hood in the back, with a fuzzy pair of white kitty ears sticking out of it. Similarly, a set of cat-paw mittens buttoned on to the end of each sleeve - impractical, but fancy. A detachable fuzzy tail curved behind her, as well.

What probably didn't come with the outfit, was the set of yellow-and-black colored contact lenses she was wearing in place of her usual glasses, or the makeup she'd drawn a little black nose tip and whiskers on herself with. "Cat-eye contact lenses, really?" You ask, dumbfounded. "Not, like, regular ones, so you don't have to wear glasses around all the time?"

"Y'never wore contacts in your eyes before, huh, Stevie?" Sora laughs off the question, like it was a silly thing for you to ask about. "I have regular ones, too, but it's a pain to get them on and off all the time. I'm not gonna put them on just to sit around the house... more importantly, what'cha think!?" She asks you eagerly.

You sigh. "Look, it's pretty cute and all" you answer, standing up to get out of the bowl again, "but I'm still not gonna play any game where you can just pick me up and eat me again."

"But it won't be!" She insists. "Okay, it's like this-" she strides over and sets down the second bowl right in front of you. Inside is a pile of... powdered brown sugar? "I'll put a piece of string cheese up in my bedroom, on the nightstand," she goes on. "And I won't start hunting you until I'm done with homework, in like an hour or so. You have that long to try and hide, or sneak by me - but if I see you while I'm doing homework, I get to chase ya right then!"

You know the living room, where she studies on the computer, is right by the stairs you'd need to take to reach her bedroom. You'd have to be very brave or very crafty - if not both - to try sneaking past her there. "So if I get the cheese, I win, right? But what's to stop you from just guarding it after you're done with homework?" You counter.

Sora begins to smile devilishly, starting to feel like she's winning you over. "If I don't catch you by dinner time, you win! And then you get to order me around all day tomorrow. I still can't promise that I can get you home before my moms get back, though" she adds.

"And if you win..."

"Then the super-cute kitty gets to eat the mischievous little mousy she caught trying to steal things from her room!" She grins wider. "Or maybe she'll play with her food for a bit..." she taunts. "So, you in?"

Thinking it over for a bit, it does seem like you have pretty good odds here. An entire hour to hide? You could get away from an actual cat with that kind of time. Your main worry is that she'll just refuse to eat dinner when she fails to find you, but then, you're willing to bet she'll cave to hunger before you do. "Alright, just one more question" you tell her, nodding toward the bowl of sugar. "If you're leaving cheese out for the objective, then what's that for?"

Sora's been sneaking her hand up behind you while you weren't looking, and by way of answer, she simply snatches you up in it, plucking you from the half-finished bowl of cereal, and tosses you into the pile of sugar.

You yell out loudly as you land atop the sand-like mound - more from surprise than anything, as the powder cushions your fall quite nicely - and struggle to find your feet in the cloud of dust and poor footing that the impact creates. With your body still wet with milk from the cereal bowl, the sugar instantly starts gluing itself to you, as it comes into contact with your shorts and skin. By the time you make it out of the bowl, waving the fog of powder away from your face and bearing the weight of Sora's hysterical laughter, you're covered all over in a fuzzy, brown layer of the stuff too thick for you to easily pick off.

You glare at the highly-entertained little girl in front of you until she chokes down her laughter, and covers her mouth behind her hands - or, rather, paws, since she had slipped the mittens on. "Now you're a cute little brown mousy. You'll be a- teehee! - a nice tasty treat for kitty, when she finds you!" She proclaims, still holding back some laughter.

Despite her clearly comical get-up and mirthful tones, something about that outfit of hers makes this somehow unnerving to hear, deep down, now with those cat-eyes staring you down up close. You sigh, and shake it off. "Very funny, Sora, but please don't throw me around like that just for kicks, okay? I don't like it."

You make to climb back into the cereal bowl to wash the sugar off of you, when Sora snatches it away. "Hold on! It was actually for a reason!" She rushes to clarify. "This way, you'll have to be careful not to leave tracks behind while you're hiding. It'd be too hard for me if you didn't. Sound fair?" She asks, tentative.

Well, you suppose that as much effort as she's put into dressing up for this little game, you can give a little ground here. "Alright, but after you're done with homework, you have to keep the mittens on" you concede, at her pajama paws. "That'll at least make it harder to look through everything."

"Deal!" Like an excited little kid, which you guess she kind of is, she jumps on it right away. "Okay, start now Stevie! I'll go start homework now while I finish my breakfast, so don't worry - I'll be back for dessert real soon!" Throwing out one last jab, she rushes out of the kitchen before you can even throw out a response, leaving you once again stranded on the table alone.

Deciding not to waste any time, you start to scout on each side of the table right away, considering your options.

Within the kitchen itself, the floor is white tile, and fairly clean. Trying to avoid leaving behind too much a trail, of the brown sugar all over you, might take more time than you'd like, but with the potential reward of having lots of extra time to bury yourself among the utensils in the cupboards.

Next, just through the hallway there's the foyer and entertainment room on one side, and the living room on the other. The floors there are all chestnut-colored hardwood, meaning a bit of sugar here and there would be hard for your playful young pursuer to spot. And while the foyer doesn't feature much in the way of hiding places, besides a shoe rack by the door, the entertainment room is a treasure trove of furniture and electronics for you to shelter in.

On the other hand, if you could find a way to sneak past Sora, victory's a short trip up the stairs the other way...

Where do you make your move?
122222222113122221121.title: Cat & Mouse

choices: Making a bunch of fake trails, to throw her off.
Hiding inside the sugar bowl, where she wouldn't expect.
1222222221131222211211.content:
You've had about enough of getting outwitted and eaten by a twelve-year-old. Rather than make the obvious play, and get caught trying to run straight for the objective, you decide that you'll try to pull a fast one on her and stash yourself right in the kitchen cupboards. Knowing your small but durable body can handle the impact, you take a deep breath and leap right off the table, tucking and rolling for a rough but successful landing on the tile floor.

Without wasting any time at all, you come up running and head straight for the kitchen sink, stopping right before the cupboard underneath. It's just low enough that you can reach up and shove it slightly open, at which point you expect you'll be able to pull yourself inside before swings closed again. Turning for one last look at the kitchen behind you, you- oh, no.

Right where you'd landed after jumping off the table, there's a distinct brown smudge where your frosted body had ground fine brown sugar into the tile. Worse, a trail of much lighter but still clearly visible little footprints marked the path that you'd taken to run towards the cabinet.

If you'd just hauled yourself into the cabinet without looking back like you did, you've no doubt Sora would have easily tracked you straight there. And then you would be one quick search away from going straight down her throat on the Sora's Belly Express, for yet another long, hot ride along the scenic route to Toiletsville. But, wherever else you ran would leave a trail there as well...

Frantic with the looming threat of losing yet another game to avoid being a young girl's snack, you initially come up with three possible approaches for getting around this serious problem:

- You could carefully retrace your steps, gather up the bits of sugar marking your footprints closest to the kitchen table, then trace your steps back and hide the stuff under the sink cabinet. Repeated enough times, you'd be left with no trail on the floor to show Sora where you've gone, but the possibility that the small, hard-to-spot pile of sugar tucked away in the corner might give you away regardless. And that's assuming you even were able to finish the whole thing in time.

- You could run back to where you first hit the floor, quickly run back and forth in several other directions to make a bunch of new, false trails, and then pick one of the places you ran to for actually hiding in. In theory, this would mean Sora would have to thoroughly search a whole bunch of places - with her little kitty mittens on, slowing down the process greatly - before she found you. If you were unlucky, though, she might just pick the right path to follow right away.

- You could run back to where you first hit the floor, climb your way up one of the kitchen chairs and then back onto the table from there, and then... go and hide in plain sight, right in the sugar bowl she'd left behind on the table. While she was busy following your tracks from the bowl, to the chair, then to the floor and under the kitchen sink, you'd be right there: buried in sugar, and further camouflaged by the layer of it covering your body. A bold and risky move, but one she surely wouldn't be expecting as she wasted time trying to search for you in all those cabinets...

Considering your options, you figure you've got just about an hour to pull off whatever you decide to go with. There won't be time to change your mind, once you've started.

What do you do?
1222222221131222211211.title: Home Field... Advantage?

choices: Sora goes straight to the kitchen cabinets, where the trail leads.
She decides to look at the tracks more closely, first.
She thought she saw something moving in the bowl, when she first came in...
12222222211312222112113.content:
Here's one way to look at it: No matter what you decided to do at this point, there was at least a chance Sora would pick up on your trail. And when that finally happened, did you want her to follow that trail towards you, or away from you?

That was your thinking, at least, when you decided to go back and start shimmying your way up one of the kitchen chairs. You'd figured it would be a perfectly manageable climb, and while that turned out to be true, you're still having trouble getting it done very quickly. It's just the nature of the problem; your small arms and legs can only reach so far around the chair leg, and the crust of sugar on you counterintuitively does more to hurt your gripping power than help you stick, being completely dry and powdery on the outside. All that said, you can only afford to move upwards a little bit at a time, unable to maintain your grasp on the chair leg if any of your arms or legs let go of it for more than an instant...

Anyway, the second half of the chair is easier, and from there it's a quick hop back onto the table. Turning to survey your handiwork, you note with satisfaction that the trail you've left behind doesn't make it visibly obvious that you'd been climbing up, not down, when you scaled the kitchen chair. But that satisfaction disappears instantly, when you look up and see the clock! You've probably got less than twenty minutes left to finish up here, if you're assuming your soon-to-be huntress takes the whole hour to finish her homework.

You rush to pick up the remains of your old trail from the table, the one you'd made when you first walked to the table edge and jumped off of it to the floor. Scrambling back and forth to gather up the dusty bits of sugar, and go back and dump them in the bowl, you finish just as you start to hear booming footsteps approaching the kitchen from outside!

With a last mad dash, you leap headfirst into the sugar bowl and quickly bury yourself in the sand-like substance, just as Sora walks in pretending to talk to herself in cheerful tones. "Yawnn~ I sure am hungry today. Being a hardworking kitty, who keeps the house safe from intruders is- oh, what's this~?" She says coyly, facing the kitchen table now full of sugar tracks, "did some little mousey come in here and get carried away with our sugar bowl? Nyow, nyow! Guess I'll have to track him downnn~!" She sings out playfully, while you hold your breath and try to keep still as physically possible...

What happens next?
12222222211312222112113.title: Fortune Favors The Bold... Right?

choices: Stay still, and call her bluff. (She's bluffing.)
Stay still, and call her bluff. (She eats you.)
Surrender, to at least avoid getting eaten again. =S
122222222113122221121132.content:
Holding your breath under the pile of sugar, you start feeling increasingly anxious as you hear Sora come slowly tiptoeing towards your location instead of away from it. Not daring to look or move at all, all you can do break out into a cold sweat as you wait for her to go away, with the sweat being instantly soaked up by all the sugar around you...

Panic sets in as you hear her voice booming right over you: "Well, well, well. Mousey had all that time to try and hide somewhere, but he still made himself extra super easy to find! Does Mousey really want to be eaten by cute lil' kitty, hmm? Teehee, just stay still if y'want me to eat ya, Mousey! It's a little hard to get to ya with my these big, soft paws of mine, but don't worry. I'll gobble ya up real soon~!" She says, giggling cutely.

Oh, crap! You think. Seriously? She found you already!? This was supposed to be the smart plan! Damn it!

No, wait. What if she was just trying to trick you into coming out of hiding by having you make a run for it? After all, based on her performance in the 'Kraken' game yesterday, wouldn't she have just eaten you already if she could?

Damn it, you really wanted to win this game for once! It'd be so friggin' cool if for once in your life, you could be the one making a bigger person do whatever you want for the day...

As you're thinking this, Sora giggles some more, and continues: "...or maybe I won't eat the little Mousey after all, hmm~?"

Wait, what!?

"That's right," she says musingly. "Maybe I'll just keep him around and play with him instead. Hey, Mousey, why don't you come on out of there yourself so I don't have to make a mess getting ya, hmm~? If you do that, then I promise not to eat ya'... as long as you do whatever I say! I'm gonna keep you as my little pet mouse and play around with you instead, how does that sound~?" She says in her best coaxing tone, and then giggles some more.

She's bluffing! You think.

...isn't she?

She was standing right over the sugar bowl after all, from the sound of it, instead of following the obvious trail right to the kitchen cupboards.

And it really would be pretty inconvenient for her to try to get you out of the sugar bowl, with those mittens on. Well, you could think of some ways - some more awkward than others - but the easiest one would be just to tip the whole thing over on the table. Though, you suspect she'd rather do something more amusing to her instead, and which involved less cleaning after...

"Ten seconds, Mousey! Better hurry up and make up your mind if ya don't want me t'eat ya~!"

Crap!

"Nine~! Eight~! Seven~!"

What do you do?
122222222113122221121132.title: Called Out

choices: Do as she says. Climb in.
1222222221131222211211323.content:
"Four~!"

"Three~!"

"Two~!"

"Okay!" You shout, jumping up and out of the pile of sugar burying you. Now opening your eyes for the first time since hiding in the bowl, you see Sora standing right over the table in front of you. For the briefest of moments, you could almost swear you saw her looking in the other direction, at the cupboards, and then she's staring right down at you.

"Purrrfect~" she grins, leaning down over the table and stretching her makeshift paws out to either side of you. You gulp and hesitate for a moment, then start reluctantly climbing out of the bowl. The brown crystals plating you all over were thicker than ever now, thanks to all the sweat they soaked up while you hid. You're sure even the heaviest set of platemail armor couldn't feel more awkward to move in than this, as you clumsily drop down to the table surface.

So much for running. Still... "A deal's a deal!" You call out, standing up tall (for you, anyway) in front of her and trying to sound confident. "And now you don't get to eat me, no takebacks."

Smiling, Sora leans down far enough to rest her chin on the table in front of you, while bringing her outstretched arms together to basically fence you in on either side. "So you wanna be my new pet mousey, huh? Don't worry, I'm not gonna break my promise or anything... as long as you do everything I say! Now, why don't you come on over here so kitty can have a better look at you~"

Gulping, you start to wonder if you'd made the right call after all as Sora's self-satisfied looking smile grew into a mischievous, almost wicked-looking grin. At first, you'd figured 'doing whatever she said' basically meant stuff like yesterday, humoring her with joke tea parties and stuff. Now, you start to reconsider. Didn't she want to have you spend the day in her sock earlier...!?

On the basis that you tentatively expected that whatever (no doubt embarrassing) games she had in mind for this whole bit, it would be preferable to riding out the day in her bowels yet again (if for no other reason than sheer novelty value, at least), you approach to within a few feet of Sora's face while trying not to look too nervous about it.

"CLOSER."

At this range, her voice booms tangibly as warm, minty air blows over you. In the corner of your eyes, you notice her arms begin slowly closing in, essentially corralling you in towards her head. You step forward anxiously, expecting some kind of trick. Like as not she'd suddenly try to bite you or something, then claim that fighting back gave her the right to swallow you after all...

Well, you wouldn't be taken in that easily. You stand practically right under her black-tipped nose, close enough to feel the wind from every breath she takes. Readying yourself for any surprises, you also consider that if you were going to run, there was a chance - just a chance, mind you - that you could make it by dashing forward right by her chin, under her armpit and right off the table. Where you'd go from there, you didn't really know, but at least it was something.

"Teehee!" With another bit of a giggle, Sora sticks the tip of her tongue out and pokes your chest with it before drawing it back, as if it's the most natural thing in the world. You stumble forward slightly as the wet muscle sticks to your sugary skin, yanking you forward a bit before pulling clear as it goes back into her mouth.

"Mmm, tasty~" Sora makes a show of savoring the dab of sugar on her tongue, swirling it around and smacking her lips in front of you. Then...

"Alright, mousey, climb on in~!" Just like that, she opens wide and sticks her tongue out, forming a ramp for you to presumably climb into the humid, glistening cave with. Greeted with the now-familiar sight of Sora's watering mouth eagerly anticipating your presence, and the unfamiliar demand that you crawl into it yourself, you have to start to wonder how far you can really trust this kid...

You take a deep breath. "Okay!" You call out. "But-!"

"No 'buts'!" She cuts you off right away, tongue disappearing back into her mouth with a flash as she answers you. "Or you'll end up coming out of MY butt, later! And I might make you wait a while before I let you out of there, too, for being bad and breaking the deal!" She says this teasingly, but you somehow get the feeling that doesn't mean she won't go through with it...

"Now come on, get in there - AHHHHHHHH!" Blasting you with hot air, Sora reminds you to get a move on as she opens up and sticks her tongue out again.

Although she'd promised not to eat you if you did as she said, realistically, when has she had you in her jaws and ever not ended up swallowing you?

Maybe you should just make a run for it...
1222222221131222211211323.title: Compromised

choices: The sugar bowl; she's not done using you as a candy yet.
One of her socks; she wants you inside while she's wearing it.
The television; she wants you to wait on her while she's watching it.
12222222211312222112113231.content:
"F-f-fine..." You concede, forcing yourself to step forward slowly onto the quivering pink monster in front of you. As you feel your foot sink into the slimy surface with an audible squelch, its owner gives a slight contented sigh, the hot air blasting you and forcing you to brace yourself against it. She's just messing around. She's just messing around. She's just messing around. You tell yourself repeatedly, ducking down and making to crawl along the slippery organ on all fours. Just play along, don't give her any excuse to eat you. That's probably what she wants...

As much as she may be habitually eager to swallow you again, you're pretty sure she won't go back on a deal to do so. If she did, then why would you even agree to keep playing with her afterwards?

What was she going to do, keep you prisoner and try to force you into it?

...actually, it wouldn't be the first time. But you're pretty sure Sora isn't the type to do that kind of thing.

It's just hard to keep reminding yourself of that, while you're being coerced into climbing inside her rapidly-watering mouth while covered in sugar.

Speaking of which, you immediately run into a problem: The outer layers of the thick, solid crystalline plating on your knees and hands had swiftly become half-dissolved into a thick, sticky syrup almost immediately, on contact with the slick, saliva-coated tongue. Without even reaching as far as her gaping teeth, you've become quite stuck.

"Ummm..."

You hesitantly start to call out, thinking to explain to your self-proclaimed 'kitty' captress why you aren't continuing forward - but she felt your feeble attempts to detach your limbs from the surface of her tongue. With no warning besides a slight chuckle she suddenly withdrew her tongue - and you - into her mouth!

One moment, you're on your hands and knees and staring right into a mass of lips and teeth. Next moment, you're jerked forward violently into darkness, and hear the teeth snap shut behind you as you're pressed on all sides by warm saliva and undulating flesh.


"Mmmmm~..."

The fleshy walls reverberate around you as Sora's tongue presses you against the roof of her mouth, easily tearing free your stuck hands and knees as you're splayed out flat along its surface. Keeping the pressure on you to hold your body in place, she starts to slide the drooling organ along the front side of your body, back and forth, licking and sucking the sugary coating away as it dissolves in ever-replenishing pools of saliva.

Now, you wouldn't care to admit it, but the fact is that this would normally feel... pretty good. Dangerously good, even. A soft, warm, full-body massage of sorts...

But right now, you're basically covered in a bunch of impromptu hard candy. Meaning, you can't really feel a lot of the sensation from the tissue contacting it. You can, however, feel bits of it crack and break up, and get pushed around in various ways that pull painfully on various patches of your body hair.

It's incredibly unpleasant, even downright painful at times.

That said, soon the layer of sugar left remaining on you has thinned to the point, where even the sticky inner layer right over your skin has soaked in enough saliva to turn it from hard, dry solid, to a thick, syrupy, rapidly-thinning muddy liquid instead.

*GULP*

For once, Sora holds you in place for a moment while she gathers all the sugary saliva from your surroundings, and swallows it down without you. Finally, she opens her mouth up wide all of a sudden...

At first, you remain stuck to the roof of her mouth by your syrup-covered back for a moment, before coming free with a loud sucking sound to land with a splat upon the surface of her tongue. Squinting in the sudden bright light, you prop yourself up to look out and see-

*Click!*

With a bright flash, you get a good look at yourself, still covered in globs of sticky brown goop, lying on Sora's tongue and shielding your eyes as she holds a digital camera in front of the bathroom mirror, showing herself off kitty-cat whiskers and all, and takes a selfie.

"Hey!" You start to protest.

By way of answer, she flicks her tongue to the side and crams your entire body into one of her cheeks, balling you up tight as she forces you into the tight enclosure...

"'ow do a pose like 'ou're twying 'oo ge' out'!" She booms, careful not to move her molars around too much as you fight to hold yourself away from them. Then she maneuvers you back onto the center of her tongue, turning you around so that you face the front of her mouth, and opening wide again.

Do a pose like you're trying to get out, you think she said?

So she could take a picture of it?

Damn it. She was really determined to get her mileage out of this 'do whatever she says' thing, huh?

Sora gleefully goes through a whole photoshoot in her kitty costume get-up, prominently featuring you as her hapless prey of course. You in her mouth with her cheeks puffed up and your head sticking out between her lips; you dangling out of her mouth with your ankle between her teeth; you with your torso sticking out of her mouth, in various stages of being slurped up like a thick, wet noodle.

When she's finally done, only the slightest traces of sticky sweetener are still left soaked into the fabric of your shorts, the rest having long since washed off as you were constantly being bathed in saliva, wiped clean, and bathed in saliva some more.

And yet, if anything, that simply seems to encourage her to treat you even more like a piece of candy than she had before. After putting up the camera and lapping you back up into her mouth again, Sora starts humming cheerfully to herself as she goes about doing some housecleaning, moving you around constantly and licking and sucking at your tired body as she does so.

On top of her tongue, against the side of her tongue, front of her cheeks, back of her cheeks, from side to side, under her tongue in a pool of spit... it's all you can do to keep yourself oriented as you get slid and shoved and tossed and turned in every which direction. You lose track of how many times you tried to open your mouth to breathe - only to have to spit out an entire mouthful of saliva that splashed over you, instead.

Also, Sora's cheerful humming is really, really good. Even though it's loud enough that you feel your bones rattling inside you every time it picks up, it still sounds kinda cute somehow. This kid can really carry a tune! Although that makes this whole thing worse somehow, you think, as she forces your head down into the slimy underside of her tongue again...

Finally, what seems like hours later - but in actuality was really more like just thirty minutes, - Sora opens her mouth again in front of what looks like...
12222222211312222112113231.title: Candy for Kitty

122222222113122221121132313.content:
When Sora finally opens her mouth, and spits you into one of her heavily-padded mittens, you look around to see she's holding you while lying on the couch in the entertainment room. On her belly is a bag of grapes, halfway empty, along with the TV remote. "Hey, mousey! Did you enjoy your cleaning~?" She teases at you as you look around, squinting your eyes and breathing heavily. "If you're good, we can do it again later~."

"No, thanks" you answer automatically.

"Just kidding... I'm gonna do it later whether you're good or not~." She answers teasingly, and then moves to set you down on her tummy, next to the grapes and the remote. "In the meantime, can you help kitty out with some stuff here? Kitty's paws can't use the remote very well 'cause they're so big and soft, and they're not very good for picking up food either. Except for naughty little mouseys," she jokes, letting you jump off the mitten onto her and then patting you lightly on the head with it.

"Alright, alright, I got it," you sigh.

After working the remote for her and setting it to her desired channel, she has you start grabbing grapes from out of the bag and carrying them up to her mouth, and then depositing them inside. It's quite the workout for you to make the trip repeatedly, carrying an object larger than your head over the pajama-covered terrain as it shifts with her breathing, but all things considered it's kind of a fun challenge. Sora doesn't seem to be in any kind of a rush to eat the grapes, being perfectly content to have you bring her just one every few minutes or so.

About halfway through the bag, you think you start to notice something off about the way she's eating the grapes, as you dump one into her waiting mouth and then turn away to trek back down to her tummy. Turning back, you see her playing around with the grape in her mouth; moving it around with her tongue, swishing it in her cheeks; everything but chewing it. Seeing you stop and stare, she looks you right in the eye as she starts to slowly, deliberately move it back towards her throat and...

Gulp.

Swallowing the grape down with apparent ease, Sora then sighs aloud with exaggerated satisfaction, opening her mouth wide in the process and giving you a clear view of the now-grapeless cavern. "Sure you don't wanna be my snack too, lil' mousey?" She teases, as you suddenly realize you'd been staring.

"N-no, definitely not. I hate that." You stammer, flushing red as you turn to walk away.

In front of you, Sora brings a mittened hand up to rub lightly along her flat belly. "Aww, don't say that. I bet you'd feel right at home in there~..." She giggles, causing you to lose your footing and fall flat right in front of her cotton 'paw'. Laughing a little more, she takes and pushes you gently down into her belly with it, sliding you back and forth over the surface of the pajama tops a couple of times before she lets go, and goes back to watching the TV while waiting for you to bring more grapes.

After you've fed her all the grapes, next, she decides it's time for...?
122222222113122221121132313.title: A Little Help

choices: Fuck it, run for the bed.
What the hell, try the nightstand.
1222222221131222211211323133.content:
After you're finally done feeding her all the grapes, Sora decides it's time for another game. Telling you to hop back onto her open paw, she then carries you up the stairs again.

While she jaunts up to her room rather quickly, she takes just enough care holding you to keep you more or less steady, which you appreciate. However, you start feeling more apprehensive after she shuts the door behind her, and then holds her hand out and smirks down at you, posing with her other hand on her hip.

"Alright, mousey," she says, putting on a whimsical sort of air. "I think our last game was kind of too easy for me again, so I wanna see if you can do better at a lightning round. You try to survive in my room for ten minutes without getting caught, and I'm gonna chase ya around an' try to catch ya. And if I win, I get to-"

"Yeah, yeah. I think I can guess," you interrupt wearily. Although you obviously don't have the volume to talk over her or anything, she's considerate enough to at least stop talking when it looks like you're about to say something. When she's paying attention enough to notice, that is. "Anyway, no deal. Rather not get eaten again today, thanks."

Sora looks indignant at your response. "Hmph! Well, you have to do what I say or I get to eat you anyway, remember?" She counters.

"Well, if you're going to give me some impossible task just as an excuse to eat me anyway, even though we had a deal, you might as well just be breaking your word." You answer, taking up a calm, patient tone. "Come on, Sora. You know I can't stop you, but does that really make it okay for you to force me into doing whatever you want?"

Sora's face softens at your gentle reprisal. "I wasn't trying to be all mean about it" she mutters, shifting her feet under her. "I was gonna give you a handicap to make it fair..."

You sigh. "And that handicap was?"

"Actually... I was gonna let you choose. It'd be okay if it was something really hard, I don't mind losing once in a while too, you know..."

"Hmph." You cross your arms, not entirely believing her. "And if I'd said, let's say, that you can't use your hands, for example?" You ask rhetorically, not expecting an answer.

"Okay." She readily agrees, taking you by surprise.

"W-wha?" You stop and rally, and then remember who you're talking to. "All right, so what if I said no hands or mouth?" You amend, trying to get her to admit your point.

"Sure, that's fine too. And I'll have t' catch ya three times for it to count, too, how's that?" She says nonchalantly.

"Gah!" You grunt with frustration, feeling the conversation slipping out of your control. You'd been trying to make the point that she wasn't giving enough consideration to your point of view, but she just agreed to some totally game-breaking terms like it was no big deal... did she really not care if she lost the game at all?

Wait, no.... there was something else she wanted to try doing with you as well, right? You realize you'd been overlooking something.

"All right, fine." You conclude with confidence, with the kind of tone most often used for saying things like: 'checkmate': "And if I said all of that, and also no using your feet to pin me, either?" You fold your arms expectantly, looking triumphant.

"?"

Instead of looking frustrated or beaten, Sora just raises an eyebrow at you quizzically. "Well, that seems like kind of a lot, but if that's what you want... I'll just rearrange some stuff real quick first, okay?"

You're rendered speechless as she accepts your - seemingly impossible - terms, without complaint, and immediately sets you down on the carpet. Walking calmly over to the nightstand, she clumsily goes back and forth between it and the closet, arranging some sets of shoes and slippers around it to form a barricade so you can't crawl underneath. "Okay, start!" She calls out cheerfully, turning around to face you where you've been standing, remaining immobile in the middle of the floor.

You suddenly realize that you've gotten yourself into yet another high-stakes game, as the towering form of the girl in cat pajamas started merrily skipping towards you, but...

"...hm?"

Sora stops in front of you confused, and cocks her head down. "Say, why aren't you running?" She asks you, quizzically.

"Why bother?" You answer with a shrug, and start casually walking off in the direction of the nightstand. While she was holding you earlier, you'd managed to get a look at the plate of string cheese sitting on top of it from earlier. An oversight on her part, leaving that up there - technically, you could still grab it, and then you'd win the game from earlier. "You can't catch me anyway. No hands, no feet, no mouth..."

Ten minutes to grab the cheese? Yeah, this would be easy.

Turning your back on Sora, with an exaggerated shrug, you start to muse to yourself aloud as you walk away. "In other words, no way for me to lose. I wonder if this is what being the kraken must have felt..."

You trail off as an enormous shadow suddenly falls over you. Looking up, you have just enough time to see a huge, white, fuzzy tail fly overhead, and then-

WHAM!

Sora laughs as she sits down on top of you, taking you by surprise and crushing you into the carpet underneath her. "You were saying~?" She mocks you, after rocking back and forth on her buttocks a couple of times to rub it in, and then lifting slightly off you so you could hear. "Not even a whole minute in, and I got you once already - you're the one who's easy, Stevie!"

Though still pinned to the ground beneath her, trapped between the carpet and her pajama bottoms, the pressure eases up enough for you to recover your breath and shout: "Hey, get off of me! D-don't be weird!"

"Weird? Psh!" Sora scoffs, and bounces lightly up and down on top of you a couple of times, before letting up and sitting forward on her ankles. "You're the one being weird, I didn't make the rules. And besides," she looks back over her shoulder at you, as you slowly get up and catch your breath. "For someone who doesn't wanna be sat on again, you sure are being awfully slow..."

Taking the hint, you break out into a sprint, and then suddenly change direction a moment later, as Sora's massive pajama-covered rump flies overhead to come crashing down in front of you. A second later, you change direction again, and again Sora goes flying by.

You keep up this routine, running and dodging again and again, stealing glances at the clock hanging over the door when you're able. After a couple of minutes, the constant sprinting and turning is starting to tire you out, but then, the same can be said for Sora and all her jumping. Still, you know that she can afford to start slowing down a lot more than you can.

"Oof! Dang it! You're, huff, faster than you, huff, look, huh? But you can't run forever! Hngh!" Sora comes crashing down in front of you again, panting, cheeks flushed and sweaty.

With that in mind, you start working towards an end goal: while you keep trying to dodge around more or less unpredictably around the room, you start to alter your course so that ever so slowly, you work your way closer to the bed. If you can just get to cover underneath-

WHAM!

"Gotcha!" Sora huffs and sits in place for a moment, wiping sweat from her brow with a mittened hand. At this rate, her painted-on nose and whiskers would be running off soon. She was really starting to regret doing this kind of exercise in such a stuffy outfit; at least the mouse didn't have to wear a whole bunch of fuzzy clothes. Speaking of the mousey, she feels your diminutive form through her pajama bottoms as your struggling picks up.

"Yeah, yeah," she groans, looking at the clock. Just about four minutes left. Much as she'd like to take a breather, the longer she sits to rest, the less time she'd have to catch you later...

You hear Sora start talking at you as she gets up, letting you out from under her again. "I don't know why you're in such a hurry to get away from my butt... you know you're gonna end up coming out of it again later." She says, before tiredly shaking it at you, the silly fake tail attached to it flopping comically as she does so.

Instead of answering, you save your breath and take off running for the nightstand, before making a hard right and dashing straight for the bed as you hear the telltale sound of cloth rustling as Sora makes another jump. One more stretch, and maybe-

Thoom!

With a crash, Sora lands right between you and the bed, leaning back on her hands and looking down at you. "Yeah, I thought that's where you were going," she tells you, still evidently quite short on breath. "You wanna try that again?"

So saying, she lifts herself off the ground on her hands and feet, crab-walking back and forth in front of you.

...

If you run for the bed, you risk having to pass right under her, and getting caught going through.

If you run the other way, you'll be back out in the open, and it's purely a contest of endurance from there; tired though she is, you're not sure you can outlast her that way.

On the other hand, you could run straight for the nightstand. But even with the element of surprise, you'd be out in the open while you were climbing it - was that really a safe option, here?
1222222221131222211211323133.title: Cat & Mouse: Rd 2

12222222211312222112113231333.content:
What the hell, you think. Maybe it's because you're tired, maybe it's because this is probably your last, best chance at winning back the cat and mouse game. Maybe you just don't want to be sat on anymore. Either way, you turn and sprint over to the nightstand, vaulting off of one of the slipper-boots lined up around it to grab the banister and climb.

Gripping around the corner of the piece with your limbs on, you start to scale it with remarkable speed, making it almost halfway up before Sora even has time to let out a surprised gasp. And then...

You're barely about two-thirds of the way up to the top when Sora's face appears above you, blocking out the light, following a series of rapid thumps behind. "Hey, you're pretty fast at that, huh, mousey?" She comments, looking slightly impressed at your progress as she shuffles closer in on her knees, straddling the corner of the nightstand with her thighs. "And where did ya think you were gonna go from here? I could just sit down on you when you get to the top, y'know..."

As she says this, you look down to see her pushing the slipper you'd jumped off from slightly over to the side, so that now the open leg of the fuzzy boot sits right below you. If you lose your grip or let go here, you'll land right inside the heel section of the slipper, and then it'd be trivial for Sora to trap you from there. Meanwhile, she's already set up and waiting to pin you if you climb up to the top.

Come to think of it, she wouldn't exactly have trouble pinning you in place right where you are now, either.

...why did you think this plan would work, again?

There is one thing that could provide a possible escape for you, however. In moving the boot, Sora created a tiny gap in the wall of footwear that used to block off the nightstand's underside entirely. If you jump to the side, and hit the slipper close enough to the toe end... you might, just maybe, be able to recover and dash under the crack before she gets you.

But, there's a catch. One of the nightstand's drawers is slightly open, below you; just enough that you can make out what looks like rolls of socks through the crack. Here's the problem: If you jump aside too far, you'll either hit the drawer, or fall inside. If you don't jump far enough, you'll fall into the boot instead...

"Well, what now mousey?"

As you're thinking this over, Sora starts taunting you, teasingly, from above. "Kitty's got you right where she wants ya. I mean, she will soon *teehee*. Which means you're going on a nice trip down to my tummy where you belong, huh?" She jokes, sitting up and rubbing her belly right behind you.

You start climbing again, rather than answer, and she purrs. "Mmm.... bet you'll feel right at home in there, right? All safe and warm and cozy with all the rest of kitty's treats. The perfect place for little mouseys~..." She sits back a bit, and you lose sight of her head as she leans down in behind you.

"Why don't you just give up running and hop on in? If ya do, I promise I'll make it quick. I'll even let you pick which way you go down... head or feet first~. Isn't that nice? Here, Ahhhhh..."

The hot, damp air washes over you from behind, as Sora opens her mouth up wide, once again, inviting you to jump inside it. Though her booming voice is close enough that you can feel the vibrations running through your chest, you do your best to ignore it, and move to keep climbing... and then, without warning, your hand slips.

The condensation! You realize, hugging tight to the corner of the nightstand with your arms and legs, and watching the wooden surface fog up around you from Sora's breath. At the same time, she notices it too, and giggles.

"Ahhhhhhh!"

Sora keeps breathing on you steadily, watching beads of liquid slowly form up, threatening to drop down onto your clinging figure as they swell in size. It seems like she's caught up in a new game of her own, you realize. In fact, she may have completely forgotten about the timer, now that she's focused on trying to knock you off the nightstand with her breath.

You're not sure where it sits right now yourself, but if you can stall for another minute or two by holding on, maybe you'll end up winning by default before she realizes it?

On the other hand, now that climbing any more has become completely out of the question, maybe you should work up the nerve to go for that jump to the floor. The longer you wait, the more tired out you become, and the less chance you'll have of making the jump properly...

Hell, maybe you should just give up and get it over with. The way she'd said she would 'make it quick' if you did, seemed to imply that she'd mess around first otherwise. Kitty playing with her food, she'd probably call it.

If you're going to end up with her eating you either way, you'd at least rather it be in time to beat her breakfast to the other side... preferably by a comfortable margin.

Right?
12222222211312222112113231333.title: Icarus

choices: Try to calm her down, first
122222222113122221121132313333.content:
"Here, I'll make it nice and easy for you~", Sora says as lowers her head and leans in. You look down to see her looking up at you. She extends her tongue out until it slides into the nightstand, its shape slightly contouring around the corner.

You watch for a second a second until you feel the beads of condensation finally reaching you. Scrambling to keep your grip, your body loses traction and you slide down until your bottom lands against something warm and squishy. Sora giggles as she slides her tongue slowly around your underside, the tip snaking up around your legs slightly. "Mmmm~ There's my little mousey. Now just let go and let this kitty have her treat~"

You turn to look for the crack that would have been your safety, but can't even see it through Sora at this point. You have to face facts, and that is that this girl has you completely under her control. It could be worse, you tell yourself as you reach out a hand and rest it on her nose. "Just... be gentle, okay?", you tell her before letting your other arm go and falling backwards onto the slimy pink muscle.

"Awwwwww!" Sora sighs. Her hot breath washes over your body as she coos. Suddenly, you see her fingers pinch your sides and she yanks you out off her tongue. She wraps both of her hands around you and pulls you close to her chest, hugging you as best she can given your size. "You're so sweet! I'll never hurt you, you're the best pet ever~!"

The delicate but firm grip of her warm, slender fingers around you mixed with the soft fabric of her pajamas leaves you feeling smitten... though, there was something about her comment that left a sour taste in your mouth. What was all that 'pet' business? You're about to bring it up until she suddenly pulls you away from her chest.

Sora lifts you back up to her face, her bright smile beaming at you as she points to her lips. "Okay, which way do you want to go? Head first or feet first?" The thought of choosing your way down her throat makes you feel uneasy. It was never something you wanted to do, and when it happened it wasn't like you were ever given a say in the matter.

"Uh... Feet... First?", you say with some uncertainty. If you went down feet first, at least you could control your landing in the stomach a bit better.

"And you're surrrre you want it to be quick? I could go get some dip super quick~" She winks as she sticks her tongue out of her mouth and drags it across her lips. You swallow hard as you watch. "N...no thank you", you stammer. She pouts a little but accepts your answer. "Okie dokie! Nyaaaaaah~!"

As she pulls you towards her opening mouth, light floods in to reveal the slick, pink interior. Strands of saliva stretch from her tongue to the roof of her mouth as it opens, and a glob of spit drips off her tongue as it slides out to recieve you. 'Jeesh', you think, she must really want you in there...

You wince as you're carefully pushed headfirst onto her tongue. Sora closes her lips arond your waist and gently pushes on your butt with two fingers to get the rest of your body inside.
