She heads further into the town with you
12522.content:
Okay, recap. You’ve woken up from a booze related coma to find yourself in Mexico, with a hot Senorita, who’s eyeing you like a piece of candy. You have no idea how you got here and how to get home, and if that isn’t bad enough, you speak as much Mexican as you do klingon.

“I am soooooo fucked,” you groan to yourself as the mysterious foreign woman whose cleavage you woke up in looks at you curiously. Holding your face in your hands, you try to figure out what to do first. It’s obvious that if you’re ever going to get back to your home, you’re going to need help. Getting from your front door to the sidewalk can be dangerous at time, but a trip from Mexico back into the United Sates was going to be near impossible. You might as well be on Mars because getting home was going to be just as difficult as getting back from the red planet.

“¿Es usted pequeño hombre aceptable?” You look up at your host, who has brought you closer to her face. As you look at her, you can’t help but feel slightly better hat you have such a beautiful woman to keep you company. You don’t know how you met, or even how you ended up between her knockers. All you know is she’s here and she’s your only hope of getting back home. First things first, getting past the language barrier.

“What is your name!” You shout at her, falling back on the old American stereotype that if you scream it loud enough, they’ll understand what you’re saying. The girl tilts her head slightly and stares at you. She probably thinks that you speaking some kind of tiny person language that only people your size know.

“¿Qué?” Sighing, you go back to the drawing board. She doesn’t know what you’re saying and even if you crawl into her ear and scream it directly into her eardrum, she still wont get it. You need to use the oldest form of communication that was used when your ancestors first came to America. You need to use charades.

“Do you…” stopping, you point towards the Senorita’s pretty face, then continue. “…. Know…” Thrusting your finger at her skull. “…How I….” Know you point at yourself. “…Got between your big, exquisite tits.” You point at her chest this time. You use crude language because she doesn’t know what your saying. You can tell her that you want to hump her nipple and she’d just smile at you with that distant look in her eyes.

The Senorita’s eyes light up, as though she can finally understand you. Her lips start moving, but you ignore that and focus on her hands. She points to the ground first, then you, probably telling you where she found you. Her hand rises and points at a run down house further down the street. She’s ether pointing to where she lives or where she’s taking you, possibly both. Then she does something that sends a chill down your spine, not from fear, but from shock of what it could mean and what it means you missed. Her hand pats her crotch and she keeps saying, ‘zambullidor del gatito! zambullidor del gatito!’ This means nothing to you, but the blush on her tanned face tells you it’s something that made her very, very happy.

125221.content:
Damn... whatever happened earlier, you must have had a LOT of fun! Shame you cant remember... anyway, she crams you back down her shirt and places you in between those huge, soft and snug 'tetas' of hers and starts walking off... but to where, you wonder...

The huge brown pillows tend to bounce a little, making it a little difficult to stay still in one place for too long! Nothing else you could do, besides hang tight and enjoy the ride... one moment the Senorita stops for a moment to chat with someone... you dont know who, and you dont care!

However you do remember hearing the voice go, "Hey, Rosa! ¿Que paso?" ....Rosa! Could this lovely Latin giantess's name be Rosa? Hmm.... come to think of it... you DO remember SOMETHING about a 'Rosa'... but your memory is still crap, so that dont help much!

Finally... after almost an hour of up and down, up and down (...you know what Im talking about!) youre finally pulled out and brought in front of that house 'Rosa' was pointing at earlier...

She then looks down at you with a determined look on her face... as if to try and tell you something, but she knows you cant understand it! She points to herself then the little bench right outside the front door and starts slowly speaking, "Par... me..." she then ushered her hand across the seat of the bench, "Abajo..." then points to you, "Y tu...." and starts shaking her fist in a fast up and down motion! "...Penetrado!"

All you can do is stare at her strangely and utter, "Uh... huh."

1252211.content:
The smile that Rosa is giving you both unnerves and excites you. It reminds you of the smile Angela gets when she spots a sale a her favorite store, only Rosa’s smile is directed towards you instead of a store. You’re not a hundred percent sure what penetrado means, but from the up and down motion Rosa was doing with her hand, you don’t think it means anything wholesome. Whatever you did last night was most likely rough and messy. Speaking of which, you just notice that you’re a little sticky all over. This isn’t the first time noticing, you felt a bit sticky when you were bouncing around between Rosa’s impressive fun pillows, but you thought that you were sticky because of the sweat running down her chest.

You take a whiff of yourself and recoil. You reek. The last time you smelt a scent like the one you are wearing was that time you got locked in your mom’s cabinet and found that strange phallic shaped object that vibrated when you pressed a switch on the base. When you asked your mom about it, she just blushed and gave you twenty dollars to never bring up the strange object again. Now you smell like that thing and have no idea why.

“Why do I smell?” You ask Rosa, forgetting totally about the language barer. Apparently that doesn’t matter because even without knowing what you’re exactly saying, Rosa still picks up on the gist of it. She giggles a little and her smile grows a tiny bit.

“Una más vez, amante?” She grips you a little harder and looks at you in excitement. It sounds like she asked you something, but you have no clue what it is. She could of asked you if you wanted a bath or if it was alright if she could put you in a blender and make you into a smoothie. You let your instincts do the talking, which say that what she’s asking is probably not very bad, you use one of the few words you know of Spanish.

“sí.” Not a millionth of a second after you say that one word, does Rosa let out some kind of Mexican Amazon war cry and rush into her house. Her hand clenches tightly around you as she rushes into her house. While she’s running inside, you spot the humble furniture around the small home. Then, all you see is the stairs as Rosa rushes up them as fast as her lovely, long legs will allow. By now, you’re a little sick from the rough ride. The sickness passes as Rosa opens a door at the top of the stairs and slams it shut.

She looks at you in her hand and licks her lips like you’re a taco. You begin to rethink your first assumption that what she asked you wasn’t bad. While holding you with one hand, her other hand fumbles with her pants, trying to get them down. You try to look down from her fist, but her grip is covering everything, but your head. You hear clothes hit the floor and Rosa sits down on a bed in the middle of the room. You look around as much as you can and see a closet, a nightstand and some books littered around the room. It hits you that you’re inside her room, alone, with her pants now around her ankles. Everything comes together and you finally know exactly what penetrado means.

Penetrado... PENETRATED!! As in, you 'penetrated' la g-spot!! So you finally figured it out, of course you should have figured it out sooner since the words sound so goddamn alike!!! Oh well, no time for that, because judging by the anxious look on Rosa's face, she's ready for some penetrado!

Your first thought is to beg her to stop, but because of the language barrier, it's no more helpful than telling her you want to fuck her like it's an extreme sport! *KNOCK KNOCK KNOCK!!* "ROSA!!! ¡¡ABIERTO!!"

You notice his facial expression of shock and dumbfound as he steps closer to you. He looks down in total obliviousness for a few seconds then turns to Rosa and says, "..Qué esta?"

She steps up to him and says, "Esta mi amigo, Steve!" W w w wait... she knows your name!!! Then she MUST know how got here! Shame you cant exactly ask her.. Anyway, her father stares at you in more confusion, "...Steve?" Now's your chance, you think to yourself! So you shout, "YES! I AM STEVE MCMINOR! I DO NOT BELONG HERE!! I COME FROM AMERICA! AMERICA!! I NEED TO GET BACK! ...CAN YOU... HELP... ME?"

He just continues to stare at you in confusion! Goddamn it, he doesnt speak English either, does he? You decide to test him, "...Uh... IF YOU CAN UNDERSTAND ME... SAY 'SI'!"
...Nothing. Well, since youre a little bored, you decide to act like a typical tourist jerk and start messing with his head, "uh... if youre a total panty-waste with no manhood, stare at me in total silence!"

...Oh crap times infinity! He actually DOES speak English! The reason he gave you the silent treatment wasnt because he was unable to understand you. He just thought you were a moron.... and now you just proved that you are!

"You speak English?!" you manage to grunt out past his tight grip, "Why the hell didn't you say so earlier?! Where the fuck am I--"

“Of coarse you can come in,” you say, trying to act cool in front of the cute nurse. You’ve seen plenty of dirty movies that started this way. A nurse comes in, asks for a check up, and then the action begins.

“Dr. Mcminor, your patent from room 406 is complaining about her back again. Should I increase her morphine?” You nod solemnly and the nurse leaves. Once she’s gone, your shoulders slump and you fall back down on your butt. You’re a respected doctor, working in one of the countries best hospitals, yet you expect your life to be like a porno movie. You’re not in high school any more; it’s time to forget about all those fantasies about women wanting random sex with you. It’s high time you grow up and stop glancing up women’s skirts as you walk past them. Your size is no excuse to be a pervert, keep it in your pants and focus on what’s important, your job.

Sitting on the floor, watching TV are your daughter and son. Actually technically, it’s your daughter sitting on the floor, your son is sitting on the top of her head watching TV from there. You’ve reminded him a hundred time the golden rules to always look above you, never stand on any seats and never try to climb a person. You like to think you’re really close with your son, which is something you can’t say about your daughter. She’s a sweet little girl, but you know she has trouble seeing you as an authority figure. At least she’s stopped calling you daddy-doll.

The cartoon the kids were watching ends and your daughter turns to you with a big smile. “Daddy-doll!” She squeals and races towards you. Sighing in frustration, you realize that you have to give your daughter another talk in respecting her father, which will be pointless, because face it, she doesn’t listen to you at all. Her tiny child hand grab you, while the other one takes her brother off her head. You look at your son in the other hand and he weakly smiles at you. He’s incredibly shy, only talking to you and his mother. It’s supposedly a phase according to your wife, but you still worry about him. Half the things you learned were from first hand experience. If your son stays cooped up inside, how will he learn to survive on his own like you did.

“Guess what daddy-doll, I learned a new thing today!” You smile at your excited daughter, she’s practically priming with energy. She’s always been the outgoing type, getting into trouble and what not. If something was broken, Jenny was usually involved. You smile up at her beaming face, trying to be the parental figure even if your daughter doesn’t believe it. “What did you learn today honey?”

"I learned that Jet feels good in my underwear!" You heard your daughter said, and to be honest, you really didn't know whether to be ashamed, confused, embarrassed, or just plain angry with your daughter. She was the highly experimental type, but you never thought she'd be this kind of experimental, at least not so early.
"Dear.... did Jet want you to do this too him?" You asked inquisitively.
"Of course he did!" Your daughter responded in that bubbly little girl's voice. You shoot a stern look over to your son who was fervently shaking his head. Your look softened, as you believed him. Your son was too shy and bashful to have protested, at least violently, and your daughter was always too forward and oblivious to tell if someone was refusing or liking something.

"well please don't do it honey. I'm serious." You say to your daughter. She returned your look with a sad one, not understanding.
"But why dad? I like it a lot."
"Because its not a good thing to do. Remember? we talked about this. You can't do things like this to your brother, just because he's smaller than you. It.... *sigh* may feel good to you, but I'm sure your brother doesn't enjoy it as much as he lets on."
"Why would he look like he's liking it though."

Again, this would have been misinterpreted if it wasn't for the fact you had a very good idea of how it all unfolded, as it had happened many times to you in your childhood. You didn't necessarily want to chew her out on the fact that she's oblivious and end up hurting her feelings though, so you decide to sugar coat it a little.... ok a lot.
"Well dear.... he didn't want yo hurt your feelings. Jet probably saw you were enjoying it, and as much as he hated it, he didn't want to make you unhappy. Thats because he's a good brother."
"Oh, ok. I won't do it anymore." She looked a little dejected, but not sad which was good. She was still holding onto you both like dolls, but she didn't squeeze as much right now. You were now speaking to her on a good father-daughter level, so you thought you might want to add some of your own experience to the situation while you still had her attention.

"Yes, I was in his situation many times growing up. My little sister... your aunt Tulip, I mean, she was a little hellion to me when I was younger. She was always doing things to me, unpleasant things like torturing me with her feet, forcing me into her panties, swallowing me whole from time to time, even sticking me up her rear end..."
She looked surprised. "Aunt Tulip gobbled you up before?" You were so happy that she was listening to you that you didn't notice that she was now looking at her brother with contemplation in her eyes and her tongue licking her lips.
"Oh yes honey. That was your aunt's favorite thing to do to me, then she'd tease me in her stomach by telling me how good I tasted. She loved to see me squirm too, luckily she leveled out in high school and we became much better in terms of brother and sister. Only time she ate me after that was when she was trying to sneak me off to college with her without out parents knowing. But your a good girl and know that you shouldn't..."

You stopped as you heard your son's muffled cries. Looking up, to your shock and dismay, your daughter was now eagerly pushing your son into her mouth. Jet was a mouthful for her, but you had seen Jenny swallow other stuff whole before.
"Jenny! Spit your brother out now!" You yelled at her, but the way her mouth was stuffed, she could barely hear you over her brother's cries were hitting her eardrums more directly. His feet are sticking out of her mouth every so often, and you see her trying to swallow, amidst your yells telling her to stop. To help swallow her brother down, she sticks in her finger and pushes him down, proceeding to swallow harder until her mouth was empty and a bulge was wiggling down her throat.
"Hmmm, all gone!" Jenny said, opening her mouth to you as she usually did when she finished her vegetables. "Jet was soooo yummy, and he feels so good in my tummy. I want to ask mommy if I can have him for dinner every night."
She noticed your disapproving look and looked a little distraught again. "what's wrong doll-daddy?"
"Jenny, this is even worse than putting him in your panties. How many times do I have to tell you, he's not a toy, and he's certainly not food. Would you like it if he got stuck in you?"
Jenny giggled, feeling her brother struggle inside her. Her taught child belly was thin enough to show the lumps and bumps of your 5-year-old son trying to escape his sister's appetite.
"Don't worry daddy! I ate him up and he'll just come out the other end, like my food always does!"

Tears welled up in her eyes, and you thought "oh god" to yourself, so you tried to head it off.

He wouldn't digest much anyway, I just don't want you to think you can just up and do it. you never know how hazardous your stomach can be, dear, its one of the few things in your body you cannot control, and it will only see things in it as food, not your brother. but look, I need to help Jet right now, so I need to go inside you honey. We will have a talk about this later with your mom though, ok? I want you to tell her."
She nodded and wiped her tears, smiling a little. She was still obviously worried, good girl, but she did feel better now that she knew her brother wouldn't be turned into poo.

Perhaps with a little too much enthusiasm, your daughter carries you into her salivating mouth, pushing you onto her spongy tongue and pushing you in until your legs pass her gleaming white teeth. You hit the back of her throat and are immediately going downward. The throat grabs you as you fall, rippled around your body as you’re dragged to your daughter’s stomach. Your daughter swallowed several times as you went down her throat to get you down faster, making her esophagus clench around you each time she did. Stepping on squishy pizza and over pools of digestive acid, you finally hear something. You recognize it as your son crying and rush towards him. You’ll find your son, tell him everything would be all right and stay with him until this strange odyssey ended.

Jenny walks over to your wife, Angela, smiles at her and says “daddy-doll says he wants out now.” Angela asks where you are and she FINALLY tells her about how she decided to eat you. Angela then starts to panic, now realizing that you were the doll she was talking about. Not to mention that she fed Jenny the assistive enzymes that might be able to harm you. She moves Jenny into the bathroom and kneels down beside her. “Hold still okay? This is a trick I learned from your auntie Tulip, say aaaaaaaaah.” Jenny opens her mouth and Angela sticks two of her long slender fingers down into the back of your daughter’s throat.

On the inside of the stomach, you have been tossed around from all the commotion, slipping around in all the bile and acid on the floor. Once you hear Angela talk about Tulip’s trick, you know you’ll be out soon. This is good because the liquid around you is making your legs tingle. The stomach starts contracting from Jenny’s gagging, you shout out to your son, “Jet, listen! I can’t do anything for you for now! All I can tell you is to keep moving forward, you’re going to be fine. It’s just going to be for a few hours more and then you’ll be out, okay!?” You don’t get a response, which means he’s either too far to hear or he’s passed out from shock.

The stomach squeezes around you and shoots you up into Jenny’s throat, along with all the liquid in the stomach. The muscles in her throat are tight but you keep moving upward. Finally, you make your way into your daughter’s mouth and then out into your wife's soft hands. Everything feels cold due to how wet you are and how hot it felt inside the confines of Jenny’s belly.

Angela washes you off immediately and then finally asks, nearly shouting “What happened, why would she eat you like that?!” You explain that she ate Jet first, being inspired by hearing stories of Tulip eating you when you were younger and that Jet was still in there but too far gone to get out the easy way. Angela sends your daughter to time out, after giving a long lecture about why not to eat Jet or “daddy-doll”. Then she asked how you were feeling, and discussed how you were going to handle Jet.

The consensus was that you would both wait until Angela was ready to let him out, if you know what I mean, and fish him out. Once he was out, you’d have to give him a talk about how your years were like growing up, and what he should expect from his. You knew this day would come, you just hoped it would go differently for him.

What happens next?
1411112112.title: Jenny Hears You

choices: but can't, he's too far ahead of you.
and succeed, he's fallen asleep against the villi.
14111122.content:
"Can I go to my friends house now?" Your wife stops and looks down at her curiously for a moment before slapping her forehead, "Of course! Your supposed to be over at Mandy's! I'm so sorry honey, I completely forgot." She grabs her keys off of the counter, "Are you ready now?" Jenny nods enthusiastically, "mmhmm." Your wife grabs Jenny by the hand and leads her to the car outside.

Meanwhile...

While Jenny was following your wife, you were being jostled around the stomach along with the rest of the food. Hearing the conversation between your wife and daughter, you knew that your chances of getting out of here the easy way were running out. You tried to shout out at her but kept being bombarded by liquids and soggy food.

Things finally settle down once Jenny gets into the car. There is a click sound, followed by the far wall of the stomach contracting, which must be the seat belt. Then there is the dull roar of the engine coming to life, followed by very the sound of pop music. It's loud enough for you to hear it easily even where you are (you make a note to talk to your wife about volume control).

Now that you finally feel stable enough to move around, you get up and try once more to get your daughters attention. "Jenny! Tell your mother where I am!" you shout while pushing against the walls. "Mmm... That feels good! Don't stop." She says.

Your wife vaguely hears Jenny talking, "what was that, sweetie?" 'Thank god', you think and wait for everything to unravel. "Daddy-doll and Jet were so yummy, and they feel so good in my tummy. Can I gobble them up tomorrow too?" Jenny asks while rubbing her stomach. Your wife has a hard time hearing Jenny over the radio, but manages to catch the part about something being yummy and wanting it again". 'She must have really liked that pizza' she thinks and laughs slightly. "I'm sure if you and Mandy ask nicely you can both eat it tomorrow." Jenny cheers a bit, which makes your wife smile.

You are flabbergasted, did your wife really just say that? You shake your head and think. It has to be some kind of mistake. She's probably half listening, just like she does to you when you try to tell her something with the radio on. You curse to yourself as you think about how she just inadvertently gave Jenny permission to eat her husband and son. When this is all over, you're going to have to have a serious sit-down with Jenny and your wife.

Your wife finally arrives at Mandy's house and heads up to the door with her. Jenny runs off inside the house with her friend Mandy while your wife stays outside to chat a bit with Mandy's parents.

You can hear Jenny and Mandy's muffled voices talking. You've seen Mandy a number of times, she and Jenny had met at the park one day and become fast friends ever since. She was a girl about Jenny's age, with dark brown hair, and was just a tad bit hyperactive. Whenever the two of them got together they seemed to amplify each other's energy.

Pushing against the wall gets her attention again, you yell out “Jenny, can you hear me?!”. “Ooh! Mandy, feel this!” She grabs Mandy's hand and places against her tummy to let her feel. Mandy's eyes widen as she feels something squirming around inside. She pulls her hand back, “What is that?!” “I gobbled up my daddy-doll and brother for dessert” Jenny says proudly. “they feel soo good inside, and mommy said we can both do it tomorrow too if we ask them reeeall nice.”

Frustrated, you yell out. “No you won't, young lady!”, but you are not heard. A squeezing feeling down by your foot distracts your attention. You look down to see that your foot has gotten caught in the sphincter. It is slowly sucking in more of your leg in every second. You sit down and try to use your free leg to push yourself free. You push, but the best you can do is slow down the gentle suckling on your leg. Your move your foot closer and try harder, but accidentally get it sucked in as well. 'Well shit', you think.

Some hours pass and the sphincter slowly drags more and more of your body into the intestine. All the while, Jenny and Mandy giggle and play. When they lay down to sleep, you sigh in relief. The relative silence is a nice change of pace. At this point, your body is stuck up to your chest in the sphincter. You should be able to slide in and start trying to find Jet. You shimmy your way down until you finally slip down, fully in the intestinal tract.

You start making your way through, trying to find Jet...
14111122.title: Can I go over my friends house?

choices: ... but only you can eat me, sis..."
141111221.content:
All the memories of your childhood come flooding back to you as you navigate your daughter's intestines. The villi lining the walls push you along, and you do your best to push through as well. Going in feet first made things more difficult. You couldn't see where you were going, and therefore you had to feel for upcoming turns with your feet alone.

You keep moving through for hours, calling out for Jet here and there when you find the occasional air pocket. Eventually, though, your body is too tired to keep going. You feel a bit sad knowing that you aren't as spry as you were the last time you did this sort of thing.

Jet is just too far ahead to be able to catch up to for now. You're hopeful that he'll be alright without you. Maybe the experience will make him stronger. You try to imagine what time it is. It's certainly been many hours since the girls fell asleep. Both your mind and body are tired from the nights experience. You decide, as crappy as it is, you will have to sleep in here. You chuckle a bit as you realize the unintentional pun, and then drift off into a deep sleep.

------The Next Morning-----

Jenny stirs from her slumber by a particularly uncomfortable feeling coming from her bottom. She sits up and stretches. The clock in the room reads 7:07AM. Mandy wakes up nearby and looks over. “Morning” she says faintly. “Morning”, Jenny replies.

The uncomfortable feeling hits her again. She clinches in reflex. Looks like she's really got to go. “I think Daddy-doll and Jet are trying to come out,” she says to Mandy. “Well don't make 'em wait, let 'em out.” Jenny nods and heads for the bathroom.

After a few unpleasant moments, Jenny turns to find her brother treading water in the toilet bowl. “There you are!” she says as she looks down at him. Jet coughs for a moment and then looks up at her, waving meekly. “Where is daddy-doll?” she asks him. He shrugs in reply “...I don't know, I never saw him...” She looks down at her stomach, “he must still be inside.”

Jenny uses a nearby toilet cleaner to fish Jet out of the water and place him into the sink. “It felt so good having you in my tummy, I can't wait until we do it again. Was it fun for you too?” Jenny giggles as she washes him thoroughly with soap. “...no...it wwasn't fun at all...” Jet says quietly. “It was too! You're just being mean!” She sticks her tongue out at him and makes a half sad half angry face.

Mandy waits patiently outside until Jenny walks out with her brother in hand, still wet from the sink. “Wow! You really did eat them. Where is your dad?” Jenny pats her stomach and smiles, “He's still inside.” “Ah” Mandy says and walks up to Jenny. “But what about-” she looks down at Jet and then whispers something into Jenny's ear.

Jenny looks down at Jet, and then moves to the bed. She puts him down on the sheets and leans in. “I'll be right back so don't go anywhere, okay?” Jet nods his head in an unsure manner while Jenny walks off with Mandy to another room.

They return a few minutes later with cute smiles on their faces. They both kneel against the bed, their faces resting just next to Jet. Mandy opens her mouth to speak, “So we were talkkinnggg, and we would really really like if youuu coulllddd... be my breakfast for this morning!”

Jet's eyes widen, “...what?” The two girls start in unison, “pretty pretty pleaseeee!” Jet tries to clear his throat, and says weakly “I really don't-” “Come on, It'll be fun, look!” Mandy interrupts and stretches her mouth open, wiggling her tongue from side to side. “It's like a slide!”

Jet looks away from the open mouth, “I really didn't like it the last time...” Jenny rubs his back with her finger, “pleeease, it feels sooo good. You'll be safe inside her belly!” Jet thinks about it for a moment. It was pretty terrible inside, but he did make it out okay. He looks at the two girls' pleading faces. 'If it means that much to her...' he thinks. “...Okay...

1411112212.content:
Jet sighs, “Okay... but I want you to gobble me up, sis...”

Jenny awes at her brother and grabs him. She raises him up and nuzzles him against her cheek, “awwww, thank you, Jet. You're the best brother ever!” Jenny looks over and sees Mandy, who is almost in tears. “It's okay Mandy, I'll let you have my daddy-doll allll to yourself!” Mandy looks over, “really?” Jenny nods, “of course! What else are friends for.”

Jenny turns her attention back to her brother. “Make sure you move around as much as you can, 'cuz I can feel you squirming around inside my tummy. It's the best part!” She opens her jaw and moves Jet closer. Jet nods, frightened by the sight in front of him. He does his best to move around inside her hand, partly abiding her and partly trying to escape.

Jenny giggles at him and then stuffs him into her mouth. Mandy watches as Jenny's cheeks bulge out from one side to the other as she pushes her brother around with her tongue. “Mmmmm... Jet you're delicious!”

Inside, Jet scrambles around trying to catch his breath. His sister asked him to move around a lot, and he has been, but to be honest all his moments so far have felt necessary to avoid his sister's teeth and to try to breathe.

Jet is then pushed towards the entrance of her throat. He stares down the dark hole, hot air hits him in the face as he looks down into the slimy tube. It scares him stiff. Just as his body starts to slide forward, light opens behind him. Jenny's finger pulls him back away from the throat. “Jetttt, you're supposed to be moving around!” she complains. “I'm sorry... It's just scary.”

Jenny takes her finger out and closes her mouth again. Jet starts to push himself around as best he can. Jenny's giggles reverberate around him. His body is then pushed back towards the entrance of her throat again. Jet pushes himself away, but Jenny's tongue shoves his body headfirst into the dark chasm.

Mandy sees Jenny gulp a few times and watches the wriggling lump travel down her throat. “Wow... what does it feel like?” she asks. Jenny waits until she swallows him all the way down before responding, “Ahhh, it's amazing! You can feel him going the whole way down.” Jenny lifts up her shirt to show her belly, then shakes her hips back and forth “yep, he's in there now.”

Jet lands in his sister's mostly empty stomach with a splat. He gets up and tries fruitlessly to wipe off the sticky liquids coating his body. He walks up to one of the walls and puts his hand against it, feeling the warm lining of her stomach. A sudden shaking knocking against the wall.

The room booms with Jenny's voice, “mmmmm, that's it. Keep it up!” Jet looks around the dark, fleshy room. The air was warm and he could feel his sister's breathing along with her heartbeat. 'I guess this isn't too bad...' he thinks to himself, and starts to push against the walls to please his sister.

-----Later That Day-----

You awaken to the feeling of falling. Next thing you know you are dunked into cold water. You swim up to the surface and see your daughter's gleaming face staring down at you.

“Hi daddy-doll!” she says. “Hey Jenny... Can you help me out of here?” “mmhmm.” A toilet scrubber is lowered down to you and you grab on. You are lifted out of the water and put into the sink. “Jenny, I need you clean me off, Okay?” “Don't worry daddy-doll, I'll clean you just like Jet.” “Ah, right. How was he?” “He liked it,” Jenny smiled.

“Look, Jenny. About eating your brother and me... You can't-” you are cut off as the faucet pours a waterfall down on you. Jenny gets right to work, scrubbing you with soap. You decide to wait until you're all cleaned up to talk to her.

You come out of the bathroom and are dropped off on to Mandy's bed. Jenny and Mandy look at one another, then Jenny says “daddy-doll, you're probably thirsty. I'll go get you some water.” “Well actually Jenny I'd like to-” she leaves the room before you can finish. You sigh and sit down. Turning your head give you a startle. Mandy's face was perched right next to you.

She makes a pouty face, “Mister Mcminor, could I please gobble you up?” 'ugh', you knew this was going to happen. You're going to have to convince this girl that you can't just eat someone. Suddenly, a thought strikes you. You look around the room. “...Where is Jet?” “He wanted Jenny to eat him again, so she did.” “What!? Get her in here, NOW.” Mandy makes a surprised face. “He's fine, I saw him moving around her belly! I want to try it too. Can I? Pretty pleeassee...”

“No, get her in here!” You shout.

14111122121.content:
Mandy frowns slightly, then reaches over and firmly wraps her fingers around you. With you in her fist, she stands up and lifts you to her face. She grabbed you when you were in an awkward position, and you do your best to adjust your position but her grip on you is quite strong. You settle with just freeing your arms and resting them on on top of her fingers. You look at Mandy as she pleads, "Why not? It'll be fun, see?" Mandy's mouth opens and she sticks you halfway inside, pushing your face against her squishy tongue. You have to push the tongue back so you can shout, "NO MANDY! YOU AREN'T SUPPOSED TO EAT LITTLE PEOPLE."

Mandy pulls you away from her mouth and stares at you in confusion. "..but Jenny's mommy said we could if we asked nicely.. and--" "Wait!" you interrupt. "My wife... er... Jenny's mommy.. only said that because she thought Jenny was talking about pizza." "But then how come Jenny got to eat Jet again?" You look Mandy right in the eyes and firmly say, "that's probably because Jenny didn't give her brother a choice, she probably 'gobbled' him up before he could do anything about it."

Mandy's eyes narrow at you.

"Nu-uh! Jet said it was fine! He said she could do it", she says as she stares at you carefully. You think for a moment, 'Is that really possible?.. Why would he-... Oh lord.' "Well--" you start to say but Mandy interrupts. "Jenny also said you let her eat you last night." "That was different!" you spurt out. This child is beginning to make you lose your cool.

"Nu-uh!" Mandy says again. She goes on to say, "Jenny also said that I could eat you too. I don't wanna argue anymore, I'm hungry and you're going in my tummy!" Mandy opens her mouth again and says "Aaaah~" as she pulls you closer. "MANDY, NO!" you scream but are ignored. She forces your body into her mouth. 'Fuck, again?!' you think as your body is pinned inside the girl's moist mouth.

Mandy rubs her tongue against you back and forth, getting a good taste. "Mmmm, you taste good Mr. McMinor!" She says with her mouth full, then begins to toy with your body. She swishes you from cheek to cheek as her tongue works you over. You are bathed in her spit as she tastes and toys with you. You fight for air amidst the saliva and fleshy muscles swirling around you. Trying to escape right now is useless, her tongue is so powerful that you feel like a rag-doll. That is the way it always is though, inside a mouth. Mandy continues to play with you like this for a few minutes. All the while, you scream in vain for her to let you out.

When she pushes you to the back of her mouth, you know that she's getting ready for the big finish. You get a good view down her throat. You watch as the walls of her esophagus ebb and flow as she breathes. There's no way you're going to let this little girl have her way with you. You have years of experience on your side; all that time with Tulip didn't go by without you learning a few tricks.

You wedge your arms between the back of her mouth and her molars and hold tight. Mandy swallows. The uvula and tongue slap together, pinching down your chest, and you feel yourself sliding forward. You hold your arms taut and manage to only slide forward a little bit. She swallows a few more times, feeling your body start to go down but then stopping each time. She decides you must be stuck, so she uses her tongue to flick you around a bit and then try again.

On the inside, you have been holding on as hard as you can. Each swallow dislodges you a little bit more. When her tongue comes along and flips you around, you don't get your grip back quickly enough and begin to slide into her throat. You kick and push violently against the throat walls, and luckily are able to push yourself back out of Mandy's throat before being sucked down. Feeling a bit of success, Mandy swallows again and again. Your body keeps sliding into her throat but each time you manage to fight your way out before going too far down her gullet. You've been lucky so far, but you are getting tired and can't keep this up forever.

Mandy can't figure out what's going on. She keeps swallowing like she does with her food, but she can't seem to keep the little guy down. 'He's keeps moving around too much!' she thinks to herself.

She stops trying to swallow you for a minute. She wonders how Jenny managed to swallow her brother and then decides to...

Mandy lifted her skirt reveal the bulge of Steve in her panties. His daughter reached over and rubbed that area of the underwear. Mandy moaned a little as Steve wiggled under the touch.

What does she do?

"Interesting idea, Jenny, but I'll try it later. Right now, I'm hungry." Mandy declared. With a shrug, Steve's daughter handed over the glass of water that was intended for him. What does she want?
1411112212111.title: Throat Water Slide

14111122121112.content:
It's lunch time, and Mandy's mother wants to know what the girls would like to eat. She gives them a list of options; the girls settle on chicken tenders. When she leaves the room, Mandy asks “Is it okay to eat food while they are in our tummies?” Jenny thinks for a moment, then responds “I think so, it's just food. Besides, they are probably hungry too.” Jenny grabs her stomach with her hands and jiggles it up and down. "Isn't that right, little brother?"

Listening in to the conversation, you have to agree with Jenny for once. It has been some time since you had any food. You never got to eat dinner last night. And even though this isn't the best eating accommodations, cafe de Mandy will have to do.

In a few minutes, chunks of chicken fall in. You use your judgment to pick out the cleanest pieces and dig in. Even the cleanest pieces are soggy, but beggars can't be choosers. After you've had your fill, you lie back against the stomach wall and watch the food slowly turn to mush. It's kind of like watching paint dry.

…

Your wife finally shows up an hour later. You almost don't hear her come in over the sound of the stomach churning away the food. Luckily, Jenny's greeting pierces the stomach walls. “Hi mommy! What are you doing here?” “Hey there, angel. Did you hear anything from from daddy or your brother? They aren't home and I can't find a note anywhere.” Your wife's concern is a breath of fresh air.

You put your head against the stomach wall to hear the two of them talking better. “Mommy, I told you last night, I gobbled them up.” “What?!” Your wife's voice is full of shock. Finally, you think. You're finally getting out of this mess. “Yeah, remember? You said I could eat them again today if I asked really nicely.” “O... Oh my god! I thought you were talking about pizza! Jenny you are NOT allowed to do that sort of thing!” “But mom-” “You need to come with me, RIGHT NOW. Mandy, I'm sorry but Jenny has to go home now.”

The satisfaction you got from your wife's attitude fades when she finishes those last words. She's going to take Jenny home, but you're not in Jenny's stomach, you're in Mandy's. You pound against the wall and shout out. “ANGELA! I'M IN HERE! DON'T LEAVE ME!” It's too late, though. Jenny and Angela have already left the room.

-----

Angela pulls Jenny along forcefully down the stairs. She can't believe that Jenny swallowed you and Jet. What's worse is, by some misunderstanding, she had done it a second time! She needs to get Jenny home quickly and see if she can get her to puke them up.

She passes by Mandy's parents on the couch in the living room. “You're taking her home already? Are you sure? We were just about to take the girls out to...” Angela interrupts them. “I'm sorry, but I have to take Jenny home. She sw... she did something very bad." With that she walks out the door, tugging Jenny along with her.

Mandy was watching from the hallway as Jenny was taken home. You listened as well, leaning against the lining of the stomach. "What was that all about?..." Mandy's mother asks rhetorically. 'Shit', you think, now I'm stuck here with Mandy until Angela figures out that you're still here. However long that is.'

Eventually, Mandy's parents walk into her room. "Are you ready to go, sweetie?" "Mmhmm" Mandy hums back. Mandy's family all get into their minivan and head out to...
14111122121112.title: Your Wife Finally Arrives

141111221211121.content:
Heavy bass thunders around you. You try not to pay attention as you reach out and grab hold of another fold of intestine. With a yank, your body slithers forward.

It's been a few hours since Mandy's family left their house. You'd had all you could take of this situation and started making your way towards the exit.

More bass. You overheard the conversation between Mandy and her parents while you weren't too deep in. The plan was to do a bit of shopping and end the outing with a movie. It had been a while since then and, once you moved deeper into the intestine, you stopped being able to make out the what was being said by who. The only noise you could make out now were the squishing and gurgling sounds from Mandy's body. You could tell, however, from the absence of jiggling that Mandy stopped walking a while ago. The rumbles and booms tells you she and her family are probably sitting down to some kind of action movie. That or earth was under attack by giant robots or something.

It doesn't matter; you are almost out. You grab another fold and pull yourself forward.

-----

Mandy leans back in her seat, laughing, as Spider-Man webs up some dumb carjacker. Spider-Man was always her favorite super hero; he was the coolest.

A prodding sensation interrupts her laughter. Another prod jolts her bottom. She needs to go to the bathroom, and quick. She looks over to her parents. Her mother's seat is empty, and her father seems to be very interested in the movie. She knows she isn't supposed to bother him but she needs to go. She grabs his coat sleeve to get his attention. He looks down at her for a moment but shakes her off and continues to watch the movie. Mandy takes the shrug as a sign and gets out of her seat to go to the bathrooms by herself.

She makes it to the bathroom just fine, and enters a stall.

-----

You wait at the exit for only a few minutes. Soon enough, you are pushed out and land in cold water. As you surface, you take an exhausted breath of fresh air.

When your sight comes back to you, you shout out to Mandy. You went through fast that aren't sure whether Mandy will expect you or not. "Don't flush! It's me, Mr. McMinor!" you shout.

Mandy hears the tiny voice coming from inside the toilet and jumps out of the seat. She turns to look inside the bowl and, as your eyes lock, water starts gushing in from the sides. 'Shit!' you think, 'It's an auto-flush toilet!' "Mandy! Hellllp!" You scream as the current builds up.

You fight against the swirling current of water, but you quickly run out of strength and get sucked down the pipe.

-----

Mandy just stands there and watches in shock as your little body circles the drain then abruptly disappears.

With her hands cupped over her mouth, she stares at the now clean bowl as water sifts back in. She stands there for a moment, wondering if that really just happened. Did she really just flush Mr. Mcminor down the toilet?

She continues to stand there, wondering what she should do now. She watched you disappear down the drain, just like that. Should she tell her parents? She imagines all the trouble that will follow, and squints at the thought. Everyone is going to be so mad at her...

Unless...

Unless she doesn't say anything...

She starts to back away from the toilet slowly. If no one finds out, she can act like it never happened. Step by step, she slowly backs out of the stall and exits the bathroom.

...
141111221211121.title: Night at the movies

1411112212111211.content:
Your body is pushed down the dark corridors until you reach a section of piping that is narrow enough for you to wedge yourself against. You push your extremities outward and hold on with all your might as the water rushes past. Once the current stops, you start swimming back to where you came. It takes you a few minutes to get back, but you do make it.

Breaching once again, you shake the water out of your hair and thank whichever angel is watching over you for your relatively good fortune. Looking outside, you see that Mandy is gone. You call out her name, but nothing happens. 'She must have gone to get some help', you think. You float around in the bowl while waiting for Mandy to come back (not that there is much else you can do). After about twenty minutes, you realize that she probably isn't coming back... 'That little bitch! Ugh!' You splash a fist down into the water out of frustration, then swim to the water's edge.

Climbing out of the bowl works about as well as you thought it would. Wet porcelain has got to be the most slippery surface on Earth, and getting out has always been a problem for you.
