However, when it became obvious that she wanted her Daddy-dolly first, he'd sigh with relief. He'd see his dad try to hide inside the dollhouse to escape the apparently hungry Jenny. He'd look away for a moment when she got on her hands and knees to reach in after dad, as it gave him a good view at her panties...the very same character print pair she had placed him inside twice now today.

She did ask properly the second time, he'd admit. Just like he'd admit to saying yes so she wouldn't put him in her mouth and swallow again. It was rather awkward for him, as Jet was finding it kind of fun when she used her size to play with him, but it was his younger sister. He'd have no idea what his dad would say if he told him about this feeling of enjoying it. It wasn't like he Jet didn't know the stories of Tulip's younger years, but at least Jenny was learning to ask him first.

He'd look back now, seeing her still on her hands and knees to reach inside the dollhouse for dad. He'd hear her complain that he wouldn't stay still to make it easy for her, causing him to chuckle a bit. After a few more moments of this, she'd stop moving as she exclaimed happily that she caught him. Jet could see his dad struggling in her fist as she extracted him from the pretend house.

He wouldn't be able to see what happened, since she was facing away from him, but he'd be able to hear it easily enough. From her position on the ground, Jet could see her body wiggle as she brought dad up to her face. Said figure would complain about her licking him before his cries would be muffled as she put him into her mouth head first. A few seconds later, there'd be silence as he was audibly swallowed.
141111221222121111221.title: Chasing after you!

choices: Mandy gives in to the pressure.
1411112212221211112211.content:
A second after Jet hears the gulp, he sees his sister wiping her mouth with her hand. "Ah", she says satisfyingly as she scooches herself around to face Jet and Mandy.

She puts her hand on her tummy and looks down. There is a moment of silence while Jenny sits there, trying to feel her father in her tummy. She then turns to Mandy and frowns, "he's not moving around like Jet does." "He didn't in my tummy, either." Mandy said, agreeing.

Jet watches as Jenny gets up and walks over to him. She plops herself down next to him. Her hand then reaches down and grabs him. She then throws him at Mandy, who instinctively catches him. "Jet is way better, you can feel him wiggling inside the whole time! You should try!"

Mandy looks down at Jet, whose eyes are wide open. "I can't, I'm not allowed", she says sadly. "Why not?" "My mommy says I can't." Jenny frowns, "It's okay. Jet doesn't mind." Jet does mind, but he can't manage to form the words. He likes playing with his sister, but it doesn't feel the same, sitting in this girls hands.

Mandy isn't really hungry, having eaten all of her dinner. She supposes that there is still enough room for the little guy, but she also remembers what her mother told her earlier.

What does Mandy decide?
1411112212221211112211.title: Jet's turn

14111122122212111122112.content:
After a moment, Mandy would hand Jet back to Jenny and say, "Sorry, but I promised mom that I wouldn't. She said it was something only for people who are very close, like your family is."

Jet wouldn't say that they were close, just that Jenny had a hard time listening to others. However, he didn't say anything as that would have made Jenny mad at him and most likely have made the trip worse. Not that it mattered.

"Okay, your loss Mandy." Jenny would say with a shrug before putting her brother's head in her mouth. This time, she remembered her daddy-dolly's advice from when she first swallowed him. Mandy would get to watch as Jet's legs kicked around outside of Jenny's mouth as she sucked on him to cover him in her spit. Once she had decided that he was wet enough, she would suck the legs in and swallow.

Once more, Mandy watched the lump in her friend's throat go down until it disappeared into her dress. She was honestly jealous, but she wanted her own special little guy to swallow, not borrow from Jenny.

"There we go. Jet's doing a good job. He makes it so much better than Daddy-dolly." Jenny sighed happily.

"Jenny, your mom's here. It's time for you to go."

"Yay, mommy!" The little girl would say as she charged down the stairs excitedly.

"Hey, sweetie. Ready to go? We'll go get some more of that yummy pizza you like." Angela said as she hugged her daughter.

"No thanks, mom. I'm full from eating Daddy-dolly and Jet. They're tasty, though Daddy-dolly doesn't move, the meanie." Jenny stated casually.

"Wait, you...you ate them?!"

"Yup, you said I could eat them again on the way here."

Angela's mind froze in growing horror. She made the connection to the question that she hadn't really heard because of the radio...never again.

"Sweetie, once we get home, we're going to have a talk." Angela said as she escorted her daughter to the car.

"About what, mommy?" Jenny asked innocently.

"About how to treat your father and brother." The mother said as guilt was setting in. It was unintentional, but she had caused it to happen, after all.
14111122122212111122112.title: Mandy's a good girl

1411112212221211112212.content:
Jet watches as Jenny turns to face him. She smiles at him while taking the time to lick her fingers, as if savoring her little daddy's taste. She then starts to crawling towards him. "Your turnnn Jetty-doll", she coos. Jet gets up and starts backing away from the table, not ready to spend the rest of the night in the hot, wet sack that is his sister's stomach.

Jenny is almost to him when she stops in her tracks. She looks up and screams, "Mommy!" Jet turns around to see his mother standing in the doorway. She must have just gotten there because of her gleeful expression. There is a rumbling behind him before Jenny's shoe suddenly flies overhead and stomps down just in front of him; clearly not paying attention to where she's stepping as she runs to greet mommy.

Angela kneels down and gives Jenny a big hug. "Hi, Jenny", she says happily. As they hug, Angela looks over and sees Jet standing on the floor near the table. She lets go of Jenny and, in a surprised voice, says "Jet! There you are! I was worried about you. I thought maybe Steve took you to work with him. What are you... wait, no... How did you get here?" She then looks down at Jenny. "Jenny, did you sneak your brother over here?" Jenny puts a finger on her lips while thinking what her mother means. "Kinda..." she begins to answer, "last night-". "Jenny," Angela interrupts her, "never take your brother anywhere outside the house without permission, remember?" Jenny looks confused, and is starting to tear up. "But mommy, you said-", she starts. "I don't want to hear it right now, Jenny. We're going home and then you're going straight to bed. Understood?" Angela watches her little daughter nod her head in agreement.

Angela then walks over to Jet. "Hey there, Jetty-pie. You okay?" Jet shakes his head yes. He is about to say something else, when his mother pulls him close and engulfs his face in her lips. She gives him a quick kiss, then lowers him into her cleavage. She knows that Steve wouldn't approve of carrying him that way, but frankly it's so much more convenient. That and she wasn't sure if Jet wanted a break from his sister after playing with her for a day straight.

As they make their way to the front door, Angela looks around so that she can talk to Mandy's parents. They aren't in the living room, though. She can hear the two shouting at one another in one of the rooms. Sounds pretty rough. Maybe it'd be better to just leave and say goodbye another time, she thinks as they slip out the door.

Angela secures an unhappy Jenny into her car seat then straps herself in as well. She tries to take her mind off of her daughter as she listens to the music during the drive.

It works and, by the time Angela gets to the house, she is in a much better mood. She still decides to send Jenny and Jet to bed early anyways. There was a juicy show on that night, and she hadn't had any time to relax yet. She waits until the two brush their teeth. Afterwords, Jenny then retreats to her room, not saying anything. She's just pouting, Angela thinks as she tucks Jet into his bed in the living room.

With the kids taken care of, she sneaks off to her bedroom and flips on the television.

Meanwhile...
1411112212221211112212.title: Mommy's here.

choices: She wants to keep you all to herself
14111122122212111122121.content:
You hate days like this. You used to have these kinds of days a lot as a kid, being eaten by Tulip, getting forgotten and stuck in places no man should be, but over the years things had gotten better. Sure, you had accidents at work, the number of patients that swallowed you was surprisingly low and the nurses had started remembering to check before sitting down. Still, this kind of things happened and you just had to try to make sure that it doesn’t happen again. Once you get out of your daughter, you're going to make sure she understands perfectly clear that daddy is not for eating.

“You are so grounded when I get out of here, young lady,” you grumble to yourself as you crawl around the pulsating stomach, looking for the entrance to the intestines. You hated being inside her the first time, there was just something wrong about being inside your own daughter. You take small comfort that you're not in her panties instead, but then pause and shudder at that thought. You don’t even want to dwell on that thought, the only panties you wanted to be stuck in was your wife’s lacy pair.

Continuing your search, things shift as your daughter is picked up. You catch one side of conversation as her voice echoes around you. Angela’s here and you can hope that Mandy’s mother explains where you are but judging by your luck so far more likely you’ll be forgotten. One thing you’d learned a long time ago was not to rely on others to save you, they often took too long or never came at all. You need to rely on yourself and try and handle things on your own, it’s the only way to survive.

Maybe there was some benefits to growing up in a house where your mother and older sister forgot you existed and your youngest sister saw you as a toy, you had learned to handle adversity and rise to the challenge. Maybe babying Jet wasn’t the right approach and was to blame for his timid behaviour. If he never faced danger then how will he ever learn to fight back?

Deciding to leave the reexamining of you're parenting for later, you find the opening to the intestines and pry it open, wiggling your body into the tight tunnel. You pull yourself through the intestines, ignoring the smell and the sound of gurgling as Jenny’s body processed food. It was lucky your daughter wasn’t a big eater or this could have been much messier, you don’t need to crawl through her previous meals. The heat and narrow space doesn’t bother you, after being inside peoples bellies a hundred times you had grown used to everything that happens to food as it’s processed. You start moving a little faster, the walls getting a little moisture as you near the rectum. Everything rumbles around you and you hear muffled giggling echoing around you.

“That feels nice daddy, keep moving,” Jenny said with a wide smile as she laid in bed and felt her own father moving through her digestive tract. She was upset that mommy had sent her to bed, but had passed the time feeling you moving through out her body. The feeling of you crawling around her stomach had tickled, but as you moved through her bowels she found the sensation pleasant, like that time she had tried sitting her bare butt on Jet just like Auntie Tulip did. She wondered if daddy would let her sit on him too, it might feel even better because unlike Jet you squirmed a lot.

“Definitely giving her the talk,” You groaned, covering your face in embarrassment. Whether it was the talk about how Daddy’s should never go inside daughters or why having tiny people inside you feels good would depend on how much humiliation you can take. You continue moving, wanting nothing more then to reach the exit and escape. The walls narrow in and you know you’re in the rectum and near the sphincter. Hopefully Jenny wouldn’t try to keep you in her butt or things were going to get crowded when her bowel movement reached you. When you feel movement and the world shifted, you knew Jenny was heading to the bathroom to set you free.

When Jenny stopped moving, you waited a few seconds and saw the anus opening up. Without waiting for Jenny to manually push you out, you grab the edges of her rubbery hole and pull yourself free, falling into the cold toilet water with a splash. You surface and take your first breath of fresh air in a bit. You don’t look up, having no need to see your own daughter’s bare butt. She gets off the toilet and you finally lift your head, seeing her peering down at you with that sweet, innocent smile you loved to see. Today though you really find yourself tested by your daughter’s naivety.

“That was so much fun daddy, you're such a better snack then Jet,” she innocently said before fishing you out with the toilet brush. Grabbing onto the bristles she carries you out and brings you to the sink. A long sigh escapes you as warm water washes away the fluids you’d collected moving through Jenny. Jenny turns off the sink and hands you a hand towel to dry your body. She just keeps smiling at you, seeing you not as her father, but a new toy. This needs addressing, but not until after you talk to her mother.

“Can you take me to mommy now, Jenny? I’ve had a long day and need some rest.”
14111122122212111122121.title: Leaving Jenny's Stomach....Again

choices: Jenny took the warning to heart.
141111221222121111221211.content:
"Okay, Daddy-dolly! I can eat you again later." She'd say with innocent cheer. Steve really hoped Angela would get through to her, since it seemed she wasn't listening to him for now. Once he had cleaned himself off, Jenny picked him up and ran over to the master bedroom. When she knocked, Angela answered in her bathrobe.

"What is it, Jenny? It's not a school day, so why are you up so early?" Steve's wife said as she rubbed sleep from her eyes.

"Daddy-dolly wanted to rest after the long day he had, so he wanted to go to you. Are you going to eat him and have him rest inside you?" Jenny spoke up with childish curiosity. What she said immediately wiped the sleep from Angela's face as she had a partially shocked expression.

"Eat him? Why would I do that? Have you been hearing stories from your Aunt Tulip again?" Steve could see the growing sense of dread she had for the answer.

"Well, Daddy-dolly did mention that Aunt Tulip did that when he was younger. He and Jet taste great! Thanks for saying I could eat them again!" Jenny cheered happily. The dread and shock on Angela's face told the whole story as she made the proper connections.

"Honey," Angela started as she gently took Steve from their daughter's hands. "I want you to listen to me. I didn't say you could eat your father and brother. I had thought you had wanted to have more of that pizza we had the other day."

"Well, that was good too, but I think Jet and Daddy-dolly taste even better!" And her mother's other words went in one ear and out the other.

"Jenny, listen to me. You are not to eat your brother and father. Not even when you're older. Do you understand, young lady?"

"Okay, mommy. Can I go play now?" Steve couldn't tell if she actually paid attention, but he was sure she wouldn't listen to him after having eaten him now.

"You may, but if I catch you doing anything like what Aunt Tulip did to your father, you'll be grounded!" Angela declared in her best "angry parent" tone.

Jenny frowned at the warning before she ran off. After taking a deep breath, Angela took Steve into their shared room to learn of his ordeals and do some private things to please him to make up for her blunder.
141111221222121111221211.title: Straightening Jenny out...hopefully

choices: Wait a while, then slip out.
141111221222121111221212.content:
"Don't worry, dolly, you can go sleep in my room," Jenny smiles as she reaches down and curls her fingers around your body. "Jenny! Hey! Put me down!" You shout up to her as she exits the bathroom with you in hand. You see that she is heading for her bedroom down the hall. You push away from her fingers while dangling upside down. The grip is too tight, though. "Jenny, listen to me!" you shout futily as she hurries through the hallway. Seconds later, Jenny closes the door to her bedroom.

The room is dark, but you feel Jenny moving. When you her the sound of her body against the sheets, you realize that she's taking you into bed with her. When your eyes regain vision, you look around to see the bedsheets, along with the outline of your daughter's body around you. When you turn around, you see that she is watching you. Once your eyes meet, she smiles and pulls you close, cuddling your body against her cheek and cupping your back with her hand.

She then pulls you back slightly and turns to face you, while puckering her lips. Next thing you know, they are enveloping your face, sucking you against them, then releasing you with a 'plop'. "Good night, dolly", she says in a smile as her head relaxes back against the pillow. You end up pinned under her cheek with her nose resting over your thighs, blowing hot air against your chest and face. You watch as her eyes slowly close.

You should say something, but your mind is fixated on what she said. She called you 'dolly', instead of 'daddy' or her usual 'daddy-doll'. You want to believe it's just another nickname, but after what you've been through you don't want to take chances. "Jenny", you pat her cheek with your hand. "Hmm...?" she moans as one eye opens groggily. "Jenny. I am your father. Not a dolly." You say, very seriously. "mmhmm..." she sighs in agreement and closes her eye again.

She is too tired to listen, you realize.

What do you do, now?
141111221222121111221212.title: She wants to keep you all to herself

choices: She puts you in her mouth
She kisses you, being her boyfriend means more then being a meal
141111221222121111222.content:
You can only watch as Jenny picks up her tiny brother and lifts him to her face. Jet doesn't fight back as his sister licks her lips at the sight of him. She giggles as she holds him tightly in her chubby hand, eager to have him back in her belly. “Time for dolly Jetty to go to my tummy.” Tilting her head back, she lifted Jet above her and opened wide. The boy squirmed a little as he dangled over her maw, but didn't say anything, accepting that he was his sister's food. You scream for her to stop, but its too late, Jenny lets go of her brother and he plummets into her open mouth. As you watch Jet get eaten once again, you fail to notice Mandy grabbing you off the floor. Captured by the little girl, you squirm and shout at the two smiling children.

“Put me down right now and Jenny, spit your brother out!”

“Sorry daddy-dolly,” Jenny says and then swallows. You watch a small lump travel down your daughter's throat and hear her sign. “Jet's in my belly right now.”

“Jenny I'm very upset at you right now,” you growl, trying not to scream at your troublemaking little daughter. You're sick and tired of these games. You've tried to be understanding and explain to your daughter why she shouldn't eat her family, but she just wasn't listening. She lacked any respect for you and honestly you can't really blame her for that. Your wife was the voice of authority in the house, you were the fun dad that played with the kids and let them get away with anything. Well things were going to change, you were putting your tiny foot down.

“Jenny! I demand that you get Mandy's mother right now! You're in big trouble little lady!” You sternly tell her, glaring at her from Mandy's hand. The girls just look at you in silence for a second and then burst into giggles. Mandy brings you close to her face and rubs your head against her cheek affectionately.

“You're daddy-dolly is so adorable. I wish my daddy was small too,” Mandy lovingly said as she kept nuzzling you against your cheek. Humiliated, you stew in your anger until Mandy pulls you from her cheeks and opens her mouth wide. Your forced back into her mouth head first, your face gliding along her tongue. She sucks and licks on your head, making soft moaning sounds, as she tastes you. She pops you out of her mouth, saliva coating your entire skull. Gagging on her drool, Mandy just sighs. “He's so tasty, I wish I could eat him.”

“Sorry Mandy, but your mom said that eating a dolly is special. You should only eat one if they love you and you love them. You know how much I love my daddy-dolly so only I can eat him,” Jenny rationalized, using Joyce's logic against you.

Hearing your daughter say she loves you is a little heartwarming, but any fatherly love you feel is doused by your daughter using it for a reason to eat you. Mandy hands you over while pouting, rubbing her stomach at the loss of her new favorite snack. Back in Jenny's hands you stare up at her as she eyes you with hunger. Jet filled her up a little bit, but she needed you inside her to get really full. Smacking her lips, she opens wide, but you still try to stop.

“No Jenny! You can't do this!”

She actually stops and looks at your curiously, not sure why you don't want to be eaten. “Why don't you want to be eaten daddy-dolly? Do you want to go in my panties instead?”

“No! God no!” You shudder, not even wanting to think about that fate. You try a different approach, if Jenny is willing to listen to adults that aren't snack size; you just have to use their words to convince her not to eat you. You explain one last time, trying to keep it as simple as possible so she'll understand. “You didn't understand what Mandy's mother said. When she said only people that love each other could eat one another, she didn't mean the love between a father and daughter or a brother and sister. You should only eat someone if they are your boyfriend. Don't eat daddy-dollies or brother-dollies.”

“That seems dumb,” Jenny huffed and looked at Mandy who looked equally bewildered. It seems that Jenny is finally listening as she begins to lower you down, but then pauses and carries you back up to her face. The big, sweet grin on her face makes you regret opening your mouth. “That's not a problem. Daddy-dolly, you and Jet are now my boyfriends, problem solved.”

“Problem not solved!” You scream, but know it's pointless. Every argument you've made has been disregarded or twisted around on by Jenny's innocent mind. Holding you tightly, she brings you to her mouth and you squirm desperately. You might be in just as much trouble as before, but you'd be damned if you didn't fight back. As Jenny's warm breath blows on your wet face, you can only shout out one thing. “You are in so much trouble when I talk to your mother!”
141111221222121111222.title: Daddy/Daughter Talk

choices: She has to go as well
141111221222122.content:
Mandy's mother walks up the stairs. She's had a hell of a day and she'd already be asleep if it weren't for the girls making so much noise up here. She opens the door to her daughter's bedroom and walks in to find them sitting on the bed together, giggling to one another. She leans her weight against the door frame and crosses her arms. "It's almost nine-o'clock", she says wearily. "Time for bed." "Yes, mommy", Mandy replies. There is sadness in her voice. Mandy's mother smiles, knowing that she is just trying to make her feel guilty. She walks over and gives each girl a kiss on the forehead. "Goodnight, girls", she says just before leaving the room and heading back downstairs.

With her mother out of sight, Mandy let's out a little burp which makes Jenny giggle. "Can you feel him?" she asks. Mandy nods as she feels him wiggling around inside her belly. "Uh huh! It feels like I ate a froggie." "He's not rubbing?", Jenny asks. Mandy shakes her head no, "maybe he's mad." Jenny kneels down next to Mandy's stomach and listens in. She can just barely make out her daddy's muffled screams among the various squishes and splorches of Mandy's interior. He definitely sounds mad. She backs away and pokes Mandy's belly to get his attention. "Daddy", she says in a commanding voice, "stop being grumpy and rub Mandy's belly like a good dolly!" She gets up and apologizes to Mandy. "It's okay", she replies. "Let's go brush our teeth!"

A few minutes later, the girls are both curled up in bed. Mandy is still awake, though. She frowns as she thinks about Jenny's daddy. Even though he tasted really good, he put up a fight when she tried to eat him and, when she did finally manage to keep him down, he only wiggled around for a couple of minutes. She turns over and pokes Jenny, "Hey." Jenny blinks her eyes open before responding, "...huh?" "Is Jet still moving around for you?", Mandy asks. Jenny yawns, then says "Uh-huh..." She lifts up her shirt. "He stops sometimes, but I just go like this-" she taps on her belly in demonstration. "-And... Mmm... he starts rubbing me again." Mandy puts her hand against Jenny's tummy and feels the wiggling movement of Jenny's brother inside. Mandy tries rapping her hand against her own belly. Nothing happens. She does it again, and again she gets no response. "Why aren't you rubbing me?!" she demands. She looks back over to Jenny for suggestions, but she's already fallen back asleep.

Mandy gives up for now. She lays there, trying not to think about it. Her mind starts to wind down, and she begins to drift to sleep. Before she does, she hears Jenny murmur to herself, "Mmm... Thank you Jetty-doll... that feels good..." Mandy falls asleep, wishing she got to eat Jet, instead.

---The Next Morning---

A knock against the door wakes Mandy up. "Rise and shine, you two!" Mandy's mother declares. Mandy covers herself in sheets. She hopes her mother will just go away. Instead, she hears her again. "Wakey, wakey! Eggs and bakey! Come on you two, breakfast is downstairs." After not getting a response a second time, Mandy hears her walk out and down the stairs. She smiles as she tries to get a few more minutes of shut-eye.

Out of nowhere, the sheets come flying off. Mandy opens her eyes in a glare to see that Jenny has kicked them off in a mighty stretch. "Ah... Good morning", Jenny yawns at her. "..Morning", Mandy grumps. She stares at her friend as though she'd just stepped on her foot. Jenny is preoccupied as looks downward. She stares down at her tummy for a second, then says "Uh oh." "What?" Mandy asks, sitting up. All Jenny says is "Jet", before jumping up and rushing out of the room. Mandy doesn't put together what she said until she hears the bathroom door close.

'Guess I won't be getting anymore sleep' Mandy thinks to herself.

What happens next?
141111221222122.title: Bedtime

1411112212221221.content:
Mandy decides to head downstairs and get breakfast while Jenny is busy. When she gets to the kitchen, she sees her mom laying out plates at the table. Mandy walks up to an empty chair and takes a seat. "Where's Jenny?", her mother asks. "She's getting her Jetty-doll so he can come to breakfast too!" she says happily. Mandy's mother looks confused, "huh? She's bringing who?" It hits her that Mandy must be talking about one of Jenny's dolls. "Oh! No, no, honey. Go back upstairs and tell her no dollies at the table. You know the rules." "Aww! but mom-", Mandy begs. "No means no, Mandy!" her mothers voice makes her cringe. She quietly leaves the table and heads back upstairs.

She waits at the bedside until Jenny comes out of the bathroom. She walks up to Mandy with her hands behind her back and a big smile on her face. She then swings her hands around and presents her little brother. "Ta-da!", she announces while rubbing his head with her finger. "He's all clean and ready for breakfast. Say hi to Mandy, Jetty-doll!" He looks up at Mandy and gives a timid smile and weak wave. Mandy thinks he's adorable, but loses her smile when she remembers the bad news.

She grabs Jetty-doll from Jenny's palm and sets him down gently on the edge of the bed. "Mommy says he can't come to breakfast." "What? Why not?" Jenny asks, almost angry. "She said 'no dollies allowed at the table'", mocking the voice of her mother. "Aww man", Jenny pouted. She looked over to Jet. "Sorry Jet, you gotta wait here while we eat breakfast." Jet looks terrified, shaking his head no while waves his hands in the air. He doesn't want to be left alone. "You really want to come, huh", Mandy frowns. "What if we hide him while we eat?" Jenny suggests. The idea makes Mandy nervous, she doesn't want to risk getting in trouble if her mom finds out. Then again, she feels bad for little Jet. She leans over to him and asks, "can you promise to keep quiet while we eat?" Jet shakes his head yes enthusiastically. "See, he'll be good", Jenny backs him up. "Okay, but I get to hold him", Mandy says as she grabs him. Jenny nods and the three go downstairs.

They can smell the eggs before they get down the stairs. The kitchen is lively, and the table is set. There's abundant helpings of eggs, hash browns, and ham sitting at every spot on the table. Jenny and Mandy take seats across from Mandy's mother and older sister, leaving the chair at the end of the table for Mandy's father. "It smells really good!" Jenny compliments. "Thank you, thank you. It's one of those things you pick up while being a mom", Mandy's mother gloats as she pretends to dust her shoulders off.

The girls dig into the food right away. Jenny is not used to such heavy portions of food, but she likes a challenge. Mandy tries to eat, but is preoccupied with Jet. Even though he's been being quiet, he keeps trying to get her attention. Time and time again, he tugs on her shirt or tries to climb up to the table. She keeps having to grab him and put him back down. After the third time, Mandy decides...
1411112212221221.title: Breakfast with Mandy's family

choices: Her sister eating from her plate.
Her food is still all there.
14111122122212211.content:
Mandy looks down at Jetty-doll, catching him halfway up her shirt again. She wonders why he keeps trying to climb up. He probably hasn't had anything good to eat in a while, she guesses. Poor little guy. She is about to skirt some eggs off the table for him when she gets a better idea. She looks around. Her mother is digging into her food, eyeballing the doorway occasionally, while her sister, Natalie, is busy texting. Perfect, she decides, and lifts Jetty-doll up. Quickly and quietly, she stuffs him into the pile of eggs on her plate. She then uses her fork to tuck him further in to make sure he is buried and out of sight. Everything but his face is covered. She doesn't think anyone else can see him but her.

That's when she notices Jenny staring. She must have been watching the whole time. Mandy looks at her, gauging her reaction. A wave of relief washes over her when she sees her smile and wink. She turns back to Jetty-doll. He's busy chomping down on her eggs. He looks adorable, happily stealing her food like that. She gently nudges him with a fork while smiling, as if to say: 'Hey, that's mine!.' He almost giggles as the fork pokes him.

Mandy tries to be more playful, using her fork to tickle him. She has to keep reburying him with more eggs so no one notices as spazzes out in silent laughter. She stops every once and a while to see if anyone noticed, but they are all busy eating.

Jenny finishes her plate first. Everyone else, with the exception of Mandy, is getting close when Mandy's father walks in. He speedwalks by the table, as if in panic. Mandy focuses her attention on him. He's dressed up like he always is when he goes to work. "I thought it was your off day!?" she asks, almost yelling. "They called me in", he grunts unhappily as he grabs the cup of coffee waiting for him under the keurig. Mandy can see her mother getting visibly upset when he leaves the room as quickly as he entered. The only sound after that is the jingle of keys, and the door opening then closing.

It was already quiet at the table before, but now things felt awkward. Mandy decides to focus on eating her hash browns. A few minutes later, the doorbell rings breaks the tension.

~~~~~

Angela walks up the steps towards the door. She spent the entire day yesterday all by herself, no thanks to Steve. She knows that his dumb little 'Secret Survival Training' sessions with Jet are important to him, but she'd wish he'd at least leave a note or something. She always gets worried sick when they disappear for days without even saying anything. It irritated her to think about it.

As she rings the doorbell, Mandy's mother answers. She looks aggravated initially, but changes to a smile right away. "Oh! Hi, Angela! Come on in", she says. Angela doesn't make it three feet inside before Jenny runs into the room and hugs her legs. "Mommy!" she squeals in delight. "Hi, sweetie. Did you have fun with Mandy's family?" "Uh-huh! It was tons of fun, we got to-". Jenny's mother interrupts her, "that's nice, sweetie. We need to hurry up and get going, though. We have a big day ahead!" Jenny looks confused. "Where are we going?", she asks curiously. "We're going to have our first ever girl day", Angela replies, excited. "What about Daddy-doll and Jet? Can they come, too?" Jenny asks while looking towards the kitchen. Angela waves her hand dismissively, "Let's not talk about them, okay? They'll be fine. They always come back on their own in a few days. Besides, it wouldn't be girl day if they came with us." Jenny looks sad. She tries to cheer her up. "Come on, let's go get some ice cream!" she says as she grabs her daughter's hand and leads her towards the door. Before they leave, Jenny suddenly breaks her grip. Angela turns to see her run over and give her little friend a big hug. She awes at the cute sight.

~~~~~

Mandy listens to Jenny and her mommy talk. She can't believe Jenny's mom is just going to leave Jetty-doll and daddy-doll here. When Jenny runs over and gives her a big hug, she whispers into her ear: "Have fun with my dollies, okay?" Mandy nods. Jenny then turns around and runs out the front door, screaming: "yay! Ice Cream!"

Mandy is about to head back into the kitchen when she hears something rustling behind her. She turns to find her mommy digging through her purse on the table. She had a coat on like she was leaving, too! "Where are you going, mommy?" she asks. "Mommy has some errands to run, baby", she replies. She yanks out her keys and dangles them victoriously in her hand. She then shouts into the kitchen. "Natalie! You watch your sister, yeah?" "Yeah. Whatever!" Her sister shouts back. Her mother then leans down and kisses her on the forehead, "you be good, honey."

Within seconds, she's out the door as well. Mandy stands there for a minute, overwhelmed by the situation. Everyone left so fast. She's brought back to reality hears a clinking sound coming from the kitchen. That's when she remembers Jet. She just left him there in the eggs.

She rushes back to find...
14111122122212211.title: Feeding Jet

choices: She convinces him to go inside.
Mandy's sister comes in and grabs him.
141111221222122112.content:
Mandy runs back into the kitchen. Natalie is busy gathering the plates up off the table. She reaches her hand towards Mandy's plate, but pauses. "Are you going to finish this?", she asks. "Uh-huh", Mandy nods. Mandy jumps back in her seat and takes a bite out of her now-cold hash browns. She is relieved to see Jet's confused face poking out from the eggs. Natalie dumps the plates into the sink and begins to wash them. "Okay, then. Put your plate in the sink when you're done", she tells her as she rinses the plates hastily. "kay kay", Mandy replies.

Natalie turns off the sink and starts walking toward her. Mandy quickly uses her fork to push Jet as deep as she can into the remaining pile of eggs. She turns to see Natalie looking down at her. "Amy is coming over later, don't bother us when she gets here, got it?" "got it", she agrees. Natalie smiles and pats her on the head. "Good girl", she says and leaves the room. Mandy waits to hear the door to her room close before turning back towards Jet. They were alone now. 'Playtime', she thinks to herself.

She tries to resume the game they were playing earlier, tickling him and so on, but he isn't acting like before. He runs off the plate, pushing the fork away when she tries to prod him. "What's wrong?", she asks. Jet didn't answer, he was terrified. It was okay before when his sister was there to protect him, but now she was gone. He didn't have a clue where his father was, either. Probably in Jenny's tummy, he guessed.

"It's okay, little guy" she says, smiling as she nudges him with the fork. She pushes too hard, though, causing him to fall backwards onto the tabletop. "Oops!" she giggles. She puts the fork down and starts tickling Jet's body with her finger. Jet tries to fight her, but he's always been ticklish. He can't stop himself from laughing as he is assaulted by her finger. Mandy laughs as well, watching his little body twitch all over the tabletop.

She lifts her fingers off of him to give him chance to recover. He has some trouble getting back up; he feels stuck! With some effort, he manages to pry himself off and stand up. He sees that he accidentally rolled into a drop of syrup that spilled on the table. Mandy sees it too, and she sees the syrup strewn across his back. He looks delicious.

"Mmm... Jet, you look yummy..." Jet turns to see Mandy's grinning face hovering closer. His eyes follow her tongue as it slowly slides across her lips. He starts backing up, knowing exactly what she's thinking. Before he can run, Mandy's fingers reach over and pluck him up. "Noo!" he screams as she lifts him towards her now open mouth. She pushes his little body against her tongue, leaving her finger on his chest. 'He tastes sweeter than Jenny's daddy did', she thinks as she drags her tongue across him.

Meanwhile, Jet is busy thrashing hard and screaming. He tried pushing the finger off of him, but it won't budge. The tongue slithers up across his back, sending chills down his spine. "Don't eat me!" he screams again, hoping she'll let him go. She doesn't. She just licks him again and again, letting his body slide further into her mouth.

Mandy is trying to enjoy her little snack, but Jetty-doll's screams are making her tear up. She tries to ignore it, letting go of him and letting her tongue drag him all the way inside. She closes her mouth and rolls him around on her tongue, but she can still hear him screaming. She can't do it. His screams are too much; it's like needles in her brain. She reaches in and pulls out his soaked body, setting him down on the table.

Jet doesn't know why she let him out; he doesn't even think about it. He just tries to wipe the spit off his face and chest. He hears a sniffle from behind him which stops him. Looking up, he finds Mandy on the verge of crying. Tears well up in her eyes while she looks down at him. When the first tear rolls down her cheek, she hides her face in her hands and cries. Jet feels a pit in his stomach. He doesn't even realize that he's walking over to her until he rests a hand on her elbow. He forces himself to swallow the lump in his throat. "...What's wrong?", he asks. "...You h-hate me!" she cries. Her statement stabs him in the heart. "I don't hate you... I just didn't want to be eaten" he says, almost on the verge of crying as well. "Why not?! You let Jenny do it!" She's crying even harder.

Jet can't stand watching this girl cry. "It's not because I don't like you. It's just..." Jet isn't really sure himself why he resisted so much, earlier. He knew he would make it out okay. "It was just so sudden, and... I don't really know you, yet." To his surprise, Mandy stops crying. She sniffles as she wipes her eyes and stares at him. "I won't hurt you... I promise", she says with sincerity. Jet breaks eye contact, looking down at his feet. "I know...", he says, "but... couldn't we get to know each other, first?" She nods at him "Okay."

They both stare at one another awkwardly for a moment as they each think of something to say. Then, Mandy breaks the silence with: "What ifff... you played in my mouth for a little bit? I won't swallow, I swear!" She rocks herself from side to side cutely as she asks. She seems to be in a better mood already. Jet doesn't respond. He isn't comfortable talking about this. He doesn't really want to say yes, but he's also scared he'll make her cry again.

Mandy decides to make the first move, lowering her chin down to the tabletop. "Hop in", she says before opening her mouth, presenting the glistening walls of her mouth to him. When Jet doesn't move, she tries to convince him again. "Just for a couple minutes. It'll be fun, I promise!"

What happens next?
141111221222122112.title: Alone with Mandy

1411112212221221121.content:
Her tongue lulls out onto the table as if it were some wet pink carpet. Jet stares at it for a moment while thinking to himself. "Okay..." he says, relaxing his shoulders and sighing. It'll only be for a few minutes. He steps onto the girl's tongue and let's himself fall forward. His hands sink into the slimy surface as he puts his weight on it. Taking a deep breath, he begins to crawl inside.

When he crawls all the way inside, he finds that it's just as cramped in here as was in his sister's mouth. His face is already hot with her breath. Without warning, Mandy retracts her tongue and closes her lips. His heart rate goes up as he is pulled into darkness. He waits for a moment, but nothing happens. His ears are filled with the sound of her breathing and the tongue idling in spit below him. Mandy lets him sit there for a few minutes, not doing anything. She tries to imagine what he sees as she feels his arms and legs on her tongue.

Her jaw eventually gets tired of holding itself open and she relaxes it. She feels his body squishing between her tongue and pallet. He squirms hard for a moment, but then calms back down. His tastes runs across her tongue as he moves; it's really good! She tries to ignore it, fighting the urge to play with him. She doesn't want to scare him. She also, however, isn't sure what to do next. She isn't ready to let him out yet, so she decides to watch some television for a while.

Half an hour goes by; she almost forgets he's even there. She laughs for the third time while watching cartoons. Jet cups his ears and almost falls out as he is bounced around. As her mouth closes again, he accidentally slides down under her tongue. It slaps down on him, and she feels him trying to get out from under it. She snickers to herself but decides to assist him. The pink muscle rears itself up, then dives down and scoops him back up. Jet lays himself body back down on top of it as it slithers back and forth across his body slowly. Mandy doesn't even realize she's doing it. She slowly, unconciously, plays with him more and more. By the end of the hour, she's rolling him around in her mouth like a piece of candy.

Out of nowhere, the doorbell rings. Her mouth goes slack as she gets up to look out the windows. The woman outside looks familiar, but she can't place it. Natalie's door opens upstairs and she runs out to answer. "It's Amy, remember?", she says in a frustrated tone as she walks past Mandy. "Oh, yeah", Mandy replies as she walks back to the couch. She's already sucked back into the television and Jet when Amy walks in. As the two pass by, Amy pats Mandy on the back. "Hey there, squirt", she says. The force on her back startles Mandy. In that split second, Jet accidentally slides backwards into Mandy's throat. By instinct, Mandy reflexively swallows. She starts to choke as her throat slowly accepts his wiggling figure. She can't stop herself from swallowing a few more times to keep herself from choking.

She feels him squirming all the way down her gullet until he disappears into her stomach. She probably would have enjoyed it if she wasn't in so much shock. Her panic gives her hiccups, which interrupts her yelp. 'Noo!' she yells at herself internally. She really wanted him to trust her, too.

The two older girls notice her little fit, and ask if she's okay. She looks at them and tells them...
1411112212221221121.title: Inside Mandy's Mouth

14111122122212211211.content:
Natalie and Amy see Mandy choke on something for a second, then swallow it down. "Mandy! Are you okay?", Natalie asks as she runs to the front of the couch. She looks her sister over, then points accusingly at her friend. "What are you trying to kill her?!" Amy throws her hands up, "it was an accident!" Mandy hiccups, drawing Natalie's attention back to her. "I'm okay." Mandy says as she coughs and thinks to herself about Jetty-doll. "Phew!", Natalie sighs in relief. Her mom would KILLED her if anything were to happen to Mandy while she was gone. She flicks her sister in the head as punishment for being stupid. "Be more careful, okay?" She doesn't wait for an answer; she and Amy just walk away up the stairs.

Mandy listens to her sister as she leaves, telling Amy how Mandy was going to have a hard life. It doesn't phase her. She really let Jet down. She looks at the television. She can't bring herself to watch it anymore. She just walks upstairs, lays in bed, and cries into her pillow.

~~~~~

Jet pulls himself up again. He doesn't bother wiping the mushy eggs and ham off his body again. He just tries to find his balance on the moving floor below. A jolt around him and a slight misstep send him tumbling back down into the gooey liquids of Mandy's stomach.

He thinks about his predicament as he lays in the soup. Mandy's mouth had been overwhelming at times but, after a while, he didn't mind the way he was being licked and sucked on. Then, suddenly, against her word, she swallowed him. The transition happened so fast, it caught him by surprise. He wonders if she swallowed him on accident. It didn't matter, now that he was here. He was stuck her for a while. Again, he took in the humid air as he watched the walls pulsate around him. It really wasn't all that different from his sister's belly. It even smelled the same.

He thinks he hears something when another jolt sends Mandy's breakfast splashing onto his face. He wipes the slime off and listens carefully. 'She's crying...', he realizes. It's hard to hear over her beating heart and the other noises, but she's definitely crying. He knows he should be mad at her, but the more he listens to it the more terrible he feels inside. She continues for a few more minutes until he can't take it anymore. He has to do something!

Jet gets on his feet and does the only thing he could think of. He crawled up to the wall and rubbed it, just the way his sister liked it.

~~~~~

Mandy stops crying when she starts feeling Jet in her belly. She didn't know what he was doing but it felt amazing. She wiped her eyes dry, then flipped over onto her back. The feeling stops, but comes back right away. She puts her hand on her stomach and focuses on the feeling. 'Was it Jet?' she wondered. "Jet, is that you?" she asked. Then she felt a distinct knock coming from her belly. It was him! She didn't know what to say after that. Jet had no reason to be nice to her... "Thank you, Jetty-doll", is all she manages as she lies there, almost in a trance.

Her bliss is eventually interrupted when she feels the sudden urge to poo. "Jet, can you stop for a minute? I need to go potty." Jet readily stops, thankful for the break as he lies on his back against the fleshy stomach floor.

Mandy releases herself and is about to flush when she hears a little shout. She looks down, shocked to see your body bobbing alone in the toilet. "Don't flush me!", you shout. Mandy takes her hand off the flusher. "Now get me out of here!", you growl. She gives you a disgusted look, which tells you she doesn't want to touch you. You instruct her to get something for you to grab on to and pull you out. When she picks up a toothbrush, you stop her for a moment out of courtesy. "Uhm... You sure that's what you want to use?" She smiles and says, "don't worry, it's not mine." You don't argue with her. A minute later she is scrubbing you down with it in the sink. "Eww...", she complains as she scrubs the smell off of you. "Tell me about it", you agree.
14111122122212211211.title: Making the best of a bad situation

choices: Dive in and get your son back
141111221222122112111.content:
Mandy holds you in her left hand as she reclines against a couple pillows on her bed. "Where's Jenny?", you ask as your first question. It feels like you spent an eternity inside this brat. "She went home with her mommy." "What? Seriously? What did my wife... Jenny's mommy say about me being here?" "She didn't care." 'That was an obvious lie', you think to yourself. "Okay... Where's Jet? With Jenny?" She shakes her head no, then knocks gently on her stomach. You watch as her muscles relax and her eyes nearly roll into the back of her head. "Mmm... he's in here", she says as she rubs her stomach.

You feel like you are on some alien world as you watch this girl enjoy the feeling of your son in her stomach. "Right, well... I'd like to use the phone... do you mind?", you say. She doesn't let you down. "Let me down, please", you try again. You decide to try prying her fingers off of you.

Mandy watches Jenny's daddy-doll struggle in her hand. He's never been very nice to her. Now he wanted to get up and move around. All she wanted to do was lay there for just a little while longer. She could let him go, but then she couldn't just let him wander around the house by himself. She didn't want to have to hold him the entire time, either. The answer was simple. She wondered what it was going to be like with BOTH of them in her belly. She tries to imagine it and her mouth waters. She swallows her spit and finally talks. "You know...", she says. "You should be helping Jetty-doll in there..." She pulls him closer as she remembers what Jenny did earlier, pushing him down with her finger...

You're pushed headfirst into Mandy's mouth. You can feel your legs still kicking the air outside. 'If I can just...', you think just before she slurps the rest of his body inside. Damn... You'll never understand what drives people to keep trying to eat you like this. That's your last thought before Mandy's tongue starts batting you around.

She swishes you around slightly until you are face to face with her throat. 'This again, eh', you think to yourself as you stare down into the darkness below. Some light blooms in from behind you, illuminating the undulated shaft below, and you suddenly feel fingers on your butt. She slowly forces your body forward. You try to push backwards and elude her fingers, but neither work. Your body slides down until she swallows, sending your body sliding down into her throat. Your chest and head are gripped tightly as you are pulled downward. Just before your legs are swallowed up as well, though, you manage to wrap them around her withdrawing finger. You keep a death grip on her finger as she pulls it back. You feel yourself moving back up her throat until finally she coughs, spitting you back out onto the bed.

You land near the edge of the bed, at the start of the sheets. Your first instinct is to dive into the sheets and try to lose her as you make your escape. You can't see her, but you feel her right behind you as you crawl forward.

~~~~~

Mandy recovers from nearly choking on you. Now she watches as a little figure darts around under the sheets of her bed. It's almost too easy as she just cups her hand over him and traps him in place. She reaches her hand under the sheets and pulls him out by his leg. Dangling him in front of her face, she lectures him "naughty, naughty! You're going in my tummy and that's final!" He yells something at her but she doesn't pay attention. She just stuffs him back in her mouth.

...

Attempt after attempt, she tries to gulp him down. No matter what she tried, he's always keep himself from going down. She was clearly doing something wrong, but she didn't know what. After the third attempt, she's too tired to keep trying. Jet's rubbing had started making her sleepy. Her eyelids were starting to get heavy and, frankly, she didn't care if she could gobble him up or not. She felt content just keeping him trapped him in her mouth. 'At least he can't get out', she thinks as she tongues him around tiredly. She tries to keep her eyes open, but soon they were just too heavy. 'Maybe I'll just take a quick nap', she thinks to herself.

~~~~~

You realize Mandy is getting tired when her tongue starts to lose its ferocity. Now, you lay underneath the beast in a pool of spit. Sliding it off of you is easier than you thought. Did she actually fall asleep? You test your luck by trying to pry her mouth open, and to your surprise you find it really easy. Her jaw falls open and fresh air pours in. You can finally get out of here. Swinging your legs over her bottom teeth, you remember that your son is still in this girl's stomach. You wonder if you should go get him. You've crawled out of Tulip while she was asleep when you were younger, you could do it again.

What do you decide?
141111221222122112111.title: Mandy's Candy

choices: Someone else shows up at the house
1411112212221221121112.content:
You stare back into Mandy’s open mouth, your only way of reaching your son. It would be so easy to slip back into the slippery, dripping cavern and travel down Mandy’s throat. You’ve been swallowed so much today traveling to another belly didn’t scare you. You worry about your son, especially at how accepting he’s become with being eaten by others and treated like a toy. You need to talk to him and that almost makes you crawl back into Mandy’s mouth. However, you tried reaching your son before and that only made things worse. If you really want to help him, you need to get to someone that doesn’t see you as daddy-doll, but another human being. Turning away from Mandy’s drooling maw, you travel down the bed to get help.

You stare at the giant young girl, so small and innocent to a normal person, but a literal man-eater to you. She’s rolled to her side, her belly becoming exposed as she turned. Gazing at her soft, slightly chubby gut, you decided to do one last thing before you go. Quickly running up to the wall of flesh, you press your palm down against the area just above the belly button. “Jet! Jet!” You call out, glancing up to make sure you haven’t woken the giant girl. You call his name again before you feel movement beneath the flesh. You shudder a bit, its disturbing to think your child is inside this girl and the only thing separating you is blood and flesh. Rubbing the area where you can feel movement, you speak to your soon and just hope he can hear you inside this beast of a little girl.

“I’m going to get mom. I’ll be back soon; you just try not to get sucked into the intestines. We’ll get you out, I promise.” The flesh vibrates under your palm. It’s impossible to tell if he heard you, but at least you tried. Staring one last time at the stomach that had been your prison, you dash off to get some help.

Sliding down the sheets hanging off the bed, you hit the ground running. Usually you’re a bit more careful moving around, taking your time to make sure your safe, but you’re in a rush. Even running as fast as you can, it takes a few minutes to reach her door. Dropping to your belly, you crawl under the bottom of her bedroom door to the hallway. Catching your breath, one step closer to getting some help, you glance down both ends of the hallway. Mandy’s room is between her parent’s room and her sister’s room. You can hear people talking in both locations, but you hesitate. Who should you go to for help?

The logical choice should be Mandy’s mother, Joyce. She was the only adult in the house and had your wife’s number in case of emergencies. However, your not so sure that she’s the person you want to deal with right now. Joyce was a beautiful woman; your wife often said that her husband had married way up and it was true. However, Joyce was also a very unhappy woman. She constantly complained about her husband and kids whenever you saw her, telling you how she never felt appreciated. Her attitude wasn’t that worrying, but the way she treated you did send off a few warnings. Whenever you were around she always asked to hold you, saying it felt good to have a man she could carry around with her wherever she goes. She often joked with your wife about trading husbands, Ashley could have hers to fix up the house and she could have you to finally have someone who won’t run away. Ashley thought she was joking, but that smug smile she got when she looked at you just made you unsure about her trustworthiness.

The other choice was the oldest child in the house, Mandy’s teenage sister Natalie and her friend who you overheard from Mandy’s intestines. You didn’t know much about Natalie and nothing about her friend. Whenever you saw her she was either on the phone or too busy to look at you. She seemed like a typical apathetic teenager, which might be either good or bad for you. Over the years you’ve dealt with a lot of teens that saw you as just an adult they can push around, but some just help you out to get back to whatever they are doing. Natalie and her friend might help you or just shove you into a drawer to deal with later.

It was a tough call, but you had to trust someone, but who?
1411112212221221121112.title: Escape To Where?

14111122122212211211121.content:
As you stand in the hallway, you hear Natalie and Amy break out into shrieks again. After dealing with Mandy and your daughter for the last couple days, you really don't feel up to putting up with the sass of two teenage girls. They probably wouldn't help you, anyways. That leaves Joyce as your only option. As you approach her door, you can hear her talking to someone on the phone. You can't really make out what she's saying, though.

It takes you a minute to reach her door and crawl underneath. Once you're back on your feet, you see Joyce sitting on the edge of her bed on the phone. You can tell that she's worked up about something as you walk up to her leg. "Well, it wouldn't be the first time he skipped town to go visit what's-her-face. Even even if he is, though, what can I do? I can't go out and party, I've got the kids with me." You're halfway across the room when you piece together what she is talking about. It's a matzaball you'd rather not deal with. You might be a doctor, but you're no a love doctor. You swivel around on your heels and start heading back towards the door before she notices you. Joyce continues her conversation, "No, like I said... I'm with the kids, Natalie's not going to watch Mandy all night while I go out and part...y. Um, I have to call you back." You hear the click of the phone and feel the hairs stand on the back of your neck. "S-Steve?", her voice falls falls over you like anvils.

"Steve, is that you?", she asks again. You are frozen in place as you hear her slide off the bed and thump towards you. When the floor around you goes dark with her shadow, you turn awkwardly and try to put on your best fake smile. "Oh... Hey Joyce! What a surprise!", you wave and look up at her as she squats over you. "Steve What are you doing here?... Oh my god! Where are your clothes?!" Joyce puts her hands over her mouth. You watch as her eyes scan your body over before making eye contact. You laugh nervously to yourself as you think of how to explain everything. "It's um... a long story... haha."

...Some time later...

"...I could have gone back in for him, but I was like: 'Nope! Nope! No thank you.'" Joyce laughs again at your sarcastic tone and waving arms. When you first started telling your story, you were put off by her lighthearted take on the whole thing. She seemed to think that the whole situation was kind of hilarious. Her first reaction at her daughter's behavior was laughter. She'd always known that her little girl was going to be a man-eater. What struck you hardest was that she didn't see anything wrong with what her daughter was doing was doing. She thought it was cute the way Mandy tried to 'gobble you up', and even joked that you should babysit her more often. You were visibly mad but the longer you tried to argue with her, the more you gave in to her sweet smile and lighthearted laugh.

Now here you are, laughing along with her. You let yourself fall backwards in a stretch against something soft and warm. It takes you a moment before you realize what you're doing and your eyes snap open. Turning your head you see that... yup, you're laying in her breasts. Somewhere during the middle of the story, she took to the bed. She had propped her head up against a couple of pillows and sat you against her breasts. You were so busy arguing that you didn't even notice. You whip yourself upright and apologize, "I'm sorry! I didn't mean- I mean, I didn't realize-." Joyce smiles playfully at you. She places her finger against her face to shush you, "shhh, I know what you were doing. Go on in," she says playfully and pushes you back with her finger.

"Ack! No, no! That's not- hahaha", you try to talk but her fingers are tickling you. She keeps one finger pinned to your chest as her middle finger tickles your sides. You can't see it but you can swear you can feel something else rubbing your crotch as well. It goes on for a few more seconds until she pulls her fingers back and lets you catch your breath. When you regain your composure, there is a moment of silence that follows. You decide to break it. "So, do you mind calling up Angela for me? I should probably be getting back home." You can see Joyce's smile falter as you speak. It's probably the first time all day that she hasn't smiled at you.

She picks you up and lays you in her palm as she sits upright. Her face is pleading as she looks at you and asks, "do you have to leave so soon? I never have anyone to talk to, you know?" You feel bad, knowing that Joyce's husband isn't the most pleasant of people even when he is around. "Please? It's nice having someone like you around, and I could use a man around the house for a while", she asks again. Her eyes remind you of a puppy's. Angela should really know where you guys are, but you know that the moment you tell her she'll be flying over to take you and Jet home. Jet... The memories flood back as you remember where exactly your son is right now. He's probably deep into Mandy's intestines by now. You guess that it wouldn't kill you to stay a couple more hours. "Huh... huh... holy cow. That was really good." She doesn't get any response. "Stevie?" Her hand start to move down while she worries if he's okay. She started pushing him out until his head popped out. The sound she heard right then made her laugh. "You little shit! Haha! Just like a man", Joyce says as she listens to his snoring. He continues to snore for another minute, which was cute at first but got annoying rather quickly. Joyce discreetly pushes his head back inside her ass until he was completely tucked away again. "There we go."

She smiled as she stared at the ceiling spin around her. She was pretty well drunk, but she was pretty sure that it'd been a long time since she'd had this kind of attention... certainly the last time was before she was married... She thinks of Steve as she hugs her pillow and closes her eyes.
1411112212221221121112111111.title: Joyce's Turn

14111122122212211211121111111.content:
Joyce wakes up to a loud knocking against the door. She squints as her headache stabs at her brain, "ugh, what the hell..." She stumbles out of bed and yawns while throwing on the nearest set of pajamas. Before she gets to the door, the visitor knocks again. This time more harshly than the last. "Yeah, yeah. I'm coming." She pulls open the door to see Angela in tears, holding a crying Jenny by the hand. "Joyce! Where are Steve and Jet!" The woman's hair is a mess. It takes Joyce a minute to process what is happening. "Oh, oh. Sorry, it's been a long night. Please, come in." Mandy opens her door to see what all the commotion is about and sees Jenny standing in the living room. "Jenny!", she cheers and runs into the living room. Her run slows to a stop when she senses the tension in the air. "What's going on, mommy?" "Don't worry Mandy, Angela's just here to pick up Jet and S-". Joyce suddenly gets a flashback to last night and realizes that Steve is still tucked away inside her ass.

She clears her throat. "Ahem! Sorry. Jet and Steve. Since Mandy wouldn't stop playing with Jet, I had to hide him in a cookie jar all night." Joyce leads Angela into the kitchen while Jenny sits, sulking, on the couch. Joyce reaches up and pulls down the cookie jar and hands it to Angela. "Jet's in here, I'll be right back." Joyce tries to hide her fear as she calmly strolls out of sight. Once around the corner, though, she dashes for the bathroom. 'I can't deal with this right now!', she thinks as her headache throbs while she removes her pajamas. As quickly as she can manage, she pushes Steve out, she then grabs his upper body and pulls the rest of him out. Pulling him around to look at him, she sees that he's still asleep. "Dammit! Wake up!", she says as she pokes him. No use. She then dumps him into the sink and turns on the faucet. "Wake up you lazy bum!" The water makes her realize that she'll have to clean him, too. She frantically scrubs him down while he slowly wakes up.

You were just having the nicest dream about being all wrapped up in a snuggly blanket when suddenly a waterfall hits you in the face. "Bleh! Ack!" you struggle not to drown as tan hands scrub you down. "Get off me, Mandy!" "Hey!" You recognize Joyce's voice instantly. "Your wife is here. I'm going to tell her you were sleeping in the bathroom, okay?" Before you have time to respond, she turns off the faucet and quickly rubs you down with a towel. You sit up slowly in her hand while trying to remember what the hell happened last night... You look up at Joyce who is sweating as she carries you out of the bathroom. "Shiiiiiit!", you slap your face as it comes back to you.

Joyce walks you out to the kitchen and exclaims, "here he is! He was sleeping in the bathroom, heehee!" You sigh to yourself as you listen to Joyce's unnatural tone. Angela is across the room, holding Jet in her hands. Mandy, down below is jumping up, trying to reach for him but failing. When Angela sees you, she cups Jet to her chest. "Steve... I'm- I'm so sorry. I had no idea." She tucks Jet into her bra and reaches for you. She opens her hands and you walk into them. "It's okay, you didn't know", you say, trying to reassure her. "Jenny said that Mandy was babysitting you two this morning and I asked her what I was talking about and... and..." She starts crying. Her legs are shaking. "Come on, let's sit down, okay? I'm fine." Angela nods and sits down on the couch in the living room while wiping the tears from her eyes. "It's okay", you tell her again.

You hear a door open and see Natalie coming out of her room. She's wearing headphones and doesn't even notice your whole family in the living room as she slinks into the kitchen. You hear the fridge open and close, then watch her begin to head back. Before she leaves the kitchen, however, she stops. Taking off her headphones and turns around to face Joyce. "Hey, by the way, mom. Could you keep it down next time you decide to fuck Mr. McMinor? Thanks." She then casually puts her earphones back in and mutters to herself as she turns the corner. Your eyes meet and she stops dead in her tracks when she sees the rest of your family staring at her. "Oh... shit", she says before running back into her room.

"What?..." Angela asks as she looks down at you. Tears start forming in her eyes again and suddenly you don't feel like you're in the safest of places anymore. "Angela...", you have no idea what you should be saying right now, but you are pretty sure it's something. "It's not exactly like that." "He and I just-", Joyce begins to talk but is cut off when Angela points a finger at her. "YOU DON'T TALK! wHaT dO yoU mEaN iT's noT liKe tHat, sTEVE?"

You can see Angela falling apart right in front of you. You have to set it all straight. Last night was a mistake. If you want your marriage to work, you're going to have to lay everything out. You sigh before you begin. "Last night, Joyce and I got drunk and we sorta well", you look up to see Angela's bug-eyes and almost piss yourself. You have the wince to finish, "we got drunk and ended up having sex. I'm so sorry Angela. It was-", you are thrown from Angela's hands as she lifts them to her face to cover her bawling. You get back on your feet and walk over to her. When you put your hand on her leg, she parts her fingers to see you touching her and jumps off the couch. "DON'T TOUCH ME!", she screams at you. "IF YOU WANTED OUT THEN YOU COULD HAVE SAID SOMETHING, WE COULD HAVE TRIED TO WORK THINGS OUT!" "Angela... It's not-" "NO! JENNY! COME HERE!", Angela grabs Jenny's hand roughly and nearly drags her out the door. "Mommy! It hurts!", Jenny shouts as they exit the front door. You jump down from the couch and arrive at the door just in time to see her car peel out of the driveway and head down the road.

You turn to look at Joyce, and she looks back. Neither of you saying anything...

-----A FEW MONTHS LATER-----

After that day, Angela wanted nothing to do with you. She wouldn't talk to you, respond to e-mails, text messages, or anything. The most correspondence she gave you was to throw all your shit out in front of you, which wasn't much more than a handful to her. She lawyered up rather quickly and gained custody of the kids. You fought her back but the best you could manage was to get visitation rights on the weekends. As if things weren't bad enough, she got in touch with Joyce's husband and gave him all the details (you're pretty sure she made some things up, too). He disappeared from Joyce's household, leaving Joyce with a black eye and a handful of kids to take care of. You felt bad for her and, instead of getting your own apartment, you decided to move in and help her out with the family. You didn't love her like Angela, but she was nice to you and you have to admit that you do like her.

Life is different now, to say the least. You still have the same job as before, but living with Joyce's family was an adjustment. Joyce has proven herself to be a good woman to have around. Needy, but good. Natalie felt responsible for ruining your family and opened up to you a couple weeks in. She still largely ignores you, but if you two were the only people in the house... she'd talk to you. Mandy still treats you like a toy. She still loves putting you in her mouth whenever she gets a chance. She's also gotten really good at gulping you down now, too. You can't stop her anymore. Joyce thinks it's adorable; you're still getting used to it. At least she behaves when you're rubbing her stomach from the inside.

C'est la vie.
14111122122212211211121111111.title: The Next Morning

choices: That's not important right now, listen...
14111122122212211211122.content:
You didn't like the idea of getting help from the two teenage girls, but you could hear Joyce yelling at someone down the hall. She seems really upset. It's not a situation you want to deal with right now. You sigh and walk towards Natalie's room.

When you get to her room, you see the two girls sitting on the bed, each of them occupied with their phones. They don't notice you as you approach, so you start climbing the hanging bedsheets to get to the top. Just as you make it to the top, you hear on of them. "Oh my god!", Natalie's friend says just as you see her hand approaching you. The side of her hand slaps against you, you see stars, then everything goes black.

...

Water splashes down on your face, waking you in a panic. You sputter as you choke and try to sit up, but can't. Something is pinning you down. You try to pull up a leg or an arm, when you realize that the girls' two faces hover over you. "I know who you are, you know", Natalie says as she looks down on you with a frown. You'd respond but you realize that your mouth has been taped shut. That's probably what's holding you down to the desk as well. "You're Jenny's dad. What are you doing in my room?", she continues. "I told you", her friend says, "the little pervert was trying to sneak a peek at us."

Natalie looks over to her friend, "let's see what he has to say for himself." She then reaches down and pulls the tape off your mouth.

What do you say?
14111122122212211211122.title: Natalie and Amy
