As Natalie pulls the tape off your face, it leaves a nasty sting that you have to work through to answer her. "Ugh... I wasn't trying to sneak a peek at you! I couldn't give a damn less about you girls. I came here because I need your help!" Natalie raises an eyebrow at you. She pulls the tape off that's holding your body down to the desk. As you get up, she sits down in her desk chair in front of her. You can see her friend sitting on her bed, ignoring you and texting. "Okay, little man. Talk. Start with why you're here" Natalie says as she crosses her arms.

You sigh and begin your story. "It all started a couple nights ago. Jenny, my son, and I were sitting at home after dinner..." As you rambled out your retelling of the last few nights, you pace back and forth across the desk. Occasionally looking back at the girls, you see quickly that Natlie's friend is a lost cause since she's staring boredly at her phone. You did have Natalie's undivided attention, though. Her eyes wide were open as you tell her about letting your daughter swallow you; she grimaced as you described digging through the pizza for your son.

Natalie's phone vibrates in her hand. She looks down at it, then over at her friend whom is smirking. She replies quickly then looks back to you. Another buzz at her friend's phone, with a subsequent snicker. You wait to make sure you get Natalie's attention before continuing. While describing being stuck inside your daughter, you hear more buzzes between the girls. You decide to keep going as you pace back and forth across the desk.

"...and that's why I need your help!" You say at you turn dramatically towards them. Your eyebrows drop to a frown as you notice that none of them is paying you the least bit of attention anymore. Natalie is sitting with her legs crossed as she taps away at her phone. "Come on! Put the phones down. This is serious! You damn teenagers nowadays are so spoiled! You know we didn't even have phones when we were your age!"

Natalie looks up at you as you yell. "Oh my god, do you EVER stop talking?" "Get rid of him, Nat. His voice is annoying", her friend says while still looking at her phone. "Yah, good idea", Natalie says as she gets up. You try to back away but she easily pinches you between her fingers. She raises you up to her eyes, inspecting you. You detect a hint of disgust before she...
141111221222122112111221.title: Explaining Yourself to Natalie

choices: They make you into a necklace
141111221222122112111222.content:
Natalie's fingers pinch the tape on your face then peels it off quickly, leaving you with a stinging sensation like you'd just been slapped. "Agh!" You scream. Their eyes look at you accusingly, waiting for your response. "Listen", you say. "I could care less about 'sneaking a peek' at the two of you." "Yeah, right. That's why you quietly snuck in from under the door." Amy's voice raises in tone as she glares at you.

"No! Wait! Seriously!" You shout, while Amy reapplies the tape over your mouth. You try moving your limbs around but you're too tightly bound to the desk. "We should call the cops on perverts like you." Amy's voice drowns you out. Natalie shrugs at her friend, "I don't know... It's kind of hot." "What?", Amy asks. "Guy probably went through a lot of effort just to get a look at these", Natalie cups her breasts in her hands. Amy laughs, "Natalie, you're such a ho." Natalie punches her friend lightly in the shoulder, "heyyy! Think about it. The least we can do is give him what he wants." "What are you, loco? I'm not stripping down for some perv." "I didn't say we should strip. What we could do is..."

Natalie leans in to whisper into Amy's ear. You can't make out what she's saying, but anything except 'set him free' is going to spell trouble for you. You try the tape again, and once again it fails to budge. Amy backs away from Natalie, "ooh! That's... actually a pretty cool idea." They then both look at you.

What happens next?
141111221222122112111222.title: Natalie gets an idea

1411112212222.content:
"Spit him out," Jenny orders. "buh..." Mandy begins, but it's difficult to speak with Mr. McMinor in her mouth. The little guy hasn't stayed put since she stuck him in there. She stuffs him into her cheek to speak properly. "Look... He's being like this because..." She looks down at the floor again. "...because... he wanted to you to eat him and not me, just like Jet..."

Jenny takes a moment to watch the wiggling bulge in Mandy's cheek. "Aww... daddy-doll... you're the best!" She is about to tell Mandy to spit him out so she could eat him, but then turns to Mandy. "I already got to eat Jet again, so that wouldn't be fair." "That's what I tried to tell him, but he didn't wanna", Mandy replies. Jenny walks up to Mandy and puts her face up close to the Mandy's cheek. "Sharing is caring, remember daddy? That's what you said." She then pokes the moving bulge jokingly. Backing away, she nods at Mandy to go ahead.

-----

Lies. Lies lies lies lies lies! This word bounces around your head as you lie buried in Mandy's cheek. You aren't sure if it's just the humidity in this girl's mouth, but you feel hot with anger. What's worse is that while Mandy was talking, your leg slipped out of place and she accidentally bit down on it hard. It's not broken or anything, but you're sure it is going to leave a bruise.

As Jenny pokes you, you are pushed against Mandy's teeth. You shout out once again, "SHE'S LYING, JENNY! PLEASE HELP ME!" She obviously doesn't hear you, because she just keeps on talking. When she gets to the sharing is caring part, you sigh in frustration. She repeated the words you told her whenever she wouldn't share her toys with her brother.

Mandy works out what she's going to do in her head. "So I just stick my finger in and push him down?" she asks. Jenny is about to agree when she remembers what her father told her last night. "Yeah, also get him really wet so he slides down easier." she replies.

That's when the tongue drags you out from her cheek. The muscle then starts to go crazy, sliding itself all over. Mandy lathers you up in her spit until she feels satisfied. She gathers up so much that it's hard to keep your head above it. With a swift gulp, she swallows it all down. You watch as it drains into her throat, your next stop. That's when you feel her finger pushing you from behind, and you know that today is going to be a loonnnnggg day.
1411112212222.title: No, she lies... again.

choices: Mandy's parents take everyone out to dinner.
14111122122221.content:
Mandy's finger pushes you forward. Your upper body dips downward and starts sliding into her throat. You are grabbed by her throat muscles and peristalsis does the rest, working your body down her throat.

Mandy feels like she's about to choke as Mr.McMinor goes down. She gulps a few times, trying to get him down faster. Jenny watches as the little bump travels down, eventually disappearing into her chest. She then goes over and gives Mandy a big hug. "You did it, see!" Mandy coughs, then replies "Yeah I guess I did," She still feels guilty for lying and gobbling up Mr. McMinor, but Jenny's cheers distract her into happiness. "I could feel him all the way down, just like you said!" She starts shaking her hips back and forth. "It feels really good!"

-----

Your body plops down into the girl's stomach. "God dammit..." you sigh as your body tumbles to the floor. You Lay there, taking a moment to catch your breath. You don't get any rest, though. You aren't sure if she's jumping around or what, but you feel like your on some wet trampoline as your body slaps against the walls. Things finally settle down after a few minutes.

The walls move around you, slowly shifting back and forth as her stomach beings the fruitless process of trying to digest you. You lay on the floor, tuning out the girls' conversation to think about things. How things got so out of hand so fast. In hindsight, you never should have let your daughter swallow you in the first place. Too late now, you think. You'll just have to wait until your wife comes home from work tonight and realizes you're gone.

It's pretty strange that she didn't realize you were missing as it was last night. The thought worries you, but you put it in the back of your mind. You've got enough problems to deal with at the moment.

Some hours pass by...
14111122122221.title: Down Mandy's throat.

choices: A note. She has left you.
141111221222211.content:
Things are quite peaceful at the moment. A cough from Mandy shakes the fleshy walls around you. Well, as peaceful as they can be. Lunch was... difficult. Mandy's parents whipped up some sloppy joes for the kids and let's just say that the sloppy part was no misnomer. Piled up to your waist, her stomach churned you, the meat, and bread around vigorously.

As the food was draining into the intestine, you fought the current avoid being sucked in as well. You had decided to wait until your wife shows up to save you instead of spending the rest of the day moving through a girl's intestines.

It had been quite a few hours since then. Your wife only works until noon, so she should have been off of work for a few hours now. Strange thing is, she hasn't shown up looking for you. She hasn't even called. Your wife had the tendency to be a bit absentminded, but never enough to overlook you being missing for an entire day not to mention her son. Something was wrong.

The girls are busy playing with their toys. You think of a way to get in contact with them. You know that Jenny either couldn't hear you (or ignored you) last night, but maybe Mandy will be different. You bang against the stomach wall while screaming out at the girl. "Mandy! Can you hear me?! Heyyy!"

Mandy puts down her doll when she feels a really nice sensation coming from her stomach. "Ooh..." She coos, rubbing her stomach. "Jenny, I think your daddy is doing something in there." "What do you mean?" Jenny asks curiously. "I don't know, but it feels really good." "Oh! He was doing that last night, too." In a moment of jealously, Jenny prods her stomach with her finger. "Hey, Jet!" After a moment, Jenny starts to feel Jet wiggling around in her tummy. "Ahh... There we go." Mandy holds her stomach. "Thank you Mr. McMinor." she says gleefully.

You stop hitting the wall. Once again, Your plight is not heard. You have to get out of here and figure out what is going on with your wife. Looks like you're going to have to take the long way. You move over to the pyloric sphincter and try to force it open, but it won't budge. You sigh, frustrated. You'll going to have to wait until dinner to get out of here.

...

In the later evening, the girls are taken out to dinner at some Italian restaurant. You weren't told any of this. Rather, you deduced it once chewed up pieces of Chicken Parmesan started falling on you from above. Mandy eats more than her fill, leaving you barely enough room to move around in the chunks and noodles. The stomach gets to work, turning the food into slush. This time, when the food starts draining into the intestines, you follow.

You travel through Mandy as fast as you can, reaching the end in what you think might be record time. Stuck in a shitty spot, you push against the wall in front of you. Mandy gets the message right away and quickly heads to the bathroom. You are expelled out the back and retrieved from the toilet. Mandy tries to apologize to you about earlier, but you stop her before she gets too far. "We'll talk about it later, okay?" you tell her more than ask. She nods her at you. You "I need you to get to a phone and call someone for me. Can you do that?" "Okay" she responds; not sure if she's still going to be in trouble or not.

Mandy uses the phone to call your house number. No answer. Now you're really worried. You make Mandy get her parents; once again having to reassure her that she's not in any trouble (not yet, anyway). Her parents walk in and are shocked to see you in the living room. You say hello, and tell them that you'll explain everything later, but for now you need a ride to your house.

Mandy's mother stays behind to watch the girls while her father drives you home. The two of you sit awkwardly as the truck bounces down the dark roads. You never really spent much time with the guy, he wasn't really your type of people. You try to break the ice by describing the events that led him to be in his living room without invitation. He at least deserves an explanation. You stop, however, when he starts to look like he's going to lose his dinner. Not everybody can handle all the weird shit you have to go through.

When the two of you arrive at the house, you can tell something is off from the way he looks at the house. He stares for a moment, then looks down at you. He doesn't say anything, he just lifts you up to the top of the dashboard. From the headlights of the truck, you can see that the front door is wide open. None of the lights in the house are on, making your home feel more scary than it's ever been to you.

You think that it might be time to call the police...

What do they find?
141111221222211.title: That awful, fearful feeling

choices: A bar in the windy city (Steve's story)
1411112212222112.content:
-----The Next Day-----

The investigators had combed the house for hours, looking for clues as to what happened. Not a single thing strange turned up. Neither hair, nor fingerprint of anyone outside of your family. Your wife is definitely missing though. Typically, they said, you'd be the prime suspect in the case but considering your... condition... they ruled it out.

They left, not having accomplished anything. Before they do, they let you know that they'll be doing everything they can to find her. You hope they find her quickly.

You don't tell the kids any of this. They are too young for this stuff. You just tell them that their mother has gone out of town for a bit, and will be back before they know it.

...

A week passes by with no word on your wife's whereabouts. You do your best not to worry too much. So far, the kids don't suspect a thing. Jenny has been trying to eat you and Jet again. You tried sitting her down and giving her a talk about it, but it didn't seem to phase her since she started bringing it up the very next day. One time, you caught her with your son stuffed in her mouth. She went to bed without supper that night.

One day, you are sitting on the couch when the phone rings. You hop down and head over to the miniature phone set up for you in the corner. "Hello?" you answer. "Hey there, Mr. McMinor." It's a voice you don't recognize. "Who is this?" you ask cautiously. "That's not important. What is important is that I know where your wife is." The woman teases you casually, "I saw her in a bar down in downtown Chicago." "Is she okay? What bar was it? How do you know me? Who is this" you start demanding. There is a pause on the other line, followed by an abrupt click. You stand there, holding the phone to your ear for a minute as you process the information.

You contact the police again and tell them everything. The number traced back to a payphone in downtown Chicago. The investigator, now singular, assigned to your case says that he'll contact the department over there. He tells you they'll look into it and, once again, he says that they'll do everything they can to find your wife.

It's not good enough for you. That last comment made you feel sure that they were in fact not doing everything they could to find her. So, after some thought, you decide to go to Chicago to look for her yourself. You talk to Tulip about it. She thinks the whole thing sounds sketchy but, seeing your determination, she stops trying to argue with you. You get her to agree to watch the kids while your gone.

With everything settled you pack a few days worth of clothes, kiss your kids good-bye, and head off to find your wife.

-----

The story forks from here. Follow either your (Steve's) story, or Jet's story.

Which do you choose?

141111221222211222.content:
"Jenny! Jet! Get up!"

You could hear your aunt Tulip shouting up the stairs. "Mnnn... Five more minutes..." Your aunt had gained custody of you both after a year. A year after that your father was missing... You'd been living with her ever since.

"Mnn... What time is it?" Jenny muttered above you as she sleepily rubbed her eyes.

You and her had grown a bit.... Closer, a bit more than siblings should be. You could feel her move as she rolled to the side, her thighs no longer squeezing you tight. Giving you ample room to move in your heated room.

"Ah! Jetty! Easy there... Don't squirm so much." She moaned out, her hand snaking down and rubbing over you in her panty. Unlike your dad... You quite liked being dominated by your sister.

"Sorry sissy, I just got a bit... You know." You blushed as you squirmed against her lips again, causing her to blush and moan.

Jenny biting her lip. "Okay..."
141111221222211222.title: An awkward age

141111222.content:
You sigh in relief upon seeing your son safe and fast asleep. The soft villi on the intestinal walls seemed to be the perfect place to nap to him. You run up to him and shake him. "Jet! Wake up, son."
The tiny boy groans and looks over at you. "Daddy? *yawn* You found me..."
"It's okay Jet, everything's going to be alright, now. We may have some trouble when we get out of your sister, but we'll cross that bridge when we get to it." You picked up your tired son and hug him. "All that matters is that you're safe."
Jet lays his head on your shoulder. "Is... is Jenny happy?", he asked.
"What? I... I guess so, but you need to..."
Jet yawned again and smiled. "That's good..."
If you had been drinking anything, you would have done a spit-take. "Jet, your sister just ate you and she told her friend that it was okay to eat you, too. Why do you care if she's happy?" You set your son down.
He lazily gets to his feet and yawns again. "Well, Auntie Tulip told me that little brothers like me are supposed to make their big sisters happy. I don't like some of the stuff she does to me, but as long as she's happy, I don't mind that much. It's still pretty scary, though."

You hold your face and sigh. "Look, obeying your sister may be nice to her, but..." You suddenly pause. "Wait, who told you that?!"
"Auntie Tulip. When she watched me and Jenny, she told me that if I'm a good little brother to Jenny, I might grow big like her one day."
You were stunned that the words coming out of your son's mouth. You thought for sure that Tulip had cleaned up her act and ditched her previously cruel demeanor. Surely she wasn't coaching little Jet into willingly becoming his sister's toy... right? You remembered that she had often played nice for short periods of time in the past to catch you off guard. If what your son was saying was true, then this would be by far the most heinous act your sister had ever committed. There was no way you were allowing your son to be put through the same trauma you had gone through, and you certainly weren't going to let him become a willing plaything, even to your own daughter. Of course, there was the possibility that he was lying, but your mind was too clouded by anger.

"We'll... we'll talk about this tomorrow. Right now, we need to get some sleep." You walk Jet over to an area and lay him down, lying on your back next to him.

======================================================

You couldn't sleep. With what you had just heard, could anyone blame you? How could your sister do this to you? To your family? To your son? You remember that every time she stayed the night, she would always get Jet to sleep with her. You didn't want to think about the things she could have done to the poor boy. It made you angry enough just listening to what he said. You looked over to your son, once again sleeping like a baby. You couldn't bear the thought of anything else befalling him. Something had to be done. "Poor Jet", you said to yourself, brushing his fluid soaked hair with your hand. "Once we get out of here, I'm going to do something about this..." You laid on your side and continued to watch over him.
141111222.title: Coached by Auntie?

choices: You stay in the room with Mandy.
You take Jet back to the bathroom to get a more thorough cleaning.
1411112221.content:
Morning came too quickly. Water hits you from all sides, and you shake your body awake and swim up to the surface. The last thing you remember was laying back along the slimy walls of your daughter's intestine, and now you're treading water in a toilet bowl. That's life for you.

You look around in the dim light for your son and find him swimming toward a dark object floating in the water. He must be trying to find something to hold on to. You catch him before he gets there and hold him back. "Trust me," you say, "it isn't worth it." He nods at you, embarrassed.

At the sound of your voice, you hear your daughters voice above you. "Oh!", she exclaims. Light shines in and you get a full panoramic view of your daughter's ass lifting off the seat. You watch it continue to rise until remembering that your son is right next to you; you quickly shield his eyes with your hand.

Jenny's head peaks into view. "So you do come out okay!" she says excitedly. "Jenny, get us out. Get us out now.." You say this with the straightest of faces. "Okay" she says, but pauses. "Uhm... How do I...-" "Use the plunger... err... scrubber... whatever the thing is that's right next to the toilet here" you interrupt. Jenny nods, reaching off to the side and pulls a luffa sponge into view.

"uhh... well maybe not.." before you can stop her she dips the luffa deep into the water next to you. Welp. No use now. You apologize to the poor soul who will use this next, and grab on.

The two of you are lifted out of the water and dumped into the sink. "Can you wash us off please?" you ask nicely. "Eww, no! You guys are stinky." "Jenny, please?" you ask again. Jenny turns the faucet on. Then, One at a time, she washes you and your son lightly. After she's done, you still feel pretty gross but at least you look alright. You have Jenny rip off some toilet paper to use as makeshift towels to cover your bodies up as well.

Jet looks around the room, confused. You realize that he probably didn't hear much of the conversations that went on while he was in Jenny's intestines. Now that the shock of being crapped out has worn off, he probably has no idea where he is. "We're at Mandy's house," you tell him. He looks over to you. "When did we get here?" "Last night, you missed a few things..."

You turn to Jenny who has been watching your exchange with interest. "Which reminds me! You, little lady, are under the impression that you'll be able to 'gobble us up' again, correct?" "Mmhmm, I'm gonna eat you up for lunch today!" she says while shaking her head enthusiastically.

Jet takes a step backward, you reach back and grab his shoulder to keep him from getting away from you. "It's okay, Jet" you say to him quietly. "I'll handle this." you turn to Jenny. "Wrong! You aren't going to 'eat up' anybody today" you tell her firmly. Jenny makes a sad face, "but mommy said-". "I don't care what your mother said, I'm saying 'no'" you interrupt.

She tries to fight you about it but you put your foot down on the issue. Afterwards, you are brought into Mandy's room. You tell Jenny to get a phone and call your wife, instructing her to explain everything so that you all can get back home. Jenny, after hearing all this, reluctantly walks off to get the phone and make the call.

That leaves you, Jet, and Mandy in the room together.

What happens next?
1411112221.title: Listen Here, Young Lady.

choices: "So he told you, huh?" (Jet was telling the truth)
1411112222.content:
You angrily pace around the kitchen counter, waiting for your sister to call you back after leaving her several messages. You still couldn't believe what Tulip had done. Jenny sat in the corner, having been scolded by your wife. You were lucky she noticed you and Jet were missing and brought your daughter home early. "Don't you think you're jumping to conclusions a little?", she said as she gave your son a bath.
"You don't know my sister like I do, Angela. I don't want our son going through the same mess I did." Your wife dressed him in a new change of clothes and set him on the counter in a small chair beside you.

"I'm just saying, it'll be pretty embarrassing if it's another of Jet's little stories." Your son had a habit of telling weird and bizarre lies if he felt like he was going to get in trouble, having something of a gift for making them up on the spot.
He looked really nervous. "Um... can I go watch TV, please? I don't wanna...."
You interrupted him. "No, son. I want you to be here for this. You can't let people push you around just because you're smaller than them." You started going off about how successful you had become despite your handicap. Suddenly, you heard the phone ring.
"M-momma. Is breakfast ready yet?", Jet asked, trying to find a reason to leave. You were pretty sure he didn't want to get his aunt in trouble.
You put the phone on loudspeaker. "Tulip? It's me, your brother", you greet her, attempting to hide your anger.

"*yawn* Hey, Steve. Sorry I didn't return your calls. Had kind of a late start today. What's up?", Tulip said.
"It's about Jet..."
"How is my favorite nephew? It feels like it's been forever since I've seen him."
You clenched your fist listening to her, flashbacks of her "playing" with you when you were younger coming to mind and mental images of her doing the same to your son. "He's fine now, no thanks to you."
"Did something happen to him? Wait, what did I do?", Tulip said with seemingly genuine surprise.
"Do you remember what you told him the last time you watched him and Jenny?" You managed to remain calm despite your pent-up frustration.
"Hmm... I think I told Jet that if he doesn't let other kids push him around, he'd be as successful as you one day", she replied. You had used your life story to attempt to inspire Jet enough that it was basically written in his head. "Why, did he manage to succeed at life while I wasn't looking?", Tulip asked with a giggle.

"You know damn well what I'm talking about, Tulip!" You had finally snapped and angrily told her everything your son had told you, ignoring how nervous Jet was listening to this.
1411112222.title: Family Discussion

14111122221.content:
"Wait, he said what?!" Tulip shouted, sounding surprised.

"Don't you dare act surprised, Tulip!" You shout, getting even angrier. "You're not going to fool me anymore!"

"I'm not acting, I never said that!" A pause. "Okay, I said something like that, but I can explain, I swear!"

You stopped. "You've got five minutes to explain..."

Tulip continued. "Well... last time I babysat the kids, I saw Jenny playing with Jet, just like I used to play with you... It gave me so many fond memories... but when Jenny had enough, Jet was crying his heart out. It reminded me of how much you hated it, and how long it took me to realize that... I told him that he shouldn't get so upset... Jenny just wants to have fun, and he should try to enjoy it, too... that way, he won't be so angry all the time, like you were. I never said he could grow to be as big as his sister, I swear! You've got to believe me... I know I haven't been the best sister over the years, but I would never trick your son like that!"
14111122221.title: A Kernel of Truth

14111122222.content:
A moment goes by in silence.

"Tulip?" You ask into the mic while checking the red light, indicating that the phone call is in fact still active. Tulip's sigh leaks out of the loudspeaker. "So... he told you, huh?"

"How could you do this to him, Tulip?.. To my family? You know, I thought you had grown up and then you go and do something like this!" You lace into your sister, molding your words into daggers. "I was better! I was!" Tulip's shaky voice returns, you can almost see the tears in her eyes. "I love little Jet, it's just..." She stops.

"This one night.. I was watching him and Jenny. Jenny had already gone to bed, but I let Jet stay up a bit late. Well, he had really fallen asleep on my lap watching tv. Anyways, I needed to use the bathroom so I set him down on the couch. When I came back, I... I forgot he was there so I had sat on him."

Tulip continues, "I didn't even notice him there, not until he moved in his sleep. I shot up when I realized and moved him out from under me. I was worried that I hurt him, so I watched him to make sure he was okay. I thought about how tough he was. Being able to put up with so much, just like his dad. I thought about the things I used to do to you and... and I started to get that feeling.."

"What feeling?" you ask, frowning. "The feeling I used to get when I played with you. Oh god, Steve, it felt so good. Before I knew what had happened, I had put him back where he was and sat down on him again. He didn't even wake up. It was exhilarating." "Tulip!" you shout at the phone.

"I know! I know! It was wrong! I just couldn't help myself! It just felt so... amazing." She pauses. "When I was... finished... I put him to bed." That last line made you lose your cool. You lash out at your sister, "I can't believe this! Don't you have any self control? I had no idea I was letting a wild animal watch my children!"

Tulip let's a moment pass before responding. "It didn't stop with that, though. There's more." You have no words, silence lingers until Tulip decides to continue. "I tried to forget about that night, but I couldn't. I ended up playing with him after that, too. I'd wait until he was asleep and then I'd have fun with him... like we used to. I... I knew I'd gone too far when I had put him in my shoe and he woke up."

You took a look at your son; he was staring at you as Tulip let all this out, gaging your reaction. His face nearly as red as an apple.

"He was rightfully scared, and I... panicked. I told him that I was helping him practice for when his sister wanted to play with him. He said it was too rough, but I told him that that's what big sisters like to do... play rough, and that was the reason why his body is so tough. I said that if he made his sister happy, he could grow up and be big like me one day... So he let me keep playing with him after that."

The sound of Jet's chair scraping on the counter top causes you to turn, and you see him running away across the marble top, crying. Your wife walks over and scoops him up, cradling him against her chest.

You can't believe what you just heard. All this (and possibly more) was going on behind your back. You decide to...

So...if putting him in my tummy won't get Daddy-dolly to him, then the best thing to do would be to send him in at the other end and meet Jet in the middle!"

Steve blinked in confusion at what she was getting at. However, that confusion gave way to shock and terror as she lifted her dress to expose her panties and then slide them down as she bends over. 1411122.content:
Steve heard the words and sighed. His wife was always so "open minded" and carefree when it came to her family. She'd generally agree with him when it came to disciple on the children, but when he wasn't able to talk with her about it, she'd let them do whatever. He would have to talk with her about it later. Right now, he was focusing more on getting to Jet and seeing him through this experience. It took a bit of time, but eventually, he came across Jet in the intestines.

"You alright, son?" Steve asked in relief.

"I'm fine, dad. Did I hear right? Does mom really intend to let Jenny continue to use us like this?" Jet asked in return.

"I'm going to talk with her about this. This is not how you're supposed to treat your family members!" All the experiences with Tulip left Steve with some anger issues regarding such activities.

Jet paused for a moment before mumbling, "I don't really mind."

Steve looked at his son in confusion. The small boy continued louder, "While I do wish she'd ask first, I don't mind playing with her like this! Isn't that why we're so durable for being so small? So we can spend time with our family, however it goes?"

Steve took a moment to breathe, ignoring the smell of being inside his daughter. Then, he'd say, "Jet, we're the size of dolls. Even your sister is capable of overpowering us. If we don't try to get respect, then it will only get worse for us. My sister, Tulip, didn't respect me or my boundaries. Instead, she used her size to dominate me. You mustn't grow up to allow bigger people to walk all over you."

Jet didn't respond to this, verbally. He merely lowered his head. From there, the remaining time inside Jenny was spent in silence save for the noises her body made.

14111221.content:
Outside of normal bodily functions, it stays quiet as both you and Jet stay next to each other while slowly being pushed through Jenny's body. For you, this is your second trip through your daughter's guts, only this time going the right way.

Jet continues to want to play with his twin sister, even if it involved going inside her. He knew she didn't mean any harm towards him, even when she ate him or stuffed him into her panties, she was just playing and if she thought he'd be hurt she wouldn't go through with anything. Still, if there was anyone he really wanted to be inside, it is his secret crush, his own Aunt and the one who his father cited as example most, Tulip. He loves his other Aunt, Tracy and his Grandmother Rachel, but Tulip was his favorite. One thing that helped him with this feeling is that Tulip lives with them, though she's often gone to college. Still, she's been there for all his life, and was always really nice and careful around him.

You on the other hand has been thinking your son's position over. At first you wondered what had gotten into your five year old son, after all, doesn't he know what it's like. Then it dawned on you that you've had a very different life than Jet. Unlike Tulip when she was younger, Tulip now was much kinder and had been since high school. Rachel lives with her new husband and has seemed to mature in her middle age, though she still loves to have bonding time with her tiny family members. Tracy, lives across town with her own family, and the only companionship between some more SMS sufferers, his cousins Jake and Sam, who are also twins and around eight years old, with Sam being the first girl reported to have the syndrome and actually have been effected by it. Then there's Tracy's oldest daughter, a kind hearted ten hear old named Natasha. Then there's your own family, your wife obviously cared for her children and especially Jet, though she would admit to you that there were times she had to restrain herself from playing with Jet the way she used to with you. In the meantime Jenny wasn't cruel, quite the opposite, she was always gentle and got scared for him whenever she thought she had. Perhaps it would be okay if they weren't so strict, but Jenny would have to learn to be careful so she doesn't flush Jet or himself by accident, or lose them in some other way.

Then you two find yourselves slowly being pushed toward a light at the end of the tunnel, clearly telling you that you were coming back out. You can hear the muffled grunts of your daughter as she passed the waste leaving, and of course, eventually you. You can also hear muffled splashing, meaning the toilet. You can hear your wide and Tulip as they talk with each other. Then it's your turn, your daughter's rectal muscles grabbing and pushing you out, much as they'd pulled you in earlier. You can hear your sister and wife as they see you emerge from your daughter's pucker. Tulip can't help but giggle a bit as she sees you try to escape the little girl's dirty rear end. Your wife also can't hold back a giggle. Your daughter on the other hand, strains trying to push out your larger form. You can feel her young muscles straining to get you out, as you struggle to pull yourself out as well. Unfortunately, your daughters rectal muscles are better at keeping things in, rather than pushing them out. You can feel as she gives up and her rectal muscles start to pull you back in.

"No! Jenny! No!" You yell as she stops pushing and her rear end starts pulling you you back into the cramped lower recesses of your daughter. You can hear your wife and Tulip giggle some more, as her rectal walls begin to frame your world again. "Come on! Get us out of here!" You yell, more towards your wife and Tulip, before the pucker seals you and your son inside Jenny's, thankfully now empty, butt.

You hear as Jenny wipes herself off and the toilet is flushed, watching through the tiny peephole in her rectal sphincter. Jenny bends over, being directed by your wife and the peephole widens a bit. You and Jet see your wife and Tulip through the small hole, looking in towards it. "Sorry Steve. You're just too big for her." Your wife says. "Um, hold on, we'll find a way to get you out." She tells you as she ponders a way to retrieve you from your daughter's rear.

Tulip spreads your daughter's cheeks, using her own experiences as a guide. "Open her up and reach in."
