141112211.content:
"Angela, it's okay. I've had plenty of time to think this through. Two hours in fact, and I agree. I know that it's been hard for me in the past, but our family is used to this by now. Tulip's kinder and gentler with me now, and is extremely careful with our son. I need to remember that Jenny isn't Tulip when she was younger, and at age five, Tulip didn't exactly have it out for me anyway, that came later." You tell her, as you declare your position. "I also have to remember that I had things harder as a kid, because I was the first, and that people, at least around us have gotten used to the idea of people born tiny. So, I agree with you. This is a thing with our family no matter how hard we try to avoid it, it's going to happen. Now, as long as we get everyone to be careful, and to remember that one of us is inside them, I think things will be okay."

Angela looks shocked about your cooperation. "Wow, I never expected you to take this so easily." She tells you in surprise.

"Well, Jet actually had a hand in that. It showed me how different our childhoods were. I got eaten by my sister and hated it because she was generally mean to me, or before that I didn't realize that she wasn't thinking maliciously at the time." You reply. "I was surprised myself. He didn't seem to mind when I talked to him, he even seemed happy to be playing with his sister, even if it was being eaten by her."

"He is very attached to Jenny, just like she's attached to him." Angela comments, picking you up. "We'll let everyone know in the morning. Right now, how about you and I have a bit of fun. Jenny did, so now it's my turn." She says sensually.

You look happily up to your wife, ready for some action. "The doctor is in ma'am, what seems to be the problem?" You ask, deepening your voice.

_____________

Tulip walks down the hallway, leading Jenny to her room while clutching Jet carefully in her hand. When she reaches the room, Jenny immediately starts to get dressed for bed, being tired from the day. "Goodnight Auntie Tulip." She says as she climbs into bed and falls asleep.

"Goodnight Jenny." She says, kissing her niece on the forehead. "Alright Jet, your turn. Let's get you ready for bed." She says as she approaches the small sized furniture on Jenny's dresser. She lowers her tiny nephew down and watches as he changes into his PJ's, but then is surprised that instead of going to bed, he looks up at her and reaches out to be picked up again. "What is it Jet?" She asks her tiny nephew.

"Can I sleep with you tonight, Aunt Tulip?" Jet asks her, blushing a bit.

"Um, okay." Tulip says in a bit of surprise, but the two sometimes like to climb in bed with her. They've done so in the past, especially when their parents room is closed. She picks up her nephew and walks down the hall to her room, carefully placing Jet on her own dresser and gathering her pajamas. She walks off and changes in the bathroom. The boy may have been exposed to Jenny's private areas, but that's a common occurance, and Jenny is his age, not a nineteen year old young adult.

Tulip walks back into her room after changing and collects her nephew. "Can I sleep inside you Auntie?" Jet asks earnestly, causing Tulip to stop in shock.

"I'm sorry... What?" She asks him.

Who do we follow?
141112211.title: You've thought it over and you're okay ...

choices: Go with Jet to apologize to the boys directly.
Take Jet to speak with the teacher.
Go to the principal's office to speak with the boys parents.
14112.content:
You smiled as you looked up at your daughter. "Really?! Would you mind showing me?", you asked. You were thankful that it was something normal for a change.

Jenny happily nodded as she excitedly ran to get her shoes, Jet still holding onto his sister's hair. Once she got to your kids room, she set you on the ground and pulled out her blue and pink My Little Pony shoes and slipped them on, making sure you saw as she tied the laces. It took a little bit, as was expected of a young child, but she finally managed to finish all on her own, tying up the laces in a bow. "Aaaand done!", she proudly exclaimed. "See, daddy-doll? I did it all by myself!"

You smiled and clapped your hands as you looked up at your giant daughter. "That's wonderful, Jenny! Congrat-"

"And Jet showed me how to tie them another way!", Jenny interrupted.

As your daughter untied her laces, you briefly noticed that Jet had a panicked expression on his face before he hid in his sister's hair. You were curious, but you wanted to see what kind of trick he had taught her. After fiddling with her laces, she got frustrated and pouted. "Hmph. Well, Jet knows how to do it better than me." Jenny dug into her hair and plucked out her tiny brother. "C'mon out, silly! Show daddy-doll how you helped tie those boys shoes!" Your young giantess of a daughter set your son by her shoelaces, looking quite frightened.

You gave both Jet and Jenny a puzzled look. "Jet? Is there something you'd like to tell me?", you asked.

The tiny boy shook his head in feigned ignorance. "Nuh-uh!" He looked up at Jenny and whispered quite loudly to her. "Jennyyyy!", he loud whispered. "It doesn't work on your shoes, remember!"

Both you and Jenny looked confused, but your questions would soon be answered as you heard the phone ringing. Choosing to be helpful, Jenny quickly grabbed you and Jet and ran over to the kitchen, briefly forgetting that she was wearing a pair of shoes with the laces untied before kicking them off. You didn't like Jenny leaving her things lying around, but you supposed you wouldn't worry about it right now. Your daughter managed to get you to the phone just in time as you answered. "Hello? McMinor residence, this is Steve speaking."



"Ah, Mr... I'm sorry, Doctor McMinor", a middle aged woman's voice spoke. "This is the teacher of your childrens' class, Miss Hawkins."

"Oh, hello there", you answered. "To what do I owe the pleasure?" You noticed Jet looking very nervous as Jenny held him in her hand, trying to squirm in to hide, but failing as she would just push him out with her thumb.

"I'm afraid it's no pleasure of mine", the elementary teacher said. "Your son has been causing quite a problem for a couple of other boys in my class. Their names are Kevin and Garret."

You were more than a little confused. Sure, Jet was certainly acting suspicious, but you couldn't fathom how the tiny boy could be a nuisance to boys that were giants to him. "I'm... I'm sorry, I don't think I'm following", you responded to Miss Hawkins. "My son, Jet McMinor?"

"I know nobody likes to imagine that they have a problem child, but I don't have any other tiny children in my class." The teacher cleared her throat as she continued. "I don't know if it's in retaliation to something they did to him, but their parents are convinced that he started it. I know it sounds ridiculous, but they aren't aware of your son's condition. The principal has requested a parent teacher meeting, so I'm afraid I'll need to see both yourself and your son tomorrow. Perhaps once they actually see that the two of you aren't capable of causing any trouble, they'll stop calling my personal number." Miss Hawkins sounded more than a little annoyed.

"Yes, I don't have any patients until the afternoon, so I'll be available to come." You looked over at Jet and sighed. You still weren't sure of what was going on, but you got the feeling that your son wasn't completely innocent.

"That would be wonderful", the elementary teacher said, sighing in relief. "Thank you for taking time out of your day, Dr. McMinor. I'll see you and your children tomorrow."

As Miss Hawkins hung up the phone, you looked over at Jet, still trying to hide in Jenny's hand. "Jenny, put your brother down, please, and go watch TV."

"Okay, daddy-doll", Jenny said as she set her tiny brother down and skipped away to continue watching cartoons.

Jet began to sweat nervously as you looked down at your son. "Now Jet", you said in a stern, but still gentle tone, "I'm going to ask you again. Is there something you'd like to tell me?"

Your son looked down and began fidgeting with his fingers. "U-Um... I... kinda pranked a couple of kids... a lot..."

"Okay...", you responded, making sure to not to raise your voice. "And why did you think that was okay?"

"Th-they started it!", Jet insisted. "They keep making fun of me when Jenny's not around! Then Kevin pretended not to notice and sat on me! What's wrong with fighting back?"

You found it hard to argue with his logic. There were a lot of times when you were young that you wanted to get back at some bully or get your sister into trouble for stuffing you into her socks. But you knew that if you fought back, they'd just try to do something worse. Without a second thought, some mean kid could snatch up poor Jet and stomp him into a splatter or flush him down the toilet. You didn't want him to go through anything like that. You wanted a better life for your son than you've had. You had to break him of this before it got him into major trouble.
Sighing, you walked up to Jet and gave him a hug. "Son, I know you're just trying to stand up for yourself, and I understand that", you said. "But we're too vulnerable, you and I. You have to get into the habit of going to the teacher or your sister whenever you have a problem."

"But that's why they pick on me", Jet said, annoyed. "They call me the Crybaby-bug..."

"Sooner or later they'll realize that they're always going to get in trouble for being mean to you. Then they'll stop.", you responded. "Maybe if you tried, you could make friends with them."

"Daddy, noooo..." Jet retched. "They're super annoying."

"Well, either way, you need to apologize to them for the trouble you caused."

"Yeah, okay..."

"Alright. Let's go watch TV with your sister until your mother gets home", you suggested.

"I'm... not in trouble?", Jet asked.

It's true that you were disappointed with how your son handled his two bullies, but you understood why he was doing what he was doing. It was tough being small. He just needed to learn how to properly handle his problems with big people. "Let's see how the meeting goes before we decide on that", you said with a smile. "Let's not tell your mom, though, or you really will be in trouble."

Jet winced. "Yeah... good idea..."


True to your word, you didn't speak a word of it to Angela when she got home, and you convinced Jenny to keep quiet about her teacher calling as well. The rest of the night was uneventful, save for Jenny showing your wife that she learned how to tie her shoes, which meant ice cream cake for dessert.

In the morning, you told Angela that you'd be taking Jet to school since you didn't have any patients until much later, and she didn't think anything of it. When you arrived at the school, you thought about what to do. You knew that the parents might be waiting, but it might be a good idea to talk to the boys themselves first. Maybe you could get them to act more friendly toward Jet. If you could convince them to be friends with your son, that would take away a lot of worry. Or maybe you should talk to the teacher. She seemed to respect you enough to refer to you as doctor. Perhaps you can get her to give Jet some special treatment and keep him at her desk or make sure he's properly supervised so nothing like this happens again.


It was true that you didn't have any patients until the afternoon, but you didn't know how long this meeting would take. If you were going to do anything else, it'd be a good idea to do it first.
14112.title: Not as Helpless as He Seems

14113.content:
Are you ready to hear what may very well be the worst thing you would EVER want to hear come out of your daughter's mouth? Even worse than "I'm pregnant!"?

"I learned my new daddy's name!"

"That's nice, dea-........................huh?" Know what youre thinking. Youre thinking: 'Did she just say NEW DADDY?' She did. You better hope to God she mistook that phrase and meant to say "I learned my daddy's new name!" You would way rather be permanently referred to as 'Daddy-doll' for the rest of your life than what you might THINK she meant!

You caught a glimpse of your son constantly swaying his arms and shaking his head, mouthing 'No!' Something's going on.
Nonetheless, you take a deep breath and try to keep your cool, "Um... did you just say you've learned your 'new daddy's name?"
Jenny nodded her head, "Uh huh! His name is Albert. Albert Gigante! That's Spanish for 'Giant'!" Albert Gigante?! Why does that name ring a bell?!
"JENNY! STOP!!!" your son screamed. Unfortunately, Jet was the smart one.
"He's really smart and really big!" Jenny exclaimed, "He's like a giant science guy at a grown-up school" She probably means professor at a college, but what's she mean by giant? "Mommy said he's very fun with play with in his bedroom! Sometimes they play for hours!"

WHAT?!! SON OF A BITCH!! Some guy's been messing around with your wife?! You'll kill him... if you were just a couple feet taller. And even then, he'd probably step on you! You now remember hearing about this Albert Gigante on the news. He's some hot-shot professor at a prestigious college that's been studying a treatment for some special disease he has that's very similar to yours. What's it called? 'Paul Bunyan Syndrome'?
Isnt it that disease where the victims tend to grow abnormally big, up to 18-20 feet tall?
Ouch.

Your wife's been cheating on you with that? That's like Tom Thumb's wife leaving him for Godzilla! This cant be happening!
Jenny continued, "Mr. Albert's gonna be at mommy's book club... then he's gonna read her bedtime story. Uh... what's it called again? Ka...Kama....Kame... Kamasu...."

"OK! THAT'S GREAT, HONEY!" you cut her off. Perhaps you better start questioning the smarter and much smaller twin about this, "Uh.. Jenny, I think I heard someone at the door! Would you be a dear and go check who it is?" Thankfully, she didnt even bother saying she didnt hear a knock, "Sure daddy-doll!"

With that, she jumped off, almost bouncing you and Jet off the floor and rushed out of the room. Your head's gonna explode any minute. How the hell could your own wife do this to you?! And with a PBS man, no less! Sure the both of you were having a few fights recently, but... oh lord, do you want to murder someone! 'Calm down, Steve. Blood pressure. Blood pressure'!
You looked toward your son, shivering and shaking as if he has something to hide. "How long has this been going on?" you ask him without venting your anger.
"N-n-n-not long!" Jet replied, J...just a month!"
'JUST A MONTH'?! "A MONTH?!" you screamed out, almost causing your son to flinch. You dont wanna scare him anymore than he already is, so you take another deep breath and sigh, "Why didnt you ever tell me this?"

"M-mommy made me promise not to tell you!" he replied, "I-Im sorry daddy! A...a...are you mad?!"
"Im not mad. Im fine. Im..just....perfectly fine, I-WHAT THE FUCK ARE YOU LOOKING AT?!" you shouted at Jenny's little Ken doll she never remembers to pick up before punching it so hard you knock the head right off it's body! It had a genitalia, you'd be ripping it out right now!

"A....are you and mommy gonna have a divorce?" you kid asks you. You dont answer him. You just shrug, try not to think about it and change the subject. "Uh... let's see what else is on!"
You pound your foot on one of the buttons of the remote control, changing the channel. Good ol' Boob-Tube. Surely IT wont turn on you, too! What's on?
14113.title: The Epic Battle of David Vs. Goliath Continues!

choices: Going to our bedroom and trying something 'new.'
Going for a little drive. I want to show you something.
141132.content:
The television glows to life as your head begins to swim with thoughts of your wife and some giant man's dick. Visions of her sighing and gasping. Covered in sweat. Her face screwed up as she screams another man's name.

The voice over on the television gets your attention.

"--in this species the females always select the largest, most powerful of the males to mate with. And after all--"

You stomp on the button to change the channel.

"--who wouldn't take this amazing opportunity to see such a massive erect construction such as this. In fact--"

Stomp!

"--nearly 12,000 people a year come from across the globe to enjoy the ride of a lifetime. People such as--"

Stomp, Stomp, STOMP!

"--your wife! She'll thank you for it! She won't want to stop! Why, chances are your wife will enjoy--"

S-T-O-M-P!

"--the natural male enhancement."

A nervous tick has begun to dominate the side of your face and you're about to be reduced to a quivering mass of tears when the commercial ends and a news program comes on. As you sink to your knees on top of the remote you feel strangely comforted. The beautiful news anchor looks remarkably like your wife and somehow just watching her makes you feel better. It seems she's in the middle of interviewing some guy. You actually tune out the words until your daughter re-enters the room and flops down next to you; knocking you off the remote in the process.

"Nobody was at the door, Daddy-doll," she informs you in an irritated tone as she starts to watch the interview. A moment later she sits forward in excitement, "Daddy!"

"Yes, sweetie," you manage to reply, your tone sounding as hollow as you feel at the moment.

"No," she says with a giggle, "it's New Daddy!" She points at the man on the screen who is being interviewed.

The pounding in your ears is back as you force yourself to focus on the man in the interview. You can't make out the words above the sound of your own heart beat, but the onscreen graphic labels him as 'Dr. Albert Gigante, College Professor, Victim of Paul Bunyan Syndrome.' For an instant, darkness threatens to completely envelope you, but you fight it back. With a monumental effort, you focus on the TV and what's being said.

"--an amazing story doctor. And now onto your research. I understand you're very close to finding a cure. Tell us about that."

"That's right. I can't go into to many specifics until we publish our research. Suffice to say, we hope to have a cure within a years time." He's speaks with a clear accent which reminds you vaguely of that damn Antonio Banderas. You hate him.

"Amazing, and what about the opposite disease, where people never grow much bigger than a few inches. Any hope for these people?"

A this point, 'Al' kind of smiles... no... smirks before he answers, "well, I believe our work could be used to help these people as well; though a few... obstacles... still stand in my way." Albert stares directly into the camera as he says 'obstacles' and you realize, somehow, that the obstacle in question is you!

"Simply amazing," the anchor breathes, clearly hanging on his every word. It's then that you notice that they aren't even sitting in chairs. At least she isn't. That's why you hadn't realized the size difference at first. She's actually sitting on the side of one of his legs! The camera is at an angle below her making their faces appear roughly the same size. As it pulls back however, you realize that, even as she sits on his leg; her feet rest on something else that is also running down one pant leg!

Images of your wife and this man begin to flood your mind again. Mocking. Laughing. Fucking! Your heart already feels like it's trying to leap out through your chest as the anchor changes the subject.

"On to your love life, Dr. Gigante. We've received a number of E-mails from women and a few men who would love to get to know you better. I understand, also, that you're still a 'swinging bachelor.' Do you find it difficult to get dates?"

Albert chuckles again before he answers, "not at all. I'm usually surprised by how little my condition deters the opposite sex. That being said, however, the kind of woman I need has to have a few 'specific' traits. She needs to be adventurous, passionate, and more than a little flexible." He chuckles again and briefly looks off into nowhere as if remembering something specific.

You don't even realize you've leapt off the sofa and thrown a punch at the television screen until you make contact and pain shoots up your arm.

"Dad!" Jet cries out in obvious panic.

"Stupid Daddy-doll," Jenny says as she reaches down and wraps her fist around your middle, "you're blocking the TV." She sits back again and holds you securely in her fist in her lap.

"Anybody in your life like that at the moment?" the anchor continues and you can't help but detect the hint of an ulterior motive in the question. Her similarity to your wife becomes a nightmare as you are given an live reenactment of your wife flirting with that fucking freak.

As unhappy as you are, his answer somehow makes it worse. "I do," he says, sounding almost apologetic to her, "I've met the most amazing woman, she actually looks a lot like you. I can't go into specifics there either as her husband wouldn't approve."

"She's married?" she responds, clearly surprised at his candor.

"Ehh... yes. She is," he says sounding just slightly uncomfortable, "but he's not expected to make it through the week."

What?! Not expected to make it through the week?! What the hell did that mean?!

The pretty anchor actually blushed as she reacted with mock surprise to hear this. Yup, just a little secret between him, her, and the millions of people watching. You suddenly hate her too.

A split-second of static marks the changing of the channel as Jenny obliviously hits the button to switch to Spongebob.

You remain stationary in her tight fist, but your mind is racing. This can't be happening. Could your wife actually be a part of this? Does she even realize what Albert has planned for you? Even as these questions run through your head; other thoughts intrude as well. This suddenly explains why she wanted to make sure your Will was up to date. And why she wanted to make sure you had maximum life insurance! Jesus Christ! You were even the one to suggest adding the 'Potentially Eaten' clause!! You've got to do something! You've got to get out and somehow get your children! You certainly aren't going to leave them to be raised by 'New Daddy'!

The sound of a car pulling into the driveway almost stops your heart. Suddenly everything is moving in slow motion as steps slowly make their way up to the door. A moment later the front door swings open and your beautiful wife comes strolls casually in; a big smile on her face.

"Honey, I'm home!" she announces.

"Mom!" your children call in unison as you're dropped unceremoniously on the couch in your daughters ass-print.

Your first instinct is to yell and scream. To throw insults and recriminations. Your second instinct is to cry like a sissy girl. Finally, somewhere around the 7th instinct, you realize that your wife doesn't realize you know. If she's kept it secret for months; you can certainly keep it secret for a few days while you make arrangements to get you and your kids out of here. Assuming of course that you can keep your distance from her so that nothing 'unfortunate' happens to you between now and then.

"Hey sweetie," you wife says suddenly as she appears over you and picks you up gently between her fingers. "I was thinking about you the whole ride home! What do you think about...
141132.title: Some questions are better left unanswered.

choices: Doctor Albert Gigante has good news
The Doctor has very bad news
1411322.content:
Ok... I admit that the chapter you're about to read is going to sound very far-fetched. VERY far-fetched...
... Seriously...
Far-fetched

"... Comon, Honey, I've got Katie to babysit, she'll be here in five minutes."
"Right," You say, shaking in anger, "So where are we going?"
"Uh... we discussed this, Sweetie," Your Wife looked worried "Please, just come to the car..."
"I'm not going anywhere until you tell me who this 'Doctor Albert Gigante' is! Seriously, Do you just have some size fetish or something?!"
Your Wife looked shocked for a second, then... anger?... sadness?... her face contorted and she went stiff.
"Steve," She looked like she was trying to hold back tears, "Please, just come with me to the car... I'll explain everything to you, again, on the way to Albert's."
You were struck... Go to... to... 'Albert's'!
"I... man not... Going to that filthy Ogre's place... How dare you even think of-" Then Katie walked in.
"I hope I'm not, like, gettin in your way or nuffin..."
"Oh... No, Katie..." Your wife sighed, as she picked up your heavily refuting form, "I was just telling Steve not to call his friends 'Ogres'. thanks for sitting for us."
And with that, your wife glided out of the house, slamming the door behind her.
Katie stared after her, before turning to the worried children.
"Wor was all that about?"
Neither child said anything for a second, Then the girl answered:
"Mommy has a Size-Fetish."

You complained as your wife stomped out to the car.
You complained as your wife ruffly dropped you in the passenger seat.
You complained for half-a-mile until your wife stopped by the green and parked on the curb.
"I hope you don't act like this when we get to Albert's." She says simply.
"I'm not going! You can't make me! What are we going to do there anyway? Oh my God you're going to kill me aren't you! I knew it! You're sick!... Sick! Sick! Si-"
"Oh Do shut up you stupid pixie!"
You shut up.
"Have you forgotten already," she said, her mascara was starting to run, "This is the third time this month!"
"What are you talking about?"
"Oh Steve! Do you even remember my name?"
That stopped you. You opened and closed your mouth a few times... it was on the tip of your tongue...
"It's Angela, Steve. My name is Angela"

As soon as she said that name... all the memories came flooding back with a vengeance...

You remembered being taken into Dr. Gigante's office, himself a sufferer of a size-related illness.
Him telling you of the recent discovery that SMS didn't just attack the growth hormone... It attacked the brain as well... causing long-term memory loss... and later death. Although he was working on a cure.
You remember talking to Angela, your wife, how she'd cried, how you had tried to tell the children... she didn't want that.
That was all three months ago.

You remembered getting to know your fellow doctor, told him that if you did die in the next few months, you would want no other man but the kind doctor Albert Gigante to look after Angela and the kids...
How you'd planned for him to have an 'affair' with her.
How she'd found out that the 'affair' was all your idea.
How your relationship between yourself, Angela and Albert had become a ménege à trois.
How that had been your first threesome... wow...
That had all been two months ago

"I... I'm sorry... I forgot" you muttered
"I understand," said Angela as she wiped her mascara-ridden face and reapplied her makeup "It doesn't matter."
You both sat in solemn silence for a few minutes. The last few months had been very stressful. It just seemed so strange... This illness could make you just forget about some of the most important people in your life and then just let you remember them minutes later. This was horrible, and it was getting worse. Albert said he was close to finding a cure, but how much longer did you have?

"Come on," said Angela "Doctor Gigante said he has something very important to tell you... and that we may even get an... ah... reward..." Angela winked in your direction
You smiled to yourself. That Anchorwoman... ha!... she thought that monster penis made a good footrest? imagine seeing it close up and personal from three inches tall!

"Just a second... Did you just call me a stupid pixie?!"
1411322.title: The Illness

choices: Tell him you dont wanna do this.
14113221.content:
Unfortunately, the outburst over your wife's smart-mouth remark was cut short by the time the car was parked in front of a gigantic, white, shining, shimmering, splended mansion! From your view, the size of the place was unlike anything you've ever seen before in your life, big or small! It looked almost big enough to fit an entire third-world country inside! The beautiful rose garden in the front yard would be the tropical forest surrounding the third-world country. And of course, the ginormous golden gate in front would be the borderline, keeping them illegals off our country and taking away our jobs! And our women!

...Like SOMEONE you know!!

Anyways, you almost mistaken the big person in front of the gate for the country's personal Statue of Liberty when you realized this enormous, 20-30 foot man was no statue! He was most definitely real. The giant handsome dark-skinned man, no doubt more handsome man, with long flowing black hair wrapped in a pony-tail at the very end, a set of glasses over deep Aquatic blue eyes, ratherly muscley, not afraid to show off his bulging biceps with a tattoo on one arm that read 'Corazón' and another tattoo that read 'XIII' on the other arm, dressed all nice and civilized in that clean doctor's overcoat of his! You could make out his smile, even though it was way WAY up in the sky, almost blinded by the sun!

Him. Dr... Gigante... if you thought his height on tv kinda scared you, to meet him in person almost made you wanna crawl into the nearest hole and shiver in fear! He was most definitely huge. Any averaged-sized man would be squealing for his mommy if they met Albert face-to-face! And THIS guy is your doctor. Whether or not he's your Doctor DEATH is yet to be seen.

By the time you considered jumping out the window and running like hell, your beloved wife scooped you off the passenger seat and gripped you tight in her palm as she got out of the car. She squeezed you awfully tight, as she anxiously headed over to Albert.
'Geez, Angie! I'm not dead YET!' you thought to yourself.

"Angela, dear!" you overheard the suave voice coming from above, "youve finally arrived!"

"Dr. Albert!" Angela looked directly up at the titan and smiled, "nice to meet you again!"
"The feeling is more than mutual!" he greeted her. You finally mustered the courage to look above, only to barely notice the zipper of his pants! Trying to push the thought of the um... announcer's footrest, you jerked your head even further to see beyond the clouds! You could notice him squinting his eyes as he looked down YOUR direction! "Er... um... hold on, one moment," he adjusted his glasses a bit, "um... OH! Steven? Is that you?"

"Y...yeah, that's me."
"Hm?"
"YES! IT'S ME!" you shouted. You immediately regretted raising your voice when you saw a rather eerie smirk across his face, "Oh! Good! Good! You are just the man to see!"
"Oh?" you said, "Why is that?"
"I have good news for you, my friend! VERY good news!"
"What kind of good news, Alberto?" you asked.

"What if I told you that in just a few minutes, your days of living like a tiny fish in a giant lake of whales would finally be over?"
Interesting question.

"You wont believe this dear," Angela remarked with the same eerie smirk, "We wanted to surprise you, but Dr. Albert has just recently discovered a cure for your illness!" A cure? A CURE?!!
"That is correct, my dear!" said the giant, "Funny thing. Throughout many years, I have tried and tried to search for a cure for my problem with no luck whatsoever. Yet, in only a few months, I've successfully find a true cure for yours! Arent you very lucky?" You didnt like how that last sentence came out.

"Right here, in my very pocket," he points to the pocket in his coat, "lies the ultimate solution to all your troubles..." Ok, that sentence seemed a bit odd of a way to put it, "With just a few drops of this special-serum, the dreaded SMS would no longer threaten you. You would finally be relieved of your misery.... permanently!" Ok, Albert's REALLY starting to creep you out! But he did say it was a cure. A cure to... relieve of your... misery! Oh, damn, it's a poisoned needle, aint it?

Your wife on the other hand seemed excited to hear the news, "Oh, isnt this great, honey? It'll finally be over. We can put the past to rest. And we can finally live the life we always wanted to live." By 'We', did she mean you and her... or her and HIM?
Wonderful! Could these two be any less horifying? Either theyre excited to cure you or excited to kill you. Damn it, what possessed you to come to a doctor like Albert of all people months ago?!
You didnt even get to say goodbye to your children... well, CHILD. Youre pretty sure one of them aint gonna miss you... but your son... he's gonna be all alone in that humongous scary world. Life is officially unfair.

...Wait! Wait a second! If Albert wanted to bump you off, why would he need to poison you? He could step on you, or crush you with his fingertips, or toss you in a garbage truck, and it's not like you'd leave much of a corpse behind for a murder investigation! Hell, he could feed you to his dog and no one will ever know what became of you! There'd be no point in having to inject a huge bloody needle into your tiny body.
Unless... maybe he really DOES have a cure! Perhaps youre wrong about this guy. Sure your wife's hot, but he's still a doctor... a doctor with an illness like yours, only opposite. Youre kindred spirits!

This is tough.

"So, Mr. McMinor... are you ready?"
14113221.title: The Ultimate Cure

choices: You cant do that to Angela!
141132211.content:
There's no way out at this point. Nowhere to run and nowhere to hide. It's scary, but if it's your time to go, it's your time to go. Besides, what if he really is holding a cure? You'll never know if you keep turning tail and run. Keep your head high and dont ever look back!
You swallow hard, "...Yeah. I'm ready. Let's do this."

Albert nodded, "Erm... good. Good. Glad to see your um, enthusiasm!" For some reason, he sounded a little unsure of himself there. Why, you wonder?
Judging by the way he was eyeing your wife, THAT might be the answer. 'Um... Angela, dear. Would it be alright if I had a um, minute alone to speak with your husband... in private?" In private?! Why the hell does he need to speak to you in PRIVATE? Whatever he has to say to you, he can say in front of her! Unfortunately, you lacked the necessary guts to speak to someone almost a hundred times your size like that!

Angela, on the other hand, didnt seem to mind. "Sure. I'll leave you two alone. Do what you gotta do!" she answered as she set you down on the ground. ...'Do what you gotta do'?
"Gracias, my dear!" Albert thanked her just before clapping his hands. In an instant, two much much smaller maids appeared to Albert's side.. or technically to his knee.

"Sí, Señor Gigante?" the two maids spoke in unison.
"Would you kindly show Mrs. Mcminor around while I have a moment alone with my... patient?" Damnit, will he stop doing that?!
"Sí, Señor Gigante!" the two maids bowed and replied as they escorted your wife off to the garden.

"Call me when youre finished, ok honey?" she replied. Youre unsure who she was talking to...
Now it was just you and him. David and Goliath. Jack and the Giant. The Colossus and that guy who was hunting down the Colossi to save the princess. You werent afraid, you were TERRIFIED. You were shivering and shaking as you were left at the mercy at this titantic doctor whom you agreed to leave your wife to when you die.

Albert, finally turned to you, looking straight down as he pulled out a cigar from one of his pants pockets and a lighter from the other. He lit the cigar and took a deep breath of it before blowing a big smoke cloud over your head. Not a good sign.
"It's... been a while," Albert finally spoke. His voice sounded rather cold, "...since I had a good smoke."

You sighed hard and took a deep breath, "...Whatever youre gonna do to me, could you make it quick?"
"What are you talking about?"
"Why dont we just cut the crap?" you finally built the courage to speak up, "I know what youre hear for. Hurry up and do it. Just promise me you'll take very good care of my wife and kids, ok?"
For some reason, he seemed a little clueless, "I... am not quite sure I understand."
"WILL YOU COME OFF YOUR GIANT HIGH-HORSE ALREADY, YOU FUCKING OGRE?!" Whoa. You didnt actually think you had it in you! Even Albert's big eyes widened when you said that, "...I know why you brought me here. You and Angela want to kill me? Then just fucking do it. I'm right here! Hurry it up, doc."

He finally plucked that cigar out of his mouth. "...Steven? Is that really what you thought? You honestly believe... I was going to do something so horrible as that to you?"

...What? "Wa-wait. You... you DONT wanna kill me?"
"NO!" he shouted so loud, the earth around him rumbled, "of course not! Steven, you are like a kindred spirit! We shared such hardships! We are both freakshows in the same carnival of life. Why would I do something so horrible to one of my own?"
...Yikes. Now you feel like shit. The guy seemed so deeply sincere when he said that. Perhaps you really need to stop watching so much tv!
"Then... what did you bring me here for?" you asked him.

"I just told you," Albert answered as he pulled a test-tube full of blueish inside, "I found a cure for your illness. One sleepless night, I decided to do a little a test, mixing both virus cells of SMS and PBS together and came up with an incredible result. It seems when the PBS virus come in contact with SMS virus, the SMS nuclei seems to absorb the PBS cells and slowly deteriorates and weakens into a vulnerable state in which the white blood can easily eradicate the remains left behind. This is the result!"
"So in other words," you guessed, "your syndrome can kill MY syndrome?"

"If that is how you want to put it," he answers, "however... I am afraid I cannot just hand this over to you for free. There is something... or rather someONE that I want in return for the cure!" FIGURES! OF COURSE THERE'D BE A CATCH! THE DAMN SNAKE!!
"Let me guess! You want my wife, right?!"
"Of course not!" OF COURSE....Not? "I'm sorry, but I do not want anything to do with that woman."
Of course, you dont believe that. "Are you kidding?! After all that time you've been spending with her behind my back..."
"We talked every once in a while," he interrupted, "but mostly, regarding you. Recently, we've been attending a few book clubs together, but I think she only joined them to keep in touch with me about the progress."

"Then what about her saying that it was fun to play with in the bedroom?!" you remembered the stuff your darling daughter said, "and reading her that bedtime story, the Kama Su-"
"Heh!" Albert laughed a little, "you know, I could of sworn I heard another girl spread a similar rumor about me like that before. What can I say? Some people, they can be just childish." Eh... cant exactly blame him. He apparently IS popular with the ladies.
Alright, perhaps it's best to give him the benefit of the doubt.

"Ok, ok, fine!" you give up, "if it's not my wife, then who exactly is it? ...It's not my daughter, right?"
Albert shook his head, "No... the one that I want... is you."

......

......

............................................................................ ................................................................................ .......................................................

"...Oh. Oh. OH. OHHH!! Oh.... oh? Oh. ...ohh.. oh! Oh ho ho ho! ...Eooh... oh-oh. Oh ho! Oooh. Oh. Oh youre gay?" was pretty much the only thing you could come up with saying that moment! Seriously, it did take you by surprise! Of all the... I mean, well... sheesh! Eee!

"Youre... youre joking, right?" Albert didnt say anything. He wasnt joking. "But... but why?"
"Well..." the gay doc scratched the back of his head, "perhaps my search for a good woman was nothing but a dead end. So many women that I could have... so many that I did not want. Perhaps in the end, what I REALLY was a good man." That wasnt very poetic, but-
"And ever since the day you were brought into my office... I felt some sort of bond with you. Like we were two sides of the same coin. It saddened me to tell you that your illness would soon destroy you mentally before it destroyed you physically. And... and when you said that you wanted no other man to look after your wife and children when you pass on other than the kind Dr. Albert Gigante, I... I just..."
You coulda sworn you noticed him try to fight back a tear!

"Your... your wife... " what about your wife? "when I heard how she couldnt wait for you to pass on, I... I felt I had to hurry and act as soon as possible. She... she cannot be trusted."
"What are you talking about?"
"I fear she is plotting your death," he openly admitted, "honestly, after spending time with her for a while, I learned she is a very cold woman. Cruel, bitter-hearted... a kind-hearted gentle person like you deserves much better!"

Normally after hearing him say that about your wife, you'd climb up his pant leg and rip off his gigantic balls with your bare hands, but come to think of it, Angela (if that IS her real name!) has been acting a bit shady for a while! Could she honestly want to do something so... so...
"I can offer you everything that woman cannot and will not," Albert told you, "Not just a cure, but fame, fortune, wealth beyond your wildest dreams, and a long luxurious lifetime for you and your children. What do you say?"

Damned if you arent tempted. Sure, youre not gay, but then again, you'd be a made man! Everything you'd ever want at your fingertips and then some...
Do you dare abandon this life... for THIS one?

"Goodbye cure" or "Hello Husband"?
141132211.title: ...Ya still dont hate me yet?! :D

choices: Albert decides to keep you his little secret.
1411322112.content:
It’s the age old question that every strait man asks himself at some point: would you rather lose your mind from the same disease that’s kept you only 3 inches tall your entire life; or, accept the love that dare not speak its name.

“Fuck it,” you say with a shrug as you stare up at Dr. Gigante, “just kill me now.” There’s no anger or spite in your tone; no recriminations or accusations. Just an acceptance that this is the way it’s meant to be. “Just make it quick, huh?”

For just a second Albert stares at you before he gives a shrug and turns away to pick up something that looks like a spray bottle. You close your eyes and stand as straight as you can, prepared to accept your death like the miniature man that you are. It’s with a slight amount of irritation that you push aside the thought that you’d have liked Albert to argue with you juuuust a little bit. I’m mean, he did just pour his heart out to you hadn’t he? This thought is forgotten as you are hit with a cool liquid right in the face.

And this is how it ends for you; death, it seems, sounds just like someone using a Windex bottle. After several squirts you are absolutely drenched in the fluid. You do your best to remain standing; facing your liquid firing squad. Nothing happens. You allow several seconds to pass. Still, nothing happens. Worse, you realize what the fluid smells like: your wife’s new perfume.

Finally you crack your eyes open. You howl in pain as your realize you should have wiped the liquid from your eyes first. “What the fucking hell do you think you’re doing?!” you scream up at Albert who’s simply staring down at you with a smug expression. “I said I wanted to die; not smell like I’ve spent the day in some French whore’s cooch!”

Chucking at your tiny temper tantrum, Albert leans a little closer, “are you sure that’s what you want?”

“Of course it is!” you practically howl. Is this really what it’s come too?! You’re going to have to beg him to kill you? How the fuck did that happen? “Did you really think that I was going to… to… to do… whatever it was I didn’t want to do?!” You’re so pissed off at the hulking behemoth; but suddenly your thoughts seem to have gotten so fuzzy. Fuzzy enough, in fact, that you can’t seem to remember what you were angry about, which only makes you even angrier! “Now quit being such a fucking nimrod and do… uh… whatever it is I wanted you too!”

“You admitted that you had feelings for me and that you wanted to start a homosexual relationship with me,” Albert says with a knowing grin. It’s a statement told in a tone of supreme confidence.

“I,” you scream up him; your voice gradually trailing off as that thought tries to push past your fuzzy head, “did?” Somehow that sounds so familiar but you can’t really ever see yourself doing that. It’s fine for other people. What goes on in their bedroom is none of your concern; but at the same time, you know that your door doesn’t swing that way. “I don’t really remember…” you begin before Albert interrupts.

“I was surprised myself,” he says comfortingly, “but you seemed pretty sincere. And as I was saying I appreciate the thought but I’m really more interested in the opposite sex, if you know what I mean.”

You feel your stomach drop slightly as he lets this sink in. Wow. You feel so foolish now. Soaking wet in perfume and shot down by the only man you’ve ever truly loved. No wait… that’s not right it is?! “Are,” you ask skeptically as you struggle to focus your slippery thoughts, “are you sure that’s what happened?”

Still looking down at you, you watch Albert’s smirk finally drop, replaced with something closer to irritation. “Hmm…” he says as the starts making notes on a pad, “seems he’s started to grow resistant to the serum.” Setting the pad down he turns back towards you with an eye dropper which you watch him fill from the same bottle he’d sprayed you with.

“Open your mouth,” he commands as he jabs the business end of the dropper towards your face.

“Why? What’s in there—uuhuhhhhua…” Ignoring your question you find the surprisingly thick glass tube forced deep into your mouth before it unloads its foul liquid into your throat. Yup, pretty sure you know what team you prefer to play on. Coughing and sputtering you finally manage to tear the end of the eyedropper from your mouth. “What :::::cough:::: the hell was in that thing?!” you shout up at Albert as your surprise turns back into anger. And this was the man you thought you loved?! Well, if he thinks he can treat you like this and still expect you to just accept it then he’s… uh… really tall. Yeah! So there! And why the hell are your thoughts so damned fuzzy again?!

Setting the dropper aside, Albert turns back towards you and leans down to stare you right in the eye. “You,” he says in a commanding tone, “are gay.” And of course you are! How insightful of him to notice. Why, you’d never even realized that about yourself but it seems so clear when he tells you. “And you want to leave your wife and children,” Albert continues. Right again! Wow, he’s good! Truth is you’ve probably been thinking about it for some time and hadn’t even told yourself. “And you want me to take good care of your wife when you do,” he says seriously though there’s a certain stress on the ‘good’ part. And sure enough you know exactly what he’s talking about. You have no doubt that this incredibly handsome man above you will take real ‘good’ care of your wife. Huh? Right? Wink wink! You with me?

Albert continues to stare at you for a few moments before he finally smiles and nods in satisfaction. You on the other hand, stare vacantly off into space with a rather happy, vacant smile on your face. Somewhere in the back of your numb mind a teeny, tiny, itsy, bitsy thought finally bubbles to the surface. For just a second you roll the thought around as you consider the best way to verbalize it before you finally open your mouth.

“NOOOOOOOOO!!!!!!”

Like an avalanche, your mind clears and a thousand different thoughts hit you at once. You remember the ride here with your wife; you’d argued until she’d put on some of that damned perfume and begun lying about you dying and it being YOUR idea that she have an affair with the freak above you. And you’d agreed! You remember her suggesting that you update your life insurance; you’d refused until she’d put on that fucking perfume and then: presto! You’d suddenly wanted to do whatever she says! Oh, god! You remember being present for your wife’s and Albert’s first night together! How you’d fought and struggled as they’d put you to such perverted uses; laughing the whole time! But a few squirts from her special bottle and you’d pushed all those thoughts aside.

“You fucking bastard,” you snarled up at a clearly surprised Albert, “I’ll kill you!” With your gauntlet cast you hurl yourself off the counter towards the giant freakish… freak! This, it turns out was not an especially bright idea; at his size he takes barely half a step back, more in surprise than for defense, and places himself far beyond your pathetic leap. Instead you literally jump directly into his open hand which closes around you.

You try to brace yourself for what’s coming; all he has to do is make a fist and you become a new flavor of jelly. But it doesn’t come. What does, actually seems worse and makes your blood runs cold. You hear the sound of a zipper being pulled down. “Uh oh,” you think pathetically just before your hand prison opens again.

“I tried to be humane about this,” Albert says with a tone of disappointment, “your wife wanted to do away with you a bit more creatively but me? I’m a doctor, I said. I don’t want to kill, I said. I can make him WANT to leave, I said.” He sighs heavily as he begins to lower you down his immense body. “It seems that I’ve failed so far. But if I can’t force you to be gay, I’ll train you to be.”

Two massive fingers lift you from his palm as his other hand reaches down to his pull open the elastic of his giant briefs from his body. No, this isn’t happening. Please, please, God say that this isn’t happening. Why couldn’t you have just been dying of some degenerative brain disease?!

“Oh look,” Albert actually coos down at you just before he releases you, “it’s hungry.” And down you plunge! Looking back… this has been a pretty shitty day.

info.brief_description: Born only three-inches tall, go through different periods in your tiny life.
info.description:
Your name is Steve Mcminor and you are only three-inches tall. You weren’t shrunken, you were born this way. All your life you have been scurrying around under people, avoiding their feet as you go. Finding yourself in dangerous situations at every turn, the only reason you aren’t dead yet is that your body is particularly tough. You’ve survived being stepped on, sat upon, and swallowed and hundreds of other mishap that would leave anyone else dead. You can hold you breath ten times as long as a normal person and survive tall falls. Don’t mistake your toughness for immortality, you’ve had your fair share of bruises and bumps and aren’t quite ready yet to find out how much pressure your body can take. You are in a losing battle with your hormones, which are only kept in check by the fact that if you ever even try to have sex, you’re very likely to fall into a girl.

Travel through different time periods in Steve’s life. Dealing with his cruel sister, MILF moms, hot best friend, vicious classmates, oblivious crush, sexy nurse, and horny coeds. All you have to do is remember to look out above because you’re Steve Mcminor, three-inch man.

I only ask for proper spelling and grammar and that the chapters be bigger then one sentence. Anything goes for the story, Steve can be eaten, sat on, inserted, get a blow job, get used by men or his family and anything your mind can come up with. Other people can grow, but keep Steve small and remember he’s tough so it’ll take more then being sat on for him to die.

Have fun.
